1b1(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na swatwa s+ya pa ra mAr+tha nA ma
1b2(rgyud): sAM gI ti/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam
1b3(rgyud): pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
1b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul dka' 'dul
1b5(rgyud): ba rnams kyi mchog/ dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// rdo rje dbang
2a1(rgyud): phyug gsang ba'i rgyal// nam rgyas pad+ma dkar po'i spyan// pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal// rang gi lag gis
2a2(rgyud): mchog/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa// khro gnyer ldan pa'i rlabaso la stobs// palan rdo rje mtha' yas pa// dpa'
2a3(rgyud): gdul dka' 'dul ba 'o// dpa ba 'jigs rgyang gzugs can dang // do rtse mo ba 'greg// rang gi lag gis gsor byed
2a4(rgyud): shes rab thabs dang snying rje che// 'gro don byed pa rnams kyi mchog/ dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can// kro
2a5(rgyud): sus kyi gzugs ldan pa// sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon// lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// mgon
2a6(rgyud): po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar ba byas gyur nas// 
2b1(rgyud): spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// byang chub ji ltar ba dang / thob mdzad// nyon mongs
2b2(rgyud): pas ni sems dkrugs shing // mi shes 'dam du byed 'aye// sems can kun la sman pa dang // bla med 'bras bu bob bya'i phyir// bcom ldan skyon pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i bla ma 'ashad du
2b3(rgyud): gsol// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa rig pa mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku'i// gtsug tor chen po'i tshig gi bdag/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// 
2b4(rgyud): ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// don zab don ni rgya che zhir// don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba// thog ma par dang mthang dge pa// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mchog/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
2b5(rgyud): gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang yang yang yang gsungs pa gang // rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'dir// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'a
2b6(rgyud): dpag med rnams kyis dgyes pa yis// gang yang yang dag rab gsungs pa// bdag kyang 'di ni gzung bar bgyid// bsam pa brtan pos nges 'byung bar// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi// 
2b7(rgyud): gas pa'adzin de ltar bdag 'gyur bgyi// nyon mongs pa lus bsal ba dang / na mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa 'o// khyad par dri bzhin rab bshad 'tshal// gas
2b8(rgyud): dbangal gan rdo rje yis// de bzhin gshegs la de gad du// gsol btam thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas ni sbyin sngar 'dug/ gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu drug go// 
3a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan shA thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyigal nas ljags pabang dge/ ring zhi yangs pa brgyang mdzad// 'jig rten gsum pa snang byed
3a2(rgyud): cing // bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa// 'jig rten rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'jig rten gsum po kun bkar
3a3(rgyud): ste// lagan rdo stobs poche// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // lag na rdo rje khyod legs so// 'grol phan pa'i don du khyod// snying rje tshe dang ldan pa
3a4(rgyud): 'jam dpal ye shes pa yi mtshan// yang dag brjod pa don cha ba// dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// da las mnyan par bcod pa ni// gsang ba'i bdag po spyod legs so// de pyir 'di na
3a5(rgyud): bshad bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bcom ldan de ni legs shes gsol// lan gyi gsung tshigs su bcad pa drug go/ de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// gsang sngags mtha' dag
3a6(rgyud): rigs chen po// gsang sngags rig pa 'chang ba'i rigs// rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten sdang byed rigs chen dang // phyag rgya tshas
3a7(rgyud): / po'i rigs mchog dang // gtsug tor chen po'i rigs chen no// rigs drug la gzigs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis sa// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing // gnyis su med par
3a8(rgyud): bdang // skye ba med pa'i chos can 'de// cig gi bdag pos tshigs bcad gsungs// a A i I u A me ma ma ma e saHhrI rjid dran pa ti he bu d+d+ho bad+d+hAn N+ya dA ba dz+rI na/ oM badz+ra / 
3b1(rgyud): duHkha n+na prad+yA dA na mur+ha ye/ dz+nyA na kA yA lpA g+h+r-i shwa ar pa tsanA ya te na maH/ sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa chags su bcad pa gsum mo// 'di ltar
3b2(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a yig byung // a yig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen 'gyur med dam pa yin// srog chen po ste skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa
3b3(rgyud): ba ste/ brjod pa kun gyi rgyal mchog/ chog kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod pachen po 'dod chags te// sams can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhesdang che/ 
3b4(rgyud): kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug ce// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa rnams
3b5(rgyud): sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po mgu ba che// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// kha dog che zhing lus bong che// ming yang che zhing rgya che ba// dkyil 'khor che
3b6(rgyud): phangs pa yini// shes rab chen po'i mtshon 'chang ba// nyon mongs lpags kyu che ba'i mchog/ grags chen snyan grags chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsal ba rje// mkhas be k+Shu 'phrul
3b7(rgyud): po'achang // sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba
3b8(rgyud): bzod chen 'ching ba brtan pa ste// brtson 'grus chen po pha rol gnon// bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba// stobs po tsho la thabs che ba// 
4a1(rgyud): lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// byams chan rang bzhin dpag tu med// snying rje chen blol mchog/ shes rab chen po blo tshan ldan// thabs ched byed pa chen po s+ho/ 
4a2(rgyud): 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// sred pa'i ri bo chen po'i ngoms/ 
4a3(rgyud): shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // drag po chen po drag shul che// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste// tha ma gsang sngags che ba mchog/ theg pa chen po
4a4(rgyud): tshul gnas pa// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu bzhi'o// // sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// thub pa chen pa
4a5(rgyud): ba chen ldan// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// pha rol phyin bcu
4a6(rgyud): pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ste// sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba bo// rnam
4a7(rgyud): bcu po don bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag/ kun gyi don ni ma lus byed// nam bcu dbang ldan cheb po// thogs med pa spros med bdag/ de bzhin nyid bdag dag
4a8(rgyud): 'ad// yang dge sman ga bya bya gyis// ngas+ya sa pa de bzhin byed// gnyis su med dang gnyis med sgra// yang dag papa' ma rnam par gnas// bdag sadas de'i sgra dang ldan// 
4b1(rgyud): ri dregs ngan 'jigs byed// kun tu 'gro ba'i don yod bzod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs// rgyal bar gra ma rnam pa rnal// mabang po bstar baspobs zor// tshogs kyi
4b2(rgyud): tshogs kyi gtso// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste// tshul chen gzhan gyis 'dren pa min// tshig rnga tshig bdag sgra mkhas pa// tshig la dbang batsha
4b3(rgyud): las// tshig bden bden par smra ba dang // bden pa bzhin ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir ma'ong// bse rus pa 'dren pa ste// ras 'byur sna tshogs des 'byung ba// 'byung ba chen po rgyug
4b4(rgyud): dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad// 'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob// bsil bar gyur pa gos pa med// rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan// bde gshegs la
4b5(rgyud): rten rig pa mchog/ bdag gi mi 'dzin dar mi 'dzin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar zin pa la// bya ba byas pa skams gnas// ye shes 'da'a'i
4b6(rgyud): / shes rab mtshon chas nam 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// legs pa'i lam ni ston pa'o// 
4b7(rgyud): don grub grub pa'i kun tog ne// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// rnam par mi tig dbyings mi zad// chos dbyings dam pa zad pa med// bsod rims ldan pa bsod nams tshogs// ye shes
4b8(rgyud): gnas che// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// tshogs gnyis tshogs dang yang dag ldan// rtag par kun rgyal rnal 'byor can// bsam gtan bsam bya blo yi bdag/ so so rang
5a1(rgyud): / mchog gi dang spogs ma 'chang // sangs rgyas spu lnga'i bdag nyid can// kyab bdag ye shes lnga la bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can// s+yAd lnga chags pa na
5a2(rgyud): 'phrul du bskyed pa 'gro ba'i bdag/ nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shes rab la shes ma ba / rkyen rnam par snang bar byed// ye shes snang ba lam meg// 'gro ba'i ma byug
5a3(rgyud): // gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug tar chen po rmad byung gtsug/ nam mkha' bdag po sna tshogs
5a4(rgyud): ston// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gro ba dga' ba'i mig dang ldan// sna tshogs gzugs can bsred pa ga// kha chod thos rjed 'os drang srang che// rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags
5a5(rgyud): // da pagasang sngags // gaH na rdzogags pa/ ga pa gsums sog son pa 'o// don po dgags ldanam pa // 
5a6(rgyud): lcags kya shags pa che// shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad ba rkang bas dben pa nyi shuHlnga'o// derje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po ga
5a7(rgyud): gas// me gtsug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng dus mche ba gtsigs pa po// ta la ha la gdong brgyapa// gshin rje ma thar byed bgegs kyi rgyal// rdo rje shugs can
5b1(rgyud): gas kyang pa// de grags pa dang nyid// rdzu 'phrul dong gsus na// da phyu gnas rje dbang // do gyur pa gapa' 'drag// migaso la pa gcig 'asgyings pa// glang chen lpags pa
5b2(rgyud): don pa 'chang// ga can tu rgya nas sogs pa//  hriM zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gad ma chen po gang tungs pan// rdo rtag dam cher sgrogs pa// de rnasams dpa' sems dpa'/ 
5b3(rgyud): bde ba che// rdo rjeg tum po dga' bya// rdo/ d+hi mdza hU~Mg gzugs// rdo rje mda' yi mtshan 'chad ba// ro rul bris gcod mad pa// de kun 'chad rdonacan// rdo rje gcig zug phulas la la/ 
5b4(rgyud): bar bgatsug pa mag/ ma gnas dang 'byu bas// da 'babs pa 'babs pa te// mig brgyab ste po mig/ de dza'i sku ga las// dad ni lus gcig Ta// da kyi thos dmas
5b5(rgyud): pha mas// da seng po grags pa ma rigs// ro brang thags dpal dang ldan// dod rgyan gyis brgyan paste// gang rgya sa t+ta sa zer gzhes// ye ni dreg pa dzin// 'angam
5b6(rgyud): meg// 'jig rten gsum gcigs chen po// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug sa// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ me longs bu'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa rkang ba dang bcas pa bcu'o/ 
5b7(rgyud): radag bdag med de bzhin nyid// yang dag mtha' snrel ge med// stong nyid sba ba'i khyu mchog ste// zab cing rgya che skra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung ste sgra chen po// chos kyi gaN DI sgra bo che// rab tu mig
5b8(rgyud): gas bcu chos kyi bca// gzugs med gzugs ldan dam pa ste// snga chags gzugs can yod rang bzhin// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// ga
6a1(rgyud): ba lus 'cha ba go// snang ba med cing bar grags// khams gsum dab gagacan pos// 'phags las shin du macol gnas// chos kyi rtsog ni rjer 'byung bya/ 
6a2(rgyud): rten gsab po gcig gnon lus// gnas bdan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// sdug gu 'jig rten gsu ma na mangs// thob dpon 'jib rten yon tan shes/ 
6a3(rgyud): 'dig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med// mnon skyob 'jig rten gsus khyab pa// skyabs dang skyob pa blan med// nang pa kha' khyab par longs spyod pa// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sa
6a4(rgyud): marig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol sor// ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can// yang dag rdzogs pa'i
6a5(rgyud): rgyas rgyan// sdug bsngal gsum kyi sdug bsngal te// gzu ma mtha' mtha' pas thos gsum pa// sgrib pa thams cad nges par thal// mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyan pangs drim dun
6a6(rgyud): las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtogs par gnas// sems can kun gyi klu chen po// yon tan thod can rnams kyi thong // lcags kun las rnam grol ba// nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa/ 
6a7(rgyud): de bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems can kun don byed// phan 'dog sa sem
6a8(rgyud): namanyes gshen pa// bzang ngan shes shing dus shes pa// bya ba bdag dam shes dam chog ldan// dus shes sems can dbang po shes// nam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tu
6b1(rgyud): spyo na nas// chos gas can 'grags 'byu / grags pan myo pashes pa// grags pa dpal maston pa dag/ dbugs 'byen chen po dag na // dga' ba chen po las/ 
6b2(rgyud): mgro phun sum tshogs// rab tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal// mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste// skyabs kyi dam bskyabs su'os// rab mchog 'jigs pa chen ba'i dgra// 'jigs pa ma lul pa/ 
6b3(rgyud): bapo// gtsug phud pud phu ral pa can// rol pa mdor ga cod pan ldan// gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i thod// mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang // tshangs par
6b4(rgyud): tshul zhugs mchog/ dka' thub mthar byin dka' thub che// lus ldan go'u ta ma mchog/ bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa rig/ tshangs par mya ngan 'das pa thob// gral ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhing / 
6b5(rgyud): ba nyid// mya ngan 'das gi mya ngan 'das// legs par nges 'byung mthar byed pa// bde dang sdug bsngal mthar byed gnang // 'dod chags bral ba brtags pa zad// thub pa med pa dpe med pa// gas
6b6(rgyud): ne mi snang gos pa med// cha med kun 'gro khyab pa po// phra mo sa bon zag pa med// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa// shin du rab sad nams padag/ thams cad ye shes
6b7(rgyud): kun rig mchog/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog mthar med/ 
6b8(rgyud): dang po'i sangs rgyas ris med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dab ba ma
7a1(rgyud): gnas// smra ba'i sa thub pa med// kun du lta ba mchog tu dga'// gzi brjid phreng ldan bltan sdug/ 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal zhi be'u// snang ba gsal bar byed pa'i 'od
7a2(rgyud): sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug du 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing // nyon mongs nad gyid gra tsho ba// sdug su 'jig rten gsum kyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgya skar dkyil 'khor
7a3(rgyud): can// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng // 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad+ma ga
7a4(rgyud): / khyab bdag chen po rin cher gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/ 
7a5(rgyud): rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje kun 'chang mnga' bdag ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun
7a6(rgyud): kyithugs la gnas// sangs rgyas san gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtsho dang ldan// rdorje nyim snang ba che// de rje zla ba dri med 'od// chags bral dang po tshogs pa che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar
7a7(rgyud): 'o// rdo rje skyi la dbyung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa// dbul ldan sangs rgyas bcwa gyis/ kun sa khyer ye shes mngod 'dzin pa// rgyal posgra 'phrul snga tshogasar
7a8(rgyud): che sangs rgyas reg pa 'chang // rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// rnam par dag pa 'gyur med mchog/ theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod// mtshan cha chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje bab mi ngani dag/ 
7b1(rgyud): don bzhin dag/ pha rol phyin bkun rdzogs pa// sarnams thams can rnam par brgyan// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag legs dra 'od pazang // rtswa 'phrul dra ba rnal 'byor na// t+r+ya dbun rgya
7b2(rgyud): pa mchog/ ma lus rdo rje skyil krung ste// ye shes sgra rnams ma lus 'chang // kun tu babang po bla gros bzang // s+ya yi snying po 'gro ba'angan// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// sna tshogs sprul
7b3(rgyud): 'khor lo 'chang // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos te sna tshogs don// chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba// skad cig gcig la shes ra
7b4(rgyud): chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang // chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog yang dag mtha'// mi g.yo rab tu drang ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang // sa
7b5(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa// ye shes me su 'od rab gsal// so sar gzegs pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// ngan song tham/ 
7b6(rgyud): cad rnam sbyong ba// mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed// nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/ mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// blo ni sgeg 'chang
7b7(rgyud): dpal dang ldan// dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa'i dbyug pa brgya bskyed cing // rkang pa bskyod pas gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// nam mkha' khyab par gar
7b8(rgyud): byed pa// rkang pa gcig gis mthil gnon pa// sa yi snying po'i mthil la gnas// tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo gnon// rkang 'theb sen mo la gnas pa// don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// 
8a1(rgyud): pa'i don de 'jig pa med// nam rig sna tshogs rang bzhin don// sems dang rnam shes rgyun dang ldan// dngos po ma lus don dga' ba// stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags so// srid pa'i
8a2(rgyud): 'dod cags la sogapa 'dag// srid pa gsum pa dogal 9// dag ldan dgang bzhin du pa/  nga phyin ka'i zla ba'i 'ad// nyim 'acar ga nyid kyis labar ma sa// 'dod chags can
8a3(rgyud): sen mo'i 'od// zur phud bzang po mthon ka'i mchog/ skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'char // nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan// 'jig rten khams brgya kun
8a4(rgyud): bapyod pa// rdzu 'phrul drang pa stobs chen ldan// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang /  dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal// byang chub yan lag me tog dka'// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtsho// lam
8a5(rgyud): phan lag brgyad tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems cad kun la shas cher chags// nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems can kun gyi yid las skyes// sems cad
8a6(rgyud): kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don shes da sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de nyid shes// rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba// thams cad des 'byung mtha'
8a7(rgyud): la gnas// thams cad nges par 'byung ba mkhas// thams cad nges 'byung lam la gnas// thams cad nges 'byung ston pa po// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton// dag pa rnam pa ba
8a8(rgyud): gnyis 'chang // bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can// shes pa brgyad pa rtogs pa 'chang // bde don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug reg// rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnam
8b1(rgyud): par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ dpag sod sas rgyas sprul pa yi// b+ha ni bye ba 'byed pa'o// skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa snga tshogs thabs
8b2(rgyud): / kyigyis// 'gro ba'i don gyi rnam dbye can// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung ni// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag/ las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa
8b3(rgyud): rgyamatsho kun las brgal// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// nyon mongs nye nyon kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa rab spangs pa// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don
8b4(rgyud): 'du shes thams cad rab spangs don// rnam shes don ni 'gog pa 'chang // sems can kun gyi yid kyi yul// sems can kun gyi lade gnas pa// sems can kun gyi yid nang gnapa// de dag sems
8b5(rgyud): dang mnyam nyid son// sems can kun yid tshim par byed// sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba// grub mtha' 'khrul pa ldan pa min// 'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tsom med
8b6(rgyud): ba'i blo// kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag/ dus gsum phung po lnga yi don// skad cig thams cad rnam bsgom pa// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang
8b7(rgyud): lus med mu ste sku yi mchog/ sku ni bye ba rnam par 'byed// gzugs rnams ma lus kun du ston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa nyi sa bzhi
8b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags skye gnas yi ga med// gsang sngags chen pa rig la gsum pa// gas sngags don kun bskyed pa po// thegam
9a1(rgyud): yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi ge lnga// thig le stong pa yi ge drug/ rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang // cha med cha ldan las 'das pa// bsams
9a2(rgyud): bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang // bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing // ting 'dzin rigs dang rgyad rig pa// ting 'dren su ste sgra la mchog/ longs stod rdzogs sku kun kya rgyal// sprul pa'i sra
9a3(rgyud): mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur skal pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// lha yi dbang po lha yi lha// lha min dbang po sbyin byed bdag/ lha yi
9a4(rgyud): med dbang // raba'ang mos rab 'angoms dbang phrag go// srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i tha// 'jig rten phyogs bcu rab grags pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag
9a5(rgyud): byams pa'i po cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi ni yal dbagos// shes rab ral gri mda' ga'u thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngos la// dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// bdud bzhi'i
9a6(rgyud): pamathar byed pa// bdud dpung thams cad phab par byed// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas// rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os// bkur 'os rje
9a7(rgyud): bya ba'i 'os// phyag byar 'os pa bla ma mchog/ 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod// mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste// mngon shes drug
9a8(rgyud): dran drug/ kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rngu phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab byin de nyid thog// bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa/ 
9b1(rgyud): la phan pa'i gang zag mchog/ 'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin pa'i bdag phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa// 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas
9b2(rgyud): mchog/ des 'byung gsum po bgrod nams kyi// dor bye dam pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten gsum gyi skal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor ba kun byed pa// bajam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog
9b3(rgyud): bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa bco lnga'o// // mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// steng nyid snying po khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// 
9b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas dbyis pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa kyad la 'dud// sa
9b5(rgyud): rgyas snang ba phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med las byang khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// nam mkha'
9b6(rgyud): las blang khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas gar mdzad khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku khyod la 'dud do// zhes
9b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes kyi bstod pa tshogs su bcod pa lnga'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
9b8(rgyud): sku dang / 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o// khyod kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dang ba dang mgu ba chen po yang dag par bskye
10a1(rgyud): don dang / da gsum nga than rtsegs pa yos su dag pa'i phyir dag yongs su mardzogs pa dang / yongs sum dag pa'i sa dru pa spyong ldan pa dang bsonaH/ 
10a2(rgyud): dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang / bla na med pa'i don lhag par ma rtogs pa lhag par rtogs pa'i phyir dang / mthob pa thob pa'i phyir dang / 
10a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i don du yang bdag gis bstan pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bshad pa dang / rnam par bkrol ba dang / 
10a4(rgyud): bye ba dang / rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'o// la thun do rdo 'chang / 'di ni ngas khyod kyi skyed la sngags kyi chos nyid thams cad kyi byin gyi garlabs kyis skye
10a5(rgyud): brlabs pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo dang po'i rjes su bsngags pa bcu gcig sa// gzhan la ba la rgan rdo rje 'tshang/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni shin tu yongs su dag pa/ yong
10a6(rgyud): byang ba thams sa mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sa drang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byung chub po// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sabya// 
10a7(rgyud): sa rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud
10a8(rgyud): thams dpam par byed pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs 'acu'i stobs su gyur pa'o// thams cad ma byed pa'i ye shes rnams kyi sems cad ma khyen pa'o// chos thams
10b1(rgyud): de byu 'o// sa mnyams pa kyis dag par kun chub pa'o// byang chubamams dpa' sems dpa' chen pothom pa can kyi me pa shin yongs su dag pa bsod napas dang kyi shes
10b2(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu skye ba'o// lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing ngo // theg pa chen po'i rab tu gnas pa'o// byang chub sems
10b3(rgyud): dpa'i spyod pa'i 'byung khung ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o// rnam par grol ba rnams kyi rtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi bskyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung
10b4(rgyud): spyan mo 'chad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyu rab tu 'phel ba'o// pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyi tshar gcod pa'o// mu stegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'jom pa'o// 
10b5(rgyud): dud bzhi'i stobs dang dpung dang sde rnams kyi pham par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa'o// nges par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su
10b6(rgyud): smin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin to// sems rje gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no// lus dang ngag dang yid mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// 
10b7(rgyud): pa dag par sbyor ba thams cad kyi kun du sbyor ba dang bral ba'o// nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spong ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'ching ba thams cad kyi rnam pa
10b8(rgyud): / grol ba'o// lhag ma thams cad kyi thar pa'o// sems nye bar 'phro ba thams cad kyi zhi ba'o// 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// rgud pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms pa'o// ngan song gi
11a1(rgyud): grothams cad kyi 'gebs pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam dam pa'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo li rab tu ma 'jus pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo'i reg bskor ba'o// 
11a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rab tu bsgreng ba'o// dam pa'i chos ston pa'i lhag par gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sngags
11a3(rgyud): sbyad ba spyod pa rnams kyi myur du grub pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi sgom pa lhag par rtogs pa'o// gnyis su med pa so sor rtogs pa sgom pa mngon par
11a4(rgyud): sbyor ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi bskyed pa'o// yongs su dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 
11a5(rgyud): yo dag pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i so sor rtogs pa'o// mtshan yang dag par
11a6(rgyud): 'arjod pa 'di ni ji srid sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ro// 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// // gzhan yang lagan
11a7(rgyud): rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi kun du spyad pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu ge par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad
11a8(rgyud): ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyor ba'o// ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// me khom pa brgyad du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi
11b1(rgyud): bar byed pa'o// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par sel bar byed pa'o// mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rnam par sel bar byed pa'o// lhas ngan
11b2(rgyud): pa dang bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad thag ring du byed pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'phel bar byed pa'o// tshul ba
11b3(rgyud): yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ngar 'dzin pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa'o// sdug bsngal dang yi mi bde ba thabs ca
11b4(rgyud): skye bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba gyur ba'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen
11b5(rgyud): raba'o// phyag rgya dang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o// bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yi gzung
11b6(rgyud): par byed pa'o// nad med pa dang stobs dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o// dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba dang / legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs
11b7(rgyud): bcad pa dang bstod pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o// nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// shin du dag pa rnams gyi shin du dag pa'o// shin du gtsang ba rnams kyi shin du gtsang
11b8(rgyud): ldanarnams kyi nas // na pa grags pa nams kyi gan zigs pa'o// khyabs 'ad pa rnams kyi skyabs so// gas ya pa rnams kyi pa
12a1(rgyud): slob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o// dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// sring 'dod pa rnams kyi gling du gyur ba'o// rten med pa rnams kyi bla na med pa'i
12a2(rgyud): pa'o// srid pa'i na mtsho'i pha rol du 'phro ba rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o// nad thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i phyir dran pa'i rgyal po chen por gyur pa'o// blang bar bya ba dang der bar bya 'aring
12a3(rgyud): rnam par dbye ba'i phyir shes rab tu gyur pa'o// lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa'i slag rum thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ye shes kyi snang bar gyur pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / 'dod pa ji
12a4(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur dgyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gyi shes su rab tu thob pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su thar pa'o// spyan lnga rab tu thob pa'i
12a5(rgyud): phyir yongs su dag pa'i ye shes gzigs par gyur pa'o// bang zeng dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o// bsod nams
12a6(rgyud): dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis sa bcu rab tu zab par gyur pa'o// gnyis kyi chos dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do// lhag par sgro 'dogs pa
12a7(rgyud): dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha
12a8(rgyud): rang bzhin nyid do// lta ba dad par tshang tshong ma lus pa nges par sel ba nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni 'di ltar gnyis su
12b1(rgyud): med pa'i rlom nyid kyidon dang mang yang dag par 'dzin parab tu gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis chos thams cad brjod med par gyur pa'o// 'dun mkhor lo gsum pa'i rjes su bsngags pa
12b2(rgyud): gnyis so// / gzhan yang lagan do de rje 'chung / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang ma la sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mi
12b3(rgyud): shes kyi sra/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par badzad pa/ gtsug gnod bu zhes bya ba 'di mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa/ ma
12b4(rgyud): pa med pa/ dum bu ma yin pa/ tshigs su bcad pa dang / tshig dang yi ge 'di rnams nyid kyis nyim so sor dus gsum du 'dzin par byed pa dang / brjod par byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pad
12b5(rgyud): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / gzhan rnams la yang dus ji lta bar rgyas par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang / mtshan gyi don gzhan dang gzhan re re zhing yang 'jam dpal ye shes
12b6(rgyud): sku mngon du byas te/ yid rtse gcig pas sgom par byed pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang / de kho na la de la byed pa dag gis kun nas sgo'i gnas pas gnas pa dang / chos thams cad so sor
12b7(rgyud): rtogs pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa dang / rnyog pa med pa dang / shes rab kyis rjes su 'bigs pa dang / dad pas yang dag par bgrod pa de la ni/ dus gsub du dus med par sangs rgyas dang byang chu
12b8(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'dus te/ yang dag par gshegs shing yang dag par byon nas chos thams cad kyi smon pas nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid bsgom pa nye bar ston par
13a1(rgyud): byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi hud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par byed do// sangs
13a2(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su 'dzin pas kyang rjes su 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa yang nye bar bsgrub par byed do// dgra
13a3(rgyud): bcom pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la sdug pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po yang nye bar ston par byed do// gdul dga' ba 'dul ba po
13a4(rgyud): rnams kyang khro zo'i rgyal po chen po dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su skyob par gyur pa gzugs sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis ma dngas dang stobs dang ga
13a5(rgyud): brjid zil gyis mi gnon pa nyid dang / sngags dang phyag rgya dang mngon par rtogs pa dang dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par byed do// sngags dang rig pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa dang / bgeg
13a6(rgyud): dang log 'dren dang bdud dang dang phyir rgol ba dang gzhan gyis mi nub pa chen po thams cad kyang / mtshan mo dang nyin mor bcas par skad cig so sor spyod la ma dang lam rnams su yang kha krung
13a7(rgyud): ba dang bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed do// tshangs pa dang dbang po dang / nye dbang po dang / drag po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / kun 'gyed gson nu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sprin drug gi bu dang / 
13a8(rgyud): nag po chen po dang / dka' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / 'phrog sa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang rtag par
13b1(rgyud): rgyun du mtshan mo dang / nyin mor bcas pa 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang gnyid log pa dang / gnyid sad pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / mnyam par ma gzhag pa dang / 
13b2(rgyud): bruM gnas pa dang / skye bo mang po'i nang du son pa dang / de srid zong dang tho khye dang / grong dal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho phrang na gnas pa dang / dbang po'i phur ba dang / 
13b3(rgyud): sgo khang dang / lam srang dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / grong khyer gyi bar dang / cho khang gi nang du gnas pa dang / ji srid khang stong dang / ri dang dgon pa dang / chu klung dang / dur grod nga
13b4(rgyud): nags tshong tshang du nye bar son pa dang / 'phags pa dang / ma 'phags pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na rtag tu thams cad kyi chan pa pa thams cad du mchog tu bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang sbed/ 
13b5(rgyud): babyed par 'gyur ro// nyin po dang mtshan mo mchog tu bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 
13b6(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / sgo 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi me yin pa rnams dang / gzhan yang gang gapa' dang tA skar dang ma mi dang / tshogs kyi bdag po rnams dang / gang yang ma mo bdun po rnams dang / 
13b7(rgyud): gang yang gnod sbyin mo dang srin mo dang sha ba mo rnams te/ de rnams thams cad lhan cig mthun par sde dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ spyod lam dngal ma rnams su yang mchog
13b8(rgyud): tebasrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de'i lus la mdangs dang stobs rab tu 'jug par byed do// nad med pa dang / stobs dang / tshe 'phel ba yang nye ba
14a1(rgyud): bsgrub par byed do// di ni lakhor la zin po 'a rjesas pa sngags pa bcu bu'o// gzhan yang la gan dzo rje chang / mtshan yang dag par 'ad pa gcan
14a2(rgyud): nor bu zhes bya ba 'di ni nyi ma so song mnyam pa yang dag par blangs te/ mthun par gnas pa lan gsum du kha ton du byed pa dang / glegs bam du chud ba zlog par byed pa dang / rab tu
14a3(rgyud): par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te/ de'i gzugs kyi rjes su sems par byed pa dang / de'i gzugs kyi bsam gta
14a4(rgyud): byed pas de nyid sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku yis sun mi ring ba nyid las gsul bya'i dbang bar bzung nas mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
14a5(rgyud): da sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang / lhan cig gnas pa nam mkha'i mthil na bzhugs pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po de'i skye ba ji ltar
14a6(rgyud): kyang ngan 'gro dang / ngan song du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// yul mtha' 'khob kyi skye bor skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dbang po dman par mi 'gyur ro// 
14a7(rgyud): dbang po mtshang bar mi 'gyur ro// log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyung ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang nges
14a8(rgyud): bstan pa'i chos spong ba dang lkog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro// lce tshe ring po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// su ga dang nad dang mtshan gyi bskal pa rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sdigs ma lnga'i dus
14b1(rgyud): rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang chom rkun dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgud pa dang dbul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mi bsngags pa dang / 
14b2(rgyud): skur ba 'debs pa nga/ smod pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / grags pa ngan pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ba babang po dang rigs dang dus phun sum tshogs par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
14b3(rgyud): ma mdzes par gyur pa dang / gzugs dang kha dog dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug pa dang / yid la 'bab pa dang / 'grogs na mchog tu bde ba dang / mtho
14b4(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mdzes pa dang / skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa dang / chog gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// 
14b5(rgyud): longs spyod che ba dang / 'khor mang ba dang / longs spyod mi zad pa dang / 'khor mi zad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// 
14b6(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang shes bzhin dang / thabs dang stobs dang smon lam
14b7(rgyud): dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang / spra mkhas par par gyur ro// tshig gsal ba dang blun po ma yin pa dang / blo gsal bar 'gyur ro// 
14b8(rgyud): mkhas pa dang le lo med pa dang / chog shes pa dang / don che ba dang / sred pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma bkur bar bya bar
15a1(rgyud): 'chung tha~Md dmi 'on ma thos pa'i bzo nga kyis dang shes pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung las rab tugs pa pa yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ro// 
15a2(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'cha ba dang / kun du spyod pa spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang / legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
15a3(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu brjed pa med par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa dang / bgrod pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur
15a4(rgyud): 'di ni 'khor lo lnga pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig go// / la khan rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / da ltar 'pho tan dpag tu med ba dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan dpag/ 
15a5(rgyud): tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ring po mi thogs pa
15a6(rgyud): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags te/ shin tu myur bar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
15a7(rgyud): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa mang por yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos kyis sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i chos ston pa po dang / phyogs bcur chos kyi
15a8(rgyud): par gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'di ni gakhor madrog pa'i rjes su bsngags par bag su med pa'o// / mos r+b+ba sgrub 'asgra la ba shu d+ha badzum A ma aHpra ba ti pa sa
15b1(rgyud): m+b+ha ya duta sar+b+ba thAg tA dz+nyAn kA ya ba n+d+ha shwe dAn pa re shrad+hi tA pra brA p+pa pa ti A aHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta phred pa ha ra ha ra am+ba hA thA ga bAn dran bu ti/ thA lpe shwa ra ma hA dAng / sar+b+ba d+ha thA ga gan ma la su
15b2(rgyud): sbyi \u0f7fdz+nyAnA m+b+ha.A/ thugs dag de 'i'o// dengs dpal ldan pa ra// dga' zhing ma kunas lal yo snyamA~M/ mgon pa ma ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdugs sangs rgyas la phyag
15b3(rgyud): nas// nam mang mgon po gzhan rnams dang // gsang dbang lagan rdo rje de// khro ba'i rgyas por bcas rnams kyis// gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// mgon po bdag cag rjes pa rang // legra/ 
15b4(rgyud): so legs so legs par gsungs// bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni// rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba ye// rnam dag legs
15b5(rgyud): pa'i lam 'di ni// sgra 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa// zab cing langs la N+ya re ba// don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni kha rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bsha/ 
15b6(rgyud): 'di ni yang dag par smra ba nye bar bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga'o// 'phags pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las phyung ba/ bcom ldan lad/ 
15b7(rgyud): 'das dpal ye shemasams dpa'i don ngas pa'i mtshan ya dag par brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'ad de bzhin gshegs pa shA thub pa la gsungs 'ardzogs s+ho// / dran mong da na mong sa yin pa
15b8(rgyud): gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i btag nyid chen po bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa/ sba bsgru kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gyi
16a1(rgyud): gi dben gnas su legs par bsgyud cing dag par byas pa'o// sngon gyi sgra bskur chen po de dag gis// rgyud 'di bsgyur cing kun la grags lags mod// 'on kyang sgra
16a2(rgyud): gtsug la gaji bzhin du// rgyud 'di tho brtan gnyis pas legs par bskur// bab cing ma che rjetheg pa yi// des don ye shes don gtor skyes bu dag/ chos dang don la legs par mi
16a3(rgyud): gang bag tshig 'bru'i rjes su ma 'brang zhig// @#// rgya gar skad du/ se ko& sha/ bod skad du/ dbang mdor bstan pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba
16a4(rgyud): bzang pos gsol pa// ston pa dbang bskur rnam bdun dang // rnam gsum de bzhin bla na med// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub phyir// mdor bsdus pa yis bdag la gsungs// 
16a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zla bzang dbang bskur don// rnam pa bdun dang rnam gsum mchog/ tsa yi kun spyad rtsol ba ni// mdor bstan pa yis khyod la bshad// 
16a6(rgyud): mdor bstan rnam gsum dang // rgyas par bshad pa rnam gsum 'gyur// rab tu mdod bsnyun mdor bstan che// rab tu rgyas par bshad pa gzhan// mdor bstan rgyas par bshad
16a7(rgyud): rgyud yang dag par bsdus par brjod// rab tu mdor bstan rgyas bshad pa// bka' 'grel cheg ni 'byed pa'o// mdor bstan chen po rgyas bshad pa// 'grel bshad thams cad du/ 
16a8(rgyud): byed// de ni mngon shes thob rnams kyis// bya yi mkhas rnams kyis min nyid// de ltar mtha' drug rnams kyis dag/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dam bzhi dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhin
16b1(rgyud): dang // phub khams skye mched rigs drug rnams// dag pa 'jig rten khams la sogs// le'u lnga yi gzhung rnams kyis// bden gnyis dang po'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// dus kyi 'khor lo mngon
16b2(rgyud): byed/ dang por dbang bskur bdun pa gang // byis pa rnams ni gsug pa'i phyir// nam gsum 'jig rten kun rdzob kyis// dam pa'i don gyis bzhi pa'o// bden pa gnyis kyi chos rnams
16b3(rgyud): rje can bdag gis bstan pa// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang // dam pa'i don gyi bden pas so// chu dang cod pan dar dpyangs dang // rdo rje dril bu brtul shugs che// ming dang rjes gnang
16b4(rgyud): dag ldan// dbang bskur rnam bdun mi yi bdag ga lus ngag sems ni legs dag pa// mngon par dbang bsgyur gnyis gnyis so// rjes gnang ye shes yang dag dag/ gzhan pa khams sa
16b5(rgyud): 9// ni khams // da la zung pom byung //  sa sa sbyin pad/  kyil // / sangs rgyas ma rgyun mi pa//  mug ga
16b6(rgyud): par byed// yul dang dbang po legs dag pa// 'pho med do rje'i brtul zhugs 'gyur// ming ni byams sogs yang dag dag/ rjes gnang sangs rgyas nyid dag byed// dbang bskur bdun pa
16b7(rgyud): 'di rnams ni// dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas sbyin par bya// bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang // shes rab ye shes mngon brjod pa// slar yang shes rab chen po nyid// de yi ye shes mngon
16b8(rgyud): dzod byed// 'gyur dang 'gyur dang de nas 'dzag/ de nas gzhan yang mi 'dzag pa'o// lus ngag sems ni legs dag pas// dbang bskur gsum po rim pa yis// bzhi pa ye shes yang da
17a1(rgyud): dag/ lus ngag sems ni dag par byed// byis pa dang ma de nas rgan// bzhi pa skye dgu'i bdag po'o// shes rab tu mar yan lag ni// reg pas byang chub sems
17a2(rgyud): 'pho'i bde// 'o ma 'dzin pas dbang bsrur ba// gang las bde thob de byis pa'o// yun ring gsang bar spros las skyes// byang chub sems ni 'pho ba'i bde// gsang ba'i dbang
17a3(rgyud): bskur gsang ba ni// gang las bde thob de dar ma// yun ring gsang bar spros las skyes// rdo rje rtse mor g.yo ba'i pade// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba// gang las gam
17a4(rgyud): ba'i bgrod de na na// phyag rgya chen po rjes chags las// skyes pa g.yo med bde ba ni// shes rab chen po'i dbang bskur ba// gang las g.yo med rtogs pa de// skye dgu'i bdag
17a5(rgyud): por rnam shes bya// skyob pa thams cad skyed mdzad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang sems gnyis med mi 'gyur ba// 'di ni dam tshig sems dpa' 'gyur// rdo rje
17a6(rgyud): rnam 'byor rnam pa bzhi// dus kyi 'khor lo 'dir bshad pa// rnal 'byor pa yi thar ster byed// 'di nyid kyi ni sgrub byed bya// rab gsal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// du sogs mtsha
17a7(rgyud): de rnams kyi// shes rab gzugs brnyan nam mkha' mnyam// yod dang med las rnam par 'das// rang gi sems kyi rkyen gyi don// rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams// kun nas yo
17a8(rgyud): dor ba yis// du ba smig rgyu mkha' snang dang // sgron ma 'bar ba zla nyi ma na mun can cha dang thig me che/ 'a tshogs gzugs brtan 'odagasal pa// bka ba dang ma bkab mig dag gis// stong pa
17b1(rgyud): ni nges brtags yin// rmil ma bzhin du gzugs mthong 'gyur// rtag tu gzugs de bsgom par bya// dngos med gzugs la sgom pa de// rnal 'byor pa 'i bsgom pa min// dngos po dngos med sems kyi
17b2(rgyud): stong par ma brtags mthong phyir ro// de ltar phrapha ba me long la// gzhon nums mthong dngos med skyes// de bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs ches// mtha' la de nyid rnal 'byor pas// 'di las dngos
17b3(rgyud): sgra ma rmi lam mig 'phrul bzhin// med pa'i chos can dag la chos// skye ba 'di ni rab tu mthong // yid bzhin nor lta
17b4(rgyud): yas pa'i// sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// pra phab pa yi gnon nums// ma mthong ba yi rkun po mthong // nyi tseg kyi mig dag gis/ song nas sgrub pa pa yis mthong // gal te yod pa
17b5(rgyud): thugs mthong na// rang gi gdong pa cis mi mthong // gal te med pa'i gzugs mthong na// ri bong du ni ji ltar min// gzhan gyi mig gis mi mthong zhing // rang gi mig gis mthong min pa// skye ba med pa/ 
17b6(rgyud): mthong ba ni// gzhon nu ma yi bu de bzhin// gzugs brnyan mthong na de nas ni// bar ma chad par srog col bya// steng 'og ca gsum po rnams la// lus ngag sems ni 'gog pa las// zla nyis
17b7(rgyud): bshang gci dang // dra ba 'bab pa'i lam rnams su// chu me stong pas rlung dang // ye shes khams rnams skyed rnams la// gang zhig zla DI shun can dang // bshang gci khu ba 'bab ma rnams// srog
17b8(rgyud): dang thung sel rim pa yis// lus ngag sems kyis rnams so// grubathabs kyi sku yin te// nyin mor byed pa shes rab gsung // shes rab spun bshang ba'i // gcib 'ba'am nas ma
18a1(rgyud): steng 'og thugs kyi rtsa gnyis dag/ mun can khu ba 'bab ma'o// thabs kyi thugs ni mun pa can// khu ba 'bab ma shes rab kyi// steng 'og rigs drug 'di rnams ni// smug
18a2(rgyud): thugs kyin la khyong las// shes rab babs dngas can lagrags// lus ldan sa pa ga gnas/ 29sa sus dag ga la// sang 'ag zag pa'i rgya rnams kyis// spyan
18a3(rgyud): 'bab ma la// skye ba dang ni mchi ba gnas// skye dang ba che rang 'khrig pa yi// dus su khrab 'bab pa'o// sun can ma yang steng du 'bab// nyi ma'i 'phob mnyam pa la// dus sbyor 'char ba'i mngon
18a4(rgyud): su da bum nas na mnyam pa 'bab// rkang pa dang bcas lnga bcu drug/ 'byung dang 'jug pa'o me yi bdag/ bdun cu rtsa lngas lhag pa yi// drug bcwa nyin dang mtshan la ra~M// drug brgya rnams kyi
18a5(rgyud): lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig po// 'phe yis dman pa gang de rnams// gzon rang g.yas pa rtser 'bab po// phyogs gsum dang bcas logasum rnams// lo brtsarnams las dbus
18a6(rgyud): dadug yon g.yas zla nyi ma// brkyang ma lug dang ser skya gzhan// chu dang me yi rang bzhin can// pad+ma rin chen 'dzin par 'dod// 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dag/ sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin can/ 
18a7(rgyud): bu ma'i rtsa dngag lon pa yang // 'khor lo la gre 'dzin par 'das// sbyang dang 'og tu dbu ma g.yas// sgra gcan khu ba rab 'bab pa// stong pa ye shes rang bzhin car// de dro rje 'dzin pa
18a8(rgyud): zla ba'i lam gyis bshang ba'i rtsa// nyi mas gcing 'bab pa ste// skye 'chi mnyam pa chags pa la// sgra gcan khu ba rab tu 'bab// lta ba'i steng du kun 'dar ma// gang de bde bzang mun pa
18b1(rgyud): 'bab// 'og tu khub 'gab gang de// mkha' 'gro gdang dang dung can ma// lba ba'i rgya sras snyid mgrin dang // dpral ba gtsug tor 'ang ma skyes la// bcu me rlung stong pa rnams// rab tu babab pa sdang
18b2(rgyud): pris// 'byung 'gyur deni 'jug pa dag/ bskyed pas 'jug stes la'o// lnga banas ni lte ba'i dbus// a ba d+hAN+Di 'grang ba 'ong // lcags nor bur cu rgyal la/ lus ngag sems rnams 'a
18b3(rgyud): byung dang de ni 'jug pa dag/ snga dang skyed pa'i rang bzhin can// dung can gyi po thams cad rje// zung sel chung na palab pa'o// 'di rnams bud med bad ba las// khra ba khrag 'bab dus dkAr+Na/ 
18b4(rgyud): sa rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// sted du galas dang g.yon dag dang // rag tu bshad gci 'bab pa dang // rdul dang khu ba 'bab pa dag/ rdul 'bab phyir de gtum mo t+te/ 
18b5(rgyud): 'phrog dong // steng du brjod dus bud med kyi// gsung mo skyes bu'i kun 'ad ma'o// rnam shes la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga// rtag tu 'ayon pa'i rtse la'o// sa sogs g.yas pa'i tsa la ste// dbus/ 
18b6(rgyud): su drug pa 'bab pa'o// lte ba'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// dkyil 'khor drug cu nam rim bzhin// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i dus spyo ni// lug sogs glang la sogs ngal// rtsa ba g.yon dang de nas
18b7(rgyud): g.yas// steng dang dbus su rim pas drung // sa sogs dkyil 'khor re re me // dab+hag lus sna bug dag la'o// rim pas chu tshod 'bab pa ni// drug nu dang bcas sum brgya'i dbugs/ 
18b8(rgyud): brgya phrag bco brgyad dbugs de rnams// chu tshod lngar ni 'bab pa'o// chu tshod drug cu nyin mtshan du// lus la dkyil 'khor nams shes pa'o// 'dab sa'i dbul dang denas par/ 
19a1(rgyud): gapas g.yon gzhan du rem pa yis// g.yon par rtag tu nam mkha' sogs// g.yas par sa sogs gzhan las so// g.yon par rnam shes sogs 'byung ba/ 
19a2(rgyud): g.yas daras sogs sdud pa'o// rlub dang shang du 'din mardung // phan tshun shes rab thabs pan te// 'the bong med med dag gas ni// gang byapa gas dbang bsgyur ba// gang sa
19a3(rgyud): g.yon du me dang n+ya// phan can shes rab thabs yin te// gung mi 'dzub mo gnyis dag gis// gang phyar ral grer 'gyur ba'o// zla byed rnam pa'i phyag rgya ni// mche ba kr-i gug ma'i chung ste/ 
19a4(rgyud): pa'i 'gyur seng 'og tu// phan tshun thabs dang shas rab po// dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor// sor mo nams ni phan tshun du// mgo bor lag pathil sbyar ba la// mi gug dang 'a
19a5(rgyud): gcig go/ dbu ma'i rtsal mnyam pa de// skyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa bo// phung po khams dang rdo rje gsum// gcig nyid dbu mar son pa na'o// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa 'gags na// bshang ba gci
19a6(rgyud): rtsa 'gag go// sgra gcan rtsa ni 'gags pa na// 'og tu khu ba 'bab 'gag 'gyur// skyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa can// 'di rnams grol na grol bar 'gyur// srog dang thung sel lam gang
19a7(rgyud): gyi// 'di ni rtsa mi kun spyod do// g.yon pa'am ni g.yas pa la// mtshan mo gcig dang de bzhin ltar// lhag pa'i rlung ni rab 'bab pa// de las la gsum na mchi'o// g.yas pa nyi ma'i
19a8(rgyud): lhas la// lnga dang phyogs chos nyi shu dang // de nyid gcig sag gzhan rim pas// nyin ga gsum cu gsum sman// gsum gnyis gcig po zla ba ni// drug gsum zung zla nyin gag cos/ 
19b1(rgyud): grogs lnga yon tan gnyis gcig gis// lus can rnams kyi che 'gro'o// rtsa ba nas gcig lhag pa yis// g.yon par zla ba'i rgyu bar 'gyur// nye ma nyan zhag zlab dag/ nyin zhag gsum rnams/ 
19b2(rgyud): zla ba gsum// nyin la 'chi ltas zla bar dge/ 'phel 'grib de nas 'di dag la// dbu ma'i 'chi ba'i rgyu ba ni// lo brgya yongs su rdzogs pa las// mnyam dang mi mnyam nyin zhag rnams/ 
19b3(rgyud): phyogs gnyis rnam par nyams pa las// gzhan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// phyo nas gnyis yang dag gnas pan/ 
19b4(rgyud): gaMlas deng g.yon pa'i kun spyod dang / dkyil 'khor ldan mas 'bab pa phyir// bcoMms mtshan nyid shes nas ni// srog de theg ler gzhug par bya// a bad+hU tI'i skabs brten nas/ 
19b5(rgyud): mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom par bya// rtag tu rdo rje bslang bar bya// kla nyi'i bgrod pa 'joms pa las// gzhan du kun 'dar yanA lag la// srog gi rlung ni 'jug pa med// 'og tu'abadud can sa
19b6(rgyud): rungasel// de ma zhugs las 'che ba'o// 'chi ltas bslu ba rnal 'byor bya'o// 'di ni dga' ba rnams kyis 'gyur// mgo bo'i pad+ma gtsug tor las// khu ba 'ongs pa dga' ba ste/ 
19b7(rgyud): pasnying khyer mchog dga' bo// dga' bral dga' ba de nas 'gyur// sna tshogs dga' ba lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad+mar gang 'ongs pa'o// gsang gnas rdo rje nor bu'i bar// lhan cig skyes dag
19b8(rgyud): la'o'o// rab gnas mngon 'das pa man// chags chen ma 'gyur khyab bdag go// 'dod chags bral las 'pho med bde// de ni mya ngan 'das rab gnas// khub bla char gtsug tor du/ 
20a1(rgyud): / gas pa gas pa'i sa // 2 byang na // bad+ma ma gan// de ste 'i dus su la/  sa gcon ma su / 
20a2(rgyud): 'dod chags bral bas gnam stong la// nyi ma mdzod su'i gnas su 'gro// de la tshe shes bcu drug ma// gtsug tor pad+mar son pa'o// zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod de// chags pa'i 'de
20a3(rgyud): chags bral phyir// lus can thams cad 'chi ba na// zla ba bdud rtsi 'og tu 'gro// steng du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid la// de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni// steng du bgrod
20a4(rgyud): mi yi bdag/ 'og tu nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes 'gyur med bde ba la// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod sA yi// pad+mar zla ba bdud rdzinya// nyi rdul gnam stong gsang bar ste// gtsug tor
20a5(rgyud): nor bur de dag go// zhes pa ston pa'i rdo rje'i chog/ lus can kun gyi phyin ci log/ rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa min// khams rnams phyin ci log tu 'gyur// nor bur thugs dang gsang bar
20a6(rgyud): gsung // lte bar sku ste bde chen las// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// 'di rnams dag pa'i sku las sgo// thabs kyi 'og tu rgyal ba'i dbang // shes rab kyi ni steng du 'gyur// 
20a7(rgyud): yi dpral bar sku rdo rje// mgrin snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes la// gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje rnams// sprul pa la sogs 'di rnams spro// phung po khams rnams spro ba ni// sgrib pa med pa
20a8(rgyud): bde ba las// las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang / ye shes phyag rgya'i dmigs pa dang // phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas// mi 'gyur ba de 'phel bar 'gyur// 'phel ba'i 'phel bar/ 
20b1(rgyud): bgyur ba med// nyams pa'i nyams pa nyid kyang med// nub pa de yi nub pa med// 'char ba yi ni 'char ba med// rab tu gsal ba'i rab gzhal med// bkab pa'i bkab pa yang med do// skye ba'i sna
20b2(rgyud): 'gyur nyid med// 'chi ba'i 'chi ba yang med do// brel ba'i grol bar 'gyur ba 'ang med// mi gnas pa yi ma gnas med// dngos po med pa'i dngos med med// dngos po'i dngos po nyid kyang med// 'ju
20b3(rgyud): 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'ang med// mi 'gyur ba'i yang mi 'gyur med// rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams kyi// skye 'jig snga ma de bzhin no// 'byung rnams 'jigs par 'gyur min te// rang bzhin nyid kyil skye
20b4(rgyud): gyur// sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med// dngos po dngos med mtshan nyid gcig/ rang gi shes rab la 'gyud sems// rdo rje na bu'i badrang son// der son zla ba g.yo ba dang // mi g.yo ba dang mI
20b5(rgyud): lus ngag sems kyi na rnams sa// sku gsung thugs rnams bsgom pa ste// rdo rje gsum rnams legs bsdus pa// ye shes dung can mang bsgom pa'o// shes rab chags pas ku ba yi// thigs ma
20b6(rgyud): pas mgo bo las// rdzogs pa'i gnas su zhugs rnams kyang // 'ching ba dam pa'i don gyis so// ji ltar bla shar rim pa yis// cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// grib ma nyams pa rdzogs pa ste/ 
20b7(rgyud): bcad dang rdzogs pa min// de bzhin ye shes shang rim pas// sarnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// nAn mongs la sogs nyams pa rdzogs// ye shes chad dang rdzogs pa man// ji ltar po
20b8(rgyud): las dbul// rdzogs par ri bong can mi gnas// de bzhin 'gyur med bde bar sems// 'khar ba'i bag chags mtshan ma yis// skyed dang rab tu nyams pa'i phyogs// dkar po nag por rab
21a1(rgyud): gnas// de dag dbus su rdzogs pa gang // de ni rdzogs par mi gnas so// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdzogs pa la ni g.yom 'gyur// gang
21a2(rgyud): nor bur sems// de ni skad cig thams cad rdzogs// dkar po'i phyogs la 'di mi gnas// ras 'ga' dag min lam 'gro// phyogs gnyis po la dbus gnas pa// rdzogs pa
21a3(rgyud): gnas gnyis su med// gtsug tor las ni shar ba de'i// rdo rje nor bur rdzogs par 'gyur// de chags bral las cha nyams pa// rdo rje nas nyams la rab rdzogs// slar yang gats+tsha
21a4(rgyud): tid du shar ba// slar yang rdo rje nor bur rdzogs// de chags bral mas na nyams pa// lus can ye shes nyams pa min// 'di yi bde ba rgya rang bzhin// rdzogs pa'i sgra yis pa
21a5(rgyud): par bya// dngos po bor ma gzhan thams cad// 'byung dang bsdud pa'i rgyu yin no// srid las mya ngan 'das par 'gro// de las slar yang srid par 'ong // rang phyogs dag las zla bzhin dang / 
21a6(rgyud): bgrod pa dag las snang byed bzhin// rdzogs par mi g.yo ba 'di ni// sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzogs nyid// nyi khri brgyad gnyis brgya yi dbugs// 'gyur med skad cig zos rnams
21a7(rgyud): gyis// phyogs gnyis yang dag gnon pa ni// sa rnams kyis ni yongs su rdzogs// bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa// rnam pa bcu drug 'gyur ba med// rnam pa bcu gnyis sa
21a8(rgyud): rnams kyis// rdzogs pa gnyis su med pa mchog/ cha shes rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i sems// rnam pa bcu drug ma 'gyur ba// don gcig gnyis su med pa chos// dam pa'i don
21b1(rgyud): reg pa med// rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs son pa'i sems// kun nas rab tu rdzogs pa'o// chags bral dang po chags pa che// rdo rje lus med mi 'gyur che// yongs su rdzogs pa phyog
21b2(rgyud): gnyis kyi// bkru rgyags rnams kyis ma bskyed pa'o// ji ltar cu pa'i chu zhugs pa// don rna mtshor chur mtshungs pa// de bzhin dngos po 'tshogs 'di / 'gyur ba med par 'gyur med ma
21b3(rgyud): ji ltar khams kyi tshogs pa 'dis// zos pa las ni ro nyid 'gyur// sa bon rang bzhin sa bon gyis// 'bras bu'i dus su nga rgyal spangs// de ltar dngos po'i tshogs pa yang // mchog tu mi
21b4(rgyud): 'gyur zos pa yis// mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid 'gyur// rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin 'dzin// mche ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ni// dug rdzogs gnas skabs gyur pa na// rmal rig man
21b5(rgyud): gzhan du min// yul dang dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// de bzhin rnal 'byor dam pa'i bde// sems rdzogs char gyur na rdo rje// nor bur rig min gzhan du man// yul rnams dbang po'i sgra
21b6(rgyud): rnams kyis// ji ltar ro chen lcags rnams kyi// phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa ni// lcags la drag po'i mes gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed// 
21b7(rgyud): med bde// phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa yang // sems la 'dod pa'i mes gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed// ji ltar phug pa'i lcags rnams ni// 'ga' zhig tu
21b8(rgyud): yang dri ma med// de bzhin du ni phug pa'i sems// 'ga' zhig tu yang bag chags med// lugs ni gser nyid du gyur pa// me yis dri ma med par 'gyur// de bzhin yang dang yang du sems// 
22a1(rgyud): 'dod chags me les dri ma med// ji ltar nor bu che reg pas// don rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'gyur med bde reg pas// sems ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur// 
22a2(rgyud): 'di de me pa brjod pas na// 'dog rten kun rdzob badzin pa laste// lcags rnams ba tu bigs byed do// da laldan te/ ga ni// tsani gas ya / dam pas/ 
22a3(rgyud): dems g.yogs pa yi// sems ni rab tu 'bigs byed pa// ye shes mthu ni brtag bya mon// sems la glo bur dri ma med// sems pas yun ding dus can yin// sems med
22a4(rgyud): deskye ba med// sems la mi zad gnas pa min// gal te 'di nyid glo bur pa// de tshe sngon du sems dri med// gal te sems las dus ring can// de tshe de ni ci las skye// gal te sems
22a5(rgyud): med par sten// de tshe nam mkha'i me tog mtshungs// gal te sems la rtag tu gnas// de tshe kun tu thar pa man// ji ltar bangs kyi drim ni// ro yi sbyor bas nyams par 'gyur// de yi yong
22a6(rgyud): de nyags pa med// dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// de bzhin sems kyi drim ni// stong nyid sbyor bas rnam nyams 'gyur// de pi ye shes nyid nyams med// dri med nyid kyis yang dag
22a7(rgyud): nas// ri ltar bcud kyis phug pa'i lcags// lcags nyid du ni rjes 'gro min// de bzhin bde bas phug pa'i sems// sdug bsngal nyid du rjes 'gro min// chags bral las
22a8(rgyud): gzhan sdig pa med// bde ba las gzhan bsod nams med// de phyir 'gyur med bde bar sems// mi bdag rtag tu gnas par bya// gzhon nu ma yi dga' ba ni// med par bde ba smral
22b1(rgyud): A/ 5 'i dga' bamab pa na// bde ba chen po nga gis rig/ de bzhin ting ma na dang bral ba ste// de ba skabang rnas ma yin//  ya dzin thob ban+d+ha// rnal 'byod pa yis pa / 
22b2(rgyud): Sh+Tam/ wA me pas skyes pa dag pa// thams ca dang sbyin pa'ang snyam pa// de kAn ya bde / gas thal nyid dus 'o// 'bos pa sas ni chags bral na// chags
22b3(rgyud): bral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung // sdug bsngal skyes bu'i khams zad byed// bad pa las ni 'chi bar brjod// shi las slar yang de rnams kyi// srid pa'o srid las slar 'chi 'pho// de ltar
22b4(rgyud): r+ya gyi srisreng po// chag sa bral las 'byung gzhan du min// de phyir 'bad ba mas cad kyis// 'pho ba'i chags pa rnam par spangs// gang gis 'brur med bde bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor la
22b5(rgyud): bcings pa yis// 'dod ldan yang ni chags bral bar// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos su mi 'dod// bdag gis brjod pa'i rgyud du spar// rnal 'byor paces sdug bsngal 'dod// khu ba mi 'gyur
22b6(rgyud): bzhin gyis// mchog tu mi 'gyur ba sgrub par bya// rten ni 'pho 'thob pa na/ rten pa'i 'dod chags bral ba nyid// rten dang brten pa logs rdzogs pa// ji srid 'gyur med nyid su gro// 
22b7(rgyud): sems kyi 'gyur med nyid thob na// rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid med// 'gyur med las byung klu yini// mdzod su'i lakhor longs na pa'i yang // A li kI la~M mnyam sbyar ba// hUM yig mi 'dod
22b8(rgyud): pa dag/ snang ba las kyang gzugs pa da k+Shu/ bi'i byur las skyes pad ba 'bras// rgyani 'bras bus rgyas btab pa// 'bras bu'i rgyu yis byam btab pa'o// nga nyi ga sugs brnyan 'i
23a1(rgyud): pa rgyu// snying rje 'gyur med 'dzin pa 'bras// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems ni mi 'pho ba'o// mya ngan 'das pa bral ba'i gzugs// 'khor ba las 'das
23a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba// de dag sbyor po gnyis med mchog/ rtag dang chad las nges par grol// dngos med las byung mtshan nyid phyir// gzugs ni dngos po med pa min// dngos po las byung mtshan nyid phyir// 
23a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba med pa dngos po man// dngos po dngos med yang dag sbyor// rdo rje rirnal 'byor gnyis med mchog/ gzugs dang gzugs min rnam par grol// pra phab me long la bzhin no// gzugs ni
23a4(rgyud): / srid par mi 'ong ste// 'gyur med mya ngan 'das mi 'gro// phan tshun 'khyud pas zhi ba ste// ma ning gi ni go 'phang mchog/ shes rab rgyu las ma byung zhing // shes rab rgyu las byung ba 'bras// shes rab tu
23a5(rgyud): las ma skyes phyir// shes rab la skyes rgyu skyes min// shes rab ye shes bla na med// 'bras bu N+ya yis gzhan dang gzhan// phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad gang / 
23a6(rgyud): brten cing 'brel par 'byung // phan tshun rgya yis btab pa'i gzugs// kye min mya ngan 'das pa'ang min// shes rab kun nas mya ngan 'das// skye ba mchog tu 'gyur ba med// rgyu dang 'bras bu dam nges// 
23a7(rgyud): grol// phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'o// shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong ba// de ni rang sems gzhan ma yin// phyi yi shes bya rnam 'byer phyir// de phyir bdag
23a8(rgyud): gis bdag nyid la// 'gang yang rgyab gdang nus ma yani// ral gri chen po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid so yis gcod dam ci// ma sham bu mo dang 'grogs pas// rmi lam du ni bde 'gyur
23b1(rgyud): ma mkha' yas byung gzugs brnyan ni// bsnyen pas bdag la de bzhin no// shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min// 'di ni lhan skyes shes rab bcas// kun nas bad ba rdzogs pa las// sgrib pa rnams
23b2(rgyud): cad spangs pa ste// nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// yul dang dbang po spangs pa ni// kun nas 'byung po kun la gnas// gcad du med pa dbye ba spangs// rang 'byung de rje sems dpacan// don chen
23b3(rgyud): mchog tu mi 'byur ba// 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang che// nyon mongs zad pa dgra chen po// dam tshig sems dpa'
23b4(rgyud): sug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor tho ba che// lha min khro bo dgra chen po// dus kyi 'khor lo chags pa che// 'pho ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// rdo rje mi phyed ces pa
23b5(rgyud): brjod// 'di ni don chen bcom ldan 'das// sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa nyid// mchog tu mi 'gyur brjod par bya// mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba rdzogs// sa rnams yongs su rdzogs
23b6(rgyud): / pa yis// 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// byang chub la gnas sems dpa' ni// mgo yo de phyir byang chub sems// nyon mongs las
23b7(rgyud): zhe sdang tshogs// zhe sdang chen po dgra che ba// dam tshig zla ba bdud rtsi yi// khu ba 'pho med de za ba// dam tshig sems dpa'o rigs pa 'dis// gti mug bro ste gti mug sel// rdo rje ma
23b8(rgyud): gcig pa nyid// shes rab sku dang mi 'gyur bcas// khro bo chen po dag chen po// kho bo'i gzugs can bdud rnams dri'o// 'gyur med bde ba che thabs las// nam yang sems cas
24a1(rgyud): mi 'dor// sems can grol nas chags chen po// 'gyur ba'i chags pa lel bar byed// 'di rnams rnam pa drug du brjod// mi 'gyur ye shes tshor ba dang // rnam she
24a2(rgyud): sa ba da sa sa su ga/  mamanam sngu ga sa ma /  ma sa/ phanas kyi dan
24a3(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings dang dra// reg bya la dog rnams kyi la // khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// rigs drug rnams kyis yongs dag pa// sus dang gsang ba dbang posams// rtag tu
24a4(rgyud): gakhor rnam pa gsum// shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje gsum// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni dbang gi sgrub thabs te// mchog tu ma lu sgrub pa'i thabs// ma dang rigs dang yang dag
24a5(rgyud): ldan// zla ba mdor bstan pa phyis bshad// ces pa 'jig rten khams kyi le'ur le'ur lnga pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i/ dbang gi sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs so// 
24a6(rgyud): 'ipaN+Di ta som na pa dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'gro dge slong shes rab grags pas bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ slar yang sgra tshad pa rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis/ dpal na ro
24a7(rgyud): 'grel ba shad dang mthun par bsgyur zhing bus te dag par byas pa'o// 6/ sus ma sa rgyad lags// rgya gar skad du/ bar ma A di bud+d+ha sud+g+ha ta shrI kA la tsakra nA ma tAn+danA nA~M/ 
24a8(rgyud): bod skad du/ mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku
24b1(rgyud): rten mo byed pa'i sgra ste lnga'i 'dapas rgyas pa'i stan// sangs rgyas sen khrel bzhugs pa lta macwod rnams rnaMs brtanas rnal po ba pa za mas// mag tho rab tu rgyan
24b2(rgyud): pa gyu ba yan lag mchog sa bzhag nas zhus pa ni// rnas dpyan dpal ldan dus pa' ga ze ldan pa'i sa gas ma gyis rnams dbul pa / sto pa phye shes kyang
24b3(rgyud): mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha mi yang // phyi dang lum rang gzhan la lang ste rang bzhin rnamasas skye tsal nyi shu lnga pari bdag nyid dang // lus la
24b4(rgyud): bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi longs spyod dang // dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi li bla ma la 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol/ rlab bzang po khyod la bdag ma ku gang
24b5(rgyud): dge khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rab mchog snyornams dang // mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bral chub mchog rigs rnams dag gis shes pa min pas so// byungangan 'das pA la so
24b6(rgyud): pa'i mthar zug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag ni// lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya las mi yi bdag po bzang po nyon/  dus kyis stong pa rnams
24b7(rgyud): las rlung dang 'bar byed byu nga 'don ma gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang // klu skar dang na nyezla skang ma gza' pa tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang // dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs
24b8(rgyud): sa dang 'og tu ma rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang // spyod pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste tshu la lan tshwa dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su blong skyes bzhin// lus dang ye shes nam mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang
25a1(rgyud): chu dang sa dang brtan dang g.yo ba dang // lha ni mthong ba skyed min dag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa rdo rje ba ni lus dag las// sngags kyi skye gnas dag na 'byung ba
25a2(rgyud): sing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du krol te// de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs min sems kyis kun tu rtog pa dag las grol// g.yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po'
25a3(rgyud): 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha dang g.yas su dmar pa'i mdog/ skrag can dus me zla ba nyi ma'i ri bong can gyi bu dngas skyes dkar pa bla ma dang // 'jug rings dman pa char dang klog dang chu dang rtse mo can
25a4(rgyud): te 'bar ba rnams ni zung bdun po// 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid dmun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o// rgyab tu sar pa yang ni skyar ma lha gzhus ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis
25a5(rgyud): dbye bas so// srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o// dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tu
25a6(rgyud): gnas// kun tu ye shes dang ni stong pa'ozhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam phyir grol/ 6a sags sum cu'i dbyangs gang ti yar wa lang ldan de dag zla ba'i chang
25a7(rgyud): kyang // ga sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag snang drug ma lo ched kyis spyod par byed// ha so gas dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshong lha mi gdangs can 'byung po'i skyes
25a8(rgyud): da kyi gas gas pa// mas sa s+ho/  ldan pa galas sa / mad sa pa sas sum 'ag / dbyas zhe/ sa btang nanal sagos pa pas
25b1(rgyud): brnams kyi skye ba'i gnas// 'grin rgan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung ba sreg bya las skye sa mchu dang son chu dngas dag go// a sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo slong mgrin mgo bo lta ba
25b2(rgyud): 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste// sna tshogs gnag dmar rib na dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o// / rlung gi mthu' nas ldan pa'amatshams pa
25b3(rgyud): dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la na dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis// lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza'i chags kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga// mgrin pa'o gdong la/ 
25b4(rgyud): bcu brtan pa'i go 'phangs g.yo mang dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu7// de 'i phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum thal yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o// rlung gi mabadzi nas drung
25b5(rgyud): gi mtshams dang brtanA pa 'dzin ma'i bzhi la gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams// bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum grag gnyis/ 
25b6(rgyud): dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste// cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu
25b7(rgyud): sa1/ 'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste// sa yi 'khor lag 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi re drug dgu nyi ma
25b8(rgyud): rim pas so// me yi dbang po phyi rol sred pa gsus kyi gnas la dpag chad 'bum thag gcig nyid gang yin pa// da ni ma yi lcang gis gnas su lus la pa di dag gi tshad kyis yang dag su
26a1(rgyud): gang po kyang/ phra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra mo 'dig cag phra ma brgyad kyis sra pi tsa mo phra mo ste// 'di rnams kyis ni sgo tshe shig dang nas te ltos 'gro nas kyis sar nyes
26a2(rgyud): ma ni// bung gis khru bo khru bzhis gzha ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gsu las rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur// rgyang grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshad nga yis lha yulas dang nar ma
26a3(rgyud): dkal tshad yin no/ 13/ dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang // dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin du dang
26a4(rgyud): gyung gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go// gzugs med dag ni a sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te i la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs// ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa/ 
26a5(rgyud): rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsol byed gcig pa ka sa'o/ 18/ srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo// srid gsum
26a6(rgyud): ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so// rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o// 'das
26a7(rgyud): chu dang mi zad du ba dag dang me dang mun pa dang ni ngu 'bod bdun pa dang / 15/ lan tshwa chang dang chu dang 'o mgo dang mar dang sbrang ci'i rgya mtsho bdun te re bo ni// 'od sngon ma n+da ra ri kha Ta dang nor
26a8(rgyud): 'od dang dro Na bsil ri rdo rje'o// gleng ni zla ba 'od dkar dag dang rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi 'am ci dang khrung khrung dang // drag po yang ni longs spyongs ste bdun pa 'dzam tha ma rnams kanas
26b1(rgyud): padag las kyis/ 1/ shang du rdzan shin du zlum por 'gyur/ mel bdag po lho ru ma ni gru gsum mo// byang du ma ni byed kyi b+ha ba dag dang nub tu gser mchogs ni chu yi gter gyi zung // ring ba ldan pa
26b2(rgyud): da pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste// sa yi stong du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ri dang klung dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur/ 16/ ldan pa yi ni
26b3(rgyud): dgiHdrangs gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phrag ni// lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchogs yi gshil khor yug dag gi yang dag ste// rA ni lnga po rnams dag
26b4(rgyud): dngas kazhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun du ni khor lug sa// dam phyi rol gring dang bo ga dang cu gter rnams te phyogs rnams kun du me dang drug 1/ nA gter drug pa thams cad dag
26b5(rgyud): bgacig gis dman pa ni stong brag // klung rnams dang rnye rgya sa rtog rnams dag tu nga ste'i rgyu phrag stong brag rtsa ni// 'angs bu'i gling gi yang smra bar kyang lda na
26b6(rgyud): migater ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi chad yin te// srid pa gsum pa dzin pa y-i ni mtha' ma dag gi mdang rlung gi tshod dag de bzhin no// 9tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor po
26b7(rgyud): cas la yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste// lhan po la ni tshig mnga'i tshugs dngas gzhi'i 'og na gnas bkra rnams dag ni dregs lnga'o// dpal ldan kun po'i phyogs rnam
26b8(rgyud): kun dus pi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas// zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang po khang gnas ni me dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar/ 8/ shar du
27a1(rgyud): brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu// rlung dang nor sprin 'phrog byeng phyogs su rung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang / 
27a2(rgyud): 'og tu yang // tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'bar gyes pa dang bcas rang dang thugs ni bsrung shing snying bste// de dag dbus su dus kyi mkhor lo rgyal ba mchog gaskyed mdza
27a3(rgyud): su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor// gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus
27a4(rgyud): da ni rab tu bskyod par byed// klu blo rnams kyang g.yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par tu// rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus
27a5(rgyud): gzhan ni dus kyi spong ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'ang/ dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can de rab tu zhugs pa da ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de// rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan
27a6(rgyud): cod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no// dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste// re re dag gi tshad ni dus da
27a7(rgyud): mda' yis bstar ba'i mi rnams dag gi lo lha gang yin pa'o/ 28/ pra dbugs d+ha dang nu tshod nyin zhug d+hA dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // drug brgya rnams ni rim pas
27a8(rgyud): lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso bor nyan sag gcig ga tshed des gzhi dag la dus bzhi nus pa'i ched du 'jug/ dum bu dum bur ni
27b1(rgyud): la can bzod nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so/ nga/ phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang na ma dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis// rgyal po'i lon mtha' dag
27b2(rgyud): sra nyin zhag dus spyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srang nams te// 'di rnams dri ltar bgrad pa lus skyes phra dang me ding 'byung po lnga dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso bo bzhag de la ste sri nga gsu
27b3(rgyud): lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa sham b+ha la zhes bya bar 'byung // de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par mkha'i
27b4(rgyud): yul du k+sha klo'i chos dag rab tu 'jug/ de la dus su 'dzin ma lan nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par bya// mtha' dgas gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams bdu
27b5(rgyud): song ba la 'byung 'gyur/ 2/ me mkha' rgya mtsha rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres ka kro'i lor ni rab tu grub// kwa kr-i'i dbang po'i lo ni leg pa gdengs can zla bas dmun
27b6(rgyud): ma dag kya nyi mas bskur// nag pa la sogs zla ba bsris te 'og tu dus kyis bskur ba mkha' metha pas rnam par dbye// rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag na me yi ba dag po zlo ba'i tshogs
27b7(rgyud): rnam par dag par 'gyur// zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur// tsa ba dag la drug gi ches rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la
