85a3(rgyud): spar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo las skyes rtse lo lnga pa ni// bsgoms nas yan lag la ni rig byacod pan dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i bza' nyid du'o// 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo
85a4(rgyud): de la ldan mchog gi phyag rgya sdig po'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o// gang shig cung zad gzung bar bya ba'i dngos pos skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang // bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas
85a5(rgyud): tha ma dang ni zhabs dgal yang phyag ces reg par bya// grang gang bya ba nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyang bar bya// sa la sogasnga la dkyil 'khor dor dang dang ba bgrod pa la yang rnam/ 
85a6(rgyud): 'byor pa yis bsnun par gas / lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings pa yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum
85a7(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal pa yi// mtshan ma'i rnam bdag kyang ldag sa rnams te rab gas la nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// laka pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g.yo ba'i gdengs kwa'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams
85a8(rgyud): kye byeg kyar 'gyug la/ mthe bo ga dang mam 'u dung sbyar ba bad+ma'i 'da' pa dang mdungs gung modang ni brkyang ba dang // mdzub mo gnyis ni zla ba skyed pa ming med 'og tu bskum par ngadage lag ma thi sa son gang gi// 
85b1(rgyud): nga ba tsun gyi rnam da 'gyur te bstan par bya ba 'o// cibs pa rnam pa sor ma rnams te lag pa gnyi ga'i ma la dum ni rtsom sogs bza' dag rnams/ gsag pa gnyis na
85b2(rgyud): rdo rjer 'gyur te rdo rje khu chung dag gis dril bur bcas// khu tshur byed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mda' dang mtshungs pa dag kyang ram gri rnon por 'gyur// rtswa dzub mo la sogs rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa da
85b3(rgyud): ku chur phyed pa yis ni rtse gsum la// dpal ldan kri sug khu tshur bcings shing dpal ldan mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa 'jigs pa byed par 'grupa laR+Sha ba'i steng du khu chung bcings shing mche grong gung mo'i
85b4(rgyud): mda' yi mchog la'o// khu tshur bcings shing mdzub ma shin du 'khyog par 'gyur ro mi bdag de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o// rtsa bar mdzubu mo ming med du 'gyur mda' dang mtshungs pa'i steng du gung mo yang
85b5(rgyud): mdung la te// thad kar khu tshur dbyug pa la 'olag mo'i la shin du mnyam la mtha po brkyang ba dgra sta la/ a steng du khu tu banyis dang mdzub mor 'gyur te lha meni bdag po klung chen lpags pa dag la'o// 
85b6(rgyud): ba la ni lag pa gnyi ga'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe'u chung rtsu ba phyed pa'o// leT ka la dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du son par 'gyur// kha T+wAM ga la khu chur bug par
85b7(rgyud): gyur te nges pa nyid du phrag bar mthe'u chung brkyang ba'o// ke ser mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad 'dab lta bu steng du byas pa dpal ldar thod pa la// gtsul la ka pa gan brgyal khu tshur du 'gyur nges
85b8(rgyud): par dpung pa g.yod pa rab tu brkyang ba'o// gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po kun du brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje nags pas// rin chen la ni sbyar ba'i son mor 'gyur te mi bdag de dang
86a1(rgyud): rnam par phye ba padra la/ gtu ni chubs ni mdzub mo mtho bo sbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i rog tu kha tshur ro// le longs ni shin du mnyam pa'i lag mthil sor mo zug med dang bcas mngon du phyogs
86a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// mthe bo la ni mdzub mo la sogs steng du 'khyog po rim par yongs su bkod pa lugs sgrog la'o// mgo bo la ni mthe bo la sogs bzhi po gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og tu mthe'u chung bskum pa'o// 
86a3(rgyud): cod pan la ni lag pa dag gis dung gis phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po spyong ba nyid du 'gyur// lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni gcig tu sbyar bdag kyang na rgyan la// lag pa'i rgyab tu sor pon
86a4(rgyud): rime par yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mgul ba'i rgyan la ste// lag pa gnyi ga'i sor mo gsum ni phan tshun sbyar cing thog mtha' bskum pa dag ni sgo rigs la15/ khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang kung po
86a5(rgyud): nyis po zlum skor lta bur byas pa rkang gdub la// de bzhin du ni dpung rgyan zung dang gdu bu la yang mdzub mo phan tshun sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur// mthe bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gi mchog gi rigs su 'gyur te madz+ra
86a6(rgyud): pogasang ba pa rnams kyis// dreb rnams dang gdengs can rnams kyi gung mo med med dag ni rim par yongs su bkod pa'o// 'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u drang rab mchog lag pa'i mthil de srin po rnams
86a7(rgyud): rigs su 'gyur// grub pa rnams kyi khu tshur bcings pa mchog gi rigs kyi mtshams ni lha rnams dag gi'o// ldag pa gnyi ka'i mthil du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgya sder mo can rnams kyi/ 
86a8(rgyud): ba sa so nyis pa byed / ngas pa man pa can pa stan napas kyig ga mi nyam sagapa'i ril pa me du yin na pa sa shing gagog pa sbyar ba ni skye pas kyi/ 
86b1(rgyud): ma ma ldog pa gdangs can du bya gas kyi brag tu kyang par baphags par 'gyur// nyin nanam po'i gtor ma lani 'dzub mo'i 'bab rnams rab btung gzhan pa 'og tu byung byas pa// 'bar ba dag la ma
86b2(rgyud): ko s+ya te mchog gi lag ma ni sde dag gi mdzub mo brgyud ba gzhan pa'o// mdzub mo bstan na lags par 'ongams mdag kyang nges par brjod par 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa sa yang // gnyis kyis shin du legs par 'ongs pa
86b3(rgyud): skal bzangs dge ba mthe bo bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur// sor mo ris gol rdebs pa khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchog ces nges par brjod par 'gyur ba ste// mthe bo dang ni ming med dag gis
86b4(rgyud): gis khyod ni tshim par byed pa'o// 5/ sor mo thams cad rtse mo brkyang bas skal bzangs legs par 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la yang // g.yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen gcig pu dkar
86b5(rgyud): tA gsal bar byed// skye gnas dag la rig pas gtso bo margya dang nus zung dang nges par sen po 'debs pas kyang // sdong mo phan tshun bcings shing kung mo dang ni mthe bo brkyang bas dam tshe garjod par byed pa yin// btu dang
86b6(rgyud): dam mig dag yo zhing mgo la 'phrug par byed na shin du rmongs parjod par byed// mche ba'i dbus su mthe chung dang ni snying ka kha ru badzub mo 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed// mthe bo khu chur bcings pa dang ni las
86b7(rgyud): lngas la rdebs nang yis bza' bar bya// sA la reg na zas pa dang ni lto dang sol bsnun pa dag gis ma zos pa nyid do// lag pa'i rgyab kyis song cig nges par rab tu brjod de mngon du phyogs pas 'dug cig 'dug
86b8(rgyud): bye 'dra da na skal pa sa byed de de ngas sangs par da bar byed// dang bar ba rkyong bas gad dang ma dag myong babadag sa shin du dga'as kyis// ya gsunas gas kyad
87a1(rgyud): pa gnas pa bdag la 'dus pa med pa'o// zhan tshun lag pa bcings pas bdag gi khyim du de ring 'khor lo 'dus pa dag ni rjod par byed// mthe bo meng med rtse modog gis
87a2(rgyud): mang dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya// rkang pa la ni 'brug par byed na de bzhin du ni phyi rol 'dus pa dgal 'gro ba yang // badzub mo phan tshun bcings na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni de
87a3(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o// sgra ni rang gi so yis gcod na mi yi phyugs khyod 'dir ni ltung brlabya ba brjod par byed// so ni phan tshun 'dar bar byed na khyod kyi shwa ni 'di dag bdag gis de ring bza' bar bya
87a4(rgyud): mchu g.yo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya'o nges par brjod par byed// mchul po ni 'drebs par byed na khyod kyi rgyu ma lto bar gnas 'di bdag gis bza' bar bya/ sreg pa'i sbyor ba yin
87a5(rgyud): ka par 'gyur te re yi bdag po bzhang po'i sbyor bas bshad pa'o// gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gang du 'gyur te rnam pa mang po'i ngos po'i sbyor bas rol po'o// klu yi sbyor ba yis ni klu ste mchog gi yon ton rnam ma
87a6(rgyud): pa sbyor ba dag gis dri// phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ni phreng bar 'gyur te lon tan dbang gis spos kyi sbyor ba dag gis spog la/ mar me na po pas mar me nges par mun pa bcom pa dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'argya
87a7(rgyud): nos pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar yang de nas lnga li dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste// gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' las rnams kyang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa ye rigs par bya// gang gang dngos po'i
87a8(rgyud): bzhin du 'gyur sa le sted du de pe rang ba'i na dag kyang phyag rgya rnapas/ zhanam to mo no 'bring la lta bas khyod ni gang zhi gnas 'ongs skam pa mamang la brjod par byed// mgo bor lag bdag de yi phyogs su nges par
87b1(rgyud): bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yis lan ni smras par 'gyur// steng du lta bas khyod ni dge 'ams yi steng du gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ral so cig/ yon por ska pas khyod song chags pa'i lta bas po nya po ni shin tu
87b2(rgyud): ba brjod par byed/  gzhi ba'i stabs bdag gi grogs po khro gtor khro bo'i lta bas 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed// sbal skabs bdag ni ma rungs par brjod bskal pa 'ang mal ni rang gi rang bzhin bur kyis so// 
87b3(rgyud): dod spur sta bas bdag mchog rnal 'byor ma ni sAl lta bas yon tan rab tu gsal bar byed// maN+Dal lta bas skal pa bzangs sta num zungal ldan bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mor brjod// snying kar lta bas bsgo
87b4(rgyud): bdag nyid lag pa zung ba stan bdag ni rab tug tu mi mar brjod// phrag pa bstabs padag ni rus ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mchis la ldan zin rdzo'o/ rgyal mas pag 'grom ste lte bar lta bas mi yi dbang rtsos
87b5(rgyud): chog can// gsang bar lta bas bdag ni dag pa brgyal bas bdag ni shin du dka la gdus par dka' gsus song lta bas bdag ni grub pa nges par rjod byed rkang par lta bas rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa'o/ 
87b6(rgyud): the ze ngas par ldan bdag ni srid par po'i su sa dab mo gcig bu dag/  na sde tse mo stobs srid pa gsus kyi gnas su kun du bkra la tshogs lug/ mnyi po rnams ste stangs nyid ni sa yi ste gi
87b7(rgyud): surnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ 9/ drug cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus dag gi ni yan lag mchog kyang sbyin pa ste// las kyi dbang po rnams kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dang bcas pi dang

88a1(rgyud): dam gsum sred par gnas rnams 'jig rten khabs las ye shes rdo rje lugs kyu yi// bkag sted de dag mtha' dag mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni sangs rgyas rnams pa
88a2(rgyud): yi// bdud rtsi mngon par dbang bskur nas ni dri med ri bong can lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa// dri ma rnam par gal zhing byang chub smod la rjes su gnas rnams rang gi gnas su gtang bar bya// 9/ rdzas na
88a3(rgyud): dpa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya// de bzhin du bal sogs lam dang mtha' dag yon tan gtar ni rtsi yirna la 'byor ldan pa ste// bsten pa'i
88a4(rgyud): phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang son skyor rnams kun las rnam par grol// gzhan rnams la ni rgyal ba mchog gi snying po yum gyi mchod pa rnam dman sbyin pa nyid mi bya// dbang gi mthar ni dpal ldan bum
88a5(rgyud): 'dzam zhing lus la 'di sted stod ker gos zung da// da la ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dkal sbyid bya gzhan yang de bzhin stod kor dang de kos zung dru// skon gnas pa rnams par basbyin pa'i'i dag
88a6(rgyud): shes la bdag nyed dus pas de bzhin gzhan// mthar de sbyin sreg byas nas rang gi snying ka pad+ma yi shes sems dpa' rab tu gzug byas// 'jig rted pa rnams rang gi gnas su mtha' dag du
88a7(rgyud): dag pa'i klung la spyan drang bya// tA ma brul dang dri spos me tog 'bras bur bcas dang ngas yug dag ni gzhon nu ma rnams la// byin nas slob dpon slob yar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni ji ltar
88a8(rgyud): ramachod bya te// sgo ma la ni gnang par dbyen rab mchog chags kyi tshigs ni dang rang gnas ga shegs cag so ga mdas dang mi na grang can dbang po med dang gro bye bdag sa com dran nags pas
88b1(rgyud): 'ching ba dang // chu gter 'khrugs pa dang ni sha za'i'achi ba'i 'jigs byed nad dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang // dbul dang bud med bral dang mi bdag 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni rdo rje lhung dang don nyams pa/ 
88b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni nyin zhag so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ 58/ dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las mngon par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
88b3(rgyud): / rgyal bskyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdun po rnams dang bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang dag dang // shes rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya bzhi pa
88b4(rgyud): slar yang rdul ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso ba'i sgrub thabs yang dag par ni bdag zhu'o// zla ba bzang po'i tshigs gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo rje chad dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs/ 
88b5(rgyud): skudang rung gi zhabs te me yi mgrin pa chu gter dpal ldan zhal ni sna tshogs mdog/ phrag pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung ba rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma stong pa drug dang me yi tshigs// zhabs dag gis ni zla ba nyi ma bsreg
88b6(rgyud): 'khor dag la bdud dang drag po skrag pa'i nag// rol bas mnan pa'i srid med srid pa mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor logacig pu de ni bsgrub par bya/ ra/ bskyed mos tshal lam ri bo da'i rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas ni sngong

88b8(rgyud): gdadam nya 'du sa brjod bsrung ba byas na / pa/ dang po ste gang zlab dasus su nyi 'ad cing rdzogs rnams ni phyogs bcur 'azhos par bya// khal logs pa dag bya das su sa dam ga 'dagapa
89a1(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams la ni// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po bsags pa dag ni bshags byas te// sgrub pa po yis mus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa lis ni gsum la skyabs su
89a2(rgyud): 'gro ba bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa// de dag mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam grol byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas pas rjes yi rab
89a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag kur cig bces 'dir ni smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid do// stong pa
89a4(rgyud): ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman// de las sangs rgyas byang chub med cing gzhan pa ni snying rje dag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste// mtha' dag de ltar shes
89a5(rgyud): yang mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dpag med yod tand kyi kho dang maud kyi sa ni bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya// chu yis me ni rnam par nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su
89a6(rgyud): sdom brtson dag gis bya// phye nas 'dzin ma dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan dra bzhin du tshul dbus su rab tu zhugs// drung ni chu bo de dag bskams nas nam mkha' sa ni snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
89a7(rgyud): mas ni byed mun pa'i mtha' ma yul dang rnam par thal ba dbus kyis la gzhag par bya// stong pa rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla ba nyi ma me rnams ni// khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'a
89a8(rgyud): ba'ab ni rdo las skyes kur dag go// de le dbus su da rje'i sa la na bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'bar rnam par 'grob ste// oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma kha dang ni nyi ma dag ge gdang// 
89b1(rgyud): sa drini gsung gi dkyil lakhor nod bye bad+ma'i dri Ta ba nyims rnam par dman/ bye sa phyogs dang bu khye ni nyin mong byed pa'i ng+ka na yidabus su shing rnams// nyi ba'i gornams suni rgyam po nor lugaser byer ba
89b2(rgyud): na bas dadu thod dang //  song bskyed /  ga po bzhin shin du po sa pa gas pa'i mam ma nyA la yang sa rdzogs gsogs / nga ba nas mi longal sogs rnams / 
89b3(rgyud): A 'byed par byed cing dri ma med pa'i byer 'gro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje can dang ldan pa'i lus dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi padr-i tima'i dpung 'dus kyi zhal// mgrin pa gsus dang nyi ma'i spyan te rnam par rgyas 'dzigs

89b5(rgyud): chog shen pa kyirig tu 'did dgang pogasan par ba ni dgapa'o//  sa dang galapa da ga kyi ma na dag kya sa'i bang gatshungs na ba dag shes dog gzhan pa rjon po nga ni dpapa ma na
89b6(rgyud): dalas pa dang mig long du yang // ga zas dang gapas ming dpung ba gnyis gnyis dag ni gnag dang nyi la'i lus dang zla ba'i mdog rnams te// de bzhin nges par mtshon cha dag dang bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum

89b8(rgyud): gsum pa dang srid pa degs byed be bag dang mi memed pa/ den 'o tugs bungs par byed sa shes du yo samangs ta/ bdu dacig 'dab da man da na gyi tami'i phyag gi lpags
90a1(rgyud): grarbam drapa shA rnirnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang thug gis gang 'i zod pa dag/ gsung nga grags pa rin chen bad+magran chu ba ga dang me yod da ni sngags sgog dang // tshangs pa'i mgo bo badras la
90a2(rgyud): byed gdod ldan gang yin rgyal pa'i g.yon gyi phyag na'o// bdud dang drag po'i lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed/ 9!gser mdog rig byed gal ldan nor gyi phyag gi pad+mas 'khyud pa
90a3(rgyud): yin te// gabs na gri gug lugs kyi nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i ma du dang bgrang phreng rim pas so// g.yonan thod pa zhags pa dang ni 'dab ma brgya ba'i bad+ma mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid/ 
90a4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa'o// 'dab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma rig byed zham dang nyi ma'i spyan// de dag rnams las bzhi ni sbrul gyi rnga yab 'dzin te zur du rgyal ba'i
90a5(rgyud): la gyi dbye bas so// dbang ldan bden bral dang ni rtse mo can dang rlung gi bur du chos kyi dung dang gaN+DI dang // de bzhin yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur te nges par de bzhin du ni dpag bsam shin du rib pas 'gyur// nag mo la
90a6(rgyud): ga gi na gyi snod dang gnyis padagan ba'il ba'i snod// dbang po skyong ba gsum pa ni ste myos byed dang bcas 'i zing 'dzin pa gralas kyi phrag pa ded// g.yon na khrib sung dra m+b+ha li shing gi me tog dang deme tog phreng ba ye
90a7(rgyud): pas so// dbar mo'i g.yas nam me do shal dag dang cod pan dang bcas gdu bu rnams te phyag g.yon na/ zhagos dang ske rags dang ni dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub bo// 
90a8(rgyud): gleng bu nang bu dang bcag Nam de ris pas te// g.yon na nud mangs dang dernga dang sel sem rab tu spags pa'i la bar bdag dang thangs drung ngo // 'o shu dang sran dang chang dang bdud ci ro dodang 'bras bu ban gyi snod ni dgang ma
90b1(rgyud): rdzogs kyi bad+ma chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par spyan dgu me yi nas dang dus kyi phyag/ phung du stsol la la sogs lha monams dang srung yang de dag ma tshams brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad// lha dang lha co gnag dang dmar dang ser bar
90b2(rgyud): nga'adzin pa lta bur dkar ba ste// nag po dkar po zla ba'i steng du yang na phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po nye la'i ste/ mkhar snying la sogs rtsigs pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas reg tu rdo ma la sogs// shar
90b3(rgyud): daphyogs gzhan gyi ni g.yas dang g.yas min pad+ma dag la kun tu 'bang po de bzhin nyid// dpal ldan pagang rdo rjengs par sral do rje mdang chos gyi dpyid pa ni rim pas so// rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed dge ste shing du
90b4(rgyud): gang yin du spyo ni gang du 'ong// shes rab yang ba babs ni bong 'dzin pa'i bad+mal ste lha rnams kyi yang snga ma'o// gnyis pa dag ni rang gi phyag gcu skyes rang rang mtshan mas mtshan pa dag zhes pa ni dun 'gyur/ 
90b5(rgyud): dag gang gi galas kyi dang po'i phyag mthil na ste de 'i phyag rgyan skyes dpan// shes rab thabs kyis 'khor mo mchog gi bde bar gnas pa pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs/ raklan ga po rnams kyi g.yas kyi byad
90b6(rgyud): rug dag dang sred pa 'jigs sbed ce gsum ste// g.yon pa'i phyag gi ma thil du phub drang thod pa dag dang ba nA~M ka ni dkar po nyid du 'gyur// mda' dang rdo rje lcags kyu sgra dang bcus pa'i Dam nu ni g.yas kyi bkan rim pa yis/

97b1(rgyud): dang don yod grub par rab tu grags/ ra/ rmugs byed dang ni phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dang gis khengs byed dang ni 'od dpag med// rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur stobs ldan phyag na rdo rje dag dang gnod mtsha

98a3(rgyud): du'agyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang / 3/ klu brgyad gang dbum pa rnams te khyab bdag pad+ma'i 'da' la nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma// dpal ldan du ba bya rog gdong par 'gyur

98a8(rgyud): de lta pa nyid de bzhin pa dbyel 'bor sa ni nges par rab tu 'gyur la/ ston bskum sogs dang bum bi lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku sted kyil 'khor stong pa'i dbus su'o// sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi su nye nges pa
98b1(rgyud): ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i // khro bo sprul pa'i bu ba gyur te yon tan dbang gis dkyis bang byin snying por yang dag gnas// phyi ros ni d+ha dran la sogs pa sna mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas padag pa'i sku la na sbrul sogs

102a2(rgyud): gnas ga dang brtsas nyi shu sa li bdag nyid la sogs pa/ brnam pa phyag rnal lags thub po rnams sungs par nyin 'aka' ga zhig dag gis yang dag 'bru// rings pa dngo 'ding ba rje
102a3(rgyud): pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal kye dbye ba rnams kyis byed// 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha men lag 'gro rigs 'di bsgoms pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ rag dkar po yis ni ni dang rgya

115a1(rgyud): / rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig
115a2(rgyud): po mas kyi mas yams kyi sa pa rgyam ga cas ga sa gsungs das
115a3(rgyud): mngo//  nga bkang brnams kyis rtswa dang gshid rdon byen kAzhan du du la chen gdapab ste// bathes pa din gyis ni tem byong ba yang de bzhin du rgyu nam me mye daH/ 
115a4(rgyud): ma masapa rgya zug brdzu ma sa na sa sa ma byi kyi khos sogs shA
115a5(rgyud): nan nyi//  'od brgyang du pa loga'i badzid kyi 'khor ba gnas rnams ni ba marnams kyi lan moms// bkru
115b1(rgyud): ces rdo rje me snyed dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' du phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la gnas// de ltar nges par sku'i rdo rje mchog gi yon tan nam mang kyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs// gsung gi rdo rje masos
115b2(rgyud): rlom kyad de ga rtsom pa'i ga /  'jug sa 'a rnam pa 'i paganas gca rnas nyid//  shin du ni mi zhes do ba
115b3(rgyud): 'joms pa sna tshogs sus gyi rang bzhin no// sde bka la sogs pa drug rtsor mapar yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis// rdo rje ma khri rin chen 'khong mo rgya skyes de bzhin gri bu gnyid ni
115b4(rgyud): ba rnams kyi ste// slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ldarnams dag gis dbye// so sor yi ge'i dbye bsad chu dang sreg ba rlang dang nam mkha'i' dngos po dag las so// dang por
115b5(rgyud): spyong ba'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang nga nyatsa man dang nA dang dang po'i dbyangs// rlung gi dbyed i yig g+ha d+ha d+ha b+ha d+ha sha rnams te me yi dbye ba rol sogs// chu yi dbye bas u yi ka la kha tshaHsa thal stes yi dbyed
115b6(rgyud): me la sogs// de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i rigs ni rnam pa lnga pa ka la sogs pa'i rjen pas rnam par kye// gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste rigs gsub dag sa de bzhin spu dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdzog// 
115b7(rgyud): a sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha yar wal dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams// 'ji ka rtser sdang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa la ra ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o// rig
115b8(rgyud): phyag byang gdabang po dgatu'agyur pags slob brtsegs pa lags bad namami ga ga mig so ba sa btus pas la bldan kya nga bcas pasas la ma thug / ngas
116a1(rgyud): rgyan ngas rgya mams 'asgyu ma ma ma'i mgon po rnamasasu 'gyur// kun dachos pa sa dkyog
116a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// lnga 'i bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcal pag cu ni la khor lo'i mgon po dgubadag nyid// rdzas kyi grangs kyi bdag nyid bcugasu ma dku dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang yul
116a3(rgyud): rtsa drug bdag nyid de// yal sogs pa rnams kyis sgo skyong mnga'adas tshegs kyi rig pa ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so// khro bo drug NA ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gar
116a4(rgyud): rlung gi dubyang sa tshogs dbye ba yis// kho bong mi gro bye rnams kyis las 'byung tshor sbyin la 'byor ba dang na pa 'byor chung 'di bzhin gyi nam por mas 'byung bam rol du kyi 'khor lani
116a5(rgyud): kyil 'khor dbang po ste// phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyar bar bya// stong pa gzhom med la sogs ma'i dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams
116a6(rgyud): nilha rnams brgya yis gdab pa ste/ gtsug tor na ni skyes mtha' dumes kyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gad na la'o// rdo rje rnams kyis shal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i
116a7(rgyud): po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis// de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis// sum curtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yod
116a8(rgyud): duma'o rab tu dbye ba can// yi ga mo ma'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams dag gi'o// sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig 'dul lo mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gi
116b1(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur// phung po rnams kyis lnga li bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgu pa yang // bshad lam la sogs drang ni mig la stsogs pas phongs bskor la
116b2(rgyud): khA'i bdag nyid kyang // de bzhin song rab tu skyes bslar yang sonam sa dag gis dbang phyug mthal bas 'khor lo can// dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa lung dkar bad+ma'i mtshan ma
116b3(rgyud): 'dod dpag med// nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta li shing rtas 'gro ma mA la kI dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma// drag mo chu gter tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdeng can dang ni lhag gdong ma dpa
116b4(rgyud): 'di dag dpal ldan g.yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o// chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod gru'i pa sgrol ma dang // mkha' yi snying
116b5(rgyud): rje ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsaR+tsi ka dang lcags sgrog ma// bder phra ba dang ni drung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi gdong ma dang bya rog bcas// de dag nges par byams pa'i thug
116b6(rgyud): pakasam gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'i// loyongs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshung ba rin chen 'dzin dang gos dkar mo// sa yi snying po rmugs byed pa
116b7(rgyud): mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug me yi lha// gdeng can dbang po rgya
116b8(rgyud): nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso ba ma sprol pa'o// lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i thab pa phya ka 'khor lo dang // sbyar bang ba ni rnam par
117a1(rgyud): ba rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs byed dri yi rdo rje ma// 'od zer can dang dbang mo brgya byin dus kyi gdod pa dang bcas rje rigs klu la sogs pa kun// gtso bo yis ni btang snyoms dag
117a2(rgyud): gis dub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun lasan rnams spros pa'o// gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyugs// gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te na
117a3(rgyud): / bon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo la sogs gzhan// gsang bar dag pa las ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang // steng dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams gro
117a4(rgyud): sa kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste// nyi ma'i steng du g.yon brgyud um dang bcas da
117a5(rgyud): phyag mnan zhing 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin dang mtshungs// bod pa rnams kyis phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi mi'i phyag ldan he ru ka/ phyag rgya sbrul dang stag gi pags pa mi bzang
117a6(rgyud): ro'i bdag po'i bags pa rlon pa bshus pa 'dzin// gnag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyi phyi rol tu ni 'khor lo gsum// rdo rje drug ni kro 'ol sa skyes phyag gnyis blag lar
117a7(rgyud): dang de bzhin 'byung po skyes rnams kyis// skor ni ga tum mo rol gnas shing phya kar kri gu la phrod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro// dpa' bo rnams kyis reg byed phyug na do dza TA ma du dang dril bu
117a8(rgyud): TIgagadapal ldan sun pa'i phyog pa brgyad du ni bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gon pa dang nye ba'i gnas kun te// gang dang can do ha dang 'dul pa can dang dur grod mi ni me dang rlung gi dbus su yang / de
117b1(rgyud): yul dang kro khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste// shes u gyi mngon par brjod pa srid ma gsus kyi thabs car gyigal nas smras padog/ snying por mapo lo chung
117b2(rgyud): dkyi po son /  'i phres skas pa ya ni ba lams rgya na to/ khyi tsun pa kyis padag la thal da ca
117b3(rgyud): gnas// go sbyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni 'khyer dag la kun nam son 'di la sogs pa chon shin nal 'byor chung srung 'dum pa rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa de// rung
117b4(rgyud): dang logs su yul dang yul can dzaM b+ha la ni byag na so ba bsdams// ngag dang rkang lag bshang lam b+ha gnyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyiHyi rang ba zhin te// shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dka' lags
117b5(rgyud): ye phyag ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o// snying por 'khyer lo ts+tsha gter bur du 'byung te me yi bdag pa kyi 'khor las ni gsum gyi sa// lung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'phangs
117b6(rgyud): ma rdo rje mi sogs brgyad/ phyi rom du gnas dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyis la gnas gro zab tshogs rnams te// deng ring ba'i rtsig pa dge la dus la chu gtor gyis bsnun kyang chub sems
117b7(rgyud): dpa' mtha' dag rnams// sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum stezhal gsum ro la phyag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las// rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi dbang gis g.yon gyi 'al nas spros
117b8(rgyud): dam 'byar rjes su rin pa'i rgyud dang 'di na nyis 'gyur rdzom pa chen po sakha' 'gros rnams kyi// khor mo drug dang mig 'drug mi bdags songs rnams skyes ni dub rtse la nas zlos pa'o//  ni drug dang
118a1(rgyud): thug pa'i cha shas gsong bye kyil 'khor la gnas nams kyis dkyil gakhor theg patal nas/ ske byom pani drug drug cha rnams kyis te bad+ma'i bdapa ma myed kyis skye bar ldar ba yag tha
118a2(rgyud): gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin chen rab gri mchog gi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis// nyi ma rnams kyis sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang 'khyer dang ni da shal sa// gsum
118a3(rgyud): de rab lnga li re wA ro mo can gyis do shal \u0f7fbar sngam bu'o// nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gram ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rtababs so// phyogs dang phyogs bra ba dag tu
118a4(rgyud): rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum pa'o// dbus su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la ni nyi ma ri pong can dag sbyar ba'i gdanas 'khor lo dang ni phreng ba sngon pos ni ljang gu dag dang sa gzhi dag
118a5(rgyud): 'khor lo ser// sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dngas ni dkar po phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang // sa ni ser ba sngon po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang gu'i mdog tu'
118a6(rgyud): drug gis ni mchod kyis ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no// phyi rol du ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod nams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad// 'da' ma
118a7(rgyud): brgyad la sku mo rnams// phyir ni sgeg rol sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin klu yi rgyal po brgyad// de 'i phyi rol du ris chu me dang g.yo
118a8(rgyud): kyi 'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i'aphreng 'a'og/ ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyangs ta ba Ta cags sogs stong sogs yi genams// drung sogs rtsibs rnams la de nye ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis
118b1(rgyud): 'asog sa khams kyi 'ang bzhid nasaka/ byeng sogs kyims la la du ba'i dbang gis zung ngu ra la bams mtha pa gyi byed du'o// nadang rnam par du tu k+Shangs cadanam mapa'i mthil naganas 'i bra
118b2(rgyud): bcas pa rnams// mkha' 'grom rnams rung ba'i dngo khror bong 'dzin pa'i na 'drang kyag ni wa yosod pa // gzas pa 'argyang zhing pa rang kyang rnams byas smi rna me pag pazung zla grol gos
118b3(rgyud): rkang brgod pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g.yer gsogs dang rus pa'i rtsa// mgo dang rked pa'i ngos lathong pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog lnga yi phreng ba'o// mkha' 'gre zhal gnyis phyag
118b4(rgyud): rjemachog dang Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ka dril bu// mgrin pa dpal ldan pago phreng mgo bor cod pan la yang rdo rje dang dbyangs dang ni nor bu'o// dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdub dang ni phyag la phyag sa
118b5(rgyud): dgas dag dngan rgyan te// rdzogs pa'i thong 'a rnams kyi phreng ba mche ba can gyi pa 'dag pus la gnas dang thal pa'i rgyan gtsa za dbul thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgyan ma
118b6(rgyud): pi phreng ba'o// zla byed rdo rje'i cod pan la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas lhag sngags grang nor lags pa'o// b+hita/ sreg pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal ba le// kyag
118b7(rgyud): yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can batshung la mkha' 'grom la 'o// dag byed/  phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa TAm ru dang / kha T+wAM ga nyid de// bshi gci brag dang mi sha nam
118b8(rgyud): nas byad da/ de bzhi na kyipa kyid kyi na nga ta na nyis na yig/ seM yongs 'i dananam
119a1(rgyud): ku'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams dang phyogs suka/ rgyal ba bskyed badzad rigs la gtso bo la khadog 'tshan marnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs// phan tshun du
119a2(rgyud): 'khyud pa dag kyang rang gzhan rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so// sbyin pa sogs dang phung po 'byung ba yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang ba lnga la sogs pa dang // phyogs sa phyogs
119a3(rgyud): dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya// lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyi phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang // zhing dang
119a4(rgyud): do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi khyed kyi mtshams su ste// 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang // nus dang gtso bo nyin gcig rigs
119a5(rgyud): rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las kargyab tu lha mo dbang byed pham pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te// 
119a6(rgyud): kAshin rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang // gtsug tor snying ka'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang pa'i 'khor lo la// 'a khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'og dang skyed du nyin zhanas mi
119a7(rgyud): srin nas ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis par zhag tso ba'i chu skyes rdo rje kun dang 'gyur med thig le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la gnas pa// kun nas dga' ba thams cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba ma
119a8(rgyud): gnas te dus ni thams cad do// zla ba zhu ba bla ma'i zhal de ru de gang zhig 'gas pa dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid de// bdud rnams kyi ni dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro
119b1(rgyud): po 'di dag gis shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mala' 'gro ming // rdo rje gsum po rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thogs dbus dang mtha'
119b2(rgyud): ba bzlas bya ste// srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang yis rang rang las kyi rjes 'thun pa'o// rol 'gro nams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams
119b3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur // dbugs rnams gang dag se ba'i dus su dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mdar gyur pa// de brgyand rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi dbang gis ni ye
119b4(rgyud): gnas lha mo rnams// rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na kri kug dang ni bod pacad// bdud ci bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du galas brgyad dus kyi 'khor
119b5(rgyud): gsum me lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las// gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan pa rnams// nag po dag
119b6(rgyud): 'dzegs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan rnams dang // 'di nyid la nang po gapa rnams mnyam dang mis nyam gan pa la nyem zla ba'i gdan rnams sog zla ba nye ma'i dang
119b7(rgyud): rtsibs rnams dang ni badra'i 'dab mngon bani zung gyi rnams te// srang yang nang ba rnyes 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyer mor byed dang de 'ong can gyi gdan rnams nyid// rdzogs pa ga'a' dang nyi ba'i rkang
119b8(rgyud): dang mi mnyam gnas ba cu gter nang ba gdan nams te/ te ma'i ma ni gang ba'i rnabs 'byung rigs kyi pang giso gan po yang na 'asbyor lag srungal reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni yon ta dga'
120a1(rgyud): / kyis dbang gis rgyas gang bzhal ni gnyis pa'o// rtse mo can la gzugs dang rig bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gang bzhal ni gsum pa'o// chu la zhal yang nges bya dang ni gzugs dang ro
120a2(rgyud): zhal te rgyas gdabazhal ni bzhi pa'o// sa la dril sogs pa reg bya'i mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gang ba zhal ni lnga pa'o// nam mkha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnam pa lnga ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o/ 
120a3(rgyud): / de bzhin du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gi zhal rnams so// gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bdag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsres pa lnga// shes
120a4(rgyud): rab thabs ni zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bzhi/ thun mtshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi stenam pa gsam rdzozhal yang dus spyor dbyebs pa dog kA
120a5(rgyud): dus sbyor byed pa phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni// bu na mtshams cha shas sa phyi las te zhal gsum ro la phyag ni 'byung ba dbu mo'i cha shas la// shes pa
120a6(rgyud): sbyor dang snyoms par zhugs bdag kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni kun gyi mngon mtshams la'o// shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug
120a7(rgyud): can gyi g.yon mdun yan lag dkar dang sprin nag satshungs bdag la shes rab bsam pa'o// mchog gi sras la shes rab bsam pas phye ba g.yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi ba
120a8(rgyud): g.yogayas dang phyas yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid// gos rab kyis phye rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi gso ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du sa
120b1(rgyud): shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid de// g.yas dang g.yas min nyi ma dang ni ri bong can gyi sku dag zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang // nag po sar po dag ste sngon
120b2(rgyud): kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas// dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar po mar mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa lcang dgar de bzhin nyid// ser 'o rnams kyi kha dog na g.yod kar min rigs na mas
120b3(rgyud): mchog gis gser dang mtshungs pa'o// sngon 'o rnams kyi kha dog sna tshogs slar yang ljang ku rnams kyi sngon mo rnams su de bzhin gsungs// de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs phyogs sus
120b4(rgyud): lharnams dag tu rig par bya// shes rab rgyud ni shar nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so// g.yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag 'os rnal 'byor rgyud sa chu la g.yon
120b5(rgyud): bya ba la sogs so// shar nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas nges par dbu ba mtha' dag po// mdo sde pa ni g.yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'i zhal nas dag pa'i bye brag
120b6(rgyud): shal nas nges brjod rig byed dang ni rgyal ma'i dbang pos g.yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyin gsungs// g.yas bye pa nas lhan tshig rig byed mchog gi sreg bya'i rigs la srid krung shar gyi zhalan paso// 
120b7(rgyud): zhal nas rigs can rgyad de lang yang nub kyi gal nas mkha' ldeng dang na 'byung ba'i rgyud// g.yon gyi grwal na bzhi pa'i mnga' ste nyi ma 'char ka dang satshungs g.yas pa nas de bya ba jug sbyong/ rgyaban
120b8(rgyud): 'phral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas g.yon gyi lha dang rab tu gnas pa ste// g.yas nas rig pa drag po min dang slar yang rlung gi na pa nas rlung skyes tshangs bzhi pa dag/ stong pa'i
121a1(rgyud): pa dang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa'i don du khros// rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan bcod dus rgyab kyi zhal la sogs pa'i dbye ba la/ 
121a2(rgyud): nga 'ad na pa da sa nardzogs rigs shA ma pa gro / 
121a3(rgyud): nas 'khrig pa nyid do mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal por la mad gdang ga nyid// rgyab nas je rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyu dang / rgyal po
121a4(rgyud): pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g.yas nas mang pos bkur ba'o// rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan paste slar yang dge 'dun pal chen po ni g.yon gyi zhal nas so// mdun
121a5(rgyud): nas mi rnams dang ni slar yang byar gyi zhal nas dud 'gro nams ni ngel par smos// g.yas kyi zhal nas 'byung ba snyam mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang A min na pas/ 
121a6(rgyud): nas smos padag kyang steng ka'i la khor so nas 'gyur rgya zhal rtse ba'i 'khor lonas// gams kyi lanas longs spyod dogs pa nas 'bru kun tu g.yon gyi le nas lhan cig skyes pa nas/ 
121a7(rgyud): rnams rtsegs byed byas nas yul pa dngos po slob dang ni ldang ba nyid du 'gyur/ 'jig rten gsum shu'adag nims kyang rgyal ba byed byed nal byed byes rnams kyis pa dag spyod pa la ldan
121a8(rgyud): shes nam pa rdzog pa med 'i bzhin pa pa'i rgya byung ba// de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal pa'i bdag pa'i phung zil brten thams cad sa byen pakyi chos bdag ste// chu ni mapon lamangal
121b1(rgyud): na babyu mang bzhin nyid du cha sra ga ni// sems can nams kyi dag pa'i sems gyi 'dam pa sang por gyur gyi tron gyilas pa gru kyog bdag sa sa gnas na sems cad da
121b2(rgyud): nyid po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa med// sems la gnas te mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can nams kyis mi mthong ste// yid bzhin nong bu'i skyon min med ges
121b3(rgyud): dang dge ba'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad rab tu spyod// sems ni dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya// gang gis myu gu 'dri
121b4(rgyud): skyes nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur// nyams pa de yis skyes par rab tu 'gyur te lung yang 'byon rgyal po dag gis skyed byed do// sngal gang de gA par rje dngo po la ba shi ba zhes pa'i chog sde rang gi ngo bos
121b5(rgyud): sa pa min// gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde nas bde la rjes chags skad cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhan la rjes su chags
121b6(rgyud): pa min// phung po gang dag de yis bskyed nams sbyang yang byed pa'i mad cig de yis skyed par byed pa ste// dag pa las chos de la la gzhan te smrang pang de las gzhan dang desas rnam par drag pa'o// ga ni/ 
121b7(rgyud): sal sa bon btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhim// sa dong chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste phra rab dag ni rnam pa drug/ dril sogs pa re res dman zhing yu
121b8(rgyud): rnam par bral ba mapa'am ye shes pa lta byarnams// 'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang thung dang ri bong can ta mamal mchos kyi dbyings// rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tul
122a1(rgyud): med pade la khrun skyes rten du gyur pa'o// slar yangs sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la chud pa'i dngos rnams gnas// phan tshun phung po 'byung ba dang ni
122a2(rgyud): yul can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa// phan tshun rjes chags lnga ni ro la 'gro rnabral gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gi/ rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kun nas gzham
122a3(rgyud): yon tan mi dga' mi phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas// de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsol byed chen po du ma sprul ba'i sku// de rje' bar lnga 'phro ba rnamar gyis 'dod pa'i
122a4(rgyud): gnas pa lha min dang ni mi rnams dang // longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis// stong pa'i cha yis srid gas ma mtha'
122a5(rgyud): dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zang bar te/ ka me yi cha shas rnams kyis me yi zad par tu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams kyis// 'dzin pa'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi
122a6(rgyud): tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kun// kun nas nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par byed// de ltar sangs rgyas sku b.rar
122a7(rgyud): ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyi dra 'chi ba bang ni mi 'gyur mo/ de gcig du las dam pa rda lte mapa 'dag rgyal ba bachog nam sa kyi di gadron rdzogs byang chub de// nub pa nyi shu'i rang ba'i
122a8(rgyud): slar yang de das sgra 'phru du 'a du ga ba'o// de'i ga cigag na pade mnyas 'bas pa snyengs gyur byel sa gzhan gyi ni nga bzhi dmin// 'di la 'apa' ba med ga cig gang yin
122b1(rgyud): lhan skyes chos kyi dbyings su rab tu zhugs pa la go/ namatha' las sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang nam mkha'al sogs khams rnams dang // gnas dang bye dang nyams pa rnams
122b2(rgyud): gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu sems car kur// sangs rgyas khro bo lnga sogs rnams dang snying rje'i thugs ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te// 'di dag rnam
122b3(rgyud): pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin mos klu dang brags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin rus pa dang ni dad dang r+tha// de dag rnams la phrog sogs
122b4(rgyud): zung snye kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i 'grod pa'o// zla ba'i dasus dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste// deni dadros dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi
122b5(rgyud): dud rtsi'i go 'phang khyang byed gzhom med do// sprul so zhes pa zla ba'i mtha' ni ma
122b6(rgyud): kun rnal 'byor rnams la 'dre mnyam 'bras bu ster// de pyir tha ma'i zhabs la gnas pa rna pa 'byor pa rnams kyis rnyi bang ba'i slad du btsal bar bya// yul las ma gtogs gang zhig
122b7(rgyud): ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa mi ma / sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin// de nam sna mnyes par
122b8(rgyud): dpag med srid pa gcod par byed de nam par mi rtog pa las so// rnal 'byor pa ni la du bar byed na dmyal pa su 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' su gro bar 'gyur// de phyir se mas ni dag pa na yang mkhas
123a1(rgyud): dang semapas skye bo rnam mam pags pa'i phyogan sems can dag dang 'grog par mo ban 'chos bdag pod dag pa'i byams pal sogs sems su 'gyur// mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan la khos
123a2(rgyud): ni drug yon pas ci zhe'ang chag mi sogs sems su gyur//  kun du ni chub sems cad 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// ba bar 'jug pa pa ma na ning sngon 'anam
123a3(rgyud): srang bdag ni mam sa cad dus pa bdu kyi leg/  phred blagasum gyi gnas sa bdun nams zhi men pa dang ni byang chubs mas dpa' zhi babyed// bdud rtsi dbang po yus kyis dam na mchog
123a4(rgyud): da yin te ston pa gcig cang bu lan// bdud nams ni ni bdud kyi thod skyob pa rnams kyi bde 'i rdo grol gzhan gyi snying 'dug/ dpyir sangs rgyal sabu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum
123a5(rgyud): dgra mthal bas dus su 'jug par 'khrugs kyas pa rnams kyis 'jig rten khams pa tshad gsungs gang len de yang min mas ye shes nyid ma yin// sangs rgyas rnams la lhan phyes yul gyi dpa
123a6(rgyud): kAni gcig dang dum dag gi tshad med de// las kyis rIn srog chags rnams la sems can rjes 'thun chad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar byed// gal ta tshad 'di bdag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyi
123a7(rgyud): dam bya ba zhes rjod par 'gyug gag shi rgyal ba'i dbang po ba skyed cing nyin zhag so ba'i dbangs sa gang gis mang ldan sa nges par 'gyur// skad cig gang dgis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par thal
123a8(rgyud): g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur ba// sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan dag ga shig zhom byed pa// de mi bskal ba bye ba du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan byes
123b1(rgyud): bdag kyang rig/ nim pa'i shing bas rkun 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shing las 'dam skyes dang // stong pa las ni byang 'das bde ba mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog chags gsod las klu
123b2(rgyud): nams/ mdzod sbyin dag las phrug sa nam sa mthor sa mchog tu ni 'i go bangs dbang po na ma sa ni 'gog las min// rig byed pas ni kun byen gsung dang 'gyur med pade pag yo med 'gyur ba mad/ 
123b3(rgyud): las minakya/ sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa
123b4(rgyud): rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'o// gang byer bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa// de phyir bdud dam ga nyim po ma'i dus su de dag rnam sa la du g.yis ni
123b5(rgyud): rnams byed ga rgyal ba'i stan gyis bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don spad dang po mas kyi phyag rgya bsten par bya// de nas nyi ma'i gzugs ni lus dang gdong dang dang ba gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa
123b6(rgyud): / kog gi byug pa'i rjes 'thun 'pho med bde ba skyed par byed ma mtshan nyid yan lag rab tu rdzogs// rdo rnams kyis rab tu snang bar byed ma srid gsum gnas lus chos kyi dbyings ne de nas 'gyung
123b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras skyed phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dung grong dang // mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang pa thams cad du ni dul kun tu// shin
123b8(rgyud): dga' ba'i dka' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las rab krol rigs dang reg sa min mngon byed cing // lus stob la bde ster bza' pa btung ba la sogs longs spyod dang ldan nasas byor rnam
124a1(rgyud): / bsgom padug// rlung ni yang dag phrad pa rnams kyis klogag me yi rtse mo phye bo'i nubazhu bar byed// thig le gang gang zhub 'di nas mgrin pa snying kal son wA 'a gas bdag la 'gos
124a2(rgyud): mig le las ni g.yo bal lda rdo rjen dbul gnas rgyam mtshan rtse la 'gog pa gas// de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gas te thig pa'i byeng bran po 'amed pal bde skyer na'o// de byed g.yo med bde ba'i sa
124a3(rgyud): na cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis skyed byed do// thogag pa 'i 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams com byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul kun dbyin pa
124a4(rgyud): sredag sus zla ba nyid ni nal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba 'dis phye// gal te las dung bzhugs shi bar 'gyur na de che de yi'ang nabs skye ba gzhan la'o// gang zhig yon tan med cing dang nga phrul dang na/ 
124a5(rgyud): bral de ni lu yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis// de nas chags 'arjes chags dang ni yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang dz+ra gi rang bzhin rnam pa 6// gnag dang dka la rjes chags tshul gyi yor
124a6(rgyud): ga ku s+yon sdug can pa 'a gnyis 'gyur te// rgyud dang gnyis dang tha pa 'dus da ni thang bdag byed danag sosarin chen dbang po ma 'byung bar du rgyal ba mtsha
124a7(rgyud): darnal 'byor ba yis bsrung ba bya// rin tshe na dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su ma pa' dag yon tan gtod byed kyi la 'khor ba zhengs byas nas// sangs rgyas byin 'thabs sngags rnams kyi
124a8(rgyud): pa'i rgya bde sanyam thogs dang pacas 'gro// gas ba 'asus bas byas nas do na cu gnas byang chub sem // de sag shegasu byangs rgyal 'i byen byed pa
124b1(rgyud): ni'ang ba pa'i do cid// shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig chen bu mor 'gyur te ngel par yangs rgyas yum du 'gyur// de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyi bad+ma dkar 'dzin pan ya daphyag na dong ste// me rtog
124b2(rgyud): brgyad gyis gzhan 'drad phyogs nga kyog yul du gnas rdzu 'bru da dran tho cib rgyal po rnam sa// zla bdel rgyas gang rab tu byung ba de ni spang yang 'angam dbyang sa rab tu byed pa ste/ yon te shu dag gi par dus
124b3(rgyud): brdul la byang chub sems dpa' snying stobs chen po ste// de nas stong pa dang ni rig byed par du cung zad snying stobs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur// slar yang khon nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs
124b4(rgyud): deng brtson 'grul chung ba'o// de nas skye gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'o de nyams pa las dbang ma yin// 'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i dbang po'i gsung gi
124b5(rgyud): zhen par bya// de dag rnams kyis rgya me chung nam mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal par bya// byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don ci byed pa me ste 'bres bu mang por 'gyur/ rnag
124b6(rgyud): zheg phrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lnga mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste// skyugs pa snying ka gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bul gnas chu skyes nang du rabazhugs min// bshang sa gcib bka
124b7(rgyud): nan mchog bya mnyam phyugs pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste// 'di dganams ni ye shes bdud ci srid pa gsas kyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan la shes rab chos 'byung sa ni ga 'i
124b8(rgyud): bad bdag sangs med pas bsrungs kyi// de mas sems can na// bzhig kyang pa na rgyam pa'i rigalas kyang chub sem nopa'i nyid// de byer den nyin nan pa mangs
125a1(rgyud): po rnams kyis bdu 'jug/ shes rab me tog dang ldan pos bzhi pa bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar skyon du 'jug par byed/  mchog gi bde ba la ga nas do ma la thams nyid
125a2(rgyud): skyes las ni byung mi bya// gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de'i tshen 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlangs par rab tu 'gyur// de cu skyes dag nas gzug kya rang gi rdo rje'i snying kar be shes 'khor po rab
125a3(rgyud): ste// 'di yis 'od zer rnams kyis gnyi ga'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed// gal te 'di ni grul bar 'gyur rdo rje nor bul ni yang dag gnas pa b.ra' bar bya// shes ra
125a4(rgyud): 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni bsrung ba'i don du bkod pa bya// shes rab dran pal 'de nas gcig sul ste sra babang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku// gang su 'di ni nyams
125a5(rgyud): mngon par dga' byed g.yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod par byed// srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang // 
125a6(rgyud): phyogs nyams 'jigs bskyed kyang srod chags rnams ldan ma yang ma yin no// gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi byed po g.yul gyi yul la dge' zhing gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa// de rnams
125a7(rgyud): mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i don du de dag sbyang bar bya/  mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon rnams byugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas g.yis gsol ba gang ba ye bya// sem
125a8(rgyud): nams de srung ba'i don du srid pa gsum rtse malas 'jig rten khams su smos pa// dbyer de rnams nyin gas pa 'o srung bar byed byeng hrun po sa nga bar byed/ bkrub dam
125b1(rgyud): mthu bas shi bar gyur na 'di'i sgrub pa po yi bdud yin no// skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bran tshigs rig pa la rjes chags// rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha'
125b2(rgyud): dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o// zhes pa'i bsam pa rkam chags sems kyi ye shes sbyin pa rnam par grangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug/ rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyi mtha' gzhan gyi dang
125b3(rgyud): mngon pa'i chos pa rab tu 'jugs shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni nam shes
125b4(rgyud): dbye ba las// 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sla brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i don ni byed pa so// sems can+da rnams ni sbyin pa'i slang du skar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i skur 'gyur/ 
125b5(rgyud): rdorje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sbyin dang mtshungs pa he ru kar ni byung ba gyur// gdug pa rnams ni spen pa'i don tede yang dmachog rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba 'don// rem
125b6(rgyud): posdug bsngab ldan pa rnams kyi dayang bar 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad// 'gegs rnams dag ni gzho ba'i'i don du phyag gi pad+ma ral kri don yod grub par dbyung bar gyur na
125b7(rgyud): las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i ne mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur// gti mug dag las spyan pa zhes bya mchog gi snying rje mA sa kI ni nga rgyal rgyu las so// chags pas de
125b8(rgyud): dkar zhes kyi mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrob ma yang ni phrag dog las// sna tshogs gzugs can gnyis po 'di dag yul dang yul can gzhan na mas thams cad du yang byung bar gyur/  phung po
126a1(rgyud): / yi rang bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo 'brag rnams lnga 'azhugs pa brtse pa yis// nges pa rnam par ma bslabs ba sod mams min pa lasagasu pa'i sems can
126a2(rgyud): ni sbyin pa'i don ste// gcang pa'i gnas pa migs pa bcom dzi ga zhig rnam par bzugs pacan pos rnams kyis du// nga shig oMl-i gi le gnas mchog
126a3(rgyud): mchog la dgod pa'i don du'o/ ma sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du skra dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun tu// nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang
126a4(rgyud): yang ri rab tu 'ayu pa/ khyoros lnga tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la srog gi rlung nims rgyu ba'o// l+h+wa padag gi ni sa sogs kyi 'khor dgal rabagyur / dr-i rdo ban
126a5(rgyud): 9/ sgral sogs la gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med la yang gzhan ni de bzhin kho na'o// gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o// 
126a6(rgyud): can ni dbye gsam ste cu ba dang sa can khams rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o// dus gas ma gnas gsum du bzhugs sred pa gsum du'adu gnas pa se bas can du ma'i don
126a7(rgyud): du'o// rgyad ramasA dag las 'di skad bdag gis chos shes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste// rdo rje can ni zla ba zhulas rdo rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying ka'i chu skyes stegs
126a8(rgyud): da me nams kyi b+ha ga do ni cig le gro ba ba gsum gyis mchog gi 'aslal gnas pa// de 'dir sangs rgyas zheng du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das kun la 'byor rnams kyis rig
126b1(rgyud): skye bsdu bar rang gi snying gis pa byed pa'i zhing nga chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni// khab chags stobs kyis 'khor khyor gnas pa gcig ni du myur mthong ste skyon la ma yon tan dbang gis
126b2(rgyud): so// don gcig du ma'i sad ni ngo rnyeng dro 'a rnams kyi 'thos sa ldarnams kyi ting pa smra 'jug/ nas can rnams kyi bsod nams mad du 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms ldan rnams
126b3(rgyud): dud 'gro yi dgas lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la// byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden pa'i chos ni gsung bya
126b4(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi'ang togs bya yin padangakra med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas skul pa sgyu ma ni// srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya kyin kazhu na
126b5(rgyud): po mas rjes rgyal pa dang bcas mirnam la / di rgyal ma na di'i 'a lu sa rgya pa'i phyi
126b6(rgyud): na nams kyi 'grod tu yin pa rnam pa thams cad ka/ gas gi rje sems can thams cad pa grong rnams pag gis chos ni no pa byed pa 'o//  rnga can ce thugs kyi rje sems can nam
126b7(rgyud): rang bzhin la 'dags pa gnas// dri no su dud sa 'onams kyi 'dzin byed dang yin nyid ye shes ni rje gon sbyin papa mgos des nyim 'bras bye drug dang bzhin las su'as bcu na/ 
127a1(rgyud): dag rnams su gsungs// de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams// bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa
127a2(rgyud): 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni sngon pal sog parnams// phyag rgya drug rnams stong ba drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes namya shes gcig pu'o// de 'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang
127a3(rgyud): de yi chags pa nyid dag ni// pad+ma nyon mongs pad par la gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi byed pa'o// mi shes gcod pa kri kug mchog gi rigs drug rnams
127a4(rgyud): dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa// phung po khams dang dbang pol sogs mkha' bzhin ngomanyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya// gang du nges par gyi byas kyi gzugs ni nyams

146a1(rgyud): / lag pa dag gis ni// rigs ldan zhabs kyi pad+ma phyag dag 'tshal nas smras pa stod pa gcig pu ma chog gi thugapa rje yis// thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'byor ba'i rdzun
146a2(rgyud): bsngal dag las kyang nas ye shes lam la gzhag par mdzod pas khyod na nan yang gzhon na mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po ldan yang thog par dang po'i sangs rgyas kyod// bud med sbyor zhing tsha
146a3(rgyud): par spyod ldan mchog gi zugs rje ngag gis 'jig rten gnyen tog shin rje'i dgra// khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'brog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdung // khyod ni grol
146a4(rgyud): srid pa 'dri ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug sa tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bla dag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btung bar gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar ltung // sems can rnams
146a5(rgyud): gyi thar pa'i skad du dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dgas lnga tu gsal 'a bya// rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyams bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan gas par// khyod ljin
146a6(rgyud): pad+ma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi shes ka'i zla bar nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs ba dag la// thub pa'i sku
146a7(rgyud): bcas te ma sna tshogs gtso bros byin gyis brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob// sems can rnams sde thar pa'i slad du 'dag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dgas la gnas pa bzhir/ 
146a8(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor mo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur chags sems can kun don mdzod pa po yis mchog gi thugs je dag gis rgyud
146b1(rgyud): ni bstan mang nga nas// sras popad+ma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter du gnang bu bya la ba nges par ni// dang po khyod kyis rgyad kyi rgyal po ma'a'adag mtshad med pa stegs pa ma gal kar
146b2(rgyud): dede// de nas shi 'ad pas n-i bgad byas nas gzhan gyi gnas sa mazod kyi bya 'i ga tan kyis nga dag ston phyogs gnas sam yin rnams mchig tu sa
146b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams// mi yi 'jig rten dgan phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas po thos rgyal po btsun mor btsam pa rnams// gang dag sa 'og dag na gdengs can dbang po gdon tshogs kyi
146b4(rgyud): dge sang dadus su chi byud ga/ de dag pams da nyin nogs pa dus su legs 'ag chen gnan su myong bar byed sa spyad des dun dus kyi ma shi
146b5(rgyud): lus rdo rje sdems dpa' lhag po 'i na// thabs dang shes rab gcig spyod rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo dzo ga gis de nyid nas po bcu drug pa// sems can rnams kyi 'ang ba'i slad du rgyal ba'i bya sa po
146b6(rgyud): gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bsnyun bkung // bsod nam sa dri mas sems can thams cad 'gyur byed mchog gi bde bar gyur cig del 'dud gyur cig/ dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrags
146b7(rgyud): gnyis pa pa byung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo sa legs kyi skyes pa'o// mchog gi nga po'i sangs rgyas las byung gA/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpa la dus kyi mkhor sngon kya gas
146b8(rgyud): ba'i baN+Di se yin pa dang / bod kyil tsha ba 'grod gi slong shes rabagrags kyi bsgyur cing bus te gtan lasapa pa las/ dus kyis man tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pa so mas pa'i
147a1(rgyud): / dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du/ mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang / dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul
147a2(rgyud): du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims drar gyis don gyis cha lA legs par dpyad cing bskul te/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong ston gyis
147a3(rgyud): dpalas spyi'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtAn la phab pa'o// / gang gis thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis/ 
147a4(rgyud): 'di la bskul zhing 'thun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang // bdag gis 'bad pas bsod nams gang thob des// kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog/ 
147a5(rgyud): kr-itan+dot+ter ta nA hr-i da ya nA ma// bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyis rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ltar 'di ltar chos dbyings rgya
147a6(rgyud): 'khor dri med 'jam dpal gyis ni dge dang mi dge bas// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag lha dang dmyal ba nyid ces gang thos pa// rgyal mchog pho brang sha ma b+ha lar grags ka lA pa ru ngag gi
147a7(rgyud): dbang phyug seng ge yi// gdan bzhugs rgyal pos rgyud kyi rgyal po spur yang thul pa rnams la gsal bar bstan// byung gyur zhes sogs bden te lha mchog bla ma khya ba 'jug g+ha yi dbang ba
147a8(rgyud): dang// zla ba nyi ma sgrag can me lhas stengs lha yul nam mkha' bsod nams sdig sas byung // mi rnams pha rol srid par yi dgas dmyal ba gang zhig bkag pa sha yi dam tshig can// ri
147b1(rgyud): byed pa dang pod pa can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de ni brdzun pa ste// gang du gcan chen bdun sogs dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis bras ze rnams kyang der skyes pa// sngar gyi lus po spangs nas lus gzha
147b2(rgyud): sar ba 'dzin par 'gyur// thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsod byed pa pa'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur// sha zos pa las brar ze rnams kyang sbru las sa stengs 'dir byung
147b3(rgyud): bden pa ste// bzang po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rig byed zhi ches bya ba 'jug ches bla ma// sha yi kha bas bkag la sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor rgyud// rdzogs sangs rgya
147b4(rgyud): kyis bco lnga sogs par bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas byang chub ni// sangs rgyas pa yis kun rnas pan me ba ra' zhing bdag gi pa yi bsrung mi bya// grogs chags rnams la sogs
147b5(rgyud): 'du shes bsod pa'i yid kyis nye bar brtsams pas 'dir nyams pa// phan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur gyi nam mkhang tsam ni srog chags rnams kyi byed po me na// srog gcod lus dang pa
147b6(rgyud): dang yid kyi rgyu rnams gsum gyis 'grub la de la longs spyod cing // skyed byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po srog chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jig par 'gyur// seng ge sprul dang
147b7(rgyud): stag dang bya rog skye gnas yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni skye dgu rnams ni byed dam byed du 'jug dang yi rang gsum gyis 'gyur// dge slong snying rje med pas lce la shA
147b8(rgyud): rolo rjes su tshol byed cing // bdag nyid gsod pa la sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang ni dmyal bar 'gro// dge slong nang basman pas sha bstan na yang bya ba rnam
148a1(rgyud): kyis gsang pa dang // pha yi ched du bas dang mchod sbyi mthog dang mye dang chu dang mthu'i spyod kyis shi ba rnams// sbyor ba 'di rnams med par gyur na gang du de tshe ba'
148a2(rgyud): gsungs pa rnams// dge slong rnams la sha gang den stobs bcu ldan pas nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi bas min// shal sogs pa ros nangs par sa yi 'og tu lus ched rnams su 'gyur
148a3(rgyud): chags yi dgas la sogs skye gnas dka' thub khyib pa rgyal po nges par ra dkyim du// gzhan gyi bya ba dang chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs dngar kyi ma rnams// 
148a4(rgyud): shi ba rnams kyi lus ni gang yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs ni gang // 'dir ni rdol gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni rnam par bkra// tho yor ka lA pa dang rang gzha
148a5(rgyud): la ba rdo yi tho yor phung por 'gyur// sa steng gnas su srog chags rnams kyi rig pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod pa nyid// srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni rang gzhan rnams 'brel

148a7(rgyud): rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te// longs spyod byed pa rnam par rig pa tsam ste rang gzhan bral zhing rtog med de nams kyis// longs spyod byed min srog chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gos mun
148a8(rgyud): babral nas sad par 'gyur// zla ba nyim skragacan med dumun pa gcig tu snang bar byed pa yang // sa sogs dri sogs yig lta sgo dang ga'u dang char pa sgrog dang rlung skyo drug pa gnyis/ 
148b1(rgyud): de deni lus pa phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba drug pa gnyis// de rnams longs spyod byed po srog chags phung po gnyid log gyur 'dir snang kyis rab bslang ba// phyi yi bdag dang nang
148b2(rgyud): bdag dang gsum pa mchog gi bdag rnams bzhi ba las rab gyur // sbrul sku longs spu dang ni de bzhin chos kyi sku rnams bzhi po pas ni rab tu byung // khyod stong min zhing gcig pu mchog
148b3(rgyud): 'byung ba las gyur tsam gyi gsum su them por 'gyur// de bzhi gsum sgo gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyings su nges par thim par 'gyuraro// phung po khams dang dbang po'i yan lag skye
148b4(rgyud): mun pa stug po snang ba 'od kyi mdog/ rnam par shes pa srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar rtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos// dri rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod min mkha' tsam

148b6(rgyud): dang ni srid pa yang // las de 'du byed srid pa 'gyur la 'dir rigasum po rung bcas cu chos sdug bsngal ni// rnam shes la sogs rnam pa lngar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa yang
148b7(rgyud): gsum las rung la zung las dpag tu med pa'i srid pang chos bdun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams// shing las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa las
148b8(rgyud): de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgyalas byung // chos rnams 'gag pa med pa dam mkha' tsham las 'byung ba'ang med pa nyid las de
149a1(rgyud): srog chags srog gi rdul phrar phung por bcas shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag yin mi rtagra mis// sbyin bu la sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa stong shing byang chub phyog
149a2(rgyud): bye// gang shig de rgyad pa sngo gyur gyilas rdzogasas bams skyon chags rnams kyisadun kyi ste// delas thong po mas las mas sna yang sri gzhan me
149a3(rgyud): sbyor ni// mar me kha thon rgya dang dri med chu dang sgra dang nyi ma chu shel sa bon sgyur// gang du rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dkar po'i chos kyi tshogs pas byung ngo zhes bya bden// chos las long
149a4(rgyud): rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams te// phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu 'gyur med bde ba chos sku min zhing de yi phyir// gang zhig sku yi mtshan nyid 'di ngan
149a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpon klu yi sa gang gsungs pa// gang zhig gcig min du ma min la bdag gzhan la phan phun tshogs chen po'i rten gyur po// dngos min dngos po med min nam ma
149a6(rgyud): bzhidan du ror nyam rnam par dpyad ka'i rang bzhin nyid// gos med rnam par 'gyur sbed zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab pa smos pa med// dbye med so so rang gis rig pa rgya lA ba rnams

149a8(rgyud): 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs gsung mdzad cing // 'jig rten kun la khyab ba rgyun mi 'chad pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyi sa gsungs// longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi
149b1(rgyud): po chen por gnas pa de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal// gang nig sems can rnams kyi smin parje rgyur gyur la gar me bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang // slar yang la lar mngon par byang chub chos

149b8(rgyud): kyi yon tan las byung de la longs spyod pa'i gzugs sku ma yin khams la rab btan pa// skyes pa bud med ma ning lha klu kyang 'jug rgyal ba thub pa rang las mthu las byung // gang gid nye
150a1(rgyud): lnga dang rigs gsum go 'phang yang ni gcig tu gsang ba yi// zhal brgya rig 'dzin dbang po sa la sogs dang yul dang yul can bdag po chos kyi dbyings// zhal brgya
150a2(rgyud): dergyu las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i tshogs rnams la// de las tshor ba gsum la sogs pa nub par 'gyur ba sla bzhin myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// gang zhig lnga dang
150a3(rgyud): gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis khams nams rgyas btab de yis de// gcig gi du

150a5(rgyud): ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang ni 'jig med rdul gyi phung po ste// srog ge rgyu ni dbyangs yig la sogs rang bzhin yang ni 'jig pa med pa'i srog gi khams// khu bi'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma pa

150b1(rgyud): gom par byed// de dbus lus po sbas brtse mo ba rgya brag 'bar bkun nasagasal bar byed pa can// lha rnams gsang ba'i mdzod gyur mchog go go 'phang 'di ni baN+Da byin rgyal po mchod 'os pa/ 
150b2(rgyud): tAn 'don sregazugs pabyas ma lus las kyi phung ba sreg par 'gyur bar mthong // gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyen dang mtshan du mi sdig 'phel 'gyur// gabazhags
150b3(rgyud): byas ma gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan dud mi sdig nyams 'gyur// gang zhig dran po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de la sdig pa 'phel// 
150b4(rgyud): drag po bsam gtan las ni ldog par gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang shig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig
