150b6(rgyud): bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de'i sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba la zhugs gyur bya de rnams sdig pa 'phel byar 'gyur// gang zhiganyid dang mtshan
150b7(rgyud): 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'brel// de bzhin sha dang chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nam sna
150b8(rgyud): nges par khro bar myal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur bas nyen dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa las rdzog gyur pas nyin
151a1(rgyud): dang mtshan du de mi sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin tshub khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du 'gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du// shes rab thabs dang skyon
151a2(rgyud): stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye shes rdo rje rnams// dngos dang dngos med byed po bsgribs dang nam mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bdag/ nam mkha' byed na byed pa
151a3(rgyud): yin 'dir ni gang zhig stong nyid stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig/ sems can rnams kyi byed por ma byas bsod nams sdig pa dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba stobs bcu
151a4(rgyud): pa ye shes can dang lha rnams longs ma spyad par 'jig pa min// so sor sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas stong nyid bsgom par gsungs// mtshan mo du ba las
151a5(rgyud): sbyor ba slar yang nyin mo nam mkha' par me la sogs pas// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngos po nam mkha'i dkyil du son par mthong // bsam gtan gyis kyang
151a6(rgyud): na tu sems brtan byas pas phyi ros dngos po rnam par spong // srog tsam+b+ha gyis ni srog gi rlung dag ny+tse zla'i rgyu ba bral nas mun par rgyu bar byed// dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhe sa
151a7(rgyud): dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig lo 'dzin par byed// rjes su dran pas rang gi gzugs las zla ba bzhin du nem mkha' 'od mang 'phro bar byed// ting nge 'dzin gyis khub rdo rje nas brtsams ma
151a8(rgyud): med bde bas rab gang 'gyur/ nab mkhar bltas pas gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te sna tshogs stod pa nyid mthong bas// nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags 'jig pa
151b1(rgyud): 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkag pas so// yan lag med pa bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te khu ba dri med bde ba yis// sna rtser blta bas nga rgyal 'jig par 'gyur te gzhom du med pa tshar
151b2(rgyud): pa'i gsung las so// srog dang rtsol ba byaklag pa sa sangs rgyas gzugs brtan drim bral ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// gsang ba / pa snying ga mgrin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams su rim bzhin
151b3(rgyud): nga re// khu ba gyen du song zhing khrag kyang 'og tu 'phrol tshangs dbyangs ga zhom du med pa las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsum dang
151b4(rgyud): pa'i sha yi mig dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lha la sogs pa'i lha yi sbyar// rang rgyal nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas spyan te gsum pa'o// byang chub
151b5(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi dri ma bral ba rnam dag bzhi pa shes rab spyan du 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan// rgyu 'thun dga'
151b6(rgyud): khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin pas na nges par rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// lus kyi sa bon grub 'bo ste 'khor lo lte ba'i 'khor lo'i bde ba gang // mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin po yi steng ga sgra bcas
151b7(rgyud): ba mgon po 'khor ba 'jig/ gang gis mgrin par de rig g.yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin rjen 'dzin// gang gis mgo bor zla gA 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral ba de ba shes rab
151b8(rgyud): gtsug tor tshangs pa'i bu gar 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug ra gang ba// gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'/ 
152a1(rgyud): de ni dpag med gang gi rig pa mgo bor rdo rje dang bcas drug pa rdo rje sems// snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la// dri bra
152a2(rgyud): de ba stong pa can ni stong pa can ni stong pa mun pa'i khams// gang zhig mgo la sogs pa yul can drug po lha mo rnams las sa slong la sogs gang // gzugs kyi phung po la sogs ga
152a3(rgyud): zhig yul drug nams kyang lha ru rtags pa de rnams kyis// dag pa'i dbang po lnga sogs yul can drug po gang zhig gnod mdzes rgyal po sogs// de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yu
152a4(rgyud): gnams kyang sngon po la sogs de rnams so// gang rtsig gro bog shin je gshed ni zla ba dang bcas srogs rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa// nyi ma dang brgyas srog rlung rab tu bcos 'gyur
152a5(rgyud): nig khro bo pad+ma ma par byed do// skra gcan dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom pas gang zhig khro ba bgegs muhAr byed pa ste// mjug rings dang bcas srog drung nges par bcom pa gang zhig
152a6(rgyud): shes rab mapar byed do// srog chung 'gags pas phyag gnyis dgyes rdor zhi ba 'dir ni nga rgyal 'jom pa rdo rje sems// srog drung bkag pas phyag bzhi pa yid kyis dor byin pazhe sdang
152a7(rgyud): 'joms pa byang chub sems// dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'dod chags 'joms pazhal gsum phyag drug dbang phyug sems dpa' chen por 'gyur// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs pache gti mug le
152b1(rgyud): patshangs pa bden pa dang bcas dam TIg sems// lte bar srog rlung bkag pas drim gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas nyid// snying gar bkag pa dri ma gsum bral byang chub sems dpa/ 
152b2(rgyud): rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid// mgrin par nyi sa de bzhin drim gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur// dpral bar rung gi dbang ba 'gags pas bde po dang bsdus dam 'ig
152b3(rgyud): sems dpa' ston pa'i sras// lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtsa bzhi dang // sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan rol ro yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bdes
152b4(rgyud): 'khor logs ma// lag ba rgung ba'i rus pa'i dum bu brgyad dang lag ma thil sar tshogs dum bu rnams// 'khor lo drug gi ca rnams 'ding de nyes 'gyur ba de mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor
152b5(rgyud): dmas la// gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnams su 'pho bya rnam par bral dang de bzhin myos kyi 'khor lo brgyad// mgrin pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i 'khor lo ru/ 
152b6(rgyud): sheg za pa'i ma yis gang ba mgo ba dkar po 'ding gsang bar dkar pa / 'tho po'i canams ying nam chon tu mi 'gyur ba de sadus kyil po gag pa'i na// dus shes
152b7(rgyud): lhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gsumaste tshogs mtshams rnams kyang rdo rje su// rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyung gunam mkha' lag pa rgyas po de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs// zlas
152b8(rgyud): shas supa cunam mkha' das mkha' gdengs can sla ba'i ca ni zlab pang ngo // tsa dang ba spug zhig ma lus lus la gnas pa ro rje myu gu'i ming can te// dong chu dang 'ashang ba bzhan
153a1(rgyud): lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis kye mes sdug par 'gyur// byams pa'i tshems kyis gdong dang lag pa dang pa'i sha rnams zos pas des na drag po la// mngon shes lnga na
153a2(rgyud): sa kyi thugs kyi tshogs mas thos pas des na seng ge ste// bas nams pa sa rgyal khrims dam pa com gsum tha la du kyi mthor lo spyan gsal pa//  la rngan 'dus par rdzun
153a3(rgyud): ba zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu las byung // der ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lha ru rtag tu bdud
153a4(rgyud): rnams dus phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas// srog chags so so sangs rgyas rna phul bar sngangs steng rang rang gnas su gtso rtsong gnas// mdod rgyas brdzun gyikyi rim pas 'gyu la
153a5(rgyud): yul can grub byed rdo rje bzlas pa yin// rang byin brlabs pas srog rlung ri bo ba can du bzhi pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod// bdir ni lnga bzung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan
153a6(rgyud): grasang ba 'dres par yang // bdud rnams yang dag gzung phyir sring bA gsum gyi thams lha yi bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs// gang mig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba brgya ya~M lam dang sbyin da
153a7(rgyud): khrisas sogs las skyes// skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur gyi ying tsam men la brtags par dang ni bdag kyang ngo // bdud kyi tshogs 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra bya
153a8(rgyud): bzhin gyi// bsam gau tan rdzobo bka' yang yod min khyam sa snyeg la bsod nams tshul khri las rnam par dman// stabs bcu mchog dang ldan pas rdzogs pa'i skad gachos kyi kyi
153b1(rgyud): la yang dag gnas pa ste// bsten par bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhabs pas bsgrub pa yin// bkug ci nga 'dir ni bshugs dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdungs zhing
153b2(rgyud): lag pa bcing ba yi// pasaya gtan 'dis de dge ba rnam par bral nas bdud rnams shi nas dag 'greng 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa mi ldarna mas dri ma gsum dang bral zhing sems can
153b3(rgyud): bshos dang // gsang sngags bzlas dang bstod pa dres pa brgya yis bsnyen pa sgrub pa po la dbadegyes nas// 
153b4(rgyud): 'jig tan skya sbrulas snang bar snang namasas grub pa'i rig du 'dzin pa ste / Ab nyes shi dag lagag nyi byi tu rkyen dus su sag shi gsung sngag sdig pa rig ni// zlab gajug bya
153b5(rgyud): 'kha' dang stong 'brang 'gro ngas ro ldan 'dabyer srid ba zlas// steng dang lag gnyis 'dzin bsalam gsum bral bas srog drung ging bus hU~Ms phrag khyer bsnyen pas// grub par 'gyur te
153b6(rgyud): sukun mam par 'gro bsku ka pa 'dzin pa ste// bsod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal sriphred kyang ma bdag gi sa skyed dag spyong // ye shes don du dus gsum dngos po sdong
153b7(rgyud): 'brartan mi ga slo dri bral klog byeng cing // tshul khrims don du lu ba rdo rje mgo bor khyer la mgo nas tshangs pa ng+ge ka ru// bsod nam so ye shes tshul khrim sa yang dag dri marnam pa
153b8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// shin tu byon can phyo gang zhig kyi la sred sems kyis ster ba len pas yongs mi spyod// yon tan ma yum ldan pa'i rgyung ma sems kyis byin yang ga
154a1(rgyud): yin pas longs spyod min// sha dag sems kyis byin dang gang zhig sha yid mchig can gyis len pas longs spyod min// de yis byang chub sems dpa' gal te sprob
154a2(rgyud): ldan pa tshod man rigs cis mi 'gyur// byams pas dka' thug mchog ni bo rangs dus su chang 'tshong kyim du 'gro// nyin byed dus su mchog gi zugs rje nya yi don du nya ba rnams kyi
154a3(rgyud): s+ye/ dgongs kyi dus su bud med la 'jug phyir du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro// chang nya bud myed rnams
154a4(rgyud): po du mang gyur bya seMr skya ba ni gcig pa nyid dam 'cha' la// gang gi bsgrub bya med pa nyid la brtan g.yo'i 'gro ba yod pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba// gang tshig tan tshigs bsgrub bya dang bcu
154a5(rgyud): pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min// gal te bsgrub bya gzhan lagatan tshogs kyang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bcas nyams// sgra rnams rtag par dam bcas nam mkha' lta bur byas pa
154a6(rgyud): lus med par grub de bzhin du// sran mas mi rtag dem bcas bum pa lta bur byas te shin tu rtsol bas byung ba'i phyir// nam mkha'i las ni rtag par grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams so
154a7(rgyud): nges par grub// gzugs dang reg tu dri dang ro la yul rnams bzhin du lnga pasgra/ yang cis ma phyin// de ni gang gis thog mar rtogs pas sa steng bar sdang khams su sgra des slar yang nI// 
154a8(rgyud): nams rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni sman mas mi rtag pa nyid yin lo// gang gi 'bog mar don togs gyur pas sa steng bar snang khams su spar yang de tshul gyis// na bas dodan nam
154b1(rgyud): rtogs pa gyur pas de ci gzugs rnams tan pa tad yin nas// rgyag pa gas kya gcig tu yon tanam lus rang bzhin pa ni rgan pa'i bug par gnas// mgrin pa nas 'arjod gas pa byed
154b2(rgyud): lnga ltos pas nus pa 'ang min// dngos po'i byed po'i rgyuni slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gaganan gnas pas ni// rtag pa mngon par gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis pa skyed pa 'di
154b3(rgyud): skyes bya ste// skyes pa dang ni gzhan pa gang dag chos mi mthun pas grub pas 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// chos mi mthun pa phyir byas pa rnams ni long par 'gyur la cig spos dmod do// 
154b4(rgyud): mdor pa dwags pa bya rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed den ma rgyum yin// mun par brim par gyur pa gang dag dmes mngon par shes pa byas dri yis 'bras bu rgyas ma yin// grwang 'don pa
154b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po sgra med 'gyur// gang ginas mkha' yong po nyid na brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba des na med pa nyid// gal te nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu ga sa
155a1(rgyud): dang / lha dang srin po rnams dang rang gi rigs kyi dmachog can gyi yi dgas kyu min kru// sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang
155a2(rgyud): bzhin gyi// don gcig du mi'i sgra yis kha cig tu yang don nams mang po de ni sgra gcig gis// dngos med steng pa'i rgyu las btan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rgya las grub pas na// dpe ni nam mkha'i rtse
155a3(rgyud): dang ni sa dang shing dang me tog de der rang rang grub// mo sham bu mo nam mkha' tsam las skyes pa nam mkhar 'gyur la bu ldan las skyes pa// bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i chu
155a4(rgyud): na phung po'i sa bon las// sa dang chu dang me rnams sgra yi de nyid khyad par rnams ni phyi dang ba dang min// gal te mun cig rab tu 'jug par gyur na de tshe ba dang gzugs dang lhan cig tu// sa
155a5(rgyud): dang me rnams lha yi de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jig pa yin// srog chags sa ma'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs kyi lha rnams te// sa dang chu dang byer ba rlung dang
155a6(rgyud): mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig nam lnga'i bdag nyid lus// lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnams rnam lnga de ba ni mthong min yod ces grags// srog chags rnams ni sngon gyi lus
155a7(rgyud): spangs nas slar yang lus gzhan bsam pa 'dzin par 'gyur// gang zhigs la sogs pa'i lhan mas de yi sngon gyi lus po zhig pas rab 'jig 'gyur ka srog chags gzugs gzhan spyo
155a8(rgyud): gi phreng ba chen po bzhin du rab tu rgya chen gzugs can te// srin bor nas ni bar sdang dag la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis lo// srog chags srog
155b1(rgyud): lhan cig thams po'i lus dang bral ba cor ba la sogs rab ldan pa// srid pa sul cu rtsa gcig rnams su dge dang mi dge 'i dbang gis gcig bu khon 'gro// gcig min rnam pa lnga po yul dang tha
155b2(rgyud): ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid ni// nam mkha' las 'das mi gas la min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min du pa dman pa min// sems las 'dod pas rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba mi
155b3(rgyud): zhing srog rlung med na sems med la// srog chags sems dang lhan cig bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel pas 'jug/ phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni bem po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu
155b4(rgyud): dag dang // phan tshun ltos byir gang che 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gyur par rab tu 'byung ba nas// ther zug pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams 'gyur bar nges pa
155b5(rgyud): mas cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin 'gyur yang gang zhig rtag pa nyid ni 'gyur ba med// zer zug pa dang mer thug dman pa'i skyes bu kyab bdag gis ni srid bsgrub la bshad de// phan tshun
155b6(rgyud): rigs pa dang ni rigs dag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phar tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan rkyen goso phyir byas pa dag dang byas
155b7(rgyud): pad+ma ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// thams cad rnam par rig pa tsamA ste sa dang chu dang ma dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams// gzugs dang reg bya dri dang skra dang bcas pa'i bde ba rngub phran phung po
155b8(rgyud): bamin// rnam par shes las 'bras bu'i dngos po rang 'byung ba las min shing med dang 'dren yas min// sa bon las ni s+ya gul sogs bzhin du 'gyur khye rang las min zhing rgyu med min// rkang nga
156a1(rgyud): rus pa chu ba sha dang khru khrag tshol bu lags pa rdul zlar phyung po min// rnam par rig pa tsal zhig grangs nas slar yang srid pa gzhan du nam rig tsam shig 'gre// drer ni lus len/ 
156a2(rgyud): slar yang srid pa gzhan du nam rig tsam po de nyid de// 'dod chags gnyid log gyur na rang gzhan bral ba nam rig tsam po rnam par nyams// gal te 'gro ba nam rig tsam du kar na 'dir rini do
156a3(rgyud): rnam par rig tsam du// de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir// gang zhig 'di yi ma rig glo bur ba ste lhan skyes gyur pa de ni nam rag min// sdod
156a4(rgyud): reg rnam par dag par lhan skyes bems po yang di rig par nam dag 'gyur// bems po ma lus rnam par reg pa tsam du 'gro sa sad pa'i tshe na rab tu rtogs pas grub// de yi na ma rig
156a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug la sogs 'gyur// bye brag grub na ser skya'i 'dod par 'gyur te sa bon nang na myu gu sogs// gcig phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyu

156a7(rgyud): po min// rdul phran bral te nam mkhar gnas pa las gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa med// gal te lus po rdul phran phung por gyur pa de tshe su yi lus po 'jig par 'gyur// 
156a8(rgyud): ba btags pa med las gzhan du rdul phran bral men gang gi rdul phran de rdul kyang // srud dang skyed pa bral bas nam mkha'i dkyilal gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas// phra rab rdul
156b1(rgyud): rnams la nas drug lnga slar yang cha shas drug ste slar yang gang gi cha shas drug/ de yi cha shas phra rab cha yis ral mkha'i khyams 'dri gang bar cis mi 'grug// dngul chu nor bu'i rdul phran cha
156b2(rgyud): med cad med bdag gis bsgrub byar gyur pa len// cha dang bcas na blangs ma 'bigs men rdo la yin la rdul phran phung po chu med ljin// dngul rgyus zangs ma reg cing gnyis skyes nor
156b3(rgyud): g+ha yi nor bu rin po cher 'gyur lo// rnam par shes pa nam rtog drug gis nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur yin// phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs ni gang zhig rdul phran phung po

156b7(rgyud): mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub par bya ba min// rdul phran 'dus pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshad ma yi// drag po dang ni tshangs pa'ang seng
156b8(rgyud): kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas// rdul phran rnams kyi shal ba mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gag par 'gyur// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med las
157a1(rgyud): 'dus sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung // 'di ni thub pas nam mkha'i tshad sa byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi yang // rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos sgra dang lha min
157a2(rgyud): bdag lta bur yi rgyal sras rnams// gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dang nam mkha' sa steng dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnams// khro bo rnams dang srin po sha yi dam tshig can gyi stag gzing
157a3(rgyud): song dmyal ba rnams// gang zhig nam par mi tog dang ldan rang gzhan bral ba stod nyid dus gsum ngo bo nyid// rnam pa thams cad dul phran gyis skyong nam mkha'i dkyil ltar son pa'i mi
157a4(rgyud): sgyu ma bzhin// gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par ma rtog de ma yin// gang gis de rtogs sems la dri med dri mar ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgya
157a5(rgyud): nga zhig sbyin pa la sogs lam dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams dang // byams pa la sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral ba stong pa la sogs rnam par thar pa
157a6(rgyud): tshul khrims la sogs gang zhig yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun du mi rtog pa// de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs ldan nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' mi
157a7(rgyud): gang zhig gzugs sogs khams drug de ni yul drug kyang ste rdul phran phung po'i nas 'gyur ro// phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can+da ra lus sa dang dril sogs
157a8(rgyud): sto ba sdang dang mun pas gsum gnas su rnam pa kun nas rnam par me tog pa// snang bas rab tu sad pa rab rig rnam par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags yin// 'phags pa
157b1(rgyud): yul ci rgyal po bdu gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas lam ston mdzad pa'o// klu srab rdo can kyang srid pa gsum kyi mas chos kyi byings su srung bstan cing // nyams pa rnams kyi sa
157b2(rgyud): can la sha yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub rdo rje ste// ye shes mtha' can nag be'i mang can gzhan yang badzu ma te sran po'i dbang po 'byung // ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag gdub dag kyang de bzhi
157b3(rgyud): tho par chad 'thung zhing // kha T+wAM ga dang rus pa'i rgyun cha char snod cang te'u ster ba nag po'i ming can no// slob ma rnams la gos sngon dang ni kun tu rgyug bster ba na bapa' sngon po can// sha yings tshi
157b4(rgyud): kyi mod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba byang chub rdo rje'o// gos sngon tsan+dan rta mchog bdag pong dpal ldan ta la sogs pa'i ming can gyis bsdun 'gyur/ ye shes rdo rje'i skyod kyis slob dpon ra
157b5(rgyud): 'thugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur// rab tu khros pa kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhon nus nag po'i khrag bathung snyed// sha yi dam tshig cad kyi spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs
157b6(rgyud): pa rnams srong mi 'gyur// mchog gi thugs rdo n+dan gyi 'jigs byed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po las 'doms pa// gang gi seng gis rnam tog yid kyis thugs rje yin zhing sems
157b7(rgyud): po byams pa yin// de rnams bzang pong thabs ni sna tshogs ya~M kha bas gzhan gyi nor 'phrog 'dod pa ni// log par g.yem pa dge sa rnam par bral bas skye ba 'di nyid la ni 'grub par 'gyur/ 
157b8(rgyud): ze res gnyis skyes 'jigs byed la sogs phyugs kyi sha yi mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis// de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs// tho
158a1(rgyud): dbang po sbyin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// gang yang rung ba blo gros dman pa dge ba nas bral de ni bdud kyis smras par 'gyur/ khro
158a2(rgyud): dbang po rgan po'i dbang po sha yi mtshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// mtho sa dbang phyug 'dod byer gnyis skyes phyugs kyi shadang khrag sas bskos pa 'i mgo bo las/ nges pa
158a3(rgyud): med myal ba rtag tu 'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba pal steng bar 'gro bar 'gyur// gang las bskal pa'i rgyal po stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur/ bdud rtsis
158a4(rgyud): yid ma tshig can gyi yi dgas mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyu ma byed 'gyur zhing // sems can bgru phyi kha cig tu ni 'jigs pa min par bdag nyid gzugs ni ston par byed// lhan pas shes
158a5(rgyud): tshig can gyi sgyu ma yin rnams 'dra bar bye phyir sgyu ma pyod// sems can rnams ni bskyad phyi la cig tu yang bdag gzugs 'jigasar mi byed ston par byed// long ba brlag phyir 'jig
158a6(rgyud): dus kyi me lha'i 'jigs byed du sa ni me lha rab tu byung // bde byed kyis bsad lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis mthungs par 'gyur// nya dang dus sbal phag nod me yi seng ge rtsa ma'i
158a7(rgyud): nems brlag phyir kyab 'jug skyes// nya drang de bzhin ri dgas la sogs 'o ma nags tshal dgon pa kyang 'jug gis mi baba'// sa gsum bla mas yi dwags mkha' 'gron pas ni srin gyi
158a8(rgyud): ka li gzugs su byas// mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos nA ma na yi chung mang brog phyir gnas 'jog gzugs su byas// 'jigs sde med pas skyab seng bu rna las sha yid mchog can gyis pa

170b3(rgyud): gzhan yang mchog gi cha dang thig le nyid rnams so// de yi bus su sangs rgyas spyani yul dang rnam par bral gyi longs spyod rdzogs sru du ma'o/ su 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' sa snang ba nal 'byor cheg
170b4(rgyud): gnas pa'i skabs na par bya ba ni/ ji srid ngas para'i monag pa dro da 'od par 'phro thong bdus kyi mas so// dang ni mam da bu sa da nyim yin du non pa med pa tshogs mngon
170b5(rgyud): yul dang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pam sus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid pa yin no// su mthong gyur nas kyir zhags so dus su nga tu nag ci kyis pa dang/ btu zhugs ca
170b6(rgyud): ma sems ni zlab drug gis reg tu bral nas ba des nyas 'gyur ba'o//  sred nges par rang gi lus pa 'od pa gakhor tsam yongs su tror bar byed pa mthong ba ba / chags dang chags bral mtha' dang
170b7(rgyud): song ba'i skad cig sa sa khyab bdag dbugs kyi blangs 'phel lo// mapapa dnga'abar ba'i dbas kyad kyang bar dang ni lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ninas shes dang / gnyed dang gargyal ba'i dbus su gnas pa
170b8(rgyud): pad+mad ka ges gnyis sbyor bde ba gang yin pa/ de yis 'phel bar rab tu bya ba bla ma'i nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel por the tshom med// bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal pa'i bdag po la gnas
171a1(rgyud): nal 'byor pa yi sa log cig sbyor ba yis/ sa yi nam par snang yang srang med dang cu yi gzugs su ldang labu yin gsher ba med pa'i phyir/ me yi rnam par snang yang me min rlung gi gzugs su
171a2(rgyud): sngang yang g.yo ba med pas rlung ma yin// stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang mthong sti dkar dang sngob la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog yin// rnam pakun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma
171a3(rgyud): de bdud kyis mthu stobs kyis/ sgra tsam thig le cha dang ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gnas su 'gro dang lcags sdig bcings pa'i rtsa/ srog dang zur sil lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje pad mar dang
171a4(rgyud): ldan pa yis/ dbus su rlung dag 'gro ba 'jug pa yang dag 'dus pa yul dang yul can med par 'gyur ba dang // du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzung dang 'di rnams 'dzin pa thams cad gsang ba rtse
171a5(rgyud): po'o/ dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi ma dang ba sa zla 'a gyur pa g.yas dang g.yon pa bcing ba dang / phyag rgya dang ni skyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde gyur pa dang rdo rdza yang dgas pa dang / bde ba dam pa'i don du bdang
171a6(rgyud): dadam rang gi lug pa'i padams gsor ba yis// sa bon ma btang bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan bla ma'i bral nyid do// sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur nA yang me la de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyu
171a7(rgyud): stong la de stong mtshan marnam pa cur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun kun du / rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur bde bdam pa gsom du med pa shes su du gyur ba'o// me li bdag pa 'i zhes pas ni phrul dngos grub
171a8(rgyud): sa bu rnams kyi skye ba 'dir / 'dod pas smral pa'i sku sa par 'gyur te gang brdzogs pa gsung du rab tu 'gyur ba'o/ bar basprul pa'i drugs te mo na las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes shes su brjod/ dga' ba 'ongs
171b1(rgyud): rgyo rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' khyang par dga' dang bcas pa dag gi ri ba ba yis// gsung dang thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed// g.yo ba nges par chos kyi sku ste srid wamra
171b2(rgyud): sngog byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de 'i gsung/ nyid ni nges par chos kyi thugs te kyi ma yonas nyid min mod pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms// yi gangs per dag pa'i sku ste byangs dang bral ba'i changadang mig sa sgra tsa ma ris pa
171b3(rgyud): yis// gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje srid pa rnam gsum la gnas dag pa'i sku ru skyed par byed/ sad dang rme khas rang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid log pa dang tu r+ya'i rang bzhin nams// lus gnas pa
171b4(rgyud): dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par rgyu dang yul las bskyod pa med pa'i sems thim pa// ye shes gnas kyang bud med dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems 'gyur pa'i skad cig ni// sgrub pa la sngogs rim pas thugs kyi
171b5(rgyud): rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu 'gyur ba yi// de kur sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa nam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig lnga'i dbus/ khyab byed pa de mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbyang
171b6(rgyud): rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni/ rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi bde ba bskyed par sa bon theg le ba tang na thar par ga la 'gyur/ de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig sa 'di 'artul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spyod pa bya/ 
171b7(rgyud): dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs su bcad pa sum bcu lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las mdor bsdus pa dbang rab tu byed pa rdzogs s+ho// rgyag brtse ba/ Te ha gakhas pa chen pos man ta m+b+hi dang/ lo ts+tshab dge slong chos
171b8(rgyud): rab kyis bsgyur ci shus te gtan pala' ba'o// rgyag na dang / sras pa kyus ma sog tu kai ni rdulas sar na ma su t+ta tan+ta/ bod gad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad panyam par sbyor ba ma par 'gros rgyu ba de/ 
172a1(rgyud): pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i chung blam/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdorje sems dpa' bde ba'i mcho snga gsang ba mchog ga
172a2(rgyud): na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di de rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu phye ba'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ chags med chags dang dra
172a3(rgyud): baman// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas// bud med skyes kyang par// ngo bo nyid kyi razhu dag gis// rang bzhin gyi
172a4(rgyud): de 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'das// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rked dang bde dang dga' kun gyis// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi ngo ba yongs bsgyur na// bud med kun gyi
172a5(rgyud): pas 'grub// ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di// mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to// TA ni nam mkhar 'gro ba zhes// khams las mngon du brtags pa ste// nam mkha' kun du spyod 'grus pa// mkha' 'gro ma zhes
172a6(rgyud): grags/ thams cad sa lus byag kyis// thams cad ma lus pade mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam skyong ba/ mkhara' 'grom zhes rab tu grags/ de ni nam mkha'i 'gro ba zhes/ sangs rgyas/ 
172a7(rgyud): / las rnam par brtags// kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni// sangs rgyas kun dag mkha' 'gro ma'o// sems zhes bya ba bde bar bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba/ mchogs
172a8(rgyud): de bas bde ba'i mchog/ kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tunam ba kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brten g.yo kun/ kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to// sems dang sems dpa'i ting
172b1(rgyud): kyang rgyab spyod pa tshogs nyid/ de bzhin bdu dang bad pas bya/ de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yid/ rdo 'dzin nyid dang / dbazhin 'dro bang po 'ar nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang / de dag gi yang rigs pa
172b2(rgyud): de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang / 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang // rnam pa sna tshogs pa dad pa'i/ gnas pa tham
172b3(rgyud): / de nyid do// 'gro ba dag de sa lus kun// thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam ba/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dngos po thams cad de
172b4(rgyud): yin te// nam mkha' kun gyi skyabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyas sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog go// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// sangs
172b5(rgyud): thams cad mthob pa// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur pa// de nyid bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdage bde ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid shin tu bsrubs pa las// sas
172b6(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag pa de mchog ston pa 'byor yang dag ma yin sams/ rgyal dmigs par byed pa dang/ rnal 'byor gzugs brtan rang bzhin te/ lags pa pa sogs rnas sabyor pa/ snar dge sa chog sams nas
172b7(rgyud): byor pa/ lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor ba/ mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa la/ rnal 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur gyis/ byang chu

174b7(rgyud): phrog bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun// so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal
174b8(rgyud): bis// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor bde ba myos pa kun// sos rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad/ 
175a1(rgyud): du// bde ba'i myos pa'i dngos grub kun// so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ 
175a2(rgyud): yas pa'i// bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur// de yi dam tshig dam tshig dbyung 'gyur// sdug po'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang // shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po// thams/

175a7(rgyud): tshun du ni rab dga' bas// skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed// dbang po kun nas byung ba yis// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byem tshogs
175b1(rgyud): rnams kyis// thams cad bdag nyid mchod par byed// rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi// dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba// rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// rab tu rmongs
175b2(rgyud): pas dbang bskur 'gyur// lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la// ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba// bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod// rnal 'byor thams cad
175b3(rgyud): bde ba yi// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rtag tu myang bar byed pa na// shin tu sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba nges//

175b5(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gatsho// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag
175b6(rgyud): dan// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo thams cad grub chen po// 'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
175b7(rgyud): klos par// dngos grub kun gyi bde myos pa// de las rgya chen mchog gzhan med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen nges// 'di la tshe 'ang
175b8(rgyud): ni// rnam pa kun du mi 'grub pa'i// dngos grub kun gyi bde myos pa// chos dbyangs mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'o// dbang phyug kun gyi nga
176a1(rgyud): myos pa// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa
176a2(rgyud): kun tu mi 'grub med// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro snyam bde ba'i mchog las/ 
176a3(rgyud): mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyar ba skal pa mchog bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// // 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa
176a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gu snyam bde ba'i mchog/ l+h+wam kun dang mnyam sbyar ba// skal po bzang mchog 'dod pa ste// yang dag stong ba
176a5(rgyud): bde myong ba// 'dod chags ther zug brtan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bde mchog/ rang gi spyod par
176a6(rgyud): rab spyod do// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa// gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin du// dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i// skal bzang bud med ci zhig smos// lha yi dngos grub dga' bdas / 
176a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// bskal pa bzang po bde myong bas// so sor rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa
176a8(rgyud): dpal// skal po bzang po longs spyod kun// rang gis sprad par de spyod do// rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang // 'jig rten dang po mchog gi dpal// sangs rgyas dga'
176b1(rgyud): dam pa// phrogs nas te bar spyod par byed// khams gsum dag nam lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun// rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thun du// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par/ 
176b2(rgyud): / byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs nas de spyod na// longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan
176b3(rgyud): phrogs las grub dang dran pas dga'// ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dad la sbyin par byed// ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang
176b4(rgyud): bcas// ngo 'thon stabs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dngas sbyin par byed// tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs te m+WAr skrun
176b5(rgyud): // longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de yis mi sbyin ci yang med// sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun//

176b7(rgyud): thams cad rab 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// 'khor los sgyur ba rab grub pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro snya ma bde mchog gis// sang
176b8(rgyud): sa kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che// rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'dra// la lar byang chub sems chen po// la lang smad pa 'thun par 'gro// la lar dga' ldani lha dag las// dam pa
177a1(rgyud): shin tu 'pho ba'o// la lar skye ba rnam par dag/ la lar nges par 'byung bar gsal// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar bdud las rab tu rgyal// la sar
177a2(rgyud): byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// la par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// lnga lar pha rol mu stegs rnams// chos dang glan par 'tshar gcad do// la lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba// grub pa kun gyi/ 
177a3(rgyud): dbang phyug nyid// la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog/ grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// 'dul ba'i
177a4(rgyud): su nges pa'i gar// rnam par sprul pas bgyes shing rol// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ brtan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag/ gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs// dpal ldan
177a5(rgyud): sems dpa' bzhin// 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog/ rdo rje sems dpar rab tu 'grub// sems can khams
177a6(rgyud): nidu ba dag/ ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs// lha dang byang chub dka' ba rnams// brtan par sems can dag la sbyin// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// sems can ku gyi don
177a7(rgyud): de cing // ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpos de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
177a8(rgyud): slor ba mkha' 'gro snga ma bde ba'i mchog las sna tshogs thams cad kyi skal pa bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste// dpal dam tshig gi rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o// 'di ni rnal
177b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro snyam bde ba'i mchog/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid // ji ltar 'tsho
177b2(rgyud): bzhin du sbyar// rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la// grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ sna tshogs las kyis sbyor ba las// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang // bde
177b3(rgyud): thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pas// sems can kun don rnam 'phrul na// myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyu/ 
177b4(rgyud): nyin re 'am yang na zla re 'am// yang na de bzhin lo rin// ci bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // sangs rgyas bde mchog kar bya'o// khams kyi bo thams cad dang // de bzhin srog dang rtsa las
177b5(rgyud): 'byung // rang gi lha yi cha lugs su// bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der// 
177b6(rgyud): pabyas nas des bsgrub po// de las gzhan yang rtog kun kye// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i// gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya// sems dpa' sangs
177b7(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rtag pa
177b8(rgyud): dam pa brten pa skye// rtag tud ltar 'byung ba bzhin// ra ba nyid ni 'da' bar dka'// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sog/ 
178a1(rgyud): 'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// ma
178a2(rgyud): 'gro snum bde ba'i mchog/ bla ma'i sbyor ba 'di las ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams// sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub/ 
178a3(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung
178a4(rgyud): tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson// 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas// 'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ 
178a5(rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// grol ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas sprul pa kun du bskyed// stong pa ma yin mi stong min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te// shes rab
178a6(rgyud): pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs dang snying rje bdag nyid rnams// de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal// rtogs pa med pa'i chos rnams la// sems can de
178a7(rgyud): yongs po rtags pa// rnam par mi rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya// brag cha li ni sgra 'dra ba// chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te// de las theg pa chen po yi// 
178a8(rgyud): ngag yon tan rgyas pa'i klas// dus gsum pa yed mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsod// mnyam med pe g.yo mnyam med ma chos gi chos nyid can// drug
178b1(rgyud): rje bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' las dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri zed mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu
178b2(rgyud): phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bstan du yod pa'ang min// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub
178b3(rgyud): mchog rnams nges par stsal// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rdzi shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu rtson pa mtha'
178b4(rgyud): yas pa// thugs rje chen po bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bad+ma bar gshegs pa'i go 'brang dam po brnyes zur kyang // khams
178b5(rgyud): gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin
178b6(rgyud): rnams kyi nang nago 'phang mchog brnyes pas// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam
178b7(rgyud): mchog sum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad rdzi// yang dag yon tan rgya chen te// lan gcig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub// 
178b8(rgyud): par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis// dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun// dam tshig gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// sku ni lta bas mi jo/ 
179a1(rgyud): pa// thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang // legs so zhes nas dngos grub ni// mchog rnams kun ni rab smin mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang / 
179a2(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang // rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad// de nis de las bsgrub pa dang // shin tu rtag pa'i dngos
179a3(rgyud): dag/ gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub shin tu rtag thob bshad// rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yiso// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// thal mo legs par sbyar
179a4(rgyud): thal mo lan gsum rnam par brdab// dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// shin tu mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor
179a5(rgyud): ltar mos pa'i chags pa dang // Sha Da ba la sogs pa yes/ ci nAs yongasu ma skyo bar// rtag tu chad med bzlas par bya// kun du kun nas thams cad ni/ bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas
179a6(rgyud): dngos grub pa// rab tu mthong zhing mchog grub pa'o// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid kyi
179a7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba// bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan gcig glar blangs pas// kun du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa rtag pa
179a8(rgyud): mchog/ dngos grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid thob par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal ba 'di yis de// thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba// 
179b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun rngub ste// de bas dam tshig gsum la soms// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyis mthas klas pa'o// sems can khams ni rnam pa
179b2(rgyud): grol// dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul
179b3(rgyud): shin tu gdug par khro ba yis// 'o dod 'bod par ltung bar 'gyur// de nas 'phos nas sems
179b4(rgyud): bag chags kyis ni mtshams sbyor bas// shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur// blo ni bdud kyis byin ba rlabs nas// rims dang dug dang dbyig du gnang // phra ma nam dang gnod sbyin gdon// 
179b5(rgyud): dang rnam par log 'dren nyid// shin du gdug pa chen por 'gyur// gnas gsum po ni 'jigs byed cing // sgrub pa po rnams la yang ba// lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed// bstan
179b6(rgyud): kyang 'jig par byed// de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha// tshangs pa'i drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas// 'jug sel la yang skabs su dong // tshangs dang
179b7(rgyud): sel lha rnams kyang // lha chen drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen yang // rdo rje can la skyabs su dong // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ 
179b8(rgyud): se gol phyag rgyas ni// sangs mas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dpung pa gnyis na rdo rje drabacingag// rdo rje se kol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgya
180a1(rgyud): cad bsdu mdzad na// de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor dang 'khor ma'i tshogs bcings pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na// gzhan
180a2(rgyud): smos kyang ci zhig dgos// rdo rje se gal gtogs pa yis// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas// shin tu
180a3(rgyud): gdug par gtum po la// zhabs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig
180a4(rgyud): gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos mi dgos// de nas sna yi rtse mo la// yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung // sna yi
180a5(rgyud): dadro ba las// rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung // bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje khro bor gyur nas byung // dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ 'bar bas thal bas rab tu 'dzi
180a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sngon por 'bar ba'i dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar por 'bar// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra// 'bar ba chen po sgra 'ab
180a7(rgyud): / thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can// 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs// khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa// zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang / 
180a8(rgyud): sbyin ma gro gnyer bcas par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i lte bas ga byas pas// gu ling dbang chen nye dbang bcas// nyi zlag shin rje tshangs par bcas// gnas gsum dag ni
180b1(rgyud): byas nas// thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshog/ rdo rje rdo rje kha ga/ dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis// thams cad lab nas slar yang ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de yi 'bar
180b2(rgyud): nyi ma las// byung ba'i grib ma mi zad pa// bskyed nas me lus btud la sogs// gdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus// rgyal po de ni de dag dang // lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol// thams
180b3(rgyud): cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis// shin tu gdug tsong khro drag pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas// dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// 
180b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod// rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi 'thas klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs// dpal
180b5(rgyud): ru kas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs rapa la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni tsA
180b6(rgyud): ni// log par lce la gnas par gyur// shin tu lte ba ngan pa yis// 'dod 'bod pa chen por lgang // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir// pad+mo cha
180b7(rgyud): par sbyor ba yis// rdo rje chos su gnas par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma dkar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas me gos pa// de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi// nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par
180b8(rgyud): dag/ 'dis ni kun du gzigs pas na// rgyal pa dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan spyan ngas gzigs kyi dbang // da rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'did chags
181a1(rgyud): dgapas na// mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'dul ba'i thabs ni tshogs gyis// sna tshogs pa na 'dus byar sgo// kun tu spyan dus gzigs dang
181a2(rgyud): rgal// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// pad+mor rgyal po mnam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sam bde mtshig des// bad+ma gar dpeng la sogs kyi// rtog pa blo med thams cad kyis// nam ma
181a3(rgyud): dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khrims ni rnam par sbyongs// dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po
181a4(rgyud): // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu gdug cing ba nam par 'gyur// shin du 'jungs par gyur pa
181a5(rgyud): les// yi dgas rnams dang dmyal bar lhung // de nas 'phos nas slar yang ni// shin tu dngul por skyes par 'gyur// bkres dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis// de dag phan tshun gsod
181a6(rgyud): par byed// shin du gdug ba skrad pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i don gyi no chen po// rdo rje nyim byung bar gyur// nam mkha'i snying po sa thams cad phyog gi/ kun
181a7(rgyud): rlo ba yongs su mdzad// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs// shin tu gdug cing khro ba la// zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes
181a8(rgyud): gis ni// rab tu gdung bkun bsgrubs pas// bya ba dang da bzlog pa dang // dbrog pas kyang mkhyad pa ngadra// rgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum te// nod gyi tshogs kun srud pa
181b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum tshul la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rab tu dgrol// dpal rdo rje nyims dbugs
181b2(rgyud): b.lo// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtog pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// brtson
181b3(rgyud): 'grus shin du chung bar 'gyur// shin tu 'artson 'grus chung ba yis// mdar med pa yi dmyal bar lhung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ 
181b4(rgyud): drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu// rtan mchog dpal ni byung bar 'gyur// thams cad dag par mos po yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// shin
181b5(rgyud): tu gdug cing khrol tu ba pa'i// sems cad rnam pa mang po'i khams// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ bye ba rkun po tshom po yis// thams cad rnam par spong bar byed// bri ba
181b6(rgyud): dag dang // ngo 'thon stobs kyis de bzhin du// dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// skye 'gro gnas pa 'gro ba rnams// mtha' dag btul nas 'grub
181b7(rgyud): 'gyur// 'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis// rang gis rgyal srid rtag tu stong // g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par 'gyur// 'khro ba rnams la 'gro ba'i mchog/ nub rnams la zhe ba
181b8(rgyud): drag shul can la drag pos gnom// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dbang thug dam parab mnan nas// lha mo sgrim phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang per spyod// sdig med stob
182a1(rgyud): ngo 'thon du// mthu bo che yang rab man nas// rug ma yang ni phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdug med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// skye dgu'i bdag po rab
182a2(rgyud): mnanu nas// lha mo rab tu zhi pa 'phrogs// de tshe yongs spyod rang grir stod// sdig med stobs kyi pa ngo 'thon du// 'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas// dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma// phrogs nas
182a3(rgyud): tsanye bar spyod// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyangs mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rdo rje las mchog rnam gnon pa// nam mkha'
182a4(rgyud): kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// thabs dang rtsal gyi grub pa yis// drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs na ni// khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus par// rdo rje 'dzin
182a5(rgyud): des thob nas// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mchog/ drag shul sbyor bas grub par byed// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rtsal gyi
182a6(rgyud): rol gnon pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel// lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// gong 'phang mchog gi rtag pa dag/ rang gis rnal
182a7(rgyud): kyis thob nas// sems can khams na du ma dag/ ma lus par ni rgyal 'dobs shing // 'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag/ sems can rnams la brtan par smin// rta mchog rnam par
182a8(rgyud): sprul pa yis// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun du sred par gnas// sems can kun gyi don kyang byed// de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad
182b1(rgyud): kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sems can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs// dpal rta mchog gis dbug pa byung ba'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings
182b2(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi mthas klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyis gtam gyi rtags// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// grub
182b3(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed// zhes pacom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// / 
182b4(rgyud): sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa rtog pa ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang thams cad du// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas thams
182b5(rgyud): cod mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyis dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad
182b6(rgyud): bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun kye dam tshig dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras// dril bu rgyal
182b7(rgyud): mtshan mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa bris pas na// rdo rje gru dang mchid la sogs// klu dang silam snyan rnam par 'phrul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me dri dang sogs ldan pa// sa
182b8(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyum bde mchog bsgrub// yang na bdagag gnas dag gam// skyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub// der ni dang por gdan bsham
183a1(rgyud): 'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur ba// sna tshogs pad+ma ngas kyis g.yogs// de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skor
183a2(rgyud): phyug rnam 'phrul bas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de na rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// stan de dag ni thams cad la// ci ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod// gru bzhi pa la spro bzhi pa/ 
183a3(rgyud): thibs bzhi yis mdzes par byas// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sags// sgo srung dang ni ldan par byas// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa// skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas
183a4(rgyud): mtshan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rtag par bya// mi yi mtshal ni grub pa la// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'o// rdo rje'i chung
183a5(rgyud): rdo rjer bcas// mtshal chen po dag bsgrub pa ni// mthu yis rab tu grub pa skye// pad+ma'i snod kyi nang du bzhag/ chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin na
183a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs// dam tshigs 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de yi mchil deng khu 'dang // mtshal chen po ni bslus pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dam rkye
183a7(rgyud): po zhes bya bar bshad// dpar chen dang neg bur bcas// tsan dan dmar por sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyang dbus su bzhag pa ni// ri sa ya ni kun slong sa// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// srin
183a8(rgyud): lag dang ni mthe bo'i rjes// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa yini dngos grub thob// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ram lan bde ba'adis// rdo rje sems dpa'i
183b1(rgyud): gzhan// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro snyam ba de mchog gis// 'dus pa der ni zhugs pa dag/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro'o
183b2(rgyud): kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo ku na// kun gyis dngos por de 'gyur ro// 'dis ni bsrung ba byas pas dpal//

183b4(rgyud): gos bzang ba gis nas ni// me tog phreng ldan 'dri nim// sna chags kun gyis skul bzang po'o// slong bsong bgyi bdas kyis su// gos dgapa pa yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi 'a
183b5(rgyud): bskul bar bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams// shar ba dag ni mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// nges pa'i lam

185b1(rgyud): dka' myong bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyar ba'i// mthu nyid kyi pa ni thams cad du// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// rang gi bde ba nyid kyi 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi ga

189b5(rgyud): yang na dgos pa bye// de ni chung yang mtshag yin no// de la gal te mchog bdog la// de yang ngan pa'i yon 'dul na// kun gyi slob dpon pa dus
189b6(rgyud): shin tu brgyan pa 'am// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dang // phul nas rin gyis bla ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yin// mchen dag ni phul nas su// slar yang rin gyis bla ba ni// 
189b7(rgyud): 'dzan dpal stor ba la// yon ta mchog gi yon len no// mu tig bzang dang nor bu dang // shin du dkar ba'i ras zung dang // de bzhin tani dkar po ga/ pad+ma can gyi yon mchog yin/ 
189b8(rgyud): sred longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams cad de// rdo rje ni ma'i yon yin no// shin tu
190a1(rgyud): pa'i rta dag dang // glang po shin tu brgyan pa dang // shing rta rin chen gang ba dka/ d+hU'i rgyal po'i yon yin no// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang // srog
190a2(rgyud): rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bsrung ba// mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs brtag/ spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // 'gram pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru// sangs rgyas
190a3(rgyud): chen thams cad kyi// dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan nam// sangs rgyas gtsug
190a4(rgyud): nor bu dang // kun du sna tshogs bla mar ni// kun gyi slob dpon kun la bya// rgyal sred thams cad rnam dag la// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las byas
190a5(rgyud): bzhin sna tshogs rkyen gyis spras// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dbang bskur bas// slob ma thams cad dbang 'askur ro// sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed// rdo rje rigs lnga rdo rje yin// spyan ras
190a6(rgyud): gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku// nor bu 'dzin ci nor bu yin// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma dang // rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du// thams cad mchog ni rta mchog le// rang gi dbang bskur bsdus pa
190a7(rgyud): blugs pa dang ni byas pa 'am// brdungs pa 'am yang ni bris pa 'ang rung // sna tshogs rab tu lags pa yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag/ kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// rang
190a8(rgyud): rnamig kyi mtshan ma'i bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha ba klas pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog/ gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du// sbrul ldan de bzhin skal ba ba zang // zod
190b1(rgyud): ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// pad+ma n+ya gram dpag med che'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe bsgrub pa// lha mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya tshogs skab bzhin/ 
190b2(rgyud): de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ de bzhin 'khor lo phyag rgya dang // rdo rje tri shu phyag rgya'i mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang lcug ma dang // pad+ma rta mgrin 'bar ma po pa// rtam grin ldang du
190b3(rgyud): pag gi mche bgrub pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhinono// rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi ras la// thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bzang // mtshan mo'i phya
190b4(rgyud): bzhin no// gling bu dang ni pi bang kun// ku maN+Da dang mu ra dza// me tog bdug pa mar ma dang // sna tshogs dri rnams de bzhin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi
190b5(rgyud): mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpral// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas// grub pa'i dang
190b6(rgyud): thub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin du ni mkhar sil dang // dam pa'i chos kyi glegs pam dag/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs bzhin
190b7(rgyud): de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang // cha lang dang ni rnga dag dang // rdo rje dang ni rin chen snod// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs bzhin no// de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang // me long dang ni rma
190b8(rgyud): yab dang // rdo rje ser rab sprin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang // rdo rje 'bar ba kha TIg/ thod pa kham phor de bzhin no// dmar chen dang ni snying rje dang // sha chen po yang de bzhin te
191a1(rgyud): rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'drer// chang dang chu dang de bzhin te// sdug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang // ras dang de bzhin me dang ni// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal// gdug pa
191a2(rgyud): cad za ba yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs// rnal 'byer dngos grub rab sgrub pa'o// pad+ma sde tshogs dmar po dang // ljang khu de bzhin dkar po dang // mthing ka ser po la brgan/ 
191a3(rgyud): / bA ma tshanas gnam pa 'dun// bad+ma spang ba zud me \u0f7f// de bzhin gyis kyi la 'ong sa dang // gis la ning dpal brjed do/ sa/ pad+ma mchen ma tshogs gzhin no// nung sa
191a4(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya grub pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa// dngos po brtan g.ya mi lus kun// rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya/

191a6(rgyud): sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchog las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan dag bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// rnam pa
191a7(rgyud): kun du sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthetha chung mdzes par bsgyur// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying
191b1(rgyud): ba'i thabs// gams pa bdan gsum du bya// srid bur bcas pa'i sdig pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyin/

191b3(rgyud): par bcas// btud de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur// bsam pa g.yas pas phyag byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa

191b8(rgyud): grub byed pa'o// 'gying dang bcas pa'i tshul byas nas// ci lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed cing // bskor ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas
192a1(rgyud): gnyis dag gis// mdzub myo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur bcang // g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya'i// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na/

192a5(rgyud): sbyor ba skal pa bzang po bde ba chen po bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bskur ba'i// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/

192a7(rgyud): zil mo sbyar ba sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dkrol// mchod pa'i gtor

192b3(rgyud): pa thams cad dbul bar byed// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs// bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa
192b4(rgyud): tog 'dug pa mar me mchog/ dri yi mchod pa 'byung ba'o// gang ba'am 'on te stong pa'ang rung // yang na ci 'byor pa yi sathong // dam tshig mnyam par bskub pa les// mchod pa thams cad

193a1(rgyud): pa thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba dpal skal pa bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi

193a3(rgyud): dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// bde ba kun la zhen pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku//

193a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen che// dbu rgyan can ni bde ba'i mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min 'di mi 'phrogs// lha yi chu 'dis dag pa ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang //

195b3(rgyud): mchog gi/ rab tu grub pa'i glu rnams kyis// bla med pa yi dngos grub 'thob// de nas phyag rgya ye shes 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab grub cing // 
195b4(rgyud): shin du bsgrub pa ni// kye che rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod bdag la bslab cing rtogs par mdzad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sa
195b5(rgyud): ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bsten
195b6(rgyud): dugasol// dzaHhUM ba ma ho// kye bde mchog bde bas rung la rnam par thal// hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol// yal la ho// de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshigs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob mas
195b7(rgyud): dugasol// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyum po de ba'i mchog/ kun du kun nas thams cad du// 'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
195b8(rgyud): sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir/ 
196a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// 'dod dam rnam par dag pa byar// bcom gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la sogs chags chen phyir// dkar ni
196a2(rgyud): tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal srid rab sgrubs pas// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de bas theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen dag/ g.yas pa'i mthe ba
196a3(rgyud): gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu chur bcangs pa yi// sor mo kun la reg pa ni// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// 'odadi ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin// 
196a4(rgyud): byang chub sems chen skye ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par// rab tu
196a5(rgyud): sgrubs par 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba skye// sangs rgyas nyid du rig par bya// mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so// gang gis ldan/ 
196a6(rgyud): papa'i 'di mthong zhing // rnam pa kun du mchod byed pa// de yi sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog/ mthong zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo leg
196a7(rgyud): par bskor// dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal// sems dpa'
196a8(rgyud): rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo zung ngo // rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su// lage pa g.yon pas bka' pa ni// sangs rgyas kun blo dngas gru
196b1(rgyud): rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dag/ dpang po 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// pad+mo'i bu
196b2(rgyud): khu tshur ni// de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang // byang chub spyod rab 'grub pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'thab// rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab ni ni
196b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa/ ma lus
196b4(rgyud): ba med par 'grub// bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// dngos grub thams cad mur 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rtag dang dpal gyi ku chu
196b5(rgyud): yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// thams cad 'gugs par rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal grub spyod kyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sngang
196b6(rgyud): thams cad rab grub pa// ma lus lus bla med par 'grub// dang po sangs rgyas kun snod pa// gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin// gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i'o// bzhi pa mi zad snod yin
196b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal// de bzhin zhal bzang so ma yin// sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan yin no// gzungs ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya shes pa
196b8(rgyud): dag gi/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i klu mchog ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// slong bar byed pa btan sgrub pa// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag/ 
197a1(rgyud): drug pa'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// de ba ta yi glu blang ngo // 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs snyed khyab par 'phros pa yi// rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi
197a2(rgyud): grangs snyed pa// sprul pa ye ni sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs sbed ni// srid pa 'ad chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam 'phrul sde chags kyis// rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i
197a3(rgyud): / sprul mdzad ho// rnam snang sbyor ba a la la ho// de ring grub par mdzad// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sbrum bde ba'i mchog/ grub pa
197a4(rgyud): ba gdon mi za/ de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang // rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis// cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
197a5(rgyud): shes pa'o// rnang 'byol de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig le spang nam snang phyir// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsal// shin tu gdug cing
197a6(rgyud): tum po la// zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khros byung khro bo ni// thal bar 'jig
197a7(rgyud): mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmang por snang // gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs pa// lha rdzas chu yis dgang ba ste// 'di ni rang
197a8(rgyud): tede dag dang // mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// gos chen po dang blugs pa che// sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog
197b1(rgyud): tu'o gdug gtum po yi// sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir// 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs
197b2(rgyud): gtsug gi nor bu dag/ rgyal srid thams cad rab bsgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i// 
197b3(rgyud): phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas de zos nas// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal
197b4(rgyud): ru ka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral ka yi tshul dag tu// Sha nAM gA la rgyab ter byas// lag pa g.yon da thod pa thogs// g.yas
197b5(rgyud): ba ngan gsum par bya// nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa// nam mkha' kun du 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin// phyag
197b6(rgyud): tA'adi yis yongs btab nas// bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas// nam mkha' las ni kun lags te// bdag gi spyod par de spyod do// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla mkha'
197b7(rgyud): mi bzad tshogs// mkha' las sgyu ma kun blags nas// lus pa med par de za'o// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba 'am
197b8(rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang ka yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// bde bar 'bab pa'i kar byed pas/ skyil mo krung ni khyod bcas la// rkang pa rang gi brla bsdams na// dag po dbang po nyi dbang
198a1(rgyud): bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas su// gar byed cing ni de za'o// de nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis// de nas bde bar brlabasngam
198a2(rgyud): pas// legs par bsdams te phyir btags nas// rab tu bkram ste btung bar bya// sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni// de nas gla phrag bskyod pa yis// skal bzang lha dang mi rnams kyi// 
198a3(rgyud): med kun la de spyod do// bde bar reg pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// sangs rgyas/

198a5(rgyud): ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas// shi dang drag po rmongs byed dang // gyen du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba
198a6(rgyud): 'di mchog gis// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ chang dang chu dang lhag ma dang // ras dang mi gtong grub pa yis// khyad par du ni rgyus 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba
198a7(rgyud): yis// sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba sbyin// mngon par gtor ning saM gal rdob// dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas// g.yon du blta zhing lag pas drangs// 'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin
198a8(rgyud): te// gar byed rab tu mongs pa dang // zad dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang // tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin ling gi tin gsum las rgal// de bzhin sa las 'dren pa dang / 
198b1(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul ston dang // dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // rab tu 'jig par sreg pa'i me// las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang poH
198b2(rgyud): yi rgya// snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa shin du rmongs byed ma'o// de bzhin bzhi pa 'degs byed ma'o// lnga pa glar byed pa yi rgya// drug pa gsod ma'i yin par bshad// bdun pa zlab
198b3(rgyud): po yi rgya// brgyang pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi// phyag rgya'i lan rnams bla na med// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'joms pa// kyang bar du ni bshad par bya// dpal ldan rdo

199a1(rgyud): rnabar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal ga dus ro rdo rje phyag rgya nas b+haro// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags
199a2(rgyud): thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma'i phyag rgya dpal du gnas// mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir// shel sgong shin tu dag pa 'dra// 'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs

199a4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byas pas// pad+ma'i mtshan mchog par skor bcas// phyag na rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma kham/

199a7(rgyud): des bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yil// pad+ma dmar po ci bder bzung // rang gi snying gar 'dren pa'i tshul// pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa

199b1(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas n+de// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsdur// skems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma mthing la ci bder bzung // g.yas pas rab tu gang shed pa// dpal gyi phyag rgya ba da
199b2(rgyud): gsum// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma ser po ca bder bzung // g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pas// chu srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya// skems pa'i lag pagapon pa yis/

199b7(rgyud): / gar dbang bar dka' dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bdag tshangs pa 'jug seg dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla bdag lags a la la ho// pad+me skam dpal rnam pa sna
199b8(rgyud): sa 'das mdzad pa'i tshul gyis kar mdzan pa// bskyod ma cheg 'di zhug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsil// 'dod chags rnam par spong ba thams cad du dernam par sbyongs// par+N+Na
200a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa de la spyan sngar grar maldan gar mdzad cig/ khru 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// ste tshogs pa d+ma mnyam stong ba/ mkha' 'gro snyam bde ba'i mchog/ ga
200a2(rgyud): zla bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal po d+ma gar gyi phyag kyi phyug rgyu'o// rnam 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// de rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dor mcheg rnam par sbyang ba'i
200a3(rgyud): b+hir// dpal ldan nyis phyag rgyar gnas// nam pa khe'i gling tha mams cad bya sa// ra ba thams cad chags sna da pa// bud med pa stson pa rin cher mchog/ rin chen bam
200a4(rgyud): mkha' las 'bebs// shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// dam pa'i don du drag por nur// dragra pos 'dul ba'i
200a5(rgyud): 'jig rten rnams// drag po nyid kyis sgrub par byed// nyi mar gzugs dang spyod lam dang // tshul dang gzi brjid chen pos ston// rdo rje ga'ung dri mda' mchog drag/ shin tu legs par

200a7(rgyud): lus par// drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings te// rdo rje skyil mo lung bcas nas// ba

200b5(rgyud): mchog/ bud med rin chen dag pa dam pa'i don du thams cad 'gro// klu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon ma tha
