200b7(rgyud): phyag rgya rab tu gnas// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs nis ngo 'thon du// rab tu gdon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'jig rten thams ca rab tu 'jom sa// 'dod
200b8(rgyud): can la gson par spyan// gdug pa rnams la gdug par spyan// de ba rnams lazhi bar 'gyur// drag shul can la drag shul spyod// nal bzhi pa sa phyag bzhi pa// nabs pan pa la meg
201a1(rgyud): / then rgyam bzhin po// / dang klu sa pa ba sna sgrub/ yon pa'i 'a po nga //  du na sa/ da dus
201a2(rgyud): geng spong bcug/ gams pa pa de gsul par bya/ rgya da mis pa khan ni// shin du zung bar gyur pa yo da zlan tu kun pa phrang nas/ ling brnams pad te jug
201a3(rgyud): thams cad dge ba mnyam par sbyor bskal ba bzang po// dpal rdo rje spong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba las// brkyang bskum pa'i tshul byas nas// khro ba
201a4(rgyud): skyel mo krung bcas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu bshig/ dpel rdo rje kho bo gnas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di'i// rta mchog dpal deng ldan pa'i g+hu// las rnams tha
201a5(rgyud): darab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// myos byed stong las lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong las lhag par
201a6(rgyud): ne ba'i sku yang tshangs pa stong pas shin tu lhag par ston// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod// thams cad rnam par dag pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis
201a7(rgyud): non pas non// hi he he he hi dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis nga 'thon dbang phyug nor// sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa lus
201a8(rgyud): mgrub drongs// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon mthu chen nor// mnyam sbyor ru Ta ma Ta snying las dpal mo drongs shig rab drongs rishig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pas
201b1(rgyud): stobs kyis ngo 'thon tshangs pa mo// skyor chen mtshangs las grol ma drongs shig slar Ta// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyi snga ro 'thon dga' dbang nor// mnyam sbyong kun gyi bdun
201b2(rgyud): la dga'adrongs a la la ho// bdug cing khro la rab gtum pa yi sems can bskul ba'i phyir// sgrub zhugs a la la ho// oM pum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM phaT phaT// mdza' bo me la bya 'am mi bya yo/ 
201b3(rgyud): tog de dag med snang smra// de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' bshes su zhig zer// rgol ba la yang bya 'am mI bya yongs su tig bla med kyang sku// de 'dra'i rgol bsku ma yin pas de la
201b4(rgyud): dpa' zhes su zhig zer// klu 'di blangs pa tsam gyi ba ni// rta mchog mnyam par sbyor ba yi// mkha' 'gro sgyum bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// thams cad 'byung
201b5(rgyud): 'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// mdzub mos mthe bo munan nas ni// rang gi mthe bo lo la mo mnar// dpal grub sbyin gyi phyag rgya ste/ mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur bya// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar
201b6(rgyud): rdorje spun ni gnyis dag tu// khong stong du ni sbyor bar bya// dpal grub rdo rje'i spyan yin no// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams
201b7(rgyud): du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// deb klub spyan ni grub pa ste// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// lus kyi dngos klub rab m+bA rA swA// ma lus dngos bu ba myur du 'grug/ 
201b8(rgyud): rje tshul mo ma nam gyur to// mdzub mi gnyis kyi lo / mthe ba'i rtse yo mnyam par gan// khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa'o//  ma mchoms su rab bgazhan so// 'di ma/ 
202a1(rgyud): / bsrung ba byas na ni// sangs rgyas dngos grub pa lus pa// lus pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i gtsug kyi bkra rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub po
202a2(rgyud): gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bo gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma// 'grub pa bdud la sogs pa za// de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'du
202a3(rgyud): bzhin rnam par shes pa sgrag// gtir rnams 'byin par byed pa dang // de bzhin nor kun 'phrog par byed// ril paso po na dpal man te// dpral mod ga kyang phrogs nas ni// mngag ga ru/ 
202a4(rgyud): rani byed pa dang // nod sbyin ma dang dag pa spyod// gnod sbyin /  sde dpon du// 'dis ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thul mo mnyam sbyar nas/ 
202a5(rgyud): gung mo mnyab par rab tu bsgrub// mthe bo mthe'u chung 'dab ma pa ni// pad+ma dri med rab tu rgyas// 'dis ni sdig rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa byang na rab tu 'grub// sangs rgya
202a6(rgyud): mngon sangs rgyas// rdo rje sams dpa' nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan pa d+ma'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thul mo mnas sbya la// 'dzub mo mnyam par byer ba sdug ste// mthe bo rdo rjegayogs pa ni// 
202a7(rgyud): dpal gyi nor bur ste// phyig/ rgya 'di yis btab na re// nam mkha' thams cad rab 'grub ste// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod// de rje thal mo
202a8(rgyud): pas nas// mtho'i rlung srin lag markam par babyung // mdzub mo rtse mnyam bkrugs de// dpal mchog nos ni grags pa ste// phyag rgya'i ses patapa na de// ngas kyis bye chu
202b1(rgyud): rab 'brel na// thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal// lha yi skal bzung slob ci dgos// dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar rab byas te// 
202b2(rgyud): thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi skar ni rang la nyid bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpa lo// dri bAnan dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// rdo 'di nyid
202b3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos grub ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha'
202b4(rgyud): 'gro snyam ba de mchog 'dis// mi thub 'byor pa mi 'gyur ba'i// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// dam che ga chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'o// dzek+sha'i gzugs/ 
202b5(rgyud): dadang dbyibs su ldan// bde gnyis kyis ni kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag la zhugs par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kun dang
202b6(rgyud): 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// chags pa med cing ma chags med/ 
202b7(rgyud): dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// bud med kun gyi sa sbyor 'di// gnyis su med pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan snyam kun
202b8(rgyud): bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grug/ sgyu ma thams cad kyi lha mo'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min// dbu mar yang na dmigs su med// shes rab pha rol phyin por
203a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub paro// thams cad nam ga pa'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad
203a2(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bur ste// de ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong ba dang ni rig par 'gyur// dmyigs su yod pa'ang ma phyin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa
203a3(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong rjong // bud med mi sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' mas dngos rnams thams ca myod// dngos po med pa bdakri sbyong bas// nam ma sbyar kun dang mnya
203a4(rgyud): sbyor ba/ mtha'i 'gro snum bde ba'i mchog/ shin tu rtag par 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// chags pa'i nyes pas migos pa// rnal 'byor ldan pa'ang de bzhin
203a5(rgyud): gnas kyi nyes pas yod mi gos// shin tu gdug cing drug po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// rnam par rgya phyir rab tu drag/ thams cad dag
203a6(rgyud): mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// drag shul skyong bas mnyam sbyor ba// 'jig rten thams cad gzhol bar bya// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sbyor ba ji snyed pod kun dang // 
203a7(rgyud): byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya// dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // 
203a8(rgyud): chen po dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// kun tu sna tshogs sprul pa bzang po dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag myo'o// bya ba dang de bzlog pa dang // khyad par du na
203b1(rgyud): phrog pa dang // phan lug kun tu byed pa yis// de na nor rnams kun kyang phyogs// 'o byed 'khyud la sogs pa yis// khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'das so// thar par byed cing gsod
203b2(rgyud): bye// shi yang mod la sogs par byed// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// gnas gsum po ni ma lus par/ rgyas btab mongs byas bablang na sa nga// ga byas nas ni za bar byad/ 
203b3(rgyud): dbadun gyi ba myong bas// khams gsum pa ni ma lus po// rgyas btab rkyongs byas thos pa dang / la lan gyur pa'ang ba byed// sbyor pa thams kyi shes pa'o// lA ma du/ 
203b4(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing // bde ba myong ba rab sbyor ba// mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgya
203b5(rgyud): btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sku ma che// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur ba// rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog/ mdze
203b6(rgyud): par lta bas gar byas pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje na mkhams gsum pa// rgyas btab mongs byas pa slang nas ni// zos nas slar yang 'tsho bar byed// sangs rgyas byang chub
203b7(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum// shin tu srid pa yang dag sgrub// gsang bar lta la gnas na ni// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshen rje tshangs bcas pa
203b8(rgyud): srid pa shin tu kun bsgrubs nas// rigs gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// stag pa sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// badzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur ning // rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i
204a1(rgyud): mchog/ steg pa'i lta bas gar byed cing // mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis// drag po dbang po nyi dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'dzin/ 
204a2(rgyud): rten gsum dag sgrub par byed// mche bcung bad gtsigs pa'i ga/ khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin// khrol 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzus// gsal bar blta zhing legs pa
204a3(rgyud): gnas// drag pa dbang po nyi dra bang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshungs bcas pa// rgyal po sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// 'dod chags myos pas
204a4(rgyud): g.yen skyo ba// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par bskur// 'di ni bzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// drag po mche ba rnon po bcigs// gdug/ 
204a5(rgyud): za ba 'jigs byed 'jigs// g.yas pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ rab tu dga' bar lta
204a6(rgyud): 'dzum// g.yon pa'i rang ba nin phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang thar bar byed// spyi bor ta mgrin gsang mtho po// d+ha gdong lding se la dor gas sa// so gtsigs pas ni rgu ma rA d+han/ 
204a7(rgyud): jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed// bzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchi sos mnan te// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ 
204a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// 'dod chags bde bas g.yem skyo sa// steg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i// 'dzul pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dka'
204b1(rgyud): par byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes pa'i mamu chu ga yo bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'dide// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sha chen gyi ni myo zhi ba/ 
204b2(rgyud): bcu ma yis mnan pa las// 'dzum pa'i phyin te mchog 'din// khams gsum dag kyang ba bar byed// bde bdun rtse ro byed zhing // ma mthurnam par mdzes byas pa// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mcho/ 
204b3(rgyud): 'di ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shes pa'o// bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// zam zim lta ba rnams bskur bas// rgyas bta tshangs byas thos pa yis
204b4(rgyud): khams gsum dag cang 'tsho bar byed// bud med pakhas pa sna ma'i mchog/ mdzes par blta ba'i grwar byas po sa// rgyas btab rmongs byas bsgreng nas ni// khams gsul dag kyang sgrub par/ 
204b5(rgyud): byed/ sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba// lta bu rang zhi bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag ts+tsha ma chog 'di ni// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// spri mtshams klog nyer 'gyur bcas pas// 
204b6(rgyud): rjes bu b+h+yo zhes pa'i phyag rgyal gnas na// las de mchod pa ma zhus pa// sum 'amed pa thams cad ju// rang byung nabs kyimatshad pa sun// chas dbyingos pan pa dang sa
205a1(rgyud): mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings skye mthas klas pa// lan gcig brjod pas 'grub pa'i phyir// drab pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis// gang dag byas par mgyur cing // 
205a2(rgyud): bdag tu mthur pa'o// dam pa rgya chen de dag med// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tirdza sat+pa lo tsi ni sar+b+bar+tha sA d+hA ni swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa/ 
205a3(rgyud): lhur du bkug nas ni// bran bzhin du byed du 'jug/ sub+ta gA sti ma hAn do bi hi ri/ mi r-i ra di/ nair-i shwA ye swAhA/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba kun sbyin pa'o//

205a5(rgyud): gas// chos kyi phyag kya dam pa 'di// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// shri badz+ra byAng+ga thAH b+h+ra mu kha yo ga sha ri shi shi hrI hi haM// chos kyi phyag rgyad ma pa'adi// 'jig rten thams cadar
205a6(rgyud): 'jig/ chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// skad kyi gsang ni ya tha~Md min drang // gre sgur bcos shing bzlas pa dang // dus ra zhi ba mchog rnams kyis// hUM la sogs pa'i gru blang zhing / 
205a7(rgyud): mas kun gyi ci 'dod par// ji ltar spro bar klu kun gyis// hUM k+ki klu yi phyag rgya dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pa'o// lha mo kun gyi lha mo mchog// cha lugs bzhin du gar bya zhing / 
205a8(rgyud): la ga Da b+ha la sogs// klu rnams thams cad rjes su blang // oM kye klu yi phyag kya// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tso dgar blang // ma lus gus pa med pa yi// sems can thams cad thar
205b1(rgyud): byed// rdo rje drag po gang mo che// mkhur ba'i dbugs kyis rlung 'byin cing // 'jug gi sgra ltar zab pa yi// ru lu ru lu'i sgra byung na// phyag rgya 'dri yi sa rnal 'byor pa// khams gsum dag kyang
205b2(rgyud): 'dibs sring // zlang bar byed cing gsad par byed// gi ba yo la 'tsho bar bye/ dwe dz+haiM d+hag tu ba nad pa zhes bya ba'i bya kyi'o// Ta zhes bya ba'i'aM shu pIH// thams cad dag par bsgrub pa'o// 
205b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i glu li t+ya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed// ka ka la khye dang tsera'i dbyangs// de bzhin rab tu gdang snyan dang // ka ha sha yi klu li rgya// 'joms pa thams cad grub pa'o// 
205b4(rgyud): shu li phyag rgya shes pa'o// gleng bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // de bzhin rgyud ma ngas rgyud stug dang // sil skur phyag rgya ba shad pa rnams// las rnams thams cad ras sgrub pa'o// rgya grags bzhin dug
205b5(rgyud): da pas// ma brdungs par yang rab tu 'grub// las rnams kun la mchog tu re// bdungs na dpal ni bzhi 'gyur 'grub// snying po phyag rgya sngags rlig dang // byA ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam pa
205b6(rgyud): ser la sogs pa'i thabs// dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// dzaHhUM b+h+rU~Mho// ru Ta T+Ta ma Ta Ta/ sma rA Ta/ sh+'u lu hu lu/ prA sid d+he/ Ta mi b+h+yo \u0f7fka ni d+ha ni hUM druM/ TiHhUM dzaH/ hu luT
205b7(rgyud): lu/ a la lal to// shung tu skyed d+ha/ da ShA pas rgan nu rti ti/ TaTag+haMg+hakaM/ TI k+ke Take zh-i ki ke/ rat+ta ke/ 3)/ tan \u0f7f/ Takid+hu dzaH/ ke te ke d+hon/ Tiki b+huMdz+ran/ a la sprul to/ 
206a1(rgyud): so rlon no/ Sh+Tu dzaHdzAmA ga pa d+hu b+h+yoH/  / gzo stong rgong to/  ko
206a2(rgyud): de rbe rbaka rdo rje rje phyag rgya'o// bang+tha padz+rar+tha/ pad+mA ng+tha sh+tha / bad+ma badrwa nga/ dpal blo d+d+ho dbas pa ring po// ngas twAH/ t+parmA nA / pa/ 
206a3(rgyud): na/ na ni// rgyam pa 'i//  Sh+T+r-i shrIdz+haiM pheM// skyes pa'i 'gro /  / rgyur ni ri kyi m+b+hi ba/

206a6(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'du 'gyur na// zhan ste smos kyang che nig sgos/ gson pa'i sre gol bdabs pa dang // rgyal mo dam bus padabs pas 'azug// g.yas pa'i rtsa
206a7(rgyud): po yin par gsungs// gnyig kun du sdud pa yin// thal mo'i spyod pa rab sbyor bas// las kyi tshul banin 'brang ba dang // thal po dal bus bsdu ba dang // klu dang sil snyan gar byed pas// 
206a8(rgyud): zhe dang dpa' dang ske rje dang // na da dang srod dang 'jigs pa dang // mi sku ba mtsha na pa'i// rnams kyis phyag rgya da don mug// sten la sogs pararnams da na chog
206b1(rgyud): kar byas pas/ thams cad bdag nyid rgyu bye gas// dbu' pa thams can rab tu 'grug// rdo rje sems dpa' thes pa sa// dpa' sa dba' bo na gshegs// rdo rje dzin pa snyid rjes/ 
206b2(rgyud): cid na pa'i phyir// dngos pa kun kye rang bzhin gyis// nye bar gnas shing byin kyis rlongs// lte ba sa mi ngoms pa yi gzugs// thams cad bdag srid ston par mdzad// legs so zhes bya bu/ 
206b3(rgyud): bas/ na sa bad+ma/ steg/ rnams cad bdag nyid thub pa'i mchog/ de batham snaca ljongs rdzogapa pa// sangs rgyas kun tu 'gyur ba'i ma/ nal 'byor dam pa ster byung 'gro / 
206b4(rgyud): 'di dag zhes// dang she mchod pa sa gyu// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal ci nale// skyo rib thams cad nas 'phru sa/ phyag rgya phyag rgya'i sen nams dang / 
206b5(rgyud): snronas slol pas// yid la bsams pa kun rdzogs phyir// mtshad ba des pa skyer par bya// kun du tshogs sAl babang po// sun gyi slob da bdag nyid bsku// kun 'byung las gas sbyor
206b6(rgyud): // ni la pabadag dang gang byas te// sangs kyis thams 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas srir ni myol 'i snang // rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bsgres// rgol ba 'ang de nis tshul bzhin du// pad+ma gar 'bu/ 
206b7(rgyud): mchog tu bskur/ de nas slar du gas pa yang / rdo rje nyim mo chog tu bskung // de nas phyir yang rgol ba'i// tamachog 'byung bar 'askur bar bya// de nas slar non la bayang / bdag nyid la
207a1(rgyud): pas rab tu 'grug/ de nas phyag tu shes pa 'di// sdom pa thams cad bskon pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal kyi gru// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// lang 'dri med zlas
207a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor stong las mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang // la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyim bye ba phrag dgu'i 'od zer mchog pas 'jigs// la lar mdangs pabang gzi brjid
207a3(rgyud): de shib ma pa rgyal gyi ga zus su sung // lce lang 'grib mams par mnyam par 'angog pa'i na sa shi mchog rdzun par stod// rdo rje sems dpa' thub phyi 'dulal
207a4(rgyud): pa ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams las// a ra li rnams mnyam sbyor grub mdzod du Ta ma Te a la la te// rnam pa mang
207a5(rgyud): gdadam mi shen gyi bde rgyus sangs rgyas dang badzod la la pos+ho// su yang 'di chog gang brjed pa'i sa par po'i bde ba'ang thob par mngos/ 'didag sung ni grangs bya yis/ 
207a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i'o// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon ma pa// de ltar rab tu ga byas te// de las dang nig pa mgyung pa// tshogs pa
207a7(rgyud): yis tshogs kyis zas// sngon dang bcas par dbul ba bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// bsod rnams mas rgyud 'phel bar 'gyur// ni 'di
207a8(rgyud): pa zungs par 'gyur// ribs dang dug dang dbye dug dang // mkha' 'gros ga ga pa me dpa/ 'du dang sems cand myam pa sa // 'di pa sa zhes pa su / 
207b1(rgyud): grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs// dga' dang de bzhin bdag po dang // sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad dang // phyag rgya'i mchog rnams 'grub par 'gyur// gar gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// 5
207b2(rgyud): dga' ba rjes su rab tu chags dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu pha ma'i rgyas btab pas// rab tu dga' bar sor ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod// rab tu bde ma
207b3(rgyud): rdza pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang // rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug tshe mchog grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs ho ta mchog to// rab tu sna tshogs
207b4(rgyud): ba'i mchog la rol cig ho// bde bas slong la rnam par rol hUM snang bar mdzod// a la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro snyam sna tshogs kyis// slob ma gzung du gsol// 
207b5(rgyud): de ba'i mchog grub par mdzod// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba stsol// dam par rab tu zhugs par mdzod// bdag la rab tu dgyes par gyur// a la la ho// e ma'o// shisha shi zhugs shig zhugs
207b6(rgyud): / mkha' 'gro bde mchog yongs bskor kun du zhugs// 'di dag glur ni blang ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam stor ba/ mkha' 'gro sbram bde ba'i mchog/ grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi ga
207b7(rgyud): sems dpa' sdud pa dang // rdo rje rin chen bla med pa// rdo rje chos ni gsungs pa dang // rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// hUM rdo rje las kyi mda' / nul phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam
207b8(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la phyog 'tshal lo// la la rarab tu drag cing skyo bar drag la drag pa'i bud med cu
208a1(rgyud): rab tu snang // 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir la par rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku// la lar rab tu des zhing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur
208a2(rgyud): yang ston par mdzad/ la ler rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa pad+ma rgyal po'i drim tshig bdag la grub par mdzod// thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter mchog bdag la grub
208a3(rgyud): pamadzad dug pol// kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la grub par mdzod// la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs sang li ngan// khwa lar dus mtha'i dus ltar drag/ 
208a4(rgyud): la lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du thi// la par rta mchog sbyor bas 'dod pa sgrub// rdo rje klu'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// me tog dkar dang dmar ba dang // mthing gser po kun bsdus pa/ 
208a5(rgyud): me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro// rgya skyegs mthing ga ljang khu'i mdog/ tshon sna bzhi yis bcos pa dang // dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/ snga ma bzhin dum
208a6(rgyud): par sgrub// khams las byung ba thams cad dung // srog dang rtse ba'i de bzhin te// rims par mdzes shing dri zhem pa// snga ma bzhin du mnyam par bskyag// tsan dan gnyis dang kla rtsi dang // 
208a7(rgyud): dag gi la ki/ bdug pa'i ngam dang sbyang ba// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gan darang dri dang kug la dang / sa rdza ga bur k+Sha tsaM dang // rdzas 'ad dag las bcos pa'i mang// ma
208a8(rgyud): na snang ba ste// can dgagu dgum sgeg dang // gzung dang ni kwa rtsi dang // bcas pa 'dug pa grub pa ste// skyes pa phyag rgya sras mtshig 'gyur// nal dang su/ smel dang // klu klung gabung gA ci
208b1(rgyud): 'di rnams shi ba du btags pa na// seng ldeng bu ram dag kyang sbyar// shing tshwa pa tra le dra dang // nA le sham dang ga pur s+phar// sa ha ka re shing mngar gyis// sdus pa kha yi spos yin na// dpal rdo rje sems
208b2(rgyud): dpa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba'o// me tog dmar po sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can lnga sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang la mi te dkar// ser po mkha' las byung bI lA// tsan dan bdug pasangs rgyas la// 
208b3(rgyud): can la du rus ka/ sman ras gzigs da'ang ka'i ta// ce pog rdo rje nyi ma la// mar me phreng ba sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la mar me bdun// sran ras gzigs la mar me brgya// stong ni rdo rje nyi
208b4(rgyud): la// sangs rgyas rnams la tsan dan spyos// rdo rje can la gur kum yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan dan dmar// gzur rdo rje nyi ma la// me tog kun dang bdug pa kun// de bzhin mar mi thams cad dag
208b5(rgyud): sa rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// rdo rje rtul dbul du rung // mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// sgeg mo dang ni na chung dang // myos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang // gcig tu dbang dang 'dod
208b6(rgyud): sa sra// g.yon can bran ma de bzhin te// lan ma la sogs ro kun dang // kha ra lA sogs bdud rtsi bzhin// bdag nyid kyi ni ro sgrub pa// ma lus lus pa srid par 'grub// sha dang chang du ldan
208b7(rgyud): pa yi// bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni// dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste// tshe yi dam pa rab tu 'grub// a 'bra smin dang dkun 'brum dang // pa na sa dang ni kA ra// a ru ka la sogs
208b8(rgyud): bu'i// phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'di rnams te// dngos grub 'bras bu thams cad 'thob// kha ra sbrang rtsi byug pa yis// a 'bral sogs tshig gus byu// sa ha ga ra'i mar la segs// mnyam pa
209a1(rgyud): drims m+b+ha ts+tshaH// lung dang chanags pas nus pa'o// na me 'thun pa ba 'gyur na// shun pa slob la sogs byas// mchod pa'i tshen dbul par bya// 
209a2(rgyud): bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams la bya shos dbul bar// sha dang chang ni rnam par spangs// glu dang si ba skad grub pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bden dang // 
209a3(rgyud): dang chang du bcas pan// gtor ma'i mchog ste sna tshogs pa'o// bdag gi phywag/ chen skal bzung po// rdo rje'i byas ni dpar grub pa'o// bshos dang gitor ma dkar po dang // pad+ma
209a4(rgyud): ldan pA no// spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo lnga// yul na dgos pa thams cad 'gug/ rgyal po'i kha bas sna tshogs pa// sha dang cang du ldan pa dang // klu dang sil snyan skal bzeng dag
209a5(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dbul// kha zas kun gyi ro rnams dang // sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang // sha li sbyor dang sha sbram drang // bshos dag rdo rje rtal dbul// mchod pa dang gtor
209a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi cho ga'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag ma rdo rje thal mor sbyar// sangs rgyas
209a7(rgyud): na chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba// rgyal sred thams cad ma lus pa// lus pa med par myur du 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // 'gram pa gnyis da
209a8(rgyud): ga par no// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen mchog/ deb rgya kun tu brgyan par bya// na rgyan bcing bas bci so dpo na//  nga shing mtha' bas stsol par // de kyi mtha' mang byung
209b1(rgyud): bltar// byas nas thal mo brdab par bya// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje ni mkhams gsum pa// de las dgra me khrig med par// bdag gi ljongs spyod nyid du spyod// 'di yis ba
209b2(rgyud): byas nas ni// rdo rje sebs dpa' dpal dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub che// 'khor lo sbyar ba rab tu 'grub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sde// nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam
209b3(rgyud): sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol// sor me rtse mo kun spad dag/ mthe bo rdo rjes mnan pa ni// snga dang mig phugs lta bu ste// pa
209b4(rgyud): don chen phyag rgya 'di// bdag nyid chen por dbang bskur ba// rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa// lus pa med par gyur du 'grug// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // 'gram pa gnyis dang lhag par sbyar// thod
209b5(rgyud): pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyun te// sangs rgyas gtsug gyi nor bu 'bar// dbu brgyan bcing pas bcings nas ni// 'gyong ba'i mthal nas dkrol bar bya// dar gyi mtha' ma sbyang ba ltar// byas nas thal mo
209b6(rgyud): brdab par bya// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// khams gsum dgra ni rgyal srid che// 'khor los bskur ba rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje he ru ka pad+ma nor bu
209b7(rgyud): po che'i dbu brgyan mnyam par sbyor ba bskal pa bzang po dpal kye phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du// ji ltar rig par mnyam
209b8(rgyud): nas// 'dzub ma mthe ze rtse mo po'i// yongs su bskur te bte gnas su// dpral bar legs par gnag na ni// khams gsum bdag po rgyal bar dag/ sa yus lus pa med par 'grug// das/ 
210a1(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pu shin tu brkyang ba yi// 'dzub mo gnyis pa'i mdud par bcing // gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bskur
210a2(rgyud): yongs su bskur te btig nas kyang // khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag na// rgyam srid thams cad legs grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis bsrung ba byas ni ni/ 
210a3(rgyud): las kyi dpal dang 'dra// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'gyur// ma mo dang ni byed ma dang // mkha' 'gro mu yang lhag par 'grub// dur khrod dngos grub
210a4(rgyud): cad dang // las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje he ru ki'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bo dpa' bo skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dkug/ bung ma gnyis ni mnyam par sbya
210a5(rgyud): lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'i 'od// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o// 'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis bsrung
210a6(rgyud): byas na ni// rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyis tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus slar 'grub// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i phyag
210a7(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbya la// 'dzub mo mnyam te phyir rol dgug/ mthe bo gnyis ni rab tu brgyad // rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya// dpral bar myur du bzhag pa ni// bsam pa thams cad

210b1(rgyud): rin chen dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog/ rta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgyas rab tu dbang skur ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mo
210b2(rgyud): par bshad// sor mor thams cad bsdams pan// rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa byas na ni// 'dzub mo mthe bo'i nang dag tu// g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i mtshan
210b3(rgyud): 'di// rtse mo bcug la bsdam par bya// dka' chen dpal gyi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya thams cad rang byung ba// rab 'byams las rnams dngos grub ni// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// dgra
210b4(rgyud): 'i rdo rje bcings nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/ mthe byi mthe'u chung rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa
210b5(rgyud): cad ni// ci 'di nyid lnga 'grub par 'gyur// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de las gung mo lcags kyu ni// bdag gi snying kar sbyar bar bya// 'di ni thams cad 'gugs pa'i
210b6(rgyud): de ma thag tu phyag rgya 'dis// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// bkug ste dbang du byas nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// dpal bde ba chen po
210b7(rgyud): lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdamasde pa byas nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/ mthe'u chung mthe bo rtse mo n+dan// rdo rje'i phyag rgyar yongs bsgyur na// sangs rgyas
210b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpar yod// sbyor ba'i dmis me dka' na// dngas grub gzhan dang las kyi mchog/ rab 'byams gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pa
211a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las// sgor ldan thal mo song stang sbyad// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// de ma thag tu 'bebs par byed// dpal rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o//

211a3(rgyud): ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la gnas te// mthe bo'i rtse mo de bzhin mnyam// mdzub bo ga

211a6(rgyud): ga t+ya 'di yis btab na ni// tshangs pa nye dbang dga' byed bcas// mthu yis myur du rgyal byed nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// dpal rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag

211a8(rgyud): byas nas// mkha' yi thang kar mdud pa bya// de yi 'og tu ri mi rnams// yi ge thams cad dgod par bya// gug spyad dag gis lcug mar bya// yi ge ra ni myur gud bya// klad skor zla ba kam
211b1(rgyud): ba dang // tshig gnyis zla ba gnyis su bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya'i 'gyur dam pa ste// sangs rgyas dpal gyi ri mor bshad// yi ge dag kyang mi 'gyur mchod/ 
211b2(rgyud): dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor zhes// 8
211b3(rgyud): pa'i mtshan bris ni// sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// chags chen grol dpal zhes bya ba'i// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris ni ni// sdig pa kun las
211b4(rgyud): thar bar 'gyur// grol ba kun pa rab tu gnas// snying rje dre med khrod pal zhes// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun pas thar bar 'gyur// dngos grub kun gyi mchog

212a1(rgyud): ming ni dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs par de lung bstan// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// rdo rje'i ming du rab tu gnas// de nasas

212a3(rgyud): par shes par bya// smin ma bskul ba gang yin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda// g.yas pas nam mkhar 'phro ba 'grub// g.yon pa rnam par rgyal po yi// rang byung rnams
212a4(rgyud): brda li rgya// mig gnyis g.yo bar 'grub pa ste// g.yon pa bud med bzang mo yin// g.yas pa skyes pa bzang po'o// rna ba dag la rig pa'i brda// galas g.yon gnyis ka de bzhin te// g.yon
212a5(rgyud): pa legs par blangs pa'i klu// g.yas pa legs par smras pa'o// sna yi bu ga gnyis kyi brda// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bdag la 'dug pa slong // g.yon pa bdag
212a6(rgyud): dri slong ba'o// lce ni ldag pa ltar byed pa// brda yi phyag rgya gnas pa ste// gabyas pa sha yi phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa chang gi phyag rgya len// mche ba g.yas dang g.yon pa yA// bar du ma ma
212a7(rgyud): pa ni// g.yon pa bud med reg na bde// ka yAs pa de bzhin skyes po'o// lkog mar reg pa'ang de bzhin te// brda lis phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// rtog pa thams cad
212a8(rgyud): smra ba'i mchog/ snying kar gyen du 'dren pa ni// rang zung phyag rgya'i brda grub pa// rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa ste// 'khor ba shin tu sdud pa'o// lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni// ba rda lis phyag
212b1(rgyud): rgyar gnas pa ste// dbu ma'i nan tan bsgrubs pa ldis// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil// rang gi dbang po bsgreng ba ni// rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya// de las de bzhin bde ba yis//

212b3(rgyud): nyis ka lis// bdag la shes rab 'khyud pa yi// g.yas pa thams cad 'grub pa yin// g.yon pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub// khu tshur g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis// khu tshur bcang
212b4(rgyud): grol ba dag/ g.yas pa rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa mi rnams thong shig pa'o// brla gnyis rab tu bsdams pa ni// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dod la rab tu ba

212b7(rgyud): g.yon pa thams cad gnod par byed// g.yas pa thams cad rab tu 'joms// dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// rang don lngas rnams rab grub pa/ 
212b8(rgyud): lus pa med par 'grug// bang po phyag rgya shes pa'o// oM a ti b+hu zhes bya ba'i ba // 'di ni phyag 'tshal bzhis pa'o// pra ti mo d+hi b+hu nes pa// phyag len yin par shes par bya'o// 
213a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas phyag rgya bde ba yis// e ma'o bde ba yin par bshad// e mra'o bde ba
213a2(rgyud): kyi bcan/ rdo sems dpa' gang ba dreg/ sdig bu rgan las tha ba 'thas/ bde ba thams du sa tu 'jug/ di mchog sema'ob ba dpa/  ba bzhi gi shi ka/ 
213a3(rgyud): 'debs ma dang rmongs byed dang // zab mo dang tshe 'phel ma// sangs rgyas byang chub chos 'khor lo// de ba'i na khams gsupa rnam par rgyal// 'dod pa'i lcug ma thabs cad kya
213a4(rgyud): phyag rgya brda yi phyag rgya'o// rta dang rdo rje'i zhal dag dang // de bzhin rdo rje snang ba dang // bral bar rlog pa'i ro langs ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi badz+ra yin no// glang bu dang ni rgyud rnams
213a5(rgyud): dang // de bzhin du ni rgyud gcig dang // sgeg po dang ni rdza rnga drag/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o// me tog mchod dang bdug pa'i mchod// de bzhin mar me'i mchod pa dang // spros
213a6(rgyud): kyi mchod bkra r+Ne dag/ longs spyod phyag rgya'i brda yin no// de le sogs pa mtha' las mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// lha ma hU~M
213a7(rgyud): bar ldan do// smen ma bskyod pa mda' bzhi yin// b+ha ga ling ga se ma'o bde// thod pa pad+ma yi na bAr bshad// ba T+wA~Mg yang rgyal mtshan no// sangs rgyas phrag brgya bdamar ga nas/ 
213a8(rgyud): kun gyi 'dud rtsi yin// sangs rgyas par ye phyag rgyalas// gi shi sangs rgyas kun du bshad// dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad// de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad// sgyu rnams
213b1(rgyud): cad tshogs pas na// skye bo dpa pa kun tshogs pa// tshogs kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni// mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis// de bzhin mdza' bar 'dus par
213b2(rgyud): gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' dngal sbyor byas// dkyil 'khor thams cad yin bA ba shed// sku mo thams cad kun 'das pas// thams cad sna tshogs skal pa bzang // rdo rje sems dpa
213b3(rgyud): dpal sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kun du bdag sbyor bas// rnam pa kun mkhyen shes pa'i phyir// kun gyi slob dpon yin par ba shad// kun gyi slob dpon ba gnas pa// lha mo thams cad 'dus pas/

213b8(rgyud): che// yin par dor kun grub pas gsungs// yon gyi dam pa grub pa ni// nor gyi dbyig tu bshad pa ste// snying yang nor gyi mchog yin par// sangs rgyas pa rda yi phyag rgyar bshad/ 
214a1(rgyud): tsan dan dmar po dang // sbyor ba khrag chen yin blar ba shad// tshogs kyi dbus su banag pa dpal// thams cad ldang ba'i ras yin// bag can las ni byas pa'i phyugs// 
214a2(rgyud): tsan dan dmar pos bsdus pa dang // bag phye'i zan las byas pa'i sha/ rgyal po'i zan zhes gang bshad pa'o// de nas grub pa'i mna' bsgag pa// dam tshig ces par gnas pa'o//

214a7(rgyud): myos pa'o// gzugs ni rI mo yin por gsungs// sgra ni klu yin zhes bshad do// dri ni rab tu tshim par gsungs// ro na rA sa yan yin// reg pa bde ba yin par bshad// rab tu reg pa dang

214b1(rgyud): mchod pa'i dam tshig yin// rjes su sbyor bas mchod na ni// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas parda yi phyag rgya yis// bde ba chen po yin par bshad// lha mo kun dang mnyam
214b2(rgyud): sbyor ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'o// ye shes tsam lo snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas pa rda yi phyag rgya yis// ting 'dzin rab tu sbyor ba'ang ba

214b5(rgyud): bor bshad// thams cad sdang ba kun 'gro ba// dngos grub dam par rab tu bshad// dngos grub chen po ldang ba cher// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang

215a3(rgyud): ka/ 'bras bu chen po'i khyad par dag/ bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu smin par bshad// a pra smon bkrol bar bshad// de bzhin bde bar nyal ba dang // badre bas rab tu rmongs pa dka/

219a7(rgyud): sru ni rab tu 'grug/ rims nad dug dang dbyig drug nang // mkha' 'gros gtso dang gdon rnams dang // yan lag ma rung byed bkun// 'di yis bsrung sran yod mi tshugs// dpal rdo rje
219a8(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsrung ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// chos sems dpa' yi tshul ston cing // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dag dang // zhi ba'i lta bas bltas nas ni// rims
219b1(rgyud): rnams thams cad sel// rdo rje su tshur gnyis bcings nas// mthe'u chung lcags kyu lta bur ba cing // mdzub mo mnyam pa'i rtse mos mnan// nad rnams thams cad zlog par byed// yongs su bsgru
219b2(rgyud): bteg nas ni// dpral bar bde bar gzhag par bya// ma lus lus pa med pa yis// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// dpal rdo rje smin 'tshams lus kyi nad gso bo'o// rdo rje bsdam pa byas pa/ 
219b3(rgyud): las// 'dzum mo phan tshun mngon phyogs pa// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// zug rngu kun las grol bar 'gyur// bu nad lho/ nal snyun dag dang // dmu rdzings la sogs kun las than// 'di nyid grub pa
219b4(rgyud): gyur nas ni// nad rnams kun gyis gnod pa med// zug rngu thams cad med par byed pa'o// grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcings te// 'di yis mig gnyis phyis nas ni// phyag rgya thub pa mchog 'di yis// long ba/ 
219b5(rgyud): dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// bdag nyid sbyor bas ldan byas la// de rje khu tshur dam po les// drang ba'i tshul du klad pa nas// kha phyogs drang zhing btung bar bya// rims dang dug dang gdon rnams kun/ 
219b6(rgyud): rje khu tshur dpal gyis bzung // bdag gi ltar ni sngor ldan pas// 'thungs na thams cad med par 'gyur// blud pa'i sman no// ta thA ga ta sarba s+thA si ho// 'di na rna bar bzlas pa'i mchog/ zug rngu med
219b7(rgyud): pU du thar// zug rngu thams cad sbyin pa po'o// g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis// sems pa'i gtsug tor bcings na no// byis pa nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur// thams cad bsrungs shing bde ba thob// 
219b8(rgyud): dugaso la lo// g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yi// glu yi gdengs ka wA bur bya// 'bar ba'i tshu ba ston 'bebs bcas na// dug gi las rnams bslab par bya// 'bar dang 'du ba dang bcings pa dang / 
220a1(rgyud): dug rnams med par byed// gdug pas zin dang mu ta dang // shi ba sos par byed pa'i mchog/ gdengs ka'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i mthe bo gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i
220a2(rgyud): bcings pa yi// gung mo la ni reg byas na// gdon rnams kun las thar bar 'gyur// dug gso ba dang gdon gyi cho ga'o// ba dan gsum po gnyis bcings nas// gung mo gnyis ni mdud par
220a3(rgyud): mdzub mo mthe'u chung rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings la// yongs su pasgyur te bteganas su// smin ming mtsham su bzhag pa ni// mkha' 'gro'i las rnams ma lus pa// lus
220a4(rgyud): pa thams cad 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// gnas gsum po ni ma lus pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje he ru ka
220a5(rgyud): gnyer zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste ma ma shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// rta rnams tham ca non na ni// rta rnams nad med mos pa dang // nyam skye mthar zhing mgyogs par 'gyur
220a6(rgyud): dpral rta mchog gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// glang po kun la zhon na ni// glang po thams cad nad med smos// nyam skye spro ldan mos par 'gyur// shrI badz+re satwa sti saM
220a7(rgyud): 'di ni rna bar bzlas pa'i mchog/ bya rnams nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur// mi yi skad du smra bar 'gyur// byug sngo ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal skyong bas// 'byor pa kun la
220a8(rgyud): chags na// shed rnapas nad med po skabs shing // rtag tu me to// 'bras bur ldan// shing rnams bskyed pa'i gnog lag las// sbyor ba'i cho ga gang bshad pa// phyag rgya 'di yis pa
220b1(rgyud): cad ni// yid pa bsams pa bzhin du 'phrul/ shing bskyed pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// 'phrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs dang // de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa dang // 'phangs nas sru
220b2(rgyud): bzung ba dang // stobs su 'gyed pa lnga yin te// rang byung rnams kyi dgra cha'i dpyad// phyag rgya lnga lnga rab tu gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi sa ba sha / dras pa de dag bshad par bya/ 
220b3(rgyud): dang bde brag sbyor ba dang // kun tu sbyor dang 'dren mar gyur// 'gengs dang 'phen dang gsol ba'o// rkang pa gshengs pas sAsnga mnan cing // rkang pa 'gyed pas sag don to// dkyil 'khor dag
220b4(rgyud): par bya// brkyang bskum gyis kyang gnas gsum gnod// dbyibs kyi phyag rgya'o// mi lhod pa dang sran gzugs dang // banyen zhing yan lag bstan pa dang // rgya cher 'grengs shing rnam par dag/ lus
220b5(rgyud): phyu / de'i gdon pa dang // dkyil dang dug dang khye du dang / ma pa gros co dang don nams rtsegu/ nama'i kyang tshugs par so mi 'gyur/ rgya cher shengs
220b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du// pade zag can gyis ga'u bzung nas// g.yas pa rab tu gar byed cing // mda' 'phangs na ni 'grub par 'gyur// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o// 
220b7(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa legs bsrang la// skyon med pa yig grams bya dgug/ kAru chud dang bus drangs nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad dkrug par bya// thams cad dgug pa'i byug+sa rgya'o// na drangs par
220b8(rgyud): du zlum por de// ji ltar rigs par logs bzheng ba// le ge oM tsam rang gi kha // bzung na 'gro ba'i dzin par 'gyur// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o// ji ltar rig pas drangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du
221a1(rgyud): bzung nas kyang // der ni cung zad dbye bar bya// 'gengs pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o// chang pas 'ban ni 'grib par bya// 'dzum
221a2(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i migagis pa lta// lta ba chang pa la gtan nas// myur du 'phangs na dam pa 'jug/ mda' gzhus rgyal bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gru bzhi pa la rdo ba dang // de bzhin kun nas bskor
221a3(rgyud): bar bya// g.yas phyogs nas ni mnga' bskor nas// snang de de bzhin bstod pa dang // rkang pas mnan cing rmim/ rabs gnon// 'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis// khams gsum rgyal srid che
221a4(rgyud): po dag/ bde bar thub nas nye bar spyod// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o// rab tu 'phangs dang mnyam par 'phangs// de bzhin glog ltar 'phangs pa dang // glog ltar 'khrug pa de bzhin
221a5(rgyud): te/ phyag rgya skyabs rnams sgrubs pa po// thabs thams cad kyi byu rgya'o// nyam nga lag dang 'de phyogs dang // bad ka de bzhin ldan du 'debs// 'dri dka bzlog pa'i phyag rgya ste// gnas gsum
221a6(rgyud): dag ni bzlog par bya/ des bye to/ sa thams cad kyi byag rgyal// thams cad 'debs dang nges par 'debs// kun 'debs kyi rlu du 'debs pa shar// 'di dag 'phrogs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 
221a7(rgyud): nas gsum dag kyang 'phrog par byed// 'phrog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// kun tu kun nas thams cad rdzi// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam pa kun// mdang gzhu'i dpyad kyi phyag kyi
221a8(rgyud): be'agyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// dgram thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// srin log gnyis kyi nang du ni// mthe bo legs par bzhag par bya// de nas khu tshur bcings nas ni/ 
221b1(rgyud): mo legs par dkrug par bya// rdo rje khu tshur dang lnga gyi rgya// rdo rje sems dpa' dang lnga la gnas// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams na mas// ma lus par ni sbyar du 'grub// dpal rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag
221b2(rgyud): 'o// rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la// bdag gis mthe bo'i nang du gzhug/ zhi ba'i las rnams rab thub pas// ma mus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
221b3(rgyud): / rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la// mthe'u chung gnyis ni rab brkyang nas// mkha' 'gro'i las rnams thams ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal rdo rje he ru ka li ru tshur
221b4(rgyud): t+ya'o// brdeg pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las// mthe bo dag la gung mo bzhag/ dpal pad khu tshur grub pa ste// thams cad dag pa'i mas la sbyar// dpal pad+ma'i khu tshur ro// khu tshur rdo
221b5(rgyud): chen mchog/ 'bebs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// rang don las rnams grub pa ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur dpal
221b6(rgyud): cangs la// sor mo thams cad yongs su bzung // rtul phod las rnams thams cad ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// las rnams thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rkang pa brkyang dang
221b7(rgyud): non pa dang // bskum nas bteg pa'i stobs dag dang // g.yas dang g.yod kyi sbyor ba yis// gzugs rnams thams cad gnon par bya// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rnam par
221b8(rgyud): yadzad dpal mnan nas// kun du byang chub yongs pa ku ste/ bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo bon du// darje 'dzin pa dpal mnan nas// kun tu grub pa yongs pa kus ste/ 
222a1(rgyud): bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// spyan ras gzigs dbang dpal ldan na nas// kun du dpal mo yongs bkug ste// bdag gi spyad par
222a2(rgyud): ro// sdig med stobs kyis ngo'i thon du// rdo rje ma dpal ldanan nag/ kun du longs spyod yongs bkug ste// bdag gi skyed par de spyod de// sdig med stobs kyis de 'thon du/ mchos
222a3(rgyud): pa dpal mnan nas// thams cad dbang phyug yongs bkug ste// bdag gi spyod par de spyod do// byang chub pha rol phyin pa dang // thub dang gzungs dngas rnams dang // rig dang phyag rgya rnams
222a4(rgyud): mnan nas// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dbang phyug dam pa mnan nas ni// mig gsum pa lngas gsum grub bkug/ bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig
222a5(rgyud): med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// mthu bo che yang mnan nas ni// snying las dpa' mo yongs bkug ste// bdag gi spyad par de spyod de// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'gron du// skye dgu'i bdag pa
222a6(rgyud): mnan nas ni// mo sA las grol ma spongs bkug nas// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis nga 'thon du// rab dka'i dbang phyug mnan nas ni// kun gyi bdag las dka'
222a7(rgyud): bar bkug/ bdag gi spyad pa de spyod de/ 'jigs la sogs pa'i lha ma da/ mam byed pa'i mamod nga/ mtha' 'gros rnams ca ni// bdag gi spyad pa spyod do// de bzhin ku be ra la sogs// reg pa
222a8(rgyud): 'grub pa spyod pa dang // mi yi rgyal po la sogs kyang // gnad nas bdag gi spyad pa spyod// 'gro ba dang ni mi 'gro'o// dngos po thams cad ma lus pa 'ang // rnal 'byor bdag nyid des ka
222b1(rgyud): nas// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// dpa' rdo rje gnon pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// ru mur snying gar bcangs pa na// bud med phyag rgyar de bshad de// bud med sbyor ba ma lus pa// lus pa med pa'ang thams
222b2(rgyud): rgyud 'grug/ bla yon pa'i myong ba'i tshul byas nas// lag g.yas bdag gi snying gar ni// gyen du drang ba'i tshul byas nas// bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur// dpal rdo rje 'bying ba'o// dpang
222b3(rgyud): tshogs pad+ma 'dzin// g.yon pa rdeg pa'i khu tshur dang // g.yas par ldang bar gyur ba dang // sangs rgyas dbang phyug ting 'dzin bya// sangs rgyas thams can du 'bar ba'o// g.yon pa dril phu sgra
222b4(rgyud): shing // g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis// rdo rje rkyen du gsor zhing bskor//  ba thams cad 'byung bar bya// dpal rdo rje sgyu ma'i dbang phyug ma'o// g.yon pa g.yon pa'i brlal bzhag/ lag po g.yas
222b5(rgyud): pa'adzum mo yi// rtse mos padra dam pa'i dza ni// g.yas pa'i brlalal gi ngang bzhag/ mi dge ba thams cad ses pa'i phyag rgya'o// bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du// g.yon pa nor bu rin
222b6(rgyud): g.yas pa reb kur rdzogs pa 'o// bud med la sogs rin chen 'dzin// bsam pa thams cad khong pa su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bdag gi snying ga pa'i drin tshus du// pad+ma sna tshogs dam pa 'dzin/ 
222b7(rgyud): g.yas pa rdo rje'i byeng ba yis// dbang phyug dam pa thob par 'gyur// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsung so// sangs rgyas
222b8(rgyud): thams cad dang mirnas par sbyor ba lakha'i 'grom sna ma bde pa'i mchog las kun du rnam pa sna chags kyi dmacho ga'i phyan phyi'i rtog pa stid dgu pa'o// de dal kun tu sna tshogs 'a/ bya
223a1(rgyud): pa'ang grub pa ni// kun du sna tshogs sbyor ba yis// kun tu sna tshogs bshad par bya// smin ma mig drang so dang mchu// kha dang lus dang rkang lag gis// cha lugs bzhin du
223a2(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas thams cid byin gyis rlog// legs par byin gyis brlabs na de// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyab skyor bas/ 
223a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyapa pas na// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grug/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ 
223a4(rgyud): mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// po so dag nas grub pa ste// lta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku// thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad// legs so legs so zhes grub pa'i// dam pa dag kyang rab tu
223a5(rgyud): stsol// bsdam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// grub pa kun mchog nyams dga' ba// ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod du// thams cad kyi ni bdag nyid stsol// dang po kun las byung ba yi// 
223a6(rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs rnams kyis// thams cad bdag nyid mchod pa mdzod// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gyeng dang bcas// dpal ldan lag pa gas
223a7(rgyud): pa li// pad+mo lu tur dpral bar bzhag/ bdag gi yig ni khyen du bste// 'di de rdo rje sems dpa ga/ phyag rgyab pas ca bskur pa'o// rkyen du 'bar ba'i dngos grub dang // ras 'byams
223b1(rgyud): las rnams myung du 'jug/ phyug rgya 'di yis btab na ni// khams bsum pa dag ma lus pa// rgyas btab mongs byas bos pa dang // thal bar gyur ba'ang 'tsho ba byed// bcom ldan 'das rdorje
223b2(rgyud): lem sa pal de skad gsungs so// kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// dpal rdo rje bdu chen du 'bar ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyab rgya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs bsapa cad kyi phyog rgya dang phyen n+ya'i lan nas
223b3(rgyud): bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// rtag tu dpag med tshe dang ldan// nem mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// bde ba'i cho ga ni rab tu smra// mtha' yas pa dang mu med pa'i/ 
223b4(rgyud): kun dang 'di phyi ni// mthu dang yon tan bsngags pa'i mthal// brjod pa dag tu yongs mi nus// mthu dang rang bzhan dag gis grub// ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu 'phrul// spos rjes grub bde ba ster// 
223b5(rgyud): de gsung mchog mchog gi mchog/ sem sa can don phyir las nam ste skyong ba dang // rnam phyir dag par rgyal pa sbed me mang du// 'di la bsregs med bdud kyang yod su yin// rtog pag mi 'grub pa / 
223b6(rgyud): par yod mi rus// mi bstan pa dang bdud dung mi 'gyur// bstan par bye ba'i phyir yang ngami 'dom ga// glang zhig rang gi bde bangs grub na// dngos grub mchog gis nga yi bstan par byed// kun tu
223b7(rgyud): sa/ ma donan ga shegs chos// rdo rje sem sa dpa'adas la rtsis lag /  na par rjeng sa sun gyis par gru /  / 
223b8(rgyud): nam yang rjes tshogs dga' bo'i badren pa dag mchod pa dang // ta mchog rnal 'byor bde bas gsal bar rjes su mchod na ni// rab tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa skal bar dug
224a1(rgyud): mchog/ rab mchog bde ba'i rang bzhin dam tshig bde bas rjes grub 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnya// 
224a2(rgyud): par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro snyam bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rtogs pa// rtog pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chen po bde ba chen po rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ sarba kalpa sa mu
224a3(rgyud): sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA kA nI dzA la sam+ba ra ut+ta rAt+na n+na/ bod skad du/ rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa shes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro snyam bde ba'i mchog gi rgyu
224a4(rgyud): ma'i phye ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te// ma lus lus pa med par grug// rnam rtog med pa'i sems la ni// de kho na nyid nges
224a5(rgyud): gnas// sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'dod chags
224a6(rgyud): bde chen po// bde chen rdo rje chen po pas// rdo rje 'dzin dang lhan cig pa'i// bde gshegs mgon mchog rnams kyis bzhugs// thams cad mchog 'gyur 'dod chen gyis// dngos kru
224a7(rgyud): phyug rab grub phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rtog pa 'dus pas bka' stsal 'tshal// rnam par mi to/ chos bdag las// rtog pa'i don 'di gang la gsungs/ 
224a8(rgyud): slad du'ang rgyud phyis// dang po'i sa mcho// ji ltar lags// gdod la tham med nyid yang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin te// yi ge 'bru je ltar gsungs pa lags// sngags phyung ba yang
224b1(rgyud): 'dru ste// shin tu dga'adang babang nyin de// rdo rje snying po na tso bog so// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin pang // de na do rdo rje 'dzin// nga rje 'dzin nyid can pa yang // byang chub spyo
224b2(rgyud): ci ltar// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba yang // sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar lags// rdo rje btum po thar byed dang // phyag na rdo rje yang ji ltar// dang po rigs bskyed ji ltar lags// 'dod pa'i thar
224b3(rgyud): pa rnas pa ci// mgon po rnam gsum ji ltar 'tshal// thams cad yang nyid ji ltar lags// ji ltar dang po snying po 'byung // nye ba'i snying po de ji ltar// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// don yod dam tshig ji
224b4(rgyud): ljang lags// dkyil 'khor ji ltar gsungs par gyu dra// de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ste// thig gdab de bzhin rtog pa yis// dngos grub ji ltar bshad pa lags// gsang ba lnga dang de nyid che// gang lag+sa
224b5(rgyud): ci'adra de yin na te// dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnams dang ni// rigs rnams kyang ni ji ltar lags// thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang // de nyid tshogs kyi phyag mtshan yang // thams cad dgug dang mchod
224b6(rgyud): chen dang // rang gi byin brlabs sogs grub pa// de rnams de nyid gsang chen dang // dam pa dang ni don dam pa// dam pa'i yi ge grub don du// thams cad mi gsung 'os ma lags// sangs
224b7(rgyud): tham su cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'grom sbrum bde ba'i mchog las de kho na nyid thams cad des tshig gi rtog pa ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun
224b8(rgyud): chen pos// the tshom kun gyi tshogs gnas nas// don dma'adzin pas 'ang dka' stsal pa// de la ji ltar rtog pa'i don chud pa yidan zhes// rnam par me tog mos dag la sa// sems can don du
225a1(rgyud): / su rtog/ de phyir tonag par yang dag bshad// rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro// de la ji ltar chud phyi ma yin zhe na// rgyud ni rab tu 'brel bar bya shad// phyi mgong du phyung ba yin
225a2(rgyud): gsang ba gsang chen rnams// de yang rgyud ni phye bar 'dod// de la ji ltar dang po nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na// nam mkha' kun du rab gnas pa// rdo rje kun gyi dngos po mchog/ bde chen dgyes pa
225a3(rgyud): bod// dam pa'i yi ge gzhal pas khang // zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar gdod ma dang bla ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhe na/ yi ge ka sngogs
225a4(rgyud): yig mtha'// ngaha spangs nas 'jug par bya// yi ge d+ha sogs/ Sha yi mtha'// phreng ba gnyis pa yang dun b+hi// dbus gnas par ni a yig phreng // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkod de// theg le
225a5(rgyud): zla tshes dang ldan par// tsheg drag zla ba gnyis yin te// A yig mi 'gyur bsgom par bya// dbus su rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas// de dbus rtag tu bsgom pa ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'di
225a6(rgyud): de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ri mo grags pa yin// de las 'gro bag po mig yo// thams cad yang dag 'byung bas ni// nam mkha' las byung mtshan ma'i phyir// gdod ma tha ma med
225a7(rgyud): mchog yin// rdo rje chen po dngos sems ri// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes 'dod do// de la bcom ldan 'das de gang zhen/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po rig po lha// rgyul
225a8(rgyud): chen po rdo rje 'dzin// dam pa yi ge shin tu dka'// de la ji ltar sa gartog pa yin zhen/ li gai a sogs kyu mtha' ni// pi ger yang dag bshad pa ste// mi 'ang dag pa'i rdo rje can// de nyid kun
225b1(rgyud): don mtshan nyid phyir// de la ji ltar sngags byung ba yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems sogs 'khor krol// gang rnams sngags su cer bshad pa// de rnams byung ba'i don du de// rdo rje can gyis yang bka'
225b2(rgyud): srul// gur gum la sogs byugs pa la// bri s+phu la sogs rnam brgyan nas// bla la sogs bris nas su// rtag tu re'u mig bani bsdams dras// gru bzhi gas la yas / khang byas te// re'u mig phyogs
225b3(rgyud): bzhir 'bar bar byas// ri'u pig sum cu tham pa la// bcu dgu dang ni ldan par bya// brgya phyed stan la gnas pa la// sde pa lnga ma tha' thig le yis// spyi bo gtsug la rtag pa yi// ka dang sha zhes bya ba ni/ 
225b4(rgyud): bus kyi re'u mig la bri'o// de yi phyi rol gnas brgyad dag/ mtshams drang phyogs kyi re'u mig la// dbang ldan la sogs rim pa ru// lwa dang sha li sde bkod do// me mtshams la sogs re'u mig la// ma// 
225b5(rgyud): ye yig 'bru bzhi po dang // a yig sa bon la brten nas// sa bon bcu gnyis dgod par bya// dbang ldan la sogs re'u mig la// ka yig la sogs rim par dgod// de ltar bzhi la rim par ni// tha
225b6(rgyud): cad rnam par gnas byas te// ka sogs re'u rig bzung nasra su// yig 'bru dam pa phyung bar bya// shin tu dga' chen rgyal po ni// sbyor ba thams cad dbang phyug gtso// re'u mIka nyi shu rtsa bin lnga/ 
225b7(rgyud): gnas pa zla phyed gtsug phud zhal// de 'og sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// dga' ba rdo rje can gyis phyung // re'u mig bcu bzhi zhes pa las// gnas pa chog drag dang ldan pa// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bcur
225b8(rgyud): gnas// sa oM nu rtsa bzhi la dang ra// re ru mig sum cu rtsa gcig la// gnas pa de thig la ldan// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa chog drug sbyor ba bye// mubacu rtsa brgyad sbyor ba yis
226a1(rgyud): de ni bzhi par rnam par bshad// bde ba chen po rgyal chen po// lha mo dam pa brtag pa'o// re'u mig bcu gcig la gnas pa// thig leng ror yang dag ldan// re'u mig brgyad
226a2(rgyud): pa l+ya ga nas pa// bcu dgu dag ni ldan pa ste// de 'on sum cu rtsa bzhi dang // bka ler ro sa brgyad pa'o// re'i mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa// gnas pa tshe drag sbyor bya'o// re'u yig gnyis pa la
226a3(rgyud): bkod pa'i// thig le ngar ldan pa'o// gling bu ma la sogs btus pa la// sngags phyung ba ni mchog yin te// rje'u mi gsum cu rdza brgyad la// gnas pa'i theg long ro ldan// dbusun nyi shu rtsa gcin
226a4(rgyud): dbus nas bco lnga zla ba can// re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig gnas// dbus nas bco lnga zla ba can// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas// bcu gcig zla ba dang ldan te// lha mo gling bu ma sogs
226a5(rgyud): // thAgs byu zad du byung la'o// de'i byig bcu pa la gnas dang // bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin te// dre myig su cu rdza gsus gnas/ bcu drug pa yang de bzhin te// me tog la sogs bkrus
226a6(rgyud): pa// 'dini sngags phying mchog len no// tA grin 'brangs mtho lcags rgya sogros// dang po byung ba'i sa bon nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// sgrol nan tan gyis sbyor ro// zhes dpal
226a7(rgyud): sems dpas gsungs te// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor kyi chos kyi yi ga 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// re'u mig gnyis bcar khon// zla ches gtsug dang ldan pa'i nal// rnam
226a8(rgyud): sa kyim na to//  pa shi sas/  ldananas pa la/ yog yang porjon pa'o//  ga bdud bu pagadas pa// be sa sa phyin pa'o/ 
226b1(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lngar ldan// thig leng ros brgyan pa'o// dbus nas nyi shu pa nyid la// thig leng ros brgyad pa'o// chos gos mtshogs bzhi dag gis// sa bon 'byung ba mchog 'di yin// re'u miganyi
226b2(rgyud): bzhir gnas// thig leng ros brgyan pa'o// re'u mig bdun pa de bzhin yang // dbus nas bco lnga pa dang ldan// thig ldeng ro ldan pa ni// byang du sil snyan cha lang ngo // dbus nas nyi shu rtsa
226b3(rgyud): la// gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa// thig le nga ro ldan pa ni// rdo rje rin chen cher brjod do// dbus nas bco brgyad pa drag nyid// thig ldeng ras brgyan pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor
226b4(rgyud): chos kyi dung gi phyag rgya che// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// nyi shu rtsa bzhi re'u mig la// gnas
226b5(rgyud): shu pa ldan ni// khrag 'thung zhes pa'i rgyal po che// tsheg drag lhag chad gyur pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa 'og na bcu dgur ldan// re'u mig nyi shu gnas pa dang // sbyor ba tshes draka
226b6(rgyud): pa'o// chog dreg dang ni rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa dbus nas bcu gcig ldan// re'u mig bcu gnyis pa sbyor ba'i// chog drag ldan par 'dod pa'o// re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa// 'og gi 'dren
226b7(rgyud): shru ga cig/ bcu gnyis pa dang tsheg drag can// gsum pa can de bshad pa'o// re ru mig 'dra bzhi la gnas pa// bcu gnyis pa dang ldan pa la// cho ga drag dang ni mnyam sbyor ba// lha mo snod
226b8(rgyud): yi 'dod// 'du mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa dbus nas gnyis pa can// de bzhin thig yang ro ldar// pheg le'i byung gnas gsum pa ste// dbus nas bcu pa gang yin pa// rtag tu chos
227a1(rgyud): ldan pa'i// dmar chen sogs pa'i lA mo le// bzhi po dag ni byung ba'o// re ru meg nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// gnas pa'i thig le bcas pa'o// dbus las drug pa gang yin pa// thig le
227a2(rgyud): nga ro ldan pa'o// re'u mig de bzhin bcu bdun pa// thig leng res brgyan pa'o// re'u mig bcu dgu la gnas pa// thig la du ros brgyan pa'o// lha mo mda' rnon 'dzin sogs kyi// sa bon byung ba de
227a3(rgyud): mtshare// lha po me tog ma sogs kyi// swa po dbyung ba sngon bstan yin// gang dag go srungs bstan pa yang // gzugs mi 'thun pa khona'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas na
227a4(rgyud): ces gsungs so// mkha' sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa bcu dgu'i gdan la gnas// nyi shu tshe ge drag sbyor ba ni/ 
227a5(rgyud): dgar gyi dbang phyug yin// re'u mig bcu zin la gnas pa'o// tshig gnyis lci ba de bzhin no// ba du mi ga nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas nas dbus nas dgu pa phran// rtag par thig le dang ldan ni/ 
227a6(rgyud): nyes pa yi ni yongs grags pa// be'u mi ga sum cu rtsa gcig la// gnas pa rang ro thig les brgyan// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa dbus nas bcu gsum ldan// tsheg drag can na
227a7(rgyud): pa yaM// khro gnyer ma yi rgyud las grags// re'u myig nyi shu rtsa bzhir ldan// dbus nas dgu pa'i thig ler bcas// re'u ma gnyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus nas bco lnga dang ldan no// re
227a8(rgyud): bcug cig la gnas pa// tshig drag gis ni sbyor ba'o// re ru mi gnyi su rtsa bzhir gnas// sum cu rtsa brgyad pa dang ldan// tshig drag mnyam por sbyor ba ni// pad+ma gar dbang mchog yin
227b1(rgyud): no// lha mo gling bum thogapa nyid// de bzhin lha po me tog sogs// lha mo lcags kyu ma sogs kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor la ni bskyed pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'ad
227b2(rgyud): rje sems dpas gsungs te// badra gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// dbus napa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// bcu gcig pa dang ldan pa ste// 
227b3(rgyud): zla ba gtsug lnga ni// rdo rje nyi ma 'byung ba yin// dbus nas bcu gsum gang yin pa// zla tshas theg le ga tsug gi zhal// re'u yig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa// re'u leg
227b4(rgyud): gnas dang sbyor// tsheg drag ldan pas gnyis pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus nas bcu gsum pa dang ldan// chog drag lhan cig can dang ni// gsum pa yi ni grags pa
227b5(rgyud): 'u mig nyi shu rtswa gzhir gnas// bcu gcig dang na thig le ldan// re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa// chag drag ldan pa 'dod pa'o// re 'u mag bcu bzhi la gnas pa// tsheg drag ldan par 'a
227b6(rgyud): pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus gnas dgu dang zla ba'o// re'u mig pum cu rtsa gcig gnas// thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o// re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// dbus nas
227b7(rgyud): gsum pa dang ldan// tshig drag mnyam par ldan pa ni// rdo rje nyi ma lda dag yin// lum gling bu ma sogs kun// rdza ba'i dkyil 'khor stor skyes yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
227b8(rgyud): dpas gsus te// rdo rje nyi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'thung ba'i phyag kyi shes pa'o// re'u mi gnyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// nyi shu rtsa bdun zhes sbyor ba ste// zla ches thig le ke tsu
228a1(rgyud): can ni// yul 'khor thams cad 'dul ba'o// ra'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa// bcu dgu pa dang ldan pa ste// nyi shu chog drag sbyor ba ste// sde tshogs pa yi brjod pa yin/ 
228a2(rgyud): re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas// gnas pa chog drag ldan pa 'dod// ta ye rgyal po dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rgya gram shes grags so// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa
228a3(rgyud): gsungs te// rta mchog gi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// // sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las chos kyi yi ge
228a4(rgyud): ba'i rtog pa ste// bcu dgu pa'o// / ri mo gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad kri// de yi nang du rnal 'byor pas// e yi ge tshogs kyang bri bar bya// shar phyogs 'a
228a5(rgyud): mar ka yi sde// lho phyogs 'dab par tsa yi sde// nub phyogs 'dab mar Ta ya ste// tA yi sde ni de bzhin byang // sde bo lnga yi dbus su ni// yi ge k+Sha dang lhan cig 'dod// dbang ldan 'dab ma nas
228a6(rgyud): brtsams te// ya ral wa rnam par gzhag/ dbang ldan 'dab ma'i phyi rol du// yi ler ni 'jug par bya// ma mtshams 'dab ma'i phyi rol du// yi ge sha na 'jug par bya// bden bral 'ad
228a7(rgyud): phyi rol du// yi ges ni 'jug par bya// rlung ma tshams 'dab ma'i phyi rol du// yi ge ha ne 'jug par bya// des bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// 
228a8(rgyud): mtha' rugang yin pa// theg le dang ldan yi ge oM// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa gang // skra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// 'og tu sgra yig u sbyor ro// sha
228b1(rgyud): ma gnyis pa ni// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin no// lho nas de bzhin dbu ma la/ me mtshams 'dab ma de bzhin no// bden bra ba phyi rol gnas pa gang // de nas byang gi dang po'o// dbus nas dbu ma
228b2(rgyud): gnas su// de tshe 'od kyi gong bur 'gyur// oM yig tsheg drag dang ldan pa// de yi mtha' ru de tsher 'gyur// lho nas dbus ma gang yin pa// tshig drag dang ni ldan pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol ga
228b3(rgyud): pa// u yig thig le sbyor bar bya// dbus kyi dbu ma gang yin pa// thig les mgro nas mnan pa dang // rlung mtshams phyi rol gang yin pa// oM yig tshe drag sbyor bar bya// bden bral mtshams
228b4(rgyud): phyi rol du// pra yig u ni sbyor ba ste// me mtshams 'dab mar gang yin pa// byang gi dang por de bzhin yang // bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// byang gis dang po pa yang yin// dbus nas da
228b5(rgyud): maM bzungs nas su// 'od kyi gong bu mtha' ru 'gyur// de nas theg le sbyin byas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' 'thub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po rdo rje sems dpas gas
228b6(rgyud): so// lho nas dbu ma gang yin pa// tshig drag dang ni ldan par bya// dbus nas dbu pa de bzhin du// lho nas dbu ma yang yin no// me mtshams 'dab pa dang ldan pa// rtag tu brjod par 'gyur ba la
228b7(rgyud): byang nas dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtshams dang de shin tu sbyor// swA yeg a dang sbyar nas su// rtag par nye bar 'gyur ba yin// me mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su// nub kyi dang po ldan par bya/ 
228b8(rgyud): yig yi dang sbyar nas su// 'od kyi gong bulnga pa yin// bden bral phyi ros gnas pa la// sku legs dang ldan par bya// de bzhin dbang ldan 'das pa dang // sgra yig yi ni sbyor ba'o// shar gyi dang pa
229a1(rgyud): dang ni// de nas dbu pa'i tha ma dang // nub kyi dang po pa bzung nas// a med rtag tu 'gyur ba bya// de dag bzlas pa byas pa yis// mda' ru rab tu grub pa yin// zhes bcom
229a2(rgyud): ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya// thig lang roganon nas su// de das dbus nas dbu ma'o// lho nas dbu ma
229a3(rgyud): bzung nas su// me 'tshams pa dang sbyor bar bya// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig e dang ldan par bya// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa gang // skra yig e ni sbyor bar bya'o// shar
229a4(rgyud): dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'o// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya// thig leng
229a5(rgyud): / ros mnyam sbyor na// bskal bzang bskal bzang 'gyur ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de bzhin gnyis pa dpa' bo ma// kun du bzang po gsum pa ste// 
229a6(rgyud): bzhi pa zad med sngon ma'o// dpa' mo sangs rgyas sku ldan ma// de bzhin gzungs ma zhal mdzes ma// sprin chen ma ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan pa'o// gling bu la sogs bsdus pa dang / 
229a7(rgyud): glengs ma sogs yang bsdus te// me tog ma sogs bsdus pa ni// dang po'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod// ces bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
229a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor la sngag 'byung ba'i tsheg kyi phyag tu shes pa'o// o yig thig le dang ldan pa// yi ge ye yis ldan pa yi// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa dang / 
229b1(rgyud): 'dab ma gnas pa nyid// sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// shar las dang pa de bzhin du// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// den
229b2(rgyud): bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las zam pa yang bzung // dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// tshig drag gis ni mnyam
229b3(rgyud): par ldan// de ni bcu par yongs grags te// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// me mtshams 'dab pa can dang ldan// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur nas su// byang las dbu ma de bzhin te/ sgra yig u ni
229b4(rgyud): ra bar bya// me mtshams phyi rol pa de bzhin// nub las dang po pa dang ldan// bden bral phyi rol pa la yang // dbu pa'i mtha' yang de yin te// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// yi ge u dang mnyam/ 
229b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i// dbus las tha ma pa 'gyur nas// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa// byang las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// 'dren pa a yig dang lhan cig/ dbus las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams
229b6(rgyud): na dang ldan par bya// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// thig le dang ni yang dag ldan// lho las dbu pa de bzhin du// shar las dang po pa yang yin// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le
229b7(rgyud): yig ldan par bya// dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub kyi dang po a med par// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su// theg
229b8(rgyud): lo la ga dang ldan te// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// se mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbum pa 'gyur te// sher las gsungs pa gang yid pa// sgra yig u dang ldan par bya// rlung
230a1(rgyud): mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra lig e yis brgyan pa ste// dbang ldan 'dab ma'i gdan can ni// lnga par yongs su grags pa ste// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra leg
230a2(rgyud): i dang sbyor bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// grwa yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams 'dab pa can dang 'dra// dbus las tha ma yang yin te// 
230a3(rgyud): ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la// skra yig o nI sbyor par bya// shar las gsum pa gang yin pa// sgra yi ga yo ni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa grang // dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te/ 
230a4(rgyud): me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// skra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa ni// me mtshams gdan dang ldan pa ste// tsheg drag yi ge i ldan pa// dang por yongs su grag
230a5(rgyud): pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// thig le yi ge u skor to// mkhas pas lan gnyis brjod par bya// dbus las dbus ma yang bzung ste// lho las dbu ma de bzhin la/ 
230a6(rgyud): mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan// lho las dang po bzung nas su// thig le dang ni mnyam por ldan// nub nas dbu ma bzung nas su// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan bya// dbang ldan bya
230a7(rgyud): gang yin pa// dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// shar las gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub las dang po bzung nas su// 
230a8(rgyud): dbus das dbum ldan pa ste// thig le a yig ldan par bya// bcu par yongs su grags pa ste// shar las gsum pa gang yin pa// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus la tha
230b1(rgyud): mar gzung nas su// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la ldang // yi ge yA dang ldan par bya// dbus nas dbu ma gzung nas su// lho las gsum pa 'gyur byas te// me mtshams gdan ni stor byas/ 
230b2(rgyud): nas// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// yi ge a yig ldan pa yi// dbus las dang po 'gyur byas te// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig e dang sbyor ba yi// dbus las/ 
230b3(rgyud): tha ma yang yin te// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// sgra lag u yis sbyor bar bya// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig u dang sbyor ba te// bden bral 'dab
230b4(rgyud): mar gnas pa la// spra yig u pis brgyan byas te// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa yang // sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// skra yig u pas brgyan pa ste// 
230b5(rgyud): bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa ni// gnyis brtsegs yi ge u dang ldan// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// byang lnga pa kra ma ldan byas te// tsheg drag mnyar bar ldan pa la// sgra yig i dang
230b6(rgyud): re bar bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sebs dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nal// thig le u yis sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang / 
230b7(rgyud): mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya// byang las tha ma bzung nas su// sma lig i ni sbyor bar bya// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig a yis brgya
230b8(rgyud): bar bya// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig i dang ldan pa yi// rub kyi tha mar 'gyur bar bya// lho gi dbu ma de bzhin du// lho las bzhi pa gang yin 'byor// chog dra ga yi ge ye ldan pa
231a1(rgyud): 'dus pa gsungs pa yin pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yis sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang // me mtshams
231a2(rgyud): ldan pa yi// lho yi dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi// byang gi dang po yang yin te// shar las dang khro bzung ba lnga// sgra yig
231a3(rgyud): ra bar bya// lho las dbu ma de bzhin du// tsheg drag yi ger ldan pa'o// zhes rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi'o// rlung mtshams phye rol pa bzung nas// thig le u 'i ga sbyor byas te/ 
231a4(rgyud): dus las dbu ma bzung ba dang // me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las u ma 'gyur bar bya// dbu las dang po bzung ba la// me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya// rlung mtsha
231a5(rgyud): rol pa bzung nas// de 'og/ me mtshams pa yin te// nub kyi tha ma de bzhin du// sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya// dngul lngas tha ma yang yin te// nub las deng po bzung nas su/ 
231a6(rgyud): yig med par gyur pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yis sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbu par/ 
231a7(rgyud): gyur par bya// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// thig le yis ni brgyan par bya// de bzhin dbus nas dbu ma yang // lho nas dbu ma de bzhin te// me yis mtshams pa mnyam pa kar
231a8(rgyud): yi ge a yi ga du bar bya//  napa tha ma bzung nas su// sgra mig mo ni myong bar bya// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ dbuma'i mam dang ldan par// se gatshams lan gnyis
231b1(rgyud): brjod nas su// nub nas dang por ldan 'gyur bya// rtag tu a med gyung pa ni// rdo klub T+wAM 'dzin ma yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi/ 
231b2(rgyud): rol pa bzung nas// chog drag mo ni sbyor bar bya// dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du// me mchims pas ni ldan pa yin// lho nas dbu mar 'gyur ba'o// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// skra
231b3(rgyud): leg a ni sbyor bar bya// dbus nas tha mar bzung nas su// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las dbu ma bzung bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma la
231b4(rgyud): // sgra yi ge i ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas dang po bzung nas su// yi ge a dang ldan par bya// me mtshams 'dab ma sbyor nas su// thig leng rol bsdu bar bya// sna tshogs pad+ma lha mo che// 
231b5(rgyud): rje sems sogs lha yi yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje mtshon cha dang // rdo rje rol ma dang // rdo rje dran ma dang // rdo rje snying
231b6(rgyud): ma dag rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi yin no// oM yig thig le dang ldan par// e yig thig le yang dag ldan// dbus pa tha ma bzung ba dang // yi ge u dang ldan pa
231b7(rgyud): dra nas de bzhin zin pa'o// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// snron la dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams 'dab ma dang sbyar nas// sgra yig i dang a bsdu bya'o// shar
231b8(rgyud): zhi pa gang yin pa// thig le u dang ldan bya ste// nan tan du ni lan gnyis bzla// rtag tu dang po'i 'gyur ba yin// la yog thig la dang ldan pa// dbu ma los ni dbu ma yang // 
232a1(rgyud): me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lce nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya// dbus nas tha ma bzung byas te// sgra lig a dang sbyor bar bya// shar las ba
232a2(rgyud): ba gang yin pa// sgra yig u dang sbyor ba'o// bden bral 'dab ma la gnas pa// sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste// nan tan lan gnyis bzlas pa'o// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin
232a3(rgyud): u yig me mtshams pa dang ldan// thig le nga ro gnyis pa'o// oM yig thig le dang ldan pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa// tsheg drag dang ni panyam por ldan// 
232a4(rgyud): dbang ldan phyi rol la gnas dang // me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin// byang nas gsum pa gang yin pa// dbus las dbu mar gyur par bya// lho nas dbu ma pa la yang // me ma
232a5(rgyud): 'dab ma can dang ldan// s+tha yig i dang ldan sbyor ba// e yig thig le dang ldan pa// lan gnyis gsum ni brjod byas te// lha mo gsum po kho na'o// sngags 'byung bar ni brakra
232a6(rgyud): pa yin// o yig thig le dang ldan par// shar nas gnyis pa gang yin pa// zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhab// dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du// lho nas dbu ma pa la yang // me mtsha
232a7(rgyud): 'dab ma can sbyor dang // dus rnams thams cad sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa de bzhin// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// de nyid phyi rol pa bzung nas// sku yig yi dang ldan
232a8(rgyud): byas te// me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa yi// sgra yig i yis brgyan par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sor byas te// lan gnyis gsum
232b1(rgyud): du brjod pa'o// dri ni dpag bsam shing sogs lha// rdo rje snying po ma dang // rdo rje sred med kyi bu ma dang // rdo rje wAr lnga dbang phyug ma dang // 'dod pa'i lha mo rnams shes pa lha mo
232b2(rgyud): yin no// ro yig thig le dang ldan pa/ yi ge a yis sbyor ba bya// rlu ma chis sa phyi rol la gnas pa/ mab tsha 'dasas cad de bzhin// yi ge ye yis mnyam ldan pa'i// byang nas dang por 'gyur byas te// dbus
232b3(rgyud): me mtshams 'dab ma can sbyor ba'i// lho yi dbu ma pa yang de// yi ge e yis mnyam ldan bya// dbus las dbu ma ldan 'gyur dang // bden bral 'dab ma la
232b4(rgyud): gnas pa// swa yig i ni star byas te// bden bral phyi rol la gnas pa// sgra yig i ni sbyor byas te// byang nas tham gang yin pa// skra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas dang po
232b5(rgyud): gang yin pa// me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan// nub nas dang po gang yin pa// rtag par oM med 'gyur bar bya// gdod ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ lha mo rdo rje 'i zang ma'o//

232b8(rgyud): me ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas dang po bzung nas su// sr-i yig ye ni sbyor byas te// nga ro ban po dang ldan pa// rtag par lan gsum brjod bya'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa
