233a2(rgyud): dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig/ lho nas dbu ma 'gyur byas te// rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// de bzhin bden
233a3(rgyud): bral phyi ba la// sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'i phyir// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa nyid ni// lan gnyis ched du brjod par bya// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// theg le ye
233a4(rgyud): yig sbyor bar bya// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog la// rnga chen lha mor grags pa yin// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// me mtshams

233a6(rgyud): ma pa dang yang // byang nas mtha' ma bzung byas te// me mtshams 'dab ma ldan byas nas// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// byang nas dang po bzung byas te// dbang ldan 'dab ma
233a7(rgyud): can sbyor nas// de tshe de ni yang brjod de/ de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang // sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po de bzhin du// de ni lan gnyis brjod
233b1(rgyud): par bya// lho nas bzhi pa bzung nas su// nga ro ma yig ldan par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la// rdza ja ma zhes grags pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
233b2(rgyud): sems dpas gsungs so// gling bu ma dang pi wang kun// rnga chen de bzhin rdza rnga kun// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la// sra yi lha mos mchod 'grub pa'o// a yig dang po

233b4(rgyud): bya// me mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las dang po yang yin te// ye yig dang ni mnyam por ldan// dbus nas me tog pa byung ngo // a yig dang por byas nas su/

234b1(rgyud): 'dab ma can ldan zhing // lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig leng ros brgyan byas te// shar kyi dbang po bzung nas su// sku yig ye dang mnyam ldan/

234b3(rgyud): las dbu ma pa yin te// me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig/ lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// shar las bzhi pa gleng yin pa// thig le ros rnam par brgyan// nub las dang po bzung nas/

236b7(rgyud): 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin du dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// zla chos thig le gtsug gi zhal// dbus las tham yang ngeb

237a1(rgyud): // len// dbus las dbu ma pa nyid dang // me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// grwa yig i dang sbyor nas bu// khro las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa yang //

237a3(rgyud): sogs 'dus pa ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyi ni// ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin du dga' ba'i rgyal po rdo rjes sems dpas
237a4(rgyud): gsungs te// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma pi dkyil 'khor la// sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// a yil thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma bzung byas te// bden bral phyi rol

243a4(rgyud): / byibyen brlabs te// rdo rje dbyings ni rang bdag 'gyur// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su// ling ge rdo rjer byin brlabs te// khrag 'thung zhes bdag sngon skye'o//

243a6(rgyud): su// ling ga rin chen thun brlabs te// rdo rje nyi mar bdag ldan bskyed// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su// lingag sna tshogs byin brlabs te// ta mchog dag
243a7(rgyud): ni sngon ste'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug byas te// der ni khams yig bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs dag 'ong // klu gnyis ldan pa spro bar bya// b+ha gar ling ga bcu gnas su/ 
243a8(rgyud): rala~M hU~M yig bsam par bya// shin du dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ne// sku lacos ldan pa'i sgrabya'o//  gapa se dag bcug nasas// de la hUM log bsgom par bya// khrag 'brub
243b1(rgyud): ba'i gzugs dag ni// sku gces ldan par spro bya'o// b+ha gar yang ga bcu gnas su// de la b+ha lig bsgom par bya// pad+ma 'dzin 'dra'i gzugs dang // klu gnyis ldan pa spro ba'o// b+ha gar ling ga
243b2(rgyud): bcug nas su// da la traM yig bsgom par bya// nyi ma 'dra ba'i gzugs dag yod// klu gnyis ldan pa spro bya'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// dal hUM yig bsgom par bya// hUM mdzad 'dra'i gzug dang
243b3(rgyud): ni// sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nyid gsang ba gsang chen yang // snying po yongs su grags pa yin// snying pos rjes su 'grub
243b4(rgyud): pa ni// nye ba'i snying por yangs grags so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro snya ma bde ba'i mchog lul gsang ba bzhag pa'i rtog pasteny+tsa shun gcig pa'o// / de lnga
243b5(rgyud): ltar bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dang / rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rgyud
243b6(rgyud): com ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi don len zhe na/ ji ltar gnas su gang 'khor ro// de ltar sde dang 'gro ba bzhin// 'khor dang yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor skyed mchog yin/

243b8(rgyud): de la ji ltar thig gdab pa'i chog shes pa yin zhe na/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bre byedan/ mtshams kun mnyam por 'dren par bya// shar dang nub dang byang sogs phyogs// theg srud ba'i ba re'u me
244a1(rgyud): / brgyad// dkyil 'khor thum po sangs rgyas bri// rdo bran gyi bla gam bzhin// pad ma pa d+ma'i tshul yin te// rin chen tshul ni rin chen gyi// lnga tshogs kyi ni zlum po gsungs// ci ltar
244a2(rgyud): pa ci bde bas// nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa// re'u mig brgyad par 'dod pa'o// phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// nang gi dkyil 'khor du ni 'dod// re'u mig brgyad kyi dbus gan
244a3(rgyud): pas// gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa yin// zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar rtog pa'i dngos grub dam pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar bden par dkyil 'khor bdag
244a4(rgyud): gang gis rtogs par nus pa ni// gang gis yi dam lhar sbyor bas// grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ldog pa yin// bris skra bris pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang sems bris par sbyor ba yin// lha
244a5(rgyud): cho gar gyur na yang // bsgrubs te skyon du mi 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar gsang ba lnga'i de nyid yin zhe na/ sems dpa' gdod ma tha ma med// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun du bzang po kun
244a6(rgyud): kye da// de snying ban rno tha ma// gdod ma tham me byed bang // dag pa'i dang pazas 'dad // la kho lo sun rtseg sa byed ni// dam pa dpe pa'i dbang phrag len//  la lta ba sa par/ 
244a7(rgyud): 'das gang lags ci 'dra ba yin zhe na// 'dod pa chen po kun gyi mchog/ yid bde bas ni 'dzum pa che// rtag par 'dzum pa'i bde ba des// dam pa bcom ldan 'gyur ba yin// de nas de yi
244a8(rgyud): mdog ni// dam pa yis 'bru grub nyid phyir// chos rnams thams cad dag phyer dang // gsang ba de nyid nam dag phyir// rdo rje dzin de zla ba'i mdo// de nas de'i bla tshogs dmar ba'i 'od 'bar ba na/ 
244b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags che// 'dod chags kun la rjes chags phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyang // sna tshogs dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od// de la ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa
244b2(rgyud): zhe na/ thod phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan ni/ khams gsum la ni dbu rkun med// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu can ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sngon bskyed// khams gsum las ni rin chen
244b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces// dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin// de nas ji ltar sems dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhe na/ yan lag g.yas pas mnyam
244b4(rgyud): gnon pas// g.yon pa'i yan lag gzir nas su// de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung can// rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso// de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid

244b6(rgyud): rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs// dka' ba de bzhin gtso mo bdag/ rdo rje lha mo tshogs phyag rgya// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin// de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

245a1(rgyud): / dpa' 'dra bar ni// de rnams de bzhin nyid kyis bsnyen// chos kyi dbyings la 'byung ba yis// rgya che dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
245a2(rgyud): / dbas gsungs so// // de nas je ltar phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i yan lag gi shes pa yan zhe na/ 'phrog byed ma dang 'dzin byed ma// gzung thar ma dang tshe sbyin ma// nam mkhar 'gro dang

245a7(rgyud): kha yang bstan na ni// de la zhags pa bstan par bya// gang gis gsal shing bstan thur na// de la mdung thung bstan par bya// / gang gis sngon mo bstan na ni// de la ruH
245a8(rgyud): tu bstan// gang gis khu tshur bstan na ni// de la mtshams su bstan par bya// gang gis lce ni bstan gyur na// de la bshang gci bstan par bya// gang gis mi sdug gzugs byed na/

245b2(rgyud): mtshan ma yin zhe na/ nang pa'i mig gi 'bras 'dra ba// dpral bar ti shul te mdung thung // byin log mig dang khro gnyer can// nu ma dag ni mi sdug pa// sna ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// gtsug
245b3(rgyud): bskor ba shes byas te// ri mo gsum gyis yongs su bskor// de yi khyim gyi mtshan ma ni// tri shUl tshung de me long dang // ral gri tshul dang rgyal mtshan dang // rtse gcig khyim gyi mtshan par ba

246a1(rgyud): cad de ni 'grub par bya// de nas ji ltar thams cad rjes su 'grub pa'i klu yin zhe na/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin 'gyur nas// bzlas pa'i dril bu dkrol bar bya// rtog pa thams cad
246a2(rgyud): rjes grub pas// mchog gi dang po 'grub pa'o// de la ji ltar rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin na na/ o yig thig le dang ldan pa'i// nub las dang po yang

249b2(rgyud): phal chen no// zla ba dang nyi sa dang / A li dang kA li dang / 'phob cu drug dang / dbyug su drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / chu tshad sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / thun chod bzhi ste/ de lngar thams cad bzhi bzhi'o//

249b6(rgyud): hU~M/ phyag gnyis pa'i'o// oM la dz+wa la~M b+h+yo hU~M hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i'o// oM kai Ti ka~M Ti badz+ra d+hu hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag drug pa'i'o// mai ba hUM/ sra dang gsung dang thugs kyin

251a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba la zla ba dang nyi ma byos nas rdo rje'i tshul gzhug cing sngags bzlas te/ oM badz+ra a tre dz+wa tsa la ga tsal ti/ tiSh+ThahU~M badz+rA ma hU~M hUM hU~M phaTaswAt+ma/ bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te nyi ma dang zla ba yang dag

251b3(rgyud): byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis par snying rje rnam bsgom zhing // gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang // kun gyi mthar ni btang snyoms so// yang ni sdod pa'i byang chub ste// gnyis pa la nis bon

251b8(rgyud): da pas nges par rnam par bzhom// nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni// rdo rje skye ba snying rje che// rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi// lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod// dkar mo re daH/ 
252a1(rgyud): mtshan ma 'dzin// chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i sdod// ro langs ma ni rgyal ba ma// gras+kha rI ni sran 'dzin cing // prak+ka sI ni rdo rje'i lag/ de bzhi na ri khrod sa ro 'dzin/ 
252a2(rgyud): gdol pa mo ni cang te'u rdung 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas// g.yungasas sul 'gyur ba nyid// A li zla ba kA li hi// sa bon nang du san
252a3(rgyud): gyur pa// de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi// rang gis lus mtshungs rnam par spro// bsdus nas snying

252a8(rgyud): g.yon gyi dang po ni skyes pa'i thod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba/ de bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje/ phyag lhag ma dag ni shes rab la 'thud pa/ shes rab rdo rje pag mo ni

252b6(rgyud): gsol pa gdab par bya'o// oM a b+hi Shi R+R-i tu mAM sar+b+ba ta nA ga ta zhes sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang

254a8(rgyud): yod na// 'dis ni spyod pa bya ba nyid// shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma// rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can// rdo rje'i bu mo 'di khyer nas// spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya// rdo rje
254b1(rgyud): ci dngos med na// rang 'dod lta yi rigs kyis bya// yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba/ byang chub sa bon gdab pa dang // spyad pa yis na bzung bar bya// gal te dga' bas klu blang ste// de tshe rdo rje
254b2(rgyud): mchog ldan no// gal te dga' ba skyes pa na// thar pa'i rgyud ni gar bya ste// de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar// yo gis mnyam par bzhag pas byed// 'khar lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyed pa// na cha'i bang
254b3(rgyud): nyid 'od dpag med// mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen bdag/ lag gdub rnam par snang mdzad brjod// ska rags la ni don yod gnas// kha T+wAM ga gzugs shes rab ste// thabs kyi gzugs kyis
254b4(rgyud): brde'u nyid// zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa// klu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas// gar ni sgom pa byas pa nyid// de yi phyir na klu dang gar// yo ga rtag tu rtag tu byed/ 
254b5(rgyud): chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid// rga shis zil phyis mi non cing // rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba yini// rkun ma'i sgraska las cod pan byas// de la hUM byung sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga li thod pa rnam
254b6(rgyud): la 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin// thod pa sor lnga pa yi tshad// byas pas cod pan 'dzin par byed// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// skra yi ska rags nyis skor nyid// thal ba skra
254b7(rgyud): mchod phyir thogs// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzin// cang te'u sgra ni bzlas pa ste// kha T+wAM ga bsgo ma shes rab nyid// rdo rje thob pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'di dag bzlas dang bsgom pa yin// brkam
254b8(rgyud): dang rmongs dang 'jigs dang klo/ ngo tsha'i 'bras bu rnam par spang // bdag nyid kyi ni gnyid spangs nas// the tshom med par spyod par bya// lus kyis sbyin pa byedan nas ni// phyi nas song pa yang dag
255a1(rgyud): // spyad// skal dang skal min rnam dpyad pas// de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya// bza' bca' de bzhin btang ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'// yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir// 
255a2(rgyud): zhen pa tsam du ma bya'o// bza' dang bza' min spyod pa dang // de bzhin btung dang btung min nyid// bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis// rnam rtog nyid du ma bya'o// dngos grub rnyed pa'i sku
255a3(rgyud): ma gang // yang dag ye shes sdang ba po// mnar med spang ba'i rgyu mi phyir// grub pas bla ma mngon phyag 'tshal// bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol// de bzhin ngo tsha'i 'bras bu nyid// dngos

255a5(rgyud): 'byor ldan pas spyod pa byed// nges par sngon du lha min gang // brgya byin lta bu yan na yang // de la 'jigs par mi bya ste// seng ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// sems can kun gyi don

255b1(rgyud): de la mgrin pa rab tu bstan// gang zhig gos ni ston pa la// de la rtse gsum rab tu bstan// gang shig num ston pa la// de ye mtshams ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig son sten pa la// de yi kha na

255b8(rgyud): de bzhin du ni kA ma ru nyid// nye gnas ma la wa zhes brjod// sin d+hu na kar nyid do// zhing ni lu blun ri bshad de// gang ni byed pa'i brang nyid do// de wi kauTi de bzhin zhing // shing ni

266b1(rgyud): 'jig rten 'chang 'gyur ba// 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur// bzlog pa'i bsgom pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes// 'byung ba lnga'i rang bzhin la// kun tu ru las

266b7(rgyud): namachog tu brtag pa nyid// 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yi// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// gang gA klung ni bcu yi bye snyed kyis// rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa

267a1(rgyud): rigs la grangs med rags rnams ni// mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dpa'i sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la phab pa zhes bya
267a2(rgyud): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams la rgud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal pa/ sdom pa dang ni dbang dang yang // de bzhin dgongs
267a3(rgyud): pa'i skad nyid dang // dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang // gzhan yang bza' ba la sogs pa// de la sdom pa bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// e baM rnam par rab tu gnas//

267a7(rgyud): cig shes nas bde shes pa// e bam rnam par rab tu gnas// sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang // rnam nyid de bzhin mtshan nyid bral// skad cig bzhin ni rab shes pa// de ltar rna

271a3(rgyud): i ha le kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i/ dud+hi ra bidz+nyA a oM/ tsa.u sa ma ka ts+tsha sa hA ka pU ra la i a/ A/ mA la i in+ta NA sA la dze ta ho b+ha ru khA i a i/ pau Sha Na khaM Ta ka ran+ti shud+d+ha
271a4(rgyud): shud+d+ha Na ma Na a i/ ni rang shu aM ga tsa DA wi ta haM dza sa ra bA pa Ni a i ma la ya rje ku na ru bA Ta i/ Di NA ma ta hiN+Da bidz+dzi a i/ dran pa mi 'phrogs rnal 'byor pas// he

273a1(rgyud): ye shes dngos po can// yang dag gyur pa so sor rtog/ de nyid bya ba nan tan te// chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag ma// de nyid dkyil 'khor bdag po pa
273a2(rgyud): bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje snying pos yasal pa// 'khor lo sdom pa'i lam dang ni// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// thams
273a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsungs na// sdom pa'ang bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor ma lus dbus gnas su// a yi rnam pa sdom
273a4(rgyud): ba'i gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang // sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye// bo lnga bde ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje skye mchod thabs chen nyid// 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// 
273a5(rgyud): rol gnyis gnyis bstan du med// sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni// 'khor lo'i gzug pa ni brjod par bya// sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo brjod// 
273a6(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // de bzhin du yang bde chen nyid// skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang // sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// ma lus pa lci sems can gyi/ 
273a7(rgyud): ba gang la brjod bya ba// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// de las sprul pa'i sku nyid yin// gang gis skye dang skal byed pa'i// sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod// sems ni
273a8(rgyud): rang bzhin te// chos kye sku yang steng kar 'gyur// ro rnam drug gi gzugs can gyi// bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod// mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo dang // spyi bor bde ba
273b1(rgyud): chen po gnas// e ba rnam par rgya ba thun nyid// rnam snyen chos kyi 'khor lo las// longs spyod skyes bu byed pa nyid// bde ba'i 'khor lo'i dri med nyid// tu 'thun sogs pas rab
273b2(rgyud): ba'i// 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// sngas kyi rlung gis bskal ba yis// las la bcom ldan shes rab spyod// ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod// rgyu mthun nas ni rab tu bsgrag so// 
273b3(rgyud): las chung 'bras bu che ba'i phyir// rnam par smin pa de las zlog/ rnal 'byor dag phyir dri med nyid// snyed pa skyes bu byed pa nyid// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// sprul pa'i la
273b4(rgyud): ldor gnas brtan nyid// chos ni smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lor thams cad yod// gang phyir mgrin par kun bkur phyir// longs stod 'khor lor kun bku de nyid// 
273b5(rgyud): phyir bde chen mgror gnas pas// bde ba'i 'khor lor dge 'dun che// sde pa zhes bya sku ru brjod// lto ba gnas su brjod par bya// sgo gnas 'dod tshogs bral bar 'gyur// 
273b6(rgyud): khru ma chos gos nyid// de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid// mgo bor thal mo sbyar bar phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas// sngags kyi bzlas pa a dang taM// skye gnas 'khor lo
273b7(rgyud): pa a// bde chen gyi yadu rnam pa te// gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs// sngags 'dod skyes pa dge slong nyid// 'di dag rten gyis sems can rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med// 
273b8(rgyud): sa da// mas byanas bcu'i dbang gag / nas nas 'byings bdag med pas pags pa'i sas thams cadas 'di// 9/ spyan sa dang / sem nga / 
274a1(rgyud): / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / tsun da dang / pa na ri khrod ma dang / 'o gzhal ma dang / de dag pa sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'o/ 
274a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi tshig 'di dag thos nas mchog tu ngo mchar bar gyur cing brgyal ba dang // sbagA pa dang / sa la 'brel ba dang / 'dang bar 'gyur ro// yang rdo rje can gyis k+Sha
274a3(rgyud): de rnams thams cad la gzigs nas/ bslang ba'i phyir yang dag par bstod pa/ sa dang chu dang rlung byin za'i// lha mo sdod can khyed nyid la// gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa// 
274a4(rgyud): dang yis spro yi nyon// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu nye bar thos nas de rnams thams cad srog rnyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems
274a5(rgyud): ni rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid// 'on kyang glo 'ur dri mas bsgribs// de nyid bsal na sangs rgyas nyid// lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te// bden yang ma ma
274a6(rgyud): brdzun yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang gis mi shes 'jig rten pa// btsun dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur// rmongs spangs te nyid yid
274a7(rgyud): sa no// de yis de nyid yongs su gcod// de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing // rtse'i rdo rje rang la bson// ma rig le sogs me 'dzin cing // gto mug la sogs 'ching bas min/ 
274a8(rgyud): rang dang rang gis rtogs pa las// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song dang // lha dang rnaman me rnams dang // bshang
274b1(rgyud): ba'i srin bu la sogs pa// lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang // bde ba gang phyir mi shes pas// rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can// 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang // sangs rgyas gzhan du
274b2(rgyud): mi 'gyur// sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas gzhon du bstan du med// gangs basmrig mkhan lasags pa// gsod pa don du sams pa po// de rnams
274b3(rgyud): na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsam med// byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa// 'di' bapyod pa ma shes pa// 'gro ba drug gi srid pa'i mthar// gang zhig mongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur// 
274b4(rgyud): snying po snying rje che// rtse yi rdo rje'i thabs rnyed paras// gang zhig yul rnams rnam stong ba// de ni bla med rnyed par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// mA ri pug sIr bshad pa// gang phyi
274b5(rgyud): migs pa nyid// swa ni ram snang nyid gsungs pa// de lta ma bsring byig rnalasas// bcom ldan 'das rgyas dka' stsas pa// sems sbyang sa nas tham gyis // mdzes pa gzhan du
274b6(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems// sku la thugs kyi phyag rgya gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// chu khams rwa skrod mar bshad pa// mibaskyod khu ba'i gzugs can nyid// 
274b7(rgyud): gtsotsom bstod phyag rgyas ni// re khrod mal phyag rgya rigs// bcom ldan 'das rjes bka' stsal pa// lus spangs nas ni sems kyis ni// gnas pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur/ 
274b8(rgyud): phyir sems ni gti mug 'gyur// thugs lo gti mug phyag rgyas gad ba// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// me ni gdol ba mong bshad pa// 'dod chags phyag rgyas gdol pa mo// ri
275a1(rgyud): te phyag rgya gzhan min na// ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// grang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa// khrag ni rin chen bcu
275a2(rgyud): ldan nyid// drod no khrag gi rang bzhin byer// 'dod chags ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// gang phyir gsung ma rlung nyid de// don yod rlung gi gzugs can nyid// 
275a3(rgyud): na yod phyag rgya g.yung mo la// gtso bo phyag rgya rigs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dag na// gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin
275a4(rgyud): phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis// mkhas pas g.yung mo phyag rgyas gdab// gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid// dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid// 
275a5(rgyud): sems kyis bdag pos phyag rgyas gdab// de nyid rim pos chom rkun ma// de bzhin ro langs ma nyid dang // de yi rigs pas g+ha s+pha rA// ma log pa las phyag tu'o// kye'i rdo rje rdo
275a6(rgyud): mas 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la// sems can don phyir gtor mche// de la bdag med mas nus pa// e baM rnam par bzhugs nas ni// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa las// 
275a7(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir// rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstar// oM in+da dza ma dz+wa la dzak+Sha/ b+hu da ba tI bA u rak+Sha tsan+da sutwa mAd bA p+pa ta la pA tA laM aSh+Ta sa b+hA swA hA/ 
275a8(rgyud): medam pa li de sh+tsaShI \u0f88\u0f90 pumra d+hi blo mAs po k+Sha/ ya ny+tsa sap+pa ka rdza Sha te+e su Ne le Da swA / oM a kAr mu Sha sar+b+ba d+hed+hA Sh+Ta~M a t+ya dut+te rA d+he teta/ a AHhUM phaT swAhA/ gal te 'das
275b1(rgyud): / gtor mas 'byung po thams cad mchod par byed na rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur te/ de rnams la bde ba drim med pa dang / lha ma rnams dang / 'gro ba rab tu 'byor ba rnams dka'
275b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dis 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma byin na dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgra'i sde 'jig pa dang / bskrad pa dang / bsad pa dang / dgug pa dang / zhi ba dang
275b3(rgyud): rgyas par 'gyur ro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ phyag rgya gang gis mkha' spyod ma// gang gis phyag rgyasas spyod ma// gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal// bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi// 
275b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang gsum 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// sku gsung thugs su bye ba las// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas pa'i// 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas
275b5(rgyud): spyong klu yi phyag rgya can// 'og zhal sku yi rdo rje ma// mkha' spyod 'dod chags phyag rgya can// steng shal gsung ni rdo rje ma// thugs
275b6(rgyud): nyid// samyos ni dbus ci gnas bu ste// des na bdag med ma dbus sde// rgyas par rab tu phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod// rnam gsum rnam pa lnga nyid kyang // bshad kyis
275b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma nyid nyon// mi spyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung // dpag med don grub rdo rje sems// zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang // 'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag/ 'dis ni rem pa
275b8(rgyud): bsgom pa nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' spangs nas ni// phyi nas rigs ni dam pa lnga// 'dod chags ni sdeng gti mug gis// de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// yi bsod ni sdang gzugs
276a1(rgyud): / can gyi// thugs kyi bdag po rig gcig nyid// na sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di// rigs ni drug dang lnga ru brjod// ce'i rdo rje las rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa
276a2(rgyud): don zhes bya ba'i le'u sa ban pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo kyi rdor kun sbyin pas// rnam kun rang bzhin bdag nyid che// dkyil 'khor dag ni yang dag gsungs/ 
276a3(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis// bde ba can na yang dag bzhugs// thugs kyi rdo rje'i sa bon gyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ste// phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs/ 
276a4(rgyud): bzhi pa la 'jigs pa'o// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// bdag med mAs ni mgul nas shud// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin lha la// bdag med ma ni nyid kyis zhus// bco lngas yongs su
276a5(rgyud): bskor ba yis/ bdag gi 'khor lo byed bshad na// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// gtso bo bdag gi spar ma 'tshal// bdag med ma la'o mdzad nas// rdo rje thor par rtsal nas
276a6(rgyud): lha yi nu ma mnye mdzad de// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu dbye// 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa// dol shal dol shal byed pas brtan// mtshams bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ 
276a7(rgyud): sra bus yang dag brgyan// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin las// khyod dang ljon cig bzhin bzangs ma// de la dbus su yod de// 
276a8(rgyud): zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// phyag ni bcu drug gis brgyan pa// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa'o// mgo'i 'phreng bas do shal mdzad// 
276b1(rgyud): nyimang bzhugs shing rol mor banas// kha dog nag po 'jigs pa yi// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// nyid kyi zhal nas hUM sngon // thal pas lus la byugs pa nyid// bdag med
276b2(rgyud): cig mnyam sbyor zhing // dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas// dpa'i rlabs med po'i bde ba thob// rloms sems med pa'i rang bzhin can// rtsal ba'i zhal ni nag po che// g.yas
276b3(rgyud): pu la ni kun dang mtshungs// g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa// spyi bo'i zhal ni gtsigs pa can// spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis phye// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin// grong khyer nyams dka
276b4(rgyud): khyod dang // dga' bas shin tu rol pa las// dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs phyung nas// shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas// srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor pa las// chom rkun ma yang phyung nas ni/ 
276b5(rgyud): byang nas k+ta'i swA ni// chom rgan ma ne go spangs ma// bo la ka zhol sbyor bas// ro sangs ma yang byung nas ni// spyang nas nub ce ni// bdud 'jom pa ni rnam par gnas// dge'
276b6(rgyud): ba'i snyoms 'jug las// g+hasl-i rI yang phyung nas ni// brang nas byang go skol ni// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// gnyis kyis bskyed pa'i sbyor ba las// puk+ka sI yang
276b7(rgyud): byang ras dbang ldan mtshams su ni// drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// yang ni srub pa'i sbyor ba skyes// 'tshed pa'i mtshams su ri khrod ma// srin po'i mtshams su gdol pa mo// rlu
276b8(rgyud): nam mas su ga phreng ma nyid//  nas de rnga chags can las// rig mar bcas pa 'a bar gyur// sna tshogs su mi mchod pa las// de nas nyim rnams kyis bskul// rje btsun
277a1(rgyud): spyod nan shig/ stong pa'i dang bzhin nyid rmongs la sa// de wad ma 'bras sgrub par mdzad// dgazhag tso 'jig rten 'gron gnyer ba// stong pa nyid la bzhugs pas ni// bod med/ 
277a2(rgyud): phyogs ni me 'tshal bas// gdol pa mo bdag zhu bar bgyid// bdag gis khyod kyis thugs 'tshal gyis// mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhongs shig/ g.yung mo bdag nyid dran mnyam
277a3(rgyud): pas// snying rje tshun chad ma mdzad cig/ glang po rta bong blang rnga mo// mi dang shA ra b+hA b+hi la// g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la// gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chung
277a4(rgyud): dang ni// me dang zla ba nyi ma nyid// mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa// rgod cing drag shul 'jigs rung ba// snying
277a5(rgyud): zhi ba yis// gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid// oM dang hUM gis de tshe// khu ba'i gzugs la pa bzhengs nas ni// zhabs nams sa la brdebs pa dang // sgra dang lha min bsdigs par

277a7(rgyud): dog nag po 'jigs chen po// bdag med bde ba sbyin pa po// gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom pa nyid// dkar mo'i g.yas na gri gug ste// de bzhin g.yon na ro he ta// chom rkun ma g.yas/ 
277b1(rgyud): cad te'u ste// g.yon pa'i phyug na phag pa nyid// ro langs ma g.yas ru sbal te// g.yon pa las ni pad+ma'i snod// g+ha s+sa rI la g.yas na sbrul// g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid// 
277b2(rgyud): puk+ka sI ga yas sing+ge ste// g.yon pa dgra sta de bzhin no// ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon pas bsil byed de bzhin no// gdol pa mo g.yas 'khor lo ste// g.yon pa thod pa
277b3(rgyud): bzhin no// g.yung ma g.yas na rdo rje nyid// g.yon na sngags 'dzub de bzhin no// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas// dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyi sa brjod// spyan gsum
277b4(rgyud): duste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gau rI kha dog nag por 'gyur// chom rkun mo ni bcod dang mtshungs// ro langs ma ni gser btsos bzhen// g+hasma rI ni mar gad mtshungs// 
277b5(rgyud): ni dbang sngon mtshungs// re khrod ma ni zla nor 'od// gtum mo nam mkha'i sngosangs ma// g.yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod// tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag/ gshin rje dang ni no
277b6(rgyud): dang // bden bral dang ni thags bzang sa ras// gau re la sogs pa'i gad ni// bo swa bzhi ba par mdzad nas ni// dam du mkhyud cing 'o mdzad pas// bcom ldan gus pas mchod nas ni/ 
277b7(rgyud): bdag med ma yis sngags zhus so// bud med rnams kyi dbang byed sngags// de bzhin gdug pa sdig pa dang // klu rnams bsdig par byed pa nyid// lha dang lha min rnam nyid pa// de ni
277b8(rgyud): shad bya yis// mA mo bde ba sbyin pa nyan// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// bdag gis gzhan du ma bstan to// 'di la sngags kyis gang byung zhing // rdo rje sems dpas ga
278a1(rgyud): mdzad pa// lha mo shin tu 'jigs pa ste// ngo ma mchog pas khyod la bshad// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa yi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni// rdo rje snying pa/ 
278a2(rgyud): dbang sbyin phyir// thig le mchog ni bkug pa nyid// bzlas pa kri yis gsal ba dang // sgra ring ba dang bzang ba yis// kye yi rdo rje sbyor ldan pas// btsun mo thams cad dgug par bya// 
278a3(rgyud): bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnab 'byor bdag/ kye'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di yi las rnams thams cad byed// reg byed rnams kyis dang po sbyin// 
278a4(rgyud): byed thig les rnam par brtan// de nas ASh+TA na nA ya bi ga ur+d+ha ke sha bar+d+ha ne/ tsa turba sha te ne tA ya/ de'i rjes su/ NiDasha b+hu dzA la/ kr-it+te dzA mA ta waM pu She ka pA lA ne ka d+hA
278a5(rgyud): d+ha mA taHkUr tsid+d+he ya ar d+hA na du dat+taM ni/ aM mA ra ye mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ gar+dz+dza ya gar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya tar+N+Na ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sap+ta sA ga rA na/ b+han+ta b+han+d+ha na gASh+Ta kA nar+tha
278a6(rgyud): nad+hAn/ ha~Mts+tsha hU~M hrIswAhA hU~M&hiha~M ha~M ha hU~M phaT swAhA/ de nas lha modadagyes nas// sle ba dang sgrub pa'i sbyong ba las// dam du 'thud dang 'o byed pas// dkyil 'i kho sringad du'ang bya
278a7(rgyud): de la ston pa che shes che// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mnyam gzhag pas// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad// 'phar ma gcig dang sgo bzhi pa// 
278a8(rgyud): kyis yang dag 'khrugs// rta babs bzho dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje srad bus rnam par brgyan// rak+Shalnga dang yang dag ldan// de nas bum pa brgyad po bri/ rin chen lnga pe bye ma bem// yang
278b1(rgyud): ni 'bras la sogs pa yi// dur khrod kyi ni so phag gam// de bzhin dur khrod sol ba yis// de dbus pad+ma 'dab ma ni// brgyad pa ze bar bcas pa pri// snying por skyes pa'i thod pa nyid// mdog
278b2(rgyud): dkar cha ni gsum pa bre// dbang ldan du ni shar b+ha// mo'i mtshams su dge slong bri// bden bral du ni 'khor lo bri// rlung du rigs kyi bdag po bra// shar srong de bzhin gri bug nyid// 
278b3(rgyud): dusbal bri ba nyid// lto ba phye byang du de bzhin no// lha mo'i kha dag dbye ba yis// phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags// dbus su thod pa dkar po yang // sna tshogs
278b4(rgyud): mtshan pa bri// de nas rgyal rgyal bum pa nyid// yol ga'i rtse mogs bzang can// lto ba rin chen lngas gang ba// sA lu skyes pas langs bkang bzhag/ mang du rab tu brjod pas ci// ji ltar /

278b6(rgyud): bzhug/ ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang // bu mo sring mo tsha mo dang // de bzhin nang po chung ma dang // ma yi spun dang skrag mo dang // de bzhin pa yi sring mo dang // rigs ma brgyad du rab tu grags/ 
278b7(rgyud): dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas// 'di rnams rnal 'byor pa yi mchod// de las ga pur btung pa nyid// des ni dkyil 'khor gsang gtor bya// de rnams rnal 'byor pas btung bya// dngos
278b8(rgyud): ra du thob par 'gyur// de la chang yang btung ba dong // sha dang sA lus skyes pa bza'// de yang gos dang bral byas nas// b+ha ga ra 'a na yang dag bya// des kyang po k+ka bzhib par bya// 
279a1(rgyud): / byug pa byung ba bya// sa / smya nas// das na m+b+ha bA // ma ldan rdzos shes pas// so pa mig / yul// de ni pom bag
279a2(rgyud): nyid// phye nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan// mtshan mo skye ba mang khyim du// slob dpon la sogs rab bye nas// dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya// 
279a3(rgyud): mchod dang bstod bshad pa// slob ma bzang pos sngar shes bya// de la de nyid bstan par bya// dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can// thams cad rgyud du sbas pa ste// mtha' yi ma tha
279a4(rgyud): phye ba nyid// rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas// de la lha ma des zhus pa// lhar skad cig ji ltar log/ gtso bo chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// des
279a5(rgyud): ma dbus mtha' med// srid med mya ngan 'das pa med// 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid// bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid// longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis la// rang gi g.yas dang lag
279a6(rgyud): gzhan gyi// mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis// de ni rnal 'byor pa yi btsir// de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur// de las ci zhig skye zhe na// gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta ba'i// lkugs pa
279a7(rgyud): lam ji lta'o// mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral dbus// stong dang stong min he ru ka/ kye rdo rje los kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // lha mo la ni dam
279a8(rgyud): cing // pol+la thod par bcug nas ni// dam du ru ma bzung mdzad nas// skyes pa'i sna ni ga zhabs nas kyang // tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// mtshan lungase na mos rma mdzad de/ 
279b1(rgyud): sbyor bde ba myang mdzad nas// phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba// bla ma thob rab na 'dod kyi mo// phyag 'tsham don du 'khor la 'dzin// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la// smod tshig mi nyan pa yi phyir// rna ba dag tu
279b2(rgyud): rnotshe 'dzin// sngags kyi bzlas pa 'gul rgyun nyid// gdub bu srog chags gsod pa spangs// phyag rgya sbyin pa sgra rags nyid// sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyas ni// rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gang
279b3(rgyud): de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas// tshems kyis ma mchub tsir nas ni// kye rdo rje zhes bya ba// lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can nyid// de la lha mo des zhus pa// gtso bo cho ga gang gis dang // 
279b4(rgyud): de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni// kye'i rdo rje'i bris su ni// byed pa bde ba chen pos gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dir ni 'dri mkhan dmatshig can// sgrub po 'ang dam
279b5(rgyud): chog can gyis ni// bri sku 'jigs pa bre ba nyid// skyes pa'i thong gnas kha dog lnga// ro yi s+tha li dri nyid kye// bre sku bla sa bre ba nyid// gang gang skud pa 'khal ba dang // gang gang ros lug 'thag
279b6(rgyud): pa yang // de yang dam chog can nges pa'i// dam tshig byin rlabs rnal 'byor pas// zla ba zla ba'i mar ngo la// bcu bzhi pa la khyim dben par// byed nam rungs sems kyis ni// chang gi btung
279b7(rgyud): bcung zad las// lus la ni raM shu ba sams nas// de bzhin gcer bur klang pas kyang // 'phags pa dang nem dag pas// de nas dram che ka rab tu bza'// bzhin bzangs skyed rje ldan pa dang / 
279b8(rgyud): gzugs dang lang che skal bzang sa// me tog bcas sheng sgrub por dga'// rang gi phyag rgya g.yon du gzhag/ ci'i rdo rje las bris sku'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas del lha mos zhus// 
280a1(rgyud): / bol+la kak+ko la sbyar nas// tshems kyi ma mchu btsir nas ni// glegs pa ma yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pas lha yis rab byer// 
280a2(rgyud): dra yis bshad bya yis// l+h+wam bskal pa chen po nyon// sbrang chen sdug tshabs nas ni// mi yis rus pa'i sgra gus ni// glegs pom sor ni bcu gnyis pa// gro Shar dam tshigs
280a3(rgyud): gyis bri// klags bam dang ni bris sku nyid// gal te skal med mthong na ni// skye ba 'drir ni dngos grub med// 'jig rten pha rol spyod yul med// yang dag rab sprin ldan pa la// 
280a4(rgyud): tsam zhig bstan pa nyid// glegs bam lam gyi spyod yul du// skra dang mtshan khung nyid du sra// b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// yang dang yang du 'o mdzad nas// bde chen mnyam par
280a5(rgyud): myang mdzad de// rdo rje can gyi bza' ba bstan// rmogs kyi dkyil 'khor bza' ba ni// nyon cag lha mo meg yangs ma// gang du zos pas 'dod don kun// sgrub pa can gyi dngos grub
280a6(rgyud): 'gyur// dur khrod ra'i bya byibs dang // de bzhin mi med grong kyar dang // yang na dben pa'am rgya mtsho'i mthar// bza' ba 'di ni rab tu bza'// de la gdon du rtag pa ni// ro yi gzug
280a7(rgyud): na dgu dang ni// yang na stag gi lags pa dang // dur khrod ras ni de bzhin no// dbus su kye'i rdo rje'i gzugs// ji ltar sngar bzhin gnas shes nas// phyogs dang phyogs bral
280a8(rgyud): dag tu yang // de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams dgod// mad mchog mal tenA ni// stag gi lags pa'i steng du bza'// 'bad nas rgyal po'i sA lu yi// bza' ba der ni bza' ba nyid// 
280b1(rgyud): der ni zos nas zos nas kyang // der ni ma mo mchod par bya// sring mo bu mo stug mo dang // gal te ma sring yin na yang // de rnams rtag tu legs mchod na// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub
280b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// skyes pa'i thod chen cha cig par// chang ni bzang pos longs pa gang ste// bla ma kha dbul skal chen ma// phyag 'tshal nas ni rang yang btung // pad+ma'i lag pas blangs pa
280b3(rgyud): dang // de nyid rkyen lag pas dbul// yang nas yang du rab 'dud pa// de ltar sgrub pa po yis bya// kye'i rdo rje las bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rnam 'byor mas zhus pa/ 
280b4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po je lta bu// kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bde basbyin pas bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu ring min thung ba min// gnag pa
280b5(rgyud): mi yin dkar ba min// pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par dra// de yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldan// rdul kyang dri nam ldan 'gyur te// ri dwags lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs// pad+ma la yang dbang mchog dri// skad cig
280b6(rgyud): 'byung // de leg pur si hA dag/ mkhas pas de bzang mtshon par bya// ud pa le yi drir 'gyur zhing // a ka ru ni nag po mtshungs// dgu zhing mi g.yo ba nyid dang // snyan par sri nang
280b7(rgyud): 'dom// sgra bzang dbus su gnyer ma gsum// phral bas pad+ma can du brjod// lhan cig smras pa'i gzugs can ma// de rnyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor bdag
280b8(rgyud): pas gsal pa// bcom ldan 'das smon lam je ltar gdab par brtse/ bcom ldan pa'adas gyes pas 'phrul pa/ rigs kyi skyed nga dmachog can// sgra med kyim rdong sto// bram
281a1(rgyud): / snying rjer ldan// skye zhing skye bar 'thung bar shog/ lag pas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol// zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang // btsun ma'i khu ba mnyam bzas can// s+ye zhing skye bar
281a2(rgyud): 'gyur bar shog/ de nas lha mo dgyes nas// tshig ni 'di nyid yang gus pa// skal med sems can 'dul dka' ba// gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
281a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// dang por gso sbyong len pa bya// de rjes brlab pa'i gnas bcu nyid// de la bye brag sla bar bstan// mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no// de nas rnal 'byor skyed pa nyid// 
281a4(rgyud): de yi rjes la dbu ma bstan// sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas// de rjes kye'i rdo rje brtsam// slob mas gus par blangs nas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// kye'o rdo rje
281a5(rgyud): 'dul ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas kha sbyar babyed pa yi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ 
281a6(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i lte ba'i rtsa ba la// brtul zhags cani co lag pas gdon// he ru ka mnyam rnal 'byor gyis// nang gi ma rungs sems kyis ni// 'di ni sgom pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas
281a7(rgyud): ni nges par 'jigs// bstan la gnad pa byed pa dang // bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig pa ni// bla mo thub pa la zhus nas// snying rjes bsad par bya ba nyid// ji ltar phyugs kyi gzugs mthong
281a8(rgyud): nas// khrag ni sngags pa nyid dang yang // 'dar ning mgo skyes grol ba dang // kha ni 'og tu rnam par sgom// de la lam du khab ni me'i// gzugs can 'jug par bsam pa ste// snying gar/ 
281b1(rgyud): byin za' sa bon nyid// dmigs nas skad cig gsod par byed// chud 'di la ni bsreg blug med// phyag rgya cing dang bya ba'ang med// rgyud chen klags pas 'grub pa nyid// bsam gta
281b2(rgyud): tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po// srid pa stod pa nyams dga' bar// gsang ba mchog ni bshad bya yis// nyon cig lha mo bzhin bzangs ma// rin che
281b3(rgyud): gzi brjid 'bar ba yi// phreng ba 'khrug pa lha mo ltos// ma phug pas ni sor bral 'gyur// phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa'o// de ltar 'khor ba 'dod pa yi// yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid// 
281b4(rgyud): dag pas ni dug tu 'gro// dag par bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rnam pa he ru ka/ 'gro ba sgrol pa'i gtso bo nyid// gang gi gzugs kyis 'gyur ba nyid// de ni nga yis smras pa
281b5(rgyud): snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la// byams pa'i thugs la yan lag gnas// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni// zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// 
281b6(rgyud): dastong pa bcu drug nyid// phug skyed kyis ni sangs rgyas lnga// bdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo nyid// sha ni puk+ka sI ru brjod// de bzhin khrag ni ri khrod ma// gdol pa mo ni khu bar brjod// 
281b7(rgyud): rkang dang tshil bu dag/ lags pa byang chub yan lag bdun// rus pa bden pa bzhi po nyid// bdag med mas gsol pa// sngags btub ni ji ltar 'gyur// gang gi sngags kyi skye bo
281b8(rgyud): las kyi dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po/ rdo rje snying po ga zi brjid chen pos bka' stsal pa// sngags ni khyod la
282a1(rgyud): / ba shang kyis//  smon rten mnan// dang po dam par mdzad sten// mad+harnams kyis byanasas// bag ses brtan stong bas sanan// don dkur pa na
282a2(rgyud): swA hA k+Shar// 'dis ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni// 'gro bar rtag tu rengs par byed// dang thar ma ge'i bdag po bzhag/ de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas// mthar na ska sgyur byas na// 
282a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed// rig byed rnams kyis dang po sbyin// dang po yi ni gnyis pa la// stong bcas mtha' ni swA hA sbyar// sangs rgyas kyang skod shes ri'o cano// dang
282a4(rgyud): num par snang mdzad sbyin// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la//  dang ldan zhing chu mas btsun// snang bcas swA hA yang dge ldan// me rnams thams cad sdang bar byed// dang
282a5(rgyud): yi ge'i dbang phyug gzhag/ lnga pa nyid kyi gsum pa la// stong pa mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan// mthar ni swA hA mngon spyod tshe// yang ni yi ge'i thu bo sbyir// hUM ni khrag dang 'dra ba yo// 
282a6(rgyud): trA theka la mtsho/ dka' ba zang ma sogs rtag tu 'khrugs// gti mug rigs na dang pyor sbyi// lce ni yang dag rab tu sbyar// mthar ni s+t+wa~M d+hA yang byas na// lha dang mi rnam pa ga
282a7(rgyud): par byed // da rnam par yang mdzu bcu// da ma nyid kyi dang y-i//  kros du gyur/ mthu gnas pa po gnyis pa lnga// de ga ak+Sha mA d+ha// bang na
282a8(rgyud): ma//  ma 'a sa/  mkha' sa mams//  mau sa // tshum nus pa sa rgya
282b1(rgyud): mthar snang swA hA spyod pa nyid// ku ru ku m+bu'i sngags so// oM ni dang po bzhi pa yi// gsum pa chom rkun ma yis brgyar// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// bi tsu badz+rA sbya ba dang // ASh+Ta
282b2(rgyud): rnams kyi bzhi pa 'o// thag sa mas rnam pa sten// sto pas mnan cing sam 'gyur nyi// swa pa li ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po zlar swA//  do tho sa pa na/ 
282b3(rgyud): mdzad dang por dz+wa la gnyis// sbyar nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ldan// g+hasma ras ni rnam par
282b4(rgyud): brgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid// lnga pa yin gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swAt+ma// phyag bzhi pa'i sngags so// dang por rnam snang dang po la// dang po na
282b5(rgyud): mos brtan// gsum pa nyid kyi dang po la// nang gi dkar los rnam par brgyan// nyis 'gyur lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis pa'i gsum pa me yis brgyar// hUM gi rnam pa gsum sbyar nas// 
282b6(rgyud): lnga pa nyid kyi gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA// phyag drug pa'i sngags so// dang po rnam snang bzhi pa yi// dang po byin za yang dag ldan// ro langs pa pa rnam par rab tun// 
282b7(rgyud): gnas pa yi gsum pa la// g+ham+ba re yis rnam par brgyan// dang po la ni dang po yi// mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang // rdo rje ba yis rnam par brgyan// k+Sha ni chom rkun ma yis brgyan// lnga
282b8(rgyud): da kyi dang po la// ur+g+ha rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha' 'grom yis brgyan// stong pas mnan ce sum 'gyur to// paT dang mthar nes hA nyid// phyag gnyis pa'i sngags sa
283a1(rgyud): bdag med dang po'i dang po dang // gnyis pa nyid kyi dang po dang // gsum pa nyid kyi dang po dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yini dang po dang // mthar gnas rnams
283a2(rgyud): kyi dang po dang // muSh+ma rnams kyi dang po nyid// dang por rnam snang mthar swA hA// grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ni 'bul mo// mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa dang // k+Sha ye
283a3(rgyud): rnam pa nyes 'gyur nyid// hUM gi rnam pa gsum dang ldan// dang por rnam snang phaT nyid kyi// rnam pa nang bcug mthar swA hA// sa sbyangs pa'i sngags so// dang por rnam snang de rjes su/ 
283a4(rgyud): rdorjemA li mtha' ru hUM// bza' ba dang btung ba byin gyis brlabs pa'o// dang por rnam par snang mdzad nyid // ro rjes a kA ro mu khe// uSh+ma rnams kyi gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa/ 
283a5(rgyud): yi bzhi pa ni// steng du me yis rnam par brgyan// d+harmA NA de rjes rdo rje ma byin la dwe rut+tA rA t+na ta/ oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so// kye'i rdo rje las
283a6(rgyud): sngagasab tu babe le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas chom rkun sdom gcig pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byas gsungs// bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas// bzlas pa'i yul ni rab tu
283a7(rgyud): dbye// shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid// dbang la tsan dan dmar po nyid// lung tang gis ni mngon spyod nyid// ne raM shus ni ldang ba la// rta ye rus pas skrod pa nyid// bram
283a8(rgyud): rus pas 'gugs pa nyed// glang po'i rus pas char ba la// ma he yis kyang bsad pa la// rengs pa'o ma'i btung ba nyid// dbang la rang ge 'dun pas spyad// bas pal ni
283b1(rgyud): se hA nyid// dgug pa la ni bzhi mnyam nyid// sdang la sA lu skyes pa brjod// bskrad pa nyid la ka bar brjod// yang na mtha'i shwa dang / dang po'i shA dang / na dang po dang / ga dang po dang / 
283b2(rgyud): dang po nyid thang de bzhin no// kye'i rdo rje las bzlas pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// kye'i rdo rje lang ma 'khyud cing // tshems kyis ma mchu btsi ra nas ni// lus can rnams kyi rigs
283b3(rgyud): gzugs// de la bdag med mas zhus pa// b+ha gar ling ga gzhag nas ni// 'khor lo'i 'dren pas 'di skad gsungs// lus can rang gi rigs bshad kyis// shes rab pha rol phyi
283b4(rgyud): nyor// bud med dam ni skyes pa yi// gang gi srin lag rtsa ba la// rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa// mi bskyod pa yi rigs mchog nyid// rnam snang mdzad kyi 'khor lor 'gyur// dpag med ma
283b5(rgyud): kye'adam skyes nyid// rin chen 'brang ba'i rin chen nyid// las kyi rigs kyi ral gri nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang nag po che// de yi lha ni mi bstong ga/ rnal 'byor pa gang dkar po che// 
283b6(rgyud): de rnam snang mdzad// rnal 'byor pa gang sngo bsangs che// de yi g+ha ni don yod nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang ser po che// rin chen bdag po rigs kyi lha// rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dmar nyed// 
283b7(rgyud): 'od dpag med par rigs kyi lha// rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser// de ni sems dpa'i rigs su 'gyur// skye bo rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas// nga rgyal mi bcag tho ma tsam// 
283b8(rgyud): gzugs su gnas nas ni// de rnams bde gshegs rigs su 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyid 'di// ji ltar smyos pa de bzhin no// kun rdzob tha snyad tshul las ni// 
284a1(rgyud): / su 'ang de 'gyur ro// b+ha gar ling ga'i 'o mdzad nas// de la rdo rje che mnyes nas// bdag med ma lis go mdzad pa// lha ma rab tu mchod pa nyon// tshal dang skye bo med gan pa
284a2(rgyud): dang // bdag gi sus ci nang du yang // gcer bu phrag rgya che bas nas// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// 'od 'byung ba byas nas ni// de bzhin b+ha gang reg pa nyid// skyes pa
284a3(rgyud): gnab pa nyid// ma ma chu'i snying ci btung ba nyid// rtag tu mos pa'i mtshan ma las// bol ldan pas lag pas bya// phyogs dang brgyags bya ba dang // de bzhin shin tu dkal ba yi/ 
284a4(rgyud): pa yang po 'dod pa bya// stang dang 'og tu lta ba nyid// dngos grub rgyas pa thab pa ste// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de lag pu rabatung bar bya// de lag pa
284a5(rgyud): shan bza' ba nyid du bya// khyad par du ni chang nyid do// kye rdo rje las lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor ba don tsala'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje car kyis dbang // bzhi pa
284a6(rgyud): tshogs bcad bka' stsal ba// rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid// tshe dang dril bu chen po bzung // de ring rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur// skyob ma bsdu ba nyid du kyis// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
284a7(rgyud): byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba// bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// sems ni rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro// l+h+wa mo dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma// sna tshogs gzugs can ye
284a8(rgyud): ma// khyer cig khyer cig sems dpa' che// khyer la mchod pa dag tu gyis// ye shes 'di ni chos phra zhing // rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil lto bu// rdul bral thar sbyin zhi ba nyid// khyod rang
284b1(rgyud): de yi pha// rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags ne/ oM pad+ma su khA d+ha ra ma dA ra ga su khaM dang tsa tu rA na rA b+hA ga be shrad+d+he trAM trAM kAr+ye pu ru Sha me// oM badz+ra ma hA dwe Sha tsa tu rA nan+da dA ya ka/ kha ga ma
284b2(rgyud): khaika ra sa nA thA hrI hU~M hU~M kA r+yA kAr+ra Sh+Ta me/ spyi bor ni oM kye rnam pa/ hU~Mng gar ne hU~M 'i rnam pa/ ze 'bru la ni AH rnam pa'o// rnyed kyi rgyal po chen po skye ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag
284b3(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis las phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyis bdag nyid kyi'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang
284b4(rgyud): lo ts+tsha ba dge sdang shAkya lo shes kyis bskur cing shus te gtan la phab pa/ slar yang laM tsA ba bzhon nu dpal gyi 'gyur chad bsams shing dag par bgyis pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ A
284b5(rgyud): nai badz+ra bany+dzar ma hA tan+ta rA dzA kak+ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rtul po chen po'i brtags pa/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// nam ma
284b6(rgyud): bcas dang ba dang // go skabs med dang 'byed pa dang // sna tshogs rdo rje gzhig nas khang // sems can khams dang yid khyong dang // sems can snod dang 'jig rten dang // sa dang sa 'og par snang
284b7(rgyud): dang // yid dang lus dang ngag dang ni// gcig la gnyis dang mkha' bde dang // drug dang lnga dang drug gnyis dang // skye 'gro rnams ni bzhi po dang // gcig gis nyi shur 'tshang ba dang // kham
284b8(rgyud): gsum ma lus pa dang ni// pha dang bu dang ma mo dang // phyi rol dang ni nang dang dam// btsun ma kun dang chos dang ni// thams cad las dang bdag med dang // 'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba zhes// bkra
285a1(rgyud): / bya sa'i thabs rdo rje dang // de bzhin kun gni rnam shes dang // chos kyi dbyings dang ma byung dang // mkha' la khams dang rang dbyings dang // bdag med pa dang bdag ces dang / 
285a2(rgyud): dngos po med dang dngos med min// bde ba can dang gru gsum dang // a skyes dang ni skyon bral dang // rdul bral dang ni sdig bcom dang // dpa' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin dang // mtha
285a3(rgyud): ba'i bde rig dang // gsang ba mchog dang dgyes pa la// sangs rgyas kun kyeb sems dpa' ni// mkha' 'azhom pa rdo rje gur// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lha bdag po gcis pa
285a4(rgyud): nyid// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje// las ni dkyil 'khor lngar gsungs pa// rdo rje can dang phan pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid nyid//

285a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// skam pa shags pa ma nyid dang // dol zlum ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin// me tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char// rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// nyi lag ma dang mar me ma// ran
285a7(rgyud): chen sgron mgog lag ma/ lA s+yel sogs mtshams char ro// pad+ma chos 'byung lcags sgrogs dang // 'akrung ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du// gling bram stsogs mtshams kyi char// 'das
285a8(rgyud): nyid ma byed sbya bas so// ta ma rnam pa dkyil 'khor // rdo rjen phyogs lnga sogs// ma dang ni gas 'dzin ma// de bzhin ma tshams su spyan sa sogs// rdo rje mkha' 'grod rnams pas
285b1(rgyud): rkang pa g.yon ba rkyang pas gnas// snying gar g.yon bcangs sdigs 'dzub ste// kha don sna tshogs cher 'bar ba'o// shin tu zhe sdang zhe sdang che// gau rA la sogs rab tu grags// shin tu
285b2(rgyud): gti mug rmongs chen las// skam pa ma sogs cher bzung ngo // shin tu gzi brjid cher gsal ba// nyi lags pa sogs rab tu glags// shin tu 'dod chags chags chen las// par
285b3(rgyud): chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o// phrag dog chen po sgrib chen las// sgo lcags ma sogs myur 'gro ba dag/ rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni// gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad// rdo rje nyis rgyal
285b4(rgyud): che// rnam par rtog pa'i rab rab 'phrog/ rta mgrin 'dod pa chen po ni// 'dod chags can gyi byang chub ster// rdo rje 'gyogs 'gro phrag dog che// theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs/ 
285b5(rgyud): sems dpa' rgyal po che// mi spyod ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas// skye 'gro ma bzang mgron gnyer phyir// sgrib pa lnga ni 'joms pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo/ sa
285b6(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ne sdang gti mug nga rgyal drang // 'dod chags ser sna se bo rnams// bsdu phyir rang ka 'khor lo la// rdo rje gzugs ni dum 'dzin// shin du sdug pa drag po la// zhi ba nye
285b7(rgyud): mye sbyar te// 'ad mkhyen rje can chen no// rang gis kyi mi rdo rjer 'gyur// shin tu stong par zhe ni rnams kyi// yod min brtul phyogs 'dzin rnams kyi// sangs rgyas gti mug spyod don du/ 
285b8(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs chos 'gyur// shin tu rgyal gdugs rnams kyi// sra 'gro' nga rgyal zad par mdzad// rdo rje rjem bdag nyid rgyal// dargyal cher po'i mun pa 'jams// byang chub chags
286a1(rgyud): / bral las skyes spangs// sems can gang zhig bde byed pa// chags pas byang chub 'grub phyir// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gam
286a2(rgyud): shing // gang zhig lam gnan nas 'gro ba// de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir// rdo rje mgyogs 'gro rang gtso bo// dbang po gang dang gang yam nyid// de dang de yi ro bor 'gro// mchog tu phan
286a3(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// gang dang gang gi dngos po yis// skyes pa rnams kyis yid sbyor la// des na de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// sna tshogs gzug
286a4(rgyud): ji bzhin no// gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yis/ sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste// de dang de yi rnam pa yis// chos kyi bshad pa bya ba'o// sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i// sems can sna

286a6(rgyud): mongs dug ni thams cad 'phrog/ gal te stong pa thabs yin na// de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// 'bras bu cu las gzhan min phyir// thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin// lta ba rnams la
286a7(rgyud): rnams dang // bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyis// bdag zhen bsam pas bzlog pa'i phyir// stong par rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// de phyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes// thabs ni bde ba'i sdom

286b1(rgyud): de ni thabs kyi gzugs can no// thams cad kyirnam pa mchog tu/ ba sams can 'jug pa'i le'u sgo dang po'o// // de nas rdo thabams gsum thog// rnal 'byor pa ma rdo rje kur//

286b4(rgyud): rten rjel dbul// kha che rdo rje snang ba la// bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad de// hUM rdo rje las byung ba'i dri// 'di rnams dri yi rab sbyor bas// dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob po// chab khab rdo rjer

287a1(rgyud): // mo'i sa// sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag nas ni// bdag gis rnal 'byor rab tu bskug// de rje'i dbang po sngon po ste// zla ba chu shes thub

287a5(rgyud): blugs nyid// gnyis po dag gis phyag rgyar sbyor// zhabs g.yon rkyang bas pang dag gnas// cung zad mche bas 'jigs par byed// mgo bo'i phreng ba'i rgyan mchog ste// mgo 'dzings

288a1(rgyud): / ri// sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang du byed// bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' ba'i// dngos grub gal te mi ster na// de tshe mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yis// sangs rgyas rnams ni drag

289a1(rgyud): / rje mig yon po// smod pa pos ni rab gsungs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang che// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs// 'dod bzhen pa 'jig rten bdag/ ser sna rdo rje snang byed

290a8(rgyud): dzes pa'i rdo rje dang / rol pa'i rdo rje dang / shin du dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin du dga' ba'i myu gu'i rdo rje dang / pad+mo rdo rje dang / pad+ma myu gu rdo rje dang // a la la rdo rje dang / 
290b1(rgyud): rje dang / ye shes pa dang / yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang / yan lag med pa'i rdornga dang / shes rab myu gu'i rdorje dang / snying rje mu gu'i rdo rje dang / dam par dka' ba'i rdon dang / shin du bde bar da
290b2(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs ni rdo rje dang / 'bebs pa'i rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i rdo rje dang / shes rab rdo rje dang / pha rol phyin pa'i rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ni dag pa'i gnas su phyag rgya chen po
290b3(rgyud): grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i ming 'di rnams yin no// bud med rnams kyi 'byung ste/ rdo rje nyims ma dang / rdo rje mtshon rdzas dang / rdo rje yi 'i bde ma dang / rdo rje bdag med ma dang / rdo rje spyan mo dang / rdo rje 'kha'
290b4(rgyud): 'gro ma dang rdo dkar mo dang / rdo rje sgyu sa dang / rdo rda'ab ma dang / rlo gyi khris shing dang / ro rjem gyogs ma dang / rdo /  gas rna~M tra dang / rdo bskor ba dang / rdo rje 'ding bu pa dang / 
290b5(rgyud): gaskyem dang / de sa dang / de klang ma dge de byes dang / dza ng+tha dang /  'byung ma dang /  rkyen ma dang / rdo 'dod tshigs sa ngas las dang / rdo gal pa dang/  dwagags pa dang
290b6(rgyud): paklogatu /  su ma g-i gags da / de rnam pa min ma smon rnams kyi// ma de bzhin gshegs pa mam kyis dz+nyAn k+Sha /  sa dang / 
290b7(rgyud): snyi chen po dang ni rang bying dang / rdorje sen rnams pa'i khro ba dang / de bzhin du pang da 'i khro ba nyid// rdoji bdud rtse bdud rtsi thabs snang dang / nye ru ga dang steng rje'i stobs nyid do// teg pa dang ni gti mu
290b8(rgyud): rjedang // rnam par snang mdzad dang ni thams cad skyob// sgyu 'phrul dang nod nas yo ma nga dang // khru 'ardo rje rab kyi grags pa dang // sa snying da de gte mug chen po dang // gshin rjeg shed dang thoba'i dbang gyu/ 
291a1(rgyud): / dang // de bzhin gshegs da ba thub pa dang // sas rgyas zhes byang rab tu grags pa'o// ji nyes de nas rin chen bdag/ de bzhin dus chen chen rnam po nyid// de dgar
291a2(rgyud): brjid dang ni rgyal ba ni// rdo rje bdud zil gnon dang snang byed do// rta mgrin dang ni 'jig rten bdag po dang // rdo rje chos dang spyan ras gzigs dang ni// pad+ma ga dbang dang ni 'dod chags dang / 
291a3(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon por rab tu grags pa'o// dam pa'i rta dang rta'i rgyal po dang // bdud kyi rgyal po de nas lcags rgyal dang // dam tshig rdo rje dang ni rta mchog dang // de bzhin du yang las kyi rdo rje nyid// don
291a4(rgyud): pa dang po bde ba chen po'o// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dam tshig sems dpa' nor bu ni// 'di rnams rigs ni drug tu brjod// 'dod pa'i thar pa rab bsgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
291a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // rdo rje snying po mngon byang chub// brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po nyid// bla ma'i brtag pa gnyis pa ste// rdo rje gang ni gsum pa'o// bzhi pa sna tshogs
291a6(rgyud): brtag pa ste// rdo rje brtag pa lnga pa yi// brtag pa drag pa stobs po che// brtag pa bdun pa me g.yo mgon// brgyad pa gzungs kyi brtag pa ste// mkha' 'gro Ta ru kukle dku// bcu pa 'dul ba'i
291a7(rgyud): brtag pa ste// rnam par snang mjed bcu ga cag la// dngos grub brtag pa bcu gnyis pa// sgrol ma'i brtag pa bcu gsum pa// rdo rje phags bcu bzhi pa// bco lnga pa ni kazi brjid che// bdaka
291b1(rgyud): sed brtag pa bcu dkru pa// gshin rje gshed kyi bcu bdun pa// hUM mdzad kyi ni bco brgyad pa// dbyangs mdzad can ni bcu dgub// sbyin bsrel brtag pa nyi shu pa// rab gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig
291b2(rgyud): pa// dpal 'khor chen po'i brtag pa ni/ tsa n+de gnyis sa 'dod// ga pa'i ga pa nyi shugs pa/ nyi shu bzhi ba ste gon ginas// mngon par rtog pa nyi shuH// de bzhin phyag nyi shu drug
291b3(rgyud): pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// klu ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// gar gyi dbang phyug brtag pa ni// sum chur gcig med sum cu pa// brtag pa sum bcu par ni bshad// stong phrag sum cu'i grangs kyis na/ mkha' 'gro/ 
291b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gros rnams kyi// 'bum phrag lnga yi na mtsho che// kyis rdo rje 'chang gi ni// nAd ni ye ma rgyas bstan pa// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye rdo rje// dag pa'i snying po yongs su bzung / 
291b5(rgyud): 'gros gzung sa pa rtse// 'do ni rgyud ces nges pa'o// sa rjenal 'byor chud// dang por myal ba rnams rjes bshad// phyinas rnal 'byor ma chung sa// de nyid 'ad med bcu phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das
291b6(rgyud): sta na thos pa las bsdus pa lags/ bskal pa bzang po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang sa ma'i skye bo rnams tsho byung bar 'gyur na/ ji ltar na de rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ ji ltar na de rnams
291b7(rgyud): ma par gyu/ nga lta na sems par rgyas/ bcos ldan sa rdo ltar na skye ba pa la bam zla ba u/ ji mdzin pas bka' a pa/  sh+le gang da slong poni dpa' su phyi
291b8(rgyud): rnams sa babagyung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang gang dag spyod pa pa de rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dgas sa'i skye bo nams phrog chags gas par 'akrung ba
292a1(rgyud): / dang / gang dag bud med kyi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dod pa la zhen par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir chud rnams thams cad rgyas par bstan par ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan
292a2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gsung rdo rje thos nas mnyes par 'gyur nong dkris pa brnyes nas tshig 'di gsungs pa/ snying rje chen po kye'i rdo rje// da ni dur
292a3(rgyud): kro chu 'gram dang // nags tshal bye bo med krung du// bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// mtsho skyes rnam pa'i 'gram yid 'ong // sku gdung zab mo'i mchod rten dang // rkang 'thung
292a4(rgyud): pa'i 'og tu ni// nga ni sangs rgyas dngos grub ster// tshong dus tshong rdal nyid dang ni// tshong dus rnam pa'i khyim du ni// rdo rje nyi ma bstan pa // bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// kla gar
292a5(rgyud): rab tu 'chang ba dang // chang 'tshong ma yi khyim du ni// 'di ltar pad+ma kar mkha nang // bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// rtag tu 'gro mgyogs non 'gyur dang // des dka' lam du 'gra
292a6(rgyud): na// ta ni don yod bstan par// dngos grub rdo rje rnams ster ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen chen po mkha'i 'gas rdo kur phyag tu rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bkra
292a7(rgyud): phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang dag par bshad pa// gsung thugs kyi brtag pa las// phyag rgya rnam gsum shes par bya// sku la laka pa'i phyag rgya yin// sngags bzlas pa las ngag phyag rgya// sems
292a8(rgyud): mtshon ma'i phyag rgyas sa// de nyid 'asam gtan dkyil 'khor lalo// lag pa gsas na bskam pa ste// g.yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no// mkha' 'gro ma la ma 'jigs ma// gdug pa rnams kyi
292b1(rgyud): 'khor ba 'dor// g.yas pa'i lag na zhugs pa ste// gdugs pa rnams bcings rnam par dga' de 'di zhags pa ma zhes bya// g.yon pas gdug pa sdigs 'dzub ma// g.yas na nya N+Da zlum po ste/ 
292b2(rgyud): gdug pa rnams ni dkri bar 'dod// 'di ni rtag tu dal blu ma bshad// g.yon pas sdug pa snga/ dzub mdzad// lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu ste// gdug pa rnams ni dgug par 'dod// 'di
292b3(rgyud): mar bshad// g.yon pas bdud la sdig mdzub ma// lag pa g.yas pas nyi ma ste// gti mug mun pa rnam par dal// g.yon pas sdig mdzub mar ni bshad// de ni rdo rje nya mar brjod// laka ka
292b4(rgyud): mar me'i sdod snod de// de bzhin g.yon par sdigs 'dzub po// 'di de rdo rje mar mer bshad// rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'joms// lag pa g.yas na rin po che// sems can rnams la sbyin pa ster// g.yo
292b5(rgyud): na sdig mdzub 'dzin pa mo// rin chen skon pa 'di rab brjod// glog ni lag pa g.yas pa ste// rnam par rtog pa'i chu 'dzin 'joms// de 'di klo ka lag par shes bya// de bzhin g.yon pas sdigs mdzub ma/ 
292b6(rgyud): lag pa g.yas par pad+ma ste// pad+ma'i 'dod chags brjod par bya// g.yon pas sdig 'dzub ma nyid de// 'di ni mkha' 'gro'i pad+ma mar brjod// g.yas par b+ha ga'i pad+mo ste// bde ba chen po rnam par 'phel// gso
292b7(rgyud): na sdig mdzub mdzad ma ste// 'di ni chos 'byung mar ni brjod// g.yas pa'i lag na lcags zlog ste// byang chub rten pas kun 'chang ba// g.yon na sdig 'dzub mdzin ma ste// 'di ni rdo rje sgo/ kla mer brjod// sa
292b8(rgyud): rjes chags 'tshong ba pos// bdag nyid 'gyud par 'dod pa ste// byang chub chags pas rab bskul pa// de 'do rje 'byud par bshad// g.yas pa'i lag na ga phyogs te// ye shes kun gyi srung ba
293a1(rgyud): // mo// gson na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di de rdo rje zho lugs brjod// g.yas pas lag tu lde kyog ste// ye shes blangs nas gcod pa mo// g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa
293a2(rgyud): mo// 'di de rdo rje lde kyog brjod// g.yas pa'i lag tu sgom ni// ye shes skyes pa ma spangs pa// g.yon na sdug 'dzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di ni rdo rje sgo mar brjod// lag pa g.yas par yol ba
293a3(rgyud): ni// rang mtshungs btsun mo bsrung ba nyid// g.yon na sdig mdzub 'dzin pa mo// rdo rje yol ba mar ni brjod// de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' 'gro ma ni dam pa'i tshogs// mkha'
293a4(rgyud): 'gro lnga ni rab bsgrub phyir// mkha' 'gro ma 'i rgyud gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje'i gsung thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ bco
293a5(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag rgya 'phrog pa 'di ci nyi tshe ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya gsungs pa lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal ba/ 
293a6(rgyud): com ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i lung bstan pa yod de 'di ni de'i yin te/ DaM baM hA ya sa ga ma
293a7(rgyud): de'i skad kyi dbyings 'dir rnam par brtags pa ste/ thams cad kun du nam mkha' spyod par grub pas 'di ni mkha' 'gro sor rab tu grags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams
293a8(rgyud): datshig 'di thos nas dga' dang mgu ba nye bar skyes par 'gyur ba dang tshig 'di gsol pa/ e ma mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud// rgyud kurna las ni bye ma dang // rtogs sgra rtogs par dka' ba dang / 
293b1(rgyud): rig dang mi rig pa nyid pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskul ba'i phyir 'di
293b2(rgyud): skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di la rdo rje kur chud ce rgyal po chen po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bsdu ba ban
293b3(rgyud): byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ sgong las skyes pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pangs srid pa las bskal bar bya'o zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i byang chub
293b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs na/ ci'i phyir na srog chags rnams gsad pa dang / gcig tu 'dod pa'i btsun mo rnams spangs legs/ lta ba rnabs las logs rnams dang // btsun mo rnams ni bsdu
293b5(rgyud): ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro ma'i rgud bshad do// bde ba'i thabs ni mdor bsdus pa// gzhung nyung don ni rgyas pa ste// blo dman rab tu sad byed pa// rgyud kun gyi ni snying por nges// sngags rnams
293b6(rgyud): khyad par du'o// rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'di ni bshad pa tsam gyis ni// bdag med rnal 'byor ma nyid kyi// sngon du gar gyis mchod byas nas// rang gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs
293b7(rgyud): pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // gal te rje chos dang na// tamachog rdo rje nyi ma yang // bdag gis spangs me 'grub ste// de nyid sengs rgyas thams cad / sa kye gzugs kyis brgya
293b8(rgyud): byed// de rnams kyi ni mangs mang // de la nga ni dngos grub ster// mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang // ral gres 'og bsgrub pa dang // ri lu la kha' la spyod pa dang // mi snang ba dang bcud kyim len// rig 'dzin
294a1(rgyud): / 'khor los bsgyur nyid dang // bu mo dam pa dkrug pa ni// bdag mnyes pas ni bsgrub pa pos// dngos grub rdo rje rnams 'thor po// spros pa rnam pa mang por ni// smras
294a2(rgyud): pas 'dir ni ci zhig bya// bdag spangs nges par mi 'grub cing// byang rgyud med cing bsgom pa med// she/ d+hA/ tu bdug dran ni // ga tu sto/  mas pa dang // sngags
294a3(rgyud): ba dang // nga'i sku ni bsgom byed pa// gal te sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sam// gal te rmi lam 'dra bar bas// shin du bsgom pa'i rim pa las// mngon gsum du ni mthong bar 'gyur// gzugs par
294a4(rgyud): rab tu sbyor ba las// de yi dngos grub sbyin par bya// rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas// shin du bde chen sbyor ba las// gang zhig bdag la 'dod ster ba// lus can de la smos ci dgongs// gang zhig nyi ma
294a5(rgyud): bsgom po// rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba las// shes rab phyi rol byin dngos grub// ster de 'di la the tshom med// bdag nyed te ru kar byas shing // rang gi btsun mo rang bsgoms nas// gang shig rnal 'byor/ 
294a6(rgyud): 'dod pa// de rnams la nong ma nyes 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan k+Sha ldan zhing // slob dka' bar ldan pa dang // klu dang rob sgo'i rnam pa dang // 'did gur bde basprob dang // snga tshogs sgeg pa
294a7(rgyud): ldan pa dang //  tshogs rol brgyad bdung//  tshogs gos ni n+tan//  rmug sa sa b+hag pa yis// gang nig bdag dang TI rtul ba// de sbe dngas grub sted papa lcug cha chen po'i gnas
294a8(rgyud): / deng 'dod la gyur to// se ma mo sa she mra m+b+hi TI seM sa seM ma yin ni/ ga she 'as skyed pa rgyam 'i yod ma
294b1(rgyud): ba yang dag par gnas kyis 'dug go// rdo rje ma ni shang du sbyin par bya'o// lho phyogs su ni dkar mo'i gzugs can ma'o// nub phyogs su ni chu'amakha' 'gro ma'o// byang du na rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o// 
294b2(rgyud): dbus su bzhag ste snying po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig bsam par byed pa'i de'i bdag mdzes ma ste/ phyag gnyis ma nul gcig me'o// gri gug dang skyes pa 'thod pas bral ba// skrag gi
294b3(rgyud): pabagos pa/ spyan gsum pa/ sgra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag rgyalasu rnam par brgyan pa/ shar gyi skor na dkar mo chen mo'o// lhor ni chom rkun pa'o// nub phyogs kyi skor ni chu ma'o// de bzhin du byang du ne b+haH/ 
294b4(rgyud): 'o// dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI'o// 'tshed ma'i mtshams su ni ri khrod ma'o// srin po
294b5(rgyud): dge 'dag rab tu 'i sgom par byed pa de'i lag mthel du phyin pa'i dpal lus kyang dbrog par mi nus so// thams cad kyang kha dog nag por mtshungs par rab tu son pa'i steng du gar dang bcas pa 'am
294b6(rgyud): na mo dpa' mo// gasngon kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkha' 'tsho ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ rig pa'i dbang lang dag par bshad pa
294b7(rgyud): rang gi rims skyes pa'i chub// brem pa brgyad pa thams ca kyis// de rje thugs me ba bsgoms pas// rdorje can bsam dbang bskur bya// 'i ma ba bsgom pa// der ni u t+ya skyen par bya// tham
294b8(rgyud): cad sngon skye ngos bsams rnams// rdo rje'i tshig bcad sbyor ba las/ rdo rje chen brtse dgu pa// snying gar rang gi lag pas bya// slob sa 'jig rten dbang phrag byas// rdo rje sems dpas rab bsrur bya// 
295a1(rgyud): / sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni// de ring khyod ni dbang bskur 'gyur// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// bzang bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje bzung // slob ma lcags mchog lha mo
295a2(rgyud): ni// sgrol mas 'byung bar bsam par bya// lag pas rdo rje dril 'a khrol zhing // rdo rje bdag pos dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra d+hi pa tI tramA b+hi/ Shany+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma pa ste/ slob ma rnam snang byas
295a3(rgyud): nas ni// ming gis kyang ni dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra sa twa tAmA b+hi Shany+tsa mi badz+ra nA mA b+hi She ka ta/ kye che ge mo rdo rje/ gang gang kun gyi rang gtsor gyur// de de bdag nyid he ru ka/ sangs rgyas ye
295a4(rgyud): shes 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyagan gnas// rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag
295a5(rgyud): tu zung // oM sarba ta thA ga tha ta sid badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha sA d+hA ra yA mi hA hi he hi hi he hUM/ kun kyang cho ga gcig pa yis// rtag tu bla med mchod pas ni// slob dam rdo rje brtul zhugs
295a6(rgyud): sbyin// phyis ni rdo rje lag nas lag/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po// kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag/ yang ni de ring dril bu sbyin// shes rab pha rol
295a7(rgyud): byon skyes pa'i// rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba// sems can kun gyi don tu phyir// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// rgyal bas byang chub mchog
295a8(rgyud): brjod pa// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung // dbugs 'byen thams cad byin nas ni// shAkya thub par rang gyur pas// slob ma chen po lung bstan to// sangs rgyas nyid du the tshem med// 
295b1(rgyud): khyod ni 'chi 'jigs mya ngan med// de bzhin nad dang tsha ba med// bde chen theg pa chen po ni// di las ngalal khung bstan bu// oM ma Sha/ he bA ka ro ma hA badz+ra sa twa sta thA ga tA/ sred pa'i ngan 'gro/ 
295b2(rgyud): las bskal te// shin du srid pa'i dngos grub phyir// kye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa yi// yid ni rdo rje shes byar 'gyur// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rig ma chen po'i dbang gi mitshig
295b3(rgyud): bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ston pa pos// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba gton to// tshig 'di bkang phul pa// bla ma rdo rje dam mchod cing // bdun pa rnam
295b4(rgyud): par dag par bya// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su// chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par bsgom// de la sangs rgyas gnas bsams nas// rnam pa lnga ni bsgom par bya// dang po skyes bu 'asam de nas// 
295b5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro// dri ba mnyam par zhugs pa ni// khu bar rjes su dran par bya// 'tshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya// 'khor lo'i 'dren pa bskul nas ni// mig la sogs pa gti drug
295b6(rgyud): sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// phyi nas rjes chags rdo rje ste// be shes rnam par gzhug pa dang // dbang ni rig ma brgyad rnams kyi// yang ni bdud ci myang ba dang // lha mo brgyad kyis mchod
295b7(rgyud): pa nyid// 'khor lo'i 'dren pa bstod pa'o// rang byin brlab pas byin brlab te// de la yan lag dag bsgom bya// phye nas yang ni dam tshig gi/ cho ga'i go rim rim pa yis// mtshan ma yang dag
295b8(rgyud): mtshan par bya// dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa dub 'dra ba yin// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin// bzhi pa mar me nyer 'bar ba// lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ste// sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba nyid// 
296a1(rgyud): / de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyud// dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ba yin// phyi nas rgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar// rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur// khams gsum rgyu dang mi chu
296a2(rgyud): ba'i// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// 'jig rten khams na thams cad du// ji srid rdo rje'i lus can rnams// ye shes phung po'i blo ldan pa// de mo rjes su thams cad 'brang // ji
296a3(rgyud): srid skye gnas las byung ba// khams gsum la ni nyams dga' bar// phyag rgya chen po rab sbyar bas// de rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 
296a4(rgyud): chog gi rdo rje rnam thos nas// dga' zhing rangs par gyur nas ni// smra ba'i rdo rje mdzad par ldan// rig ma chen mo bdag med dang // rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag dang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal
296a5(rgyud): na dang // rta mchog thub pa chen po dang // rdo rje nyi ga gzi brjid che// rta mgrin mnga' bdag chen po ni// sku gsung thugs ni nyid dang yang // lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur// lan cig rkyal
296a6(rgyud): po ston pa yis// 'phral du mngon sum byed pa po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te tshig 'didra
296a7(rgyud): / gsungs so// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa// zhal brgyad pa la stobs po che// phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan// dbang po sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzi brjid chen po zhabs bde
296a8(rgyud): sgeg cing khro ba'i gzugs can te// stsol krung byed pa'i gar gyis gnas// rus po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ne nag po ste// dkar po dmar pos rnam par brgyad// lhag/ 
296b1(rgyud): ba'i nal ni nyung ba bzhin// bdud bzhi mnyam por mnan pa ste// spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ der ni rdo rje mdog nag po// 'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya// dbang bsrung ba yi gnas nyid du// sang
296b2(rgyud): k+Shas ni rnam par brgyan// glang po te bong glang nga mo// me dang par b+ha bya'o// g.yas pa'i rtsod pa brgyad du na// gnyam 'a klung la sogs rim shes bya/ sa dang rgyo dang rlung dang ni// drod dang // ba nyam nyid// mtha/ 
296b3(rgyud): byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// skyes bu chen pa bzhengs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gti mug rdo rje mig la dgod // zhe sdang rdo rje rna pa la// sar sna 'dang chags
296b4(rgyud): / rig dang bdag med bsgom par bya// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin// sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid// lag pa gri gug thod pas brel// srog song du ni yang dag gnas// sa spyod mkha'
296b5(rgyud): dam nyid dang // de bzhin rkang 'og gnas pa mo// 'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// gnas gsum du ni gnas par bsgom// oM mdzad rgyal po chen po ni// sku la rdo rje rnam par brgyan// thugs
296b6(rgyud): tshe// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na bzhugs// a ni mchog gi de nyid de// ngag ge lam ni gas la byed brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yin// chos can las ni rigs gsum 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil
296b7(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par// dkar po gzugs can bsgom par bya// lcags kyu sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo// dkar mo rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dmar po'i
296b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// chom kun ma yi gzugs can bsgom// gcim gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// rdo rje nag pa mtshon chen mo// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ro langs ma ni
297a1(rgyud): / khrag dang mchungs// rdo lcags sgrogs dargyal byed// byang chub 'ching bar mdzad pa mo// 'od byed dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// de nas g+haswa ri bsgom bya// rdo rje bri brus
297a2(rgyud): lag pa brel// mar gang ud pal 'dra ba'o// rdo rje sgo skyong ma rdo rje brtson ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mtshams su lha mo bzhi rnams ni// cho ga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// byang sems
297a3(rgyud): bum pa ri rab dang // me yi thab kyang rgyal mtshan che// phya bcas gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// mgon pa de ltar bsgom par bya// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas// dpa' rlabs med
297a4(rgyud): pa'i bde ba 'thob// 'byung ba bzhi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyi dam pa ston pa po// thams cad kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ 
297a5(rgyud): dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ hUM las byung ba'i klo bo ni// rtag tu zhe sdang ldan pa'o// nang du ma rungs sems kyis ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// na maHsa man ta bud+d+he b+ho// na mo badz+ra munar
297a6(rgyud): sA ya tsan+da lAk+She ba ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ de nas 'dir khro bo chen pa bshad pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzegs shing 'dar bar gyur nas mnga' bdag
297a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa dren par byed de// skyes pa'i pad+mags chags med// srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis pa// rig ma ba ni yi rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun ci rab tu dgang // nang rjes rdul gyi
