297a8(rgyud): ba yis// rkeng pas gnan cing bsdigs par bya// sku gsum bskyed pa'i bsgom pa las// bu mtshan modakrug par bya// gshin rjegashed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa
297b1(rgyud): d+hIb+h+yo// ma hAdan+ta d+har bi bai d+ha s+'u R+sha ma d+hA na b+hUn+d+rer+m+ma tha d+d+ha phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bshad pa las byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan na / 
297b2(rgyud): kyang 'dar bar gyur cing de dran par byed do// 'byung po yi dgas sha za nyid// mkha' 'gro kul bum zin pa la// hUM gis dreg byas phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje btsi rabs bde ba nyid// gzhan gyis
297b3(rgyud): pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud d+he b+h+yo// hu lu hu lu/ ma hA pad+ma a mr-i tI ku ru ma dA bi ShA na AHba tsan dug chen po dgug par bya'o// brgyal ba bskrad pa de bzhin no// pa
297b4(rgyud): drag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na ma \u0f7fsa r+b+ba bud d+he b+h+yo// na ma badz+ra kr-id+hA la ma hA de Sh+Ta~Md+hA Ta b+hai thA le/ badz+rI sa n+do nI la oM apr-i ta kuN+Da lA~M hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po bklags
297b5(rgyud): 'joms rdo rje bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams med mi dga' bar gyur to// rlung gis bteg pa po dang / rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming pyang
297b6(rgyud): bzung ste// tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod cing hUM phaT ces bya ste/ hUM gi nga rgyal byas nas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa/ khro bo'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas
297b7(rgyud): rnams kyang smod par byed do// rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// shin tu log par gsang bar ni// bya ba 'di ni rab bskul bar// ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste// nyi ma bdun gyis 'grub
297b8(rgyud): 'gyur// na maHsa man+ta bud d+he b+h+yo// oM ya ma daN+Da la nI lA ya/ nI la dasngal tu ru hu ru lu ru mu ru sar+b+ba duSh+TA na mA ra ya mAr ba hU~M phaT// de nas khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po skyes bu chen po bshad/ 
298a1(rgyud): / pas sems can thams dang / sangs rgyas rnams sogal te them du gyur to// bcu phrag brgyad bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang shin du bsgom pas spor ba'i tshogs bskul ba
298a2(rgyud): las gdug pa thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur ro// dbyig pas gnan pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud d+he b+h+yo// na mo ma hA ba la ya/ uts+tsha sh+ma ha
298a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba na gA ne hri da yai tA Da ya hUM phaT/ de nas gtum pa chen po bshad pas dug gis gdong 'jigs shing bral ba dang / skrag cing 'dar bar gyur te/ stobs po che dran par 'gyur ro// 
298a4(rgyud): stobs kyi spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsan+ta bud/ d+ha b+ho// na mo a tsa la ka Na tsan+da tu mon+da mon tur+thak+Sha k+Shak+Sha ta yag+hA ta ya hU~M pa gde nas khro'o chen mo me g.yo ba
298a5(rgyud): skyes bu chen po bshad pas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin chen po brtul te sa la 'gyel to// 'das ni khro bo'i rgyal po yis// seng ge zhon pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las// skye
298a6(rgyud): po dang ni lha rnams khrag/ oM sumA ni sriSh+Te huM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ihA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya to b+ha ga wa nA bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ rdo rjes 'og gnas pa yis// khro bo chen po bshad pa yis
298a7(rgyud): lha min bu mo kla mor bcas// nu ma 'dar zheng nang pa 'am// rdo rje zhags pas nges btsongs te// lcags kyu yis ni dril nas ni// sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis// bu mo thams cad
298a8(rgyud): dbug par byabya// 'jig rten gsum dkrug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje chos ni chad sbyin no// rdo rje sems dpanga' char mchig ste// de rje nyes dge 'dun che//  mtshag tshogs ni
298b1(rgyud): chen po dang // phan pa'i yang ni char sprin gyi// zhags pa lcags kyu'i bsgom pa yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgugs brjod na// so so bye bo sdos ci dgos// rang gi rig sa skyes bu bsams// 
298b2(rgyud): gsum rdo/ sa rnam par rgyan// lcags kyu la sogs sbyor ba yis// bu mo dathug la bza' bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chen pos dgug pa'i dam chog bka' stsal to// na maHsa many+dzu
298b3(rgyud): / oM Tik+ki hU~M dzaHkha ta dang ne btsag la yang // rdo rje lugs kyu'i sbyor ba las// zla ba nye bar chags dus su// khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya// mang ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang // brgyan gsal bar
298b4(rgyud): pa yis// sgra ldan gnas med dbang po drag/ chung mar bcas pa dgug par bya// dam tshig gi lcags kyu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan sngags dang ting 'dzin gnangs// rang gi rig pa
298b5(rgyud): skyes bu bdag/ dgug pa'i gnas su gzung bar bya// thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// na maHsa pan+d+ha bud+yAd+hA nA~M/ nAm s+pho mAn+tad+harmANAM/ nu mardzas man+ta sa b+hA r+tha/ oM s+yet+te ta pra tA/ oM ba mal/ oM shA kar/ 
298b6(rgyud): e pra d+hi / e ba dzA mrat+te/ tsakra mren+tes na sarna la kamA ma n+tar rmA Sh+ThANan spel ni brasam kyi nyim ni kan cid kyi te ts+tshin d+d+ho/ tsau tsir/ gli ker/ myur mar
298b7(rgyud): hU~M hrIn+d+he/ phaT phaT phaT/ bdag nyid bsrung ba'i sbyor ba la/ spyir ba rgyud sogs gzhig pa la// dbang bar reg pa gdags byas ni// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'da' mi nus// tshwa
298b8(rgyud): po'i'akhor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dben pa'i nags tshal nyid du yang // yid gnyis thams cad rnams spangs la// rnal 'byor mchog ni 'di bsgrubs na// thub pa gzhan du mi 'a
299a1(rgyud): khro bo chen po 'khor ba'i snying po'i sngags la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i be'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs// kun mkhyen
299a2(rgyud): ye shes las byung ba// yang dag nges par rab tu dbye// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te// rdo rje sems dpa' reb bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bskom bya// sangs
299a3(rgyud): / rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te// rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas// 
299a4(rgyud): 'dod chags rdo rje rnam par bsgom// sems can gzugs brnyan rnam bsgoms te// rta la don yang rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor rnams
299a5(rgyud): bsgom bya// thams cad rnams kyi sngags 'di yis// snying kar ye shes gnas su dgod// ye shes sems dpar rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// rang sngags yi
299a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang // phyag brgya dang ni phyag mtshan brtag/ spro dang bsdu ba byas pa ni// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'byung gnos nyid// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams lan dbul
299a7(rgyud): bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rgyal ba ni// rdo
299a8(rgyud): rjen ma snang mnga' bdag nyid// dril rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la na dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni// rin chen phung po rab tu grags// rol rnam gsum
299b1(rgyud): rang shes nas// lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya// da bcom ldan 'dod chags nyid// rngo chos na de bzhin gshegs// rag sa rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ 
299b2(rgyud): bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod 'bras bu ster ba po// gsung ba'i dam tshig dbus gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor ldan pa sgom par bya// lnga lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes lngani
299b3(rgyud): rnam par bsgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan// 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu khyab// sna tshogs las ni byed par brjod// thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba
299b4(rgyud): yis// rdul tshon gyis kyang bri bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// phung po lngar ni rab tu grags// sangs rgyas mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// shar gyi char ni rab tu grags// g.yas
299b5(rgyud): sra rdo rje nyi ma yi// nub tu 'dod chagos rdo rje yi// byang du rta yi rgyal po yi// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' pi// shar du dkar po chen po ste// lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan// dmar po nub kyi cha
299b6(rgyud): du// kacod ni byang du yang dag ldan// mtshams kyi tshor ni thams cad dang // sgo yi logs dang la phubs su// rdo rje chen po rnams kyis brgyan// sna tshogs snang ba rnams kyis mdzes// sangs rgya
299b7(rgyud): makon po gang nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'gyur ba ni// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor brjod// snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor re re bsgom pa 'am// yang na bsdus pa
299b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lo// brgyad brgyad dbus su gnas pa 'am// yang na ke shu r+ya lnga ru// gang tshe dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yi// sgor ni lcags ku zhags pa dang // lcags sgrogs de bzhin rdo rje nyid/ 
300a1(rgyud): / 'jug pa'i sgo srungs dgod par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdus pa chen po'i dam tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// don dang bya rgod de bzhin pas// sdug glang ba chen dang
300a2(rgyud): ni staganyid dang // spre'u dang sna 'thung ba glang mche// rdo rje chos kyi g.yas na'o// khwa'ug chu skur seng ge dang // mtshor gnas de bzhinar dang ni// ri dgas pag dang yang dag ldan// g.yas man pa
300a3(rgyud): tu gnas// rma byam he chu srin dang // nya yi rgyal po ru sbal dang // 'og gi rlung dang rang skya dang // re bong phan pa'i galas pa na'o// sbal pa thu bo sprin shushes kyi// kha chu mig sman mtshungs byi ba// gal
300a4(rgyud): dri ldan de bzhin bshad// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// kar NA dang 'khor lo dag/ lug dang tsa kor dang ni// bye khwa hor krarol pa dang // ku reng nyi la'i g.yas na'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang / 
300a5(rgyud): rigs ldan pad+ma bad bzang dang // 'dzag pa nor rgyas mtha' yas ni// rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon na'o// gza' la la phur bu mjug rings dang // skra gcan mig dmar ba bsangs// spen pa khya
300a6(rgyud): rgyal nyid// g.yas pa nyid du rab tu grags// dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin // 'dod lnga de bzhin thod pa can// gcer bu dang ni thags pazung des// stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon ma'o// rdo dang dbugs dang banan/ 
300a7(rgyud): bo'og/ khong skam mdze dang rkang shu dang // mtshan pa mtshar ba'i rang bzhin yang // glang po la sogs rab tu grags// lcags stegs dang ni rjed byed dang // khrag rjogacod nad rgyal po dang // gzhang 'brum sman dang
300a8(rgyud): bkres na dang // meg ser ngom la sogs pa'o// rje sa byid nga ponod dang // mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin drung // bdag na 'dzan dang bus skam dang // spyan 'a 'bras nem byas gol// nanga' ba'i tshis da
300b1(rgyud): rlig sbyangs dang // sum 'phel dang gapud pa dang // tshad pa rims dang rapa gas ni// kar Na ra sogs rab tu grags// rlung ma khris de bzhi na ma zhug// snyib g.yogs rab rib gcan sri ba// gnog phyed na
300b2(rgyud): dang ka 'bras dang // rlung byas gza' lag la sogs pa'o// me la 'gro bdam pa ni// rab mchog des tha 'grob// thams cad ma kyis sgrub ma na nas// sangs rgyas snar ni che grags pa/ 
300b3(rgyud): ge lus la gzhug par bya// sems can rnams la gdungs mgyur// nad rnams gi phyir sangs rgyas na// glang po la sogs nad 'dzin to// de ltar bsgom par gyur ba la// nad med ru dza drang kram med// 
300b4(rgyud): 'chi med nges par bye ta med// nga rgyal med cing gti mug med// bkres pa med cing sgom pa med// sdug bsngal ngan 'gro de bzhin med// lha dang lha min mi rnams sa ma// gang gis kyang ni nad byed min// nang
300b5(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhib dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin po'i rgyal po lus thams cad 'dzin pa po mkha' 'gro ma'i yid 'phrog pas tsheka 'di bka' stsal pa/ 
300b6(rgyud): sems kyi rjes dran dmigs nas ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom// sems kyi rin chen bsams nas ni// chos ni rjes su dran pa sgom// lus rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'khor
300b7(rgyud): lo chen po rab bskom bya// rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab ste// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdag/ rdo rje rnam snang bsams
300b8(rgyud): ni// phyag rgya ba sgoms pas phyag rgyas gdag/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen phung po rab bsgom bya// chos kyi phyag gyur ba sbyor bas// las kyi rdo rje phyag rgyas gdag// ni sdang rgyal pa rgyal po tsho// rkyen
301a1(rgyud): rnams thams cad zad par mdzad// spro zhing bsdu bar bsgom par bya// bsdu ba yang ni yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas mgon po rab bsgobs na// sangs rgyas sbyin
301a2(rgyud): kun tu khyab/ sgo dong bsdu'i 'arnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas byang chubar mi ba sgom bya// sems noroni chen rten pa rjes// bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad// sems kyi char sprin sbyor ba yis/ 
301a3(rgyud): yang ni bsdu pa bstan par bya// chos kyi rgyal po gti mug che// spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can de// thun tshong bzhir ni byin brlabs pa// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sems
301a4(rgyud): / ni 'grom kyigs ltar bsams nas// gzhal med 'bras bu stsol ba'o// rta mchog char sprin chen po las// bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba
301a5(rgyud): dam tshig chen po di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyi ma'i dkyil la khor dbus gnas par// sems kyi rnam pa bsgob par bya// rnyog med dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sku yi yaM ge rnam par bsgo
301a6(rgyud): khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par// gsung gi le ge rnam par sgom// lus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 
301a7(rgyud): don yod mi ge'i gzugs can te// sku gsum mi phyed pasgom pa yis// ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo nam snang la// rin chen sems
301a8(rgyud): pache// pad ma pazang po'od pa ma dmar// shes rab ram gri don yod kyi// shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin gyi// rnam tog rib bcang nas ne// phyag rgya chen po ldan par 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba/ 
301b1(rgyud): skyes par ni// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// ngan pa dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang // rin chen phung ma 'od chen dang // chos kyi phung po mgon chen dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje las/ 
301b2(rgyud): tshogs 'od zer cher 'bar ba// sangs rgyas sprin gyis rnam par brgyan// nam mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yas
301b3(rgyud): thams cad du ni sna tshogs gzugs// mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya// mtshams kyi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bya// dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi// ye shes rje
301b4(rgyud): chen po'abar// sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pas// skad cig lani gnyis med 'gyur// ru da kA dang drang byase ru// bu li 'tsho ba bang 'bras dang // pra he ga la sogs bye ru sogs// bsam
301b5(rgyud): gtan ldan pas sngags bzlas bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // mkha' bgro ma dang rang btsun mo// mngon sum du ni bya ba'i phyir// sngags ni spyan gsan 'bebs par
301b6(rgyud): per na skyes chen la la shig/ skad kyi ngos bos pa na// thos pa tsam gyis 'ong 'gyur ba// de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs// 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang // nam mkha'i khams
301b7(rgyud): kyis pa'i klong du// phyag rgya chen po'i bde gnas kyi// gal pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// de rnams sngags reg drung na gshegs// rdo can gyis rnam par gzigs// gang gis
301b8(rgyud): sngags kyi rim tho ba// se ma de yis byang chub khol// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / sngags kyi spyod pa dang bar 'dzin// da rje sngags ni spyo pas// mtshungs pa med
302a1(rgyud): pa'i ye shes 'thob// de ltar shes pa'i sangs rgyas te// sngags kyi spyod pa'i rim gnas pa// 'bras bu nyid la mi gzigs te// de ni sangs rgyas mnyam par
302a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas nga rgyal dmigs nas ni// chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba// gang zhig bsgom pa de bas na// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur// 'jig rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te// de
302a3(rgyud): ltar chos ni rnyog med pa// sems can khams ni de ltar bshad// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// ngan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// sems dag pas
302a4(rgyud): ni dag par 'gyur// ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'jig pa// nam mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems// sems kyi rin chen bskul ba las// sems nyid bsgom pa bangs rgyas te// skye bar sangs rgyas
302a5(rgyud): dam pa nyid// rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i// sangs rgyas med cing gang zag med// rnam par shes pa'i gnas don nas// phyi rol gyur pa cung zad med// yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad
302a6(rgyud): / khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po che// sems gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya'i rang bzhin te/ 
302a7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni mchog tu zhi// 'di ni rin chen sems su 'arjod// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid// 'di dag thams cad sems las skyes// thub pa'i
302a8(rgyud): gzhan mi 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu na pa che// 'dod yo 'bras bur bster ba// sems kyid nyid rang bzhin dag/ sangs rgyas byang chu 'bras bur ster// de nyid phyir na sngogs rgyal kyis/ 
302b1(rgyud): ses dang 'asrub pa pa// nam mi rnas pades ldan pa'i// byed par dga' ba'i dngos grub ste / de rje sams dpa'i snying po sdong ba'i ma'u ste drug pa'o// de nas du chen padang carnam par gro ma'i bur
302b2(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas gnas nir 'ardzogs dang / rnam pa lnga po bsgom pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin dang // rang gi lhag pa'i/ 
302b3(rgyud): bsgrub dang // dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang // mchod bstod bdud rtsi la sogs pa// rim pas rjes su bsgoms par bya// rnal 'byor yan lag drug du 'dod// mo sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+he She ka ta badz+ra swa b+hA la gar+tha
302b4(rgyud): / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// oMs ba ta thA ga ta ma mr-i ta ska ba dras b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas de ska
302b5(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// yos rbA ta thA ka ta u te bdus b+hAb At+ma ko te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oMs twA ta thA ga ta bu du badras pa pa ya
302b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa do rnga ta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM san ta thA ga ta a ru rA ka Na badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpang de bzhin gshegs pasadas
302b7(rgyud): / rnas pa zhesadus pas/  rna pa daH/ sa gyis legs baspyad pa//  ngas rgyas gnas s+ho/ \u0f7f// mos tagag tam nal la drus
302b8(rgyud): sa sum du rgya ma / me mes masan la/  nyid kyis so//  sa la
303a1(rgyud): / gnal las gnas dgod bya// do lta ba mi byed byed// des na mi bskyod pasgom par bya// sa skyes rjes su dran palas// rnam par snang mdzad par pa nyid// rin cechen rnams kyi
303a2(rgyud): mchog gi mchog/ 'di ni rin chen sems su bshad// rdorje chos ni rgyal po che// 'dod chags mtshan nyid 'dzin pa las// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas bdug pa'i// sems ni 'dod chags shes byar bshad ka
303a3(rgyud): phyir 'bras bral mi 'grub ste// de phyir don yod rab tu grags// rig ma mdzes ma do rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste/ gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes
303a4(rgyud): // ji ltar lus ni de bzhin gshegs// dkyil 'khor dam pa bris nas ni// dam tshig khu ba'i cho ga yis// he dang bsam gtan bskyed byas nas// de tshe dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya// mkhang 'gro lnga dang ldan
303a5(rgyud): dang // dam ga sa mas bka 'dang // mkha 'grom ma tshogs ldan pas// slob sa do can paskur// rje pon pa spyong bas// rang gi skrag pa'i lta byas nas// sro sa dag par nges pasam kyi
303a6(rgyud): rigs kyi ming gis ni// slob ma rdo rje can dbang bskur// sbyin dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang // dkar mo la sogs bdag gzugs kyi// rdo rje btsun mo basbyor bas// do bla med bshad par bya// bla/ 
303a7(rgyud): na med pa'i de nyid 'di// gnyis su med cing yi ge med// chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal byed// bde ba bzang po'i ro myang gis// sgrib pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ga dang ha zhes bya ba dang / 
303a8(rgyud): dang po mthar yang shA ldan pa'i// rab tu gsal bar dam pa nyid// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// tshogs rdo rje bdud ci myang // 'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor
303b1(rgyud): / da dza dang ni mnyam par gyupa// nad rnams thams can rab tu 'i// de ni gam brjid lngas can 'o// 'jig rten kun gyi med 'phrog sa// phas kyi gos bkun las rgyal// 'jig tan thun gyi bdag bsong rgya
303b2(rgyud): lha rnams kyis ni 'dren par brjod// mkha' 'gro lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur// chos kyi bas ni bab bo// dam tshig chen po'i bsam gtun zos pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mi bskyod brten pa'i nas
303b3(rgyud): // nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs// rtag pas mdangs ni chen por ldan// de rje nyi ma la sal pa med// dor chos ni bsten pa yis// pradra med kun la longs spyod do// don yod rgyal ba chen po na/ 
303b4(rgyud): rje srog gi yan lag 'byung // don kun sgrub cing dpal dang ldan// des ni rnal 'byor par ni brjod// mi bskyod btur ba'i sbyor ba las// stong phrag lngas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur// phan pa yis ne khri ru lnga
303b5(rgyud): rje nyims rdo rje'i 'brum// tshe dpag med kyis dpag med dang // bdun gyis nam mkha' ji srid bshad// rdo rje nyi ma dpag medo dag/ 'khor ba'i sgrub thabs ca ba nyid// 'di dag bsten pas rnal 'byor
303b6(rgyud): pa// kun du bzang 'o 'dra bar 'gyur// shes rab pa rol phyir ye shes// 'di ni rdo rje nyi mar 'dzod// chos rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med// sangs rgyas
303b7(rgyud): nyid ste// thabs dang shes rab 'phel mdzad pa// khams gsum dag ni thams cad du// sa dang sa 'og par snang la// khrag dang khu bas khyab pa'i lus// rigs kyi dbang phyug gas 'di gsungs// 
303b8(rgyud): mo pa su de bzhin gshegs// khams dang khub snad mtha' yas// pags dang khrag lagazi brjid che// tshil dang rkang la rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad mgon po rnam snang mdzad// rtsa dang shal bdun kyas
304a1(rgyud): nyid// sgrol la rlung ni rnam dag pa// rdo rje btsun ma po ni rnams ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya'o// gud kyis de rnams bka' stsol to// sngags thams cad rnam par dag par bdud rtsi lnga mchog tu byung
304a2(rgyud): bdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te le'u bdun pa'o// khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rnga longs skyong ba// thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas// khA yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa// puk+ka sI ni bdag la myur
304a3(rgyud): du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten don gyi phyir// stong pa nyid spangs skyo ba pa zhes par mdzod// khyod ni gti mu ka darnga yongs spyod ba// sku yi bdag po chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// lha li
304a4(rgyud): lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa// mgon po ra khrod ma la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni 'dod chags
304a5(rgyud): / gsung dag legs par sa sor rtogs pa yis/ lha lo lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ gtum par ldan pa bdag la gzigs par mdzod/ rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyi
304a6(rgyud): spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs spyod ba/ gzugs kun nan tan thams cad mnyam nyid kyis// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa// Dom pa bdag la mgon
304a7(rgyud): myur du ga zigs/ rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du/ stong pa nyid spong skye ba ba zhes par mdzod/ thams cad bzhengs par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'khor lo can rnams thams
304b1(rgyud): / des ni baspyad par 'gyur ba na// shes na gyis bya// dbye paya bdan pa / aHA ga tas can bangs rnal swAHk+Sha wa kata hAN+Da
304b2(rgyud): te/ oMs ba ta blag ta pA dz+wal gAs ni 'dras thAl At+ma ko te/ srug sung thugs kyi chos rnams kyi// byin pa rlabs gnas su btag par de// ye shes dong can gyis bya// 'di ni byang chuba'i ma skrun la
304b3(rgyud): ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor bas// U li rin chen sbyang bar bya// bsam gtan rdo rje bsams nas ni// sems kyi rin chen rab ska
304b4(rgyud): byed// rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis// ngag gi rdo rje dri ma med// gti mug rdo rje rab sbyor bas// mig gi rnam par shes pa spyad// zhe sdang rdo rje bsam pa yis// sgra yi sgor ni bsam pa'o// sna ni ser sna rdo rje
304b5(rgyud): ro drug 'dod chags rdo rje yis// lus ni phrag dog rdo rje yis// yid ni kun du bzang po yis// de nyid mkha' 'gro bdag med ma// 'di rnams kyis ni rnam par spyad// gal te 'gal ba yod pa ma yin yang // 
304b6(rgyud): pa'i dngos po spyad pa yod// kun rdzob bden par yang dag gnas nas ni// 'khor lo gzugs kyi chos tsam rnam par bsgom// chos kyi dngos po ma byung spyad pa las// gang zag thams cad rnam spangs 'jig
304b7(rgyud): 'jig rten 'gro bar bsam par mi nus te// chos kyi tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dag/ tshig pa rnams kyi gdung dang dug khyab pa'i// lus kyi sman ni bzhin gyi duganyid de// ji kur mun na par zhugs pa la/ 
304b8(rgyud): yang de rgyun thabs su 'gyur ba nyid// de ltar rung gis dkrugs pa'i sems rnams kyi// de bzhin mkhas pas yon sran gre'u bzhin// 'dod chags kyis kyang mongs pa yi// skye bo 'dod chags me yis
305a1(rgyud): gdung // 'dod chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten pa// 'dod chags med pas zad par 'gyur// 'dod chags rdo rje longs shes pas// yid ni rdo rje sems dpar 'akar// 'dod chags
305a2(rgyud): zhags pas 'ching ba yis// 'jig rten chags pas khyab par brjod// 'dod chags bral ba'i mngon byang chub// 'dod chags mthar phyin rnams mi 'dod// de nas de rje slob ma pa// sgrub thabs skyen
305a3(rgyud): sregs las kyi ni// tshogs 'dod don thams cad ni//  ba thabs yang dag rab bshad bya// de la 'di rnams ni sngags kyi rkang pa yin te/ na mo tA tra yA la/ an sa Ar+tha ba lo ki te shwa rA la/ 
305a4(rgyud): ya/ ma hA satra ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ i tA re sarbe duSh+Tan+ma ma kr-i te dza~M b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hU dz+dza hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta swam+b+ha ni
305a5(rgyud): par// la mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya// phyag brgyad gas ni bzhepas// rgyan rnams kun kyis rnam par brgyan// gsar gyi kha dog 'dra bar bsgom// gnon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar// dong nyi bas da
305a6(rgyud): bskur ma// sangs rgyas bzhi yid la sngan can// yang tshol ni bab pa'i mus// g.yo bgasar gyen chas// sna tshogs bad+ma'i gdan pa bzhugs// 'od cir dmar pos rnam par btsun// de rje zhags
305a7(rgyud): pa de bzhin dung // g.yas pas mda' ne 'gengs pa'o// de rdza lpags ga ung ba la// sdigs 'dra ba g.yon pas mdzin pa mo// rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis// gnas gsum pa ni bsgrub par bya/ 
305a8(rgyud): shar du me tog sgrol ma ste// kha dog dkar shing yid 'ong ma// yi ge oM las skyes pa'o// me tog phreng bas lag pa khyab// phyag gnyis zhas ni gcigam nyid// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
305b1(rgyud): g.yas su bdug spos sgrol ma ste// mdog gnag mdzes pa'i gzugs can ma// spos dang dung gis lag pa brel// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// nub tu mar me sgrol ma ste// dmar
305b2(rgyud): dus lag pa khyab// mdog ser rnam par rgyan chen po// g.yo gser gyi nacham// byang du dri la sgrol ma ste// dri yi dung gis las khyab pa// khrag gi mdog ltar lha mo ni// dkyil 'khor snying po bska
305b3(rgyud): par bya// lcags kyu la sogs par dbye bas// der ni sgo yib spangs ma bsam// steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma// 'og tu gnod mdzes ma rab bsgom// 'khor lo klu zhags bsnams nas ni// 
305b4(rgyud): sngags ni bzla bar bya// oM t+pa re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// yi ge bcu les lha mo bcu// bar la phyin bcu la gnas ma// 'bras bu thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// rab tu 'bod pas bsgob par bya// sngags ni
305b5(rgyud): mchog dang phul du phyin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad ma// klags pas 'gyur byed drag pa ste// rdo rje kur gyis bshad pa'o// sngags 'dis gos kyi zla bar bdun// mngon par bsngags pa bya ba ste/ 
305b6(rgyud): gdud pas brjengs te nags tshal du// 'gron 'ang sus kyang me 'khyer te// stag dang chom kun dang tA srin snang 'thungs dang seng ge dang sbrel dang mche ba can dang ma he dang / ngos dang sdug glang la sogs dran pa tsAH
305b7(rgyud): kyis nyams shing yib bo// sngags 'dis ud pal la sbyin sreg ji srid du/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad ji tsam gyis bsdu bar bya ste/ oM tA ra t+yat+ta re tu re a pra kaM me wa sha sa ma na ya swA hA/ yang sngags de nyid kyis/ 
305b8(rgyud): khwa'i sgrol lan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su bzlas te/ dgra'i khyim du sbas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed/ e tA re tut+tA re tu re tsa la pra tsa la shI g+h+raM gA me ni de wa dat+taM uts+tsha nA ya hUM phaT/ de nas gzhan
306a1(rgyud): yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+hA nAM ka mA ri ma h+ya krang+ga he ne tas+yAHbita pra lats+tsha tu me swA hA// swa tshil dang gtum pa'i sa bon dang / myos byed dang a she ka
306a2(rgyud): lo ma dang / me tog bsreg thogs pa zhing / mar dang srang kyi bu ram du bcas pa stong phrag lnga'i spun sreg ni bu mo dngos grub la rab tu bsngags te/ nyi ma bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas rang
306a3(rgyud): pa'i bra mo thob bo// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re Na re a mu kA b+hi d+ha ne swas+thAn ta a kar Sha la man+ti ke dzaHsngags 'das pa da ra'i tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog dang
306a4(rgyud): gas te bsreg blugs bya bar brjod pa 'di byas pas skyes bu spyod pa rnams kyi bu mo yang 'gugs par byed de// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das
306a5(rgyud): phag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig lag pa lcags kyu dang / ud pa la dang zhags par bcas pa rnam par bris te/ de'i mdun du mchod pa byas te/ me tog 'di rnams bzang zhing dge/ zhes bya ba la sogs
306a6(rgyud): pas mchod nas phyi nas bsgom pa dang ldan par sngags bzlas so// oM tA re tang+ka re ta re a mu kI ma sebs te sa paM na ka tha la hUM phaT/ stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// zhags pas bkrin par bcing
306a7(rgyud): lcags kyur drangs nas bslab bya rkang ba'i 'og tu bsams te/ rol mo'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyang bar 'gyur ba skol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par sngags par ba ste
306a8(rgyud): bdag giseg gshes mig phrad myos basmra bar bya byas pa'i rigs kyi drung du badrug par byag// de nas rgyal bslab pa dang 'dra bar zhus par byed cing 'gal bar byed pa dang / bka' drin grol nas
306b1(rgyud): bong brjod par byed pa dang / bran du yang dag par 'gro gang khros pa yang dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ di ni mngon sum du mthong ba dang ngo mtshar dang bcas pa'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba skol
306b2(rgyud): gzungs lan brtsa rtsa brgyad bzlas te// la gnyis pa'i so ga thal bar byas la// ba kha dog dmar mo'i mar dang // a ka'i shing bal las sdong bu rab tu sngar mig sman ba sdu bar bya'o// mig ska
306b3(rgyud): pa dang // rdo rje chos dag mnyes la rdo rjer mchog gis bdug par bya'o// thal ba dang lhan cig mig la bslu bar byas/ rdo rje mig gis gang bltas pa de/ gal te pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug mi 'ab
306b4(rgyud): bdag sgrol ma lags te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dkrongs pa lags so// 
306b5(rgyud): bangon par bsngags pa byas nas bung ba'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang / ba lang gi gi thang lhan cig byas pas dpral bar thig le yongs su bzung ste/ gang bzlas pa de dbang du byed do// de nas gzhan yang snang
306b6(rgyud): bar 'byung ba lto ba'i srid bu pa gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags pa bya ste/ rdo rje dang lhan cig sa ces byas la byin te/ sbyong ba mchog zos pa na ma spong ba dang / gzhan du me dka' ba dang / gzhan du ma
306b7(rgyud): ba dang / rang gi bdag po yang spong ngo // de nas gzhan yang sbyong bar 'gyur/ ba mar khri ba chen pos nye bar byugs la/ sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas bde bsgom par bya'o// bzlas pa'i mthar sA
306b8(rgyud): btags pas 'dag ku'i dre ma la khu ba byas te/ gang la byon pa de lnga por yang mi spong ngo // de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla ba la nye bar chags pa'i dus su sgrol ma gzungs zlos shing bsnyen
307a1(rgyud): ba byas la de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs te/ dung gi thal ba dang mnye bar bya zhing rab tu grags ma nyid la sbar te/ ji srid du lnga por yang rjes su 'brang ngo // 
307a2(rgyud): gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrob ma'i gzungs kyis ma ngan pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu des te mgrin dang / lhan cig pas bskus na dbang du 'gyur ro// 
307a3(rgyud): tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu ka s+ya ban+d+han k+Sha ma ku nu muHswA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di arka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming nang du bcug par bris la ne'u le'i khung bur sbas na bcings pa las grol bar
307a4(rgyud): kyar ro// de nas shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa'i 'byung gnas yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya'o// gang gis bsgom pa tsam gyis phas kye rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// 
307a5(rgyud): mo phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig ma/ sku mdog dkar ba yid 'phrog ma/ pA phyed du li ba/ chu skyes shin du dkar ba la yang dag par gnas ma/ lag pa g.yas par pad ma mdog dkar ba yang dag
307a6(rgyud): par bsgoms shing / g.yon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdo rje skye la krungs su gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o// oM las
307a7(rgyud): sam/ mchog tu dga' bar byed ma/ dam tsheg sems dpa' bskyed nas ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya da rnab 'byor zla ba drug du goms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dra
307a8(rgyud): / mtshan mo bdun du spong bas bstan bcos thams cad shes par byed do// 'bug bzlas pa'i sbyong bas nyi ma re nge la tshigs bcad brgya brgya byed par 'gyur ro// rab tu 'bad pa med par
307b1(rgyud): gsung brgya yang 'dzin par byed do// de la sngags kyi rkang par gyur pa/ oM bcu bcu prad+d+ha ban+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dral me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri prad+d+ha ban+da ni swA hA/ kham zar ba na/ sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par
307b2(rgyud): bsngags par byas te/ ma bsrungs pa'i sengs po skar bo srid zla ba drug dgang 'thung bar shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// de yis snre
307b3(rgyud): bsten pa'i sngags/ sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub// ngal zhing zab mo'i chos dang ldan// rig pa kun la mkhas dang bcas// sbyin bsreg dkyil 'khor sngags shes shing // rab gnas gtor ma'i pha
307b4(rgyud): rol son// de nyid bcu ni rnam par rig/ nyan thos spyad pa bsrung babo// sngags spyod ram pa gus pa dang // gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba dang // dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing bzlas par ldan// ca ba'i srung
307b5(rgyud): 'joms pa'o// sngags dang lus skyeb sor ba yis// 'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed// de ldan thams bcas nas ni zhagang gis kyang ni smad mi bya// skye bo bla ma sprod pa dang // dmyal ba chena'o/ 
307b6(rgyud): 'tshed par 'gyur// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dang por mchod// rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis// de ltar bla ma'i nan tan bya// bla ba'i grib ma bad med dang // lham dang stan dang
307b7(rgyud): spyan rnams// rmongs chen gang zhig 'gad byed na// skyes pa de ni spa grir ltung // legs par dbang bskur slob ma gang // bla ma'i bka' las 'da' byed pa// 'jig rten 'dir na 'on par 'gyur// 'dzeg/ 
307b8(rgyud): rten pa rol dmyal bar gnas// g.yo dang sbru la sbyar ba yis// brdzun gyis mi rus smra ba las// long ska ma mdza dad chen pa can 'ad myal ba la sogs skye bar 'gyur// da lngar shes pa'i slos
308a1(rgyud): bsnyen pagrang pa sa skyen//  ma'i ga/ ni rang bsrungs na// dngas sgrub rgyas pa 'grub 'ang 'gyur/ chog kyabasan tag// ba las gas rab tu bsgru// swA
308a2(rgyud): 'dun chos ston bya// bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya// bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing // de yi rjes su tshogs kun la'o// bdag gi las ni brtsams nas ni// cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// yin lag
308a3(rgyud): rkyergyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// rdo rje rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma dang // me tog bdug sos mar me dang // de bzhin dri yi dung sogs ka khas
308a4(rgyud): g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod// mdun du bzed snod bzhag par bya// zhabs bsil gong ma'i cho ga yis// me tog spos sogs rim pa bzhin// lA s+yai la sogs mchod pa yis// mchod
308a5(rgyud): par byas na bzang por sbyin// me tog skar ba'i tshul gyis dang // dri ni 'thor ba'i tshul las dang // sdong bas mar ma'i mchod pa dang // byug pa'i lus kyis rjes su dris// lAs+ye'i lag pa ka s+yai ste/ 
308a6(rgyud): de bas phreng ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// kA yis hUM gi dam tshig klu// brla bsnams pas ni gar nyid de// mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// sangs rgyas rnam
308a7(rgyud): mchod pas mchod// 'dod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur// bzlas dang bsgob pa mngon dga' zhing // rtag tu 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro// de rje mkha' mgro'i bka' ji bzhin// 'di rnams bla med mchod
308a8(rgyud): pa'o// me tog spos sogs mngon sum du// 'jig rten spyod par gnas pa yis// sna tshogs mchod pa mchog nyid min// de nyid byang chub yan lag min// dkar po zhi bar byed par brjod// ser po
308b1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i sprub thabs pa// dbang dang dgug par dmar poste// tha ma'i las la nag pa'o// zhi ba la ni me tog dkar// ser po rgyas pa'i rdo rje la// me tog nag pa tha ma la// dbang dang dgugaka dmar
308b2(rgyud): po ba'ang // rnal 'byor pa gang dbang bskur med// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang // gang zhig rab gnas ma mthong dang // gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ 
308b3(rgyud): grub mchog nyid med// gang gis slob dpon gsol ma btab// 'dir ni rigs skye ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// gang gis byang chub ma thob na'ang // 'khor los pa
308b4(rgyud): gnas su de'i// skye ning skye bar skye bar 'gyur// yang nas yi bdag po nyid// dag pa'i gnas su mngon par 'gro// bde ba can dang mkha' 'gro dang // dga' ldan du ni blo ldan skye// 'jig rten
308b5(rgyud): kar 'grub pa// sangs rgyas de ni ci zhig smos// khams gsum bdag po chen po 'di// 'chi med rgas pas khyab pa med// tshangs pa brgya byin de bzhin drag/ sgra can me dang rlung dang ni// 
308b6(rgyud): dang mthong ldan nyid// 'di rnams de la 'khor du 'gyur// b+ha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha ma yin dang mi// mi 'am ci dang mkha' spyod gang // de rnams 'khor 'gyur the tsom med// 
308b7(rgyud): dbacom ldan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // 'khrungs dang byang chub byed pa dang // de bzhin du ni lhar gshegs dang // khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa dang // rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa
308b8(rgyud): sme ba yongs su len pa dang // yongs su mya ngan 'das bstan// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni// 'di ni gzugs ni du ma byed// sangs rgyas sems can skyabs bzhed pas// sangs rgya
309a1(rgyud): da sa ma da/  bong stag dang me ge dang // thang po rnams kyi rigs su yang // se rjes pan pa'i sems can// phyag rgyas grub paskye bar 'gyur// bud med skyepa sa pa ltas// 
309a2(rgyud): 'dod chags can la chos gsung ngo // bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid// sgyu ma thams cad sel bar byed// shes rab pha rol phyin gzugs su// bud med rtag tu yang dag gnas/ skam chen mo
309a3(rgyud): 'dug na// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ste/ g.yo zhing dang chen ngo tsha med// rtag tu 'dod chags pha rol 'gro/ dngos grub kyang ni rab tu ster// gzugs dang yon tan nor la yang // 'dod pa gang yang bcu
309a4(rgyud): mdo// rdo rje 'dod chags yid 'dod pas// rang gi bde ba myang bar ldan// skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa dang // bde gshegs bka' las mi 'da' zhing // bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje can// kye yi rdo
309a5(rgyud): phye ba'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma gcom dang // mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// gti mug rdo rje phyag 'a
309a6(rgyud): bstod// ser snad rjes bdag la skyobs// 'dod chags rdo rjes bdag la stsol// yid dang phrag dog chen po dang // do kun gyi dam tshig mgon// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa bo// rdo rje can kun
309a7(rgyud): par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas te/ dbyangs 'di gsungs pa// thig skud sar pa mdzes par ldan// shin du tshad ma gtsang ma yis// te zhes
309a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi// shes rab car gyis thig gdab bya// de la 'di ni slob ma chen po'i gsol pa gdab pa'i dam tshig go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// de bzhin gshegs pakun gyi
309b1(rgyud): dordorje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'dren pas bshad du gsol// dkyil 'khor kyi rje la gsel ba gdab pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nga ni snying rje spobs dpal ldan/ 
309b2(rgyud): bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyar ba po// rdo rje les ni gsal ba'i lus// sgra gsum las ni sres bsgo// gal te la la 'da' byed na// 'jig par 'di la the tsom med// lus sbal po dang kha cig gang // 
309b3(rgyud): shes 'byung ba dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes// zur la cig bgegs ni chen po rnams// 'khor la yen brgyad nyid kye// cha yis sgon rab tu grags// sgo khang lha'i snam bu ni// 
309b4(rgyud): tshad du bya// sgo yi phyed kyi cha ra nI// ya phubs dang ni 'gram nyid do// reg byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya// dra ba'i snam bu rig byed byed// dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni// gnyis par mtshams kyi thig dang yang
309b5(rgyud): gsum par ngos bzhi yin pazhi// big ni rab tu gdab par bya// tshangs theg cha gnyis bor nas ni// cha drug du ni gdab par bya// de nas sgo yi tshad bor nas// dgu yi char ni rab tu gdab// de sa 'di nis sbyar
309b6(rgyud): ba'i dal tshig go// oM khaM hUM bru~M/ de la 'di ni ye shes sman drong 'di/ oM me de n+de 'dri b+ha ba 'dra ban+d+ha hA// de la 'di ni theg gdab pa'i da mchog ste// yos ma pa sung mA ti kra madz+nyA// de la 'di ni rdul tshon bris
309b7(rgyud): dmatshig ste// 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can khams ni thang ba dbyed// kye yis rdo rje rgyal po ches// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya// dbang ldan du ne shar b+ha// me yi mtshams su
309b8(rgyud): spo bris// chos kyi 'khor lo bden bralang// rlung dung nge tho bar bya// lcags su shar du bre bar bya// gle ba sgong ni nags pa nyed// rub sgor de bzhin lcags sgrog ste// byang du dadu dril bu'o// dbus su 'ad
310a1(rgyud): ba dkar po ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bris// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos sbyin bsreg gi grong khyer rab tu lte ba// rdo rje thab khung skor ba yis// rdo rje'i bsreg ngas sbyor ba
310a2(rgyud): las// zlum po zhi bar byed par brjod// chas bar ba'i rjeng bu'i gzugs// dbang ni rlab byed pa 'dra// dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs// bsad dang zhe sdang las la de// nam mkha' khams dang
310a3(rgyud): mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin skrod byed skal ngan dang // yan lag nyams pa'i sbyor ba yis// tsan dan a ka ru shing dang // gzhan yang dri yi rkang 'thung gis// sbyin bsreg yan lag me sbyar nas/ 
310a4(rgyud): yang ni dgug par bya// oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i Shi dwi dza sat+ta ma gr-ihI tra a hu ti ma hA smin san+ni hi to b+ha wa/ lcags sgra nyid kyis dgug par bya// zhags pa nyid kyis gzhug bya zhing // ny+tsaka
310a5(rgyud): dezhabs dga' ceng // dril bu 'khrol bas dbang du bya// lA s+yai la sogs mchod pa brgyad// mchod yon chog byas nas no// mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las// yang ne me ni mnyes par bya// de la 'din
310a6(rgyud): mchod yon gyi dmachog ste/ oM pra wa ra sat+kA ra pratIts+tsha swA hA/ de la 'di ni zhabs bsil gyi dam tshig ste/ oM sar+b+ba pA pad ha na badz+ra ya badz+ra sarba s+ya sarba pA paM da ha swA hA/ de la 'di ni bsreg rdzas thams cad
310a7(rgyud): dam tshig gi sngags te/ oM bdA na la ma hA b+hU tA dz+wa pa ya/ sar+b+ba b+hasmiM ku ru sa rba duwAn hU~M phaT/ dr-i kya dzaHhUM ba~M haHsa ma ya sta ma haM/ phyi nas rang 'dod pa'i k+ka spyan drang ba ste/ oM a h+ye he b+ha ga
310a8(rgyud): dus nas ma yin mam gan sa br-i skye bu de ba sred pa/ de la 'di ni dgyes pa'i dmachog ste/ oM ga to bangs rnaMs da dung mdI ta tA la ga du klogs bud ba shi ye ba na dgas sa
310b1(rgyud): 'angs pa dang las snga tshogs kyi stong ba dang skyed pasug gisaT ska brgyad pal// danas darnga did rgyal kyis// dang sems dpa' rab gnas ni// 'jig rten bskad la gnas te// mdor bsdus nas
310b2(rgyud): de bstan par bya// dang por sheg rig ma 'dzom/ spel du 'khrol bar 'dad pa dang // gang galas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba la la// g.yas par dardegasong ba dang // srod bu gradan chug pa na// gos kyis ma
310b3(rgyud): cings pa dang // rin chen sman gyis yongs gang ba'i// bum pa sta gon gnas par bya// oM de wa bcu badz+ra ar+d+he teSh+Tha/ oM mo ta ra te a d+hi tiny+tsa/ e dwe Sha ra ti a d+hi teSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra ra ti a d+hi tiShA/ i badz+raH
310b4(rgyud): AkaR+Sha yadza.oM badra tsar bri ba sha ya tAM/ oM drab tu lde ban+d+ha la maM/ oM bad+ma g+hAs+sa rI tha shai shwa dra / 'di ni ye shes dkrug pa'i chog// shun pa sna dang babyung k+Sha// khyad par du yang dri lnga dang // 
310b5(rgyud): bshal ched du blugs par bya// mchod yon la sogs sngar bzhin bya// yang na de nyid sbyar bar bya// snga bar blugs shing byin gyis brlab// mig la sogs par gti muka sogs// rdo rje gsum ni kan
310b6(rgyud): gsum dgod// dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyis// mchod pa la sogs rim par brtsam// rang gi snying nas ye shes bsam// sangs rgyas bzhugs par bsang gtor bya// ye shes bdud rtse'i sbyor ba yis/ 
310b7(rgyud): rim pas mchod pa'i lha mo so// byang chub sems mchog bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas bstod pa yang dag brtsam// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// stong pa snyeng rje tha dad med// khyod ni rnal 'a
310b8(rgyud): yongs su bskor// khyod na nyid kyi thugs kyis mchog brnyes pa// khyod kyis rgyu dang mi rgya'i 'gro ba kun bsgrubs shing // snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can sad mdzad pa// sgyu ma'i spras pas rdo rje
311a1(rgyud): badzad pa// he drag dpa 'ardo srid kyis dgyes// rdo rje sa rgol skyong ba yis// rdo rje bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ 'do rje gi ge blangs nas ne// rdo rje dkyil lakhor bsgom par bya// 
311a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje bung pa rnam par bsgom// de nas rdo rje bachod pabs mkha rdo rje la sbyor ba las khasangs rgyas rdo rje'i rjes bcu gnyid// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bsad gto
311a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba'i rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par// rtse mo lnga pa bris pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// stobs
311a4(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas phur bus gdab// chos 'byung grong khyer yid 'ong bar// rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba las// gal te dngos grub mi ster na// rdo rje sems dpa' bsad par bya// oM du ru du ru/ 
311a5(rgyud): hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phur bus gdab pa chen po rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan pa ni rdorje
311a6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba las// pad ma dmar po skye bor 'dzin// sku mdog dmar po stobs po che// gos dkar gnyis med sbyor ba las// bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan// dbas par
311a7(rgyud): zhal ne nag po ste// g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma med// dang po dmar po shes par bya// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhig 'a rje chos ne ga'i brjid che// 'dod chags
311a8(rgyud): chen po 'dzas chags pas// bdud pa zhi mnyam par mnan pa'o// ma ma dkyil la khor dbus gnas par// do num sdang dran par bya// dbu kyan de 'dzin pa bsam// sa mdog dkar pog
311b1(rgyud): bdod tshe// phag na bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// nabs pan pa ste'angagrupa po// chos kyi 'khor lo sa bor 'dzin// 'dod chags chen pos rdzas chags pa// spyan dang gnyis med stong ba yis/ 
311b2(rgyud): ba yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// dang po nal ni dkar po ste// nag po dmar pos rnam par brgyan// lhag ma'i zhal ni bud pa mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'a khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje nyi ma rnam pa
311b3(rgyud): bsgom// cod pan rin chen 'dzin par bsam// rdo rje gzi brjid 'od pe che// phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// nabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po// sems kyi rin chen spyi bor 'dzin// btsom gse
311b4(rgyud): lhang ga ri brjid che// dang po'i nas ni ser po ste// g.yas bsngon po 'dra ba'o// g.yon ba zla 'od babang po ste// lhag ma'i nal ni byud pa mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ta mtshon
311b5(rgyud): rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan ral gri 'dzin par bsam// mar kad u ba la mtshungs pa'o// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni sngobasangs
311b6(rgyud): te// rta li gzugs te 'jigs pa bo// g.yas pa kha dog nag po ste// g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma med// ral gri dngos grub spyi bor 'dzin// lhag ma'i zhal ni bud pa mtshungs// rdo rje nyi ma hA nyid
311b7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni sgrol ma'i gzugs// lha mo rnams kyi phyag gnyis brjod// gre gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kye rdo rje sa dkyil 'khor mchog/ phan par me long de bzhin no// rta mgrin la ni gos
311b8(rgyud): derje nam la ni gser/ tam tshig sa ni 'gro ma gyogs te// mchog tu phan pa nyid kyi yon// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// blam la rtag tun du 'bul// skal pa'ang rje sems dpa'
312a1(rgyud): bdag/ skal bzang bang ba rnam snang mdzad// skal pazang dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang // skal ba zang nyi ma 'dun rgyal po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog
312a2(rgyud): do 'dzin pa pos mnga' bdag de rje 'dzin pa'i dmatshig mchog gsungs pa// eng+ga ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra ya t+ta pa/ mjam / badz+ra d+h+r-ika pa Ta swA // de nas sngags chen bshad par// dang skye bsku
312a3(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ne// de de'i dngos grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rta mgrin gyi sngags 'di
312a4(rgyud): gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra d+harmA sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hu lu hu lu/ oM A ro lag paT/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam na/ rdo rje chos ni grags chen po// 'jigs shid skrag par gyur nas ni// chos kyi dngos grub rab
312a5(rgyud): stsom// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs te/ phan pa'i sngags 'di gsangs pa/ e shA nA ta ba ra ma kA shAH e h+ye hi dzin
312a6(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin gshegs// brgyal zhing 'jigs par gyur nas ni// de rnams sangs rgyas dngos grub stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen
312a7(rgyud): lanas bya 'i ti nas snyoms pa gas// mi ku na kyimags dgasangs/ yi 'angs rgyam parnas dam ma yang skam te/ d+h+r-i kA swa d+ha/ de nas don pa shad tsas gyis/ 
312a8(rgyud): 'dzi dpa// 'angags na rgyal ba bya nas // tem ngas kyu tu stsog// danas batsham ldan 'das na pa da nga nam ngan gas/ ma ga
312b1(rgyud): gsas/  // de na na mas//  na yang nas //  gsam bya na//  padon pa
312b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zlum pos/ rdo rje can kye zla phyed mtshungs// rdo rje chos kyi pad ma 'dra// nyi ma'i yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// rta mchog ces bye de ye ne// thams cad du ni gru gsum mo// rdo rje sems dpa'i
312b3(rgyud): phyag rgya che// phan pa'i phyag cu nyid dang ni// de rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// rin chen to// gi 'od byed ma// don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya me// rus pa'i rgyan gyis brtan par ldan// stag ge pags bamanabs pa dang // dgra
312b4(rgyud): skrathod pa byed pa te// mchod par brtson pa'i sems dpa' yis// chags pas mig dmar yong nas ni// brag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las// chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// las sna tshogs bsdu
312b5(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje phyag rgya yang dag brtsam// me tog 'bras sogs kyis brgyan pa// nags
312b6(rgyud): na po yi mtha' nyid du// sems dpa' chen po 'gro bar bya// nags tshal du ni spongs mos rgyu// zas ni bzang po brgyan pa nyid// de rnams 'jigs shing sbags nas ster// nags tshal bdag
312b7(rgyud): rigs kun ni// rdo rje can te 'khor du 'gyur// skyes pa dang ni sle bkur// skye bo gang zhig skye 'gyur ba// gti mug do rje'i skor ba las// da rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// khams gsum lan nyam
312b8(rgyud): dka' bar// spu ni gang zhig rab grags pa// rna ba'i drung du gnas pa bzhin// zhe sdang rdorje'i sbyor ba las// drang srong mngon par shes pas zos// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// mtshan dga'
313a1(rgyud): kyis can nyid de// lags a b+ha drang ba zhag pa nis// rdo sems kyis shes par 'gyur// gleb kyi 'aslong drags// rang gi rigs ni song brag gce// dod skyong bas dran grang
313a2(rgyud): nyi gsum lon bdi dngan par 'gyur// su 'phrul dra ba du ma yis// 'dis ni snang bar byed par 'gyur// mngon shes lnga yi spong ba yis// sangs rgyas mngon shes thob par 'gyur// rdo rje ste mched
313a3(rgyud): dbabang dag pa'i le'us bcu pa'o// phan pa nyid kyis ni bste// rdo rje nyams rgyas pa'o// rdo rje chos kyi dbang zhes bya// dong sems dpas bsang bar bya// zhi ba'i sems kyis ne bste// dbang ni
313a4(rgyud): yang dag brtsam par bya// rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste// ran chen char sprin rab bsgom bya// rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni// bu mo bkug nas smad par bya// me yi char sprin 'bab pa dang / 
313a5(rgyud): gdug pa'i sems kyis bsad par bya// 'phrog pa las ni dkar mo ste// skye gnyis pa las tshangs ma nyid// dpal me sred med bu las kyang // ma bcag pa las rak+Sha nyid// dga' mchu srin rgyal mtshan
313a6(rgyud): las// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams thams cad nye bar spyad// shin du dga' ba'i sems kyis rtse// 'dod pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// mthar ne swA hA sa zhe bste// rgyas pa'i dus su
313a7(rgyud): (Ta// mthar ni hU~M phaT bsad pa la// dbang dang dgug la dzaHdang hriHlas thams cad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje kur// rdo rje mkha' 'gro
313a8(rgyud): rab bsku byed// 'bapas chog 'de bka' stsas te// ba ton 'bras bus pargyar byas pa'i/  bred dang ni kun ljongs sa// da kyis zung bcas das ni// skam sangs rgyas mchod par ba// dkon
313b1(rgyud): mchog gsum la bdag skabs mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yid dang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung // sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ nga
313b2(rgyud): chub bar du skabs su mtsho// rang bzhin don ni rab bsgrupa phyir// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// byang chub mchog gi sems ni ba skyed bgyis nas/ sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du gte
313b3(rgyud): byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi// 'gre la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po yis// sems kyi ngal ni bso bar bya// phyin nas byang chub sems gnas te/ 
313b4(rgyud): bsrung ba'i dam tshig go// bden dang brdzun par smad pa yi// rtag pas nye bar mi gos te// ma skyes pa yi sbyor ba yis// skye ba 'dir ni rab tu brjod// oM shud+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ta/ 
313b5(rgyud): mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya// d+ha ni bcu yi sbyor ba yis// khro bo bcu ni rim par dgod// gshin rje mthang byed shes rabs par// pad ma mthar byed bgegs la byar// 
313b6(rgyud): byed// Tak+ki khro bong dbyug pa sngod// mig le ba dang stobs chen dang // gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dang // de rje zhabs 'og gnas pa ni// bdud rtsi sbyor bas thams cad du// khro bo'i bsgom pas pa
313b7(rgyud): par bya// dpag tshad 'chang de khyab pa ru// bsams nas bgegs ni bskrad par bya// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus
313b8(rgyud): bar// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yang ne chu ni bsgom par bya// chu ye dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// brtul zhugs can gyis dbang chen bsgos/ 
314a1(rgyud): dbang rjen dkyil 'khor srung du ni// bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya// b+h+rUM la sa gnas ni bsams nas su// rdo rje dkyil 'khor de brtag bya// rnam pa lnga ni rab brtag \u0f7f/ 
314a2(rgyud): ye shes lnga las byung ba ye// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom par bya// oMd+harmA d+hA tu badz+rA swa b+hA ba At+ma keHhaM/ 
314a3(rgyud): rdo rje bzhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mig la sogs pa gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// thugs kyi rdo rje mkha' spyod ma// gsung gi rdo rjes spyod ma// 
314a4(rgyud): zhabs 'og gnas ma ste/ hUM AHa~M las byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi snying por bya// rdo rje dkar mo chu bdag ma// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag med ma// zhe sdang rdo rje'i gnas mnan cing // dkyi
314a5(rgyud): 'khor snying por bsgom par bya// dkar mchos kun ro langs ma// g+has+sa dri ni sgo bsrungs ma// bAk+kasI dang de khrod ma// gdol pa gapung mo mtshams su dgod// steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes
314a6(rgyud): bshad// 'og tu de bzhinas spyod ma// dbus su bdag med mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod pa che stsal pa// bdag kyang
314a7(rgyud): rab tu bslab pa'i phyir// nam mkha' rdo rje bdag la stsol// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas las byung ba
314a8(rgyud): stsol bar mdzad// ye shes kyi dbang lags la ba gang khang rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rig pa'i skyes bu dbang chen la// cod pan rang gi lhag pa'i lha// des ni dkyil 'khor dbang
314b1(rgyud): dang de// bstod dang mchod pa la sogs bya// ye shes gzhug pa de bded yang // lce yis rdo rje bdud rtsi byung // nang du brjod pa'i sbyor ba las// brtul zhugs can gyis sngags bzlas pa// rnal
314b2(rgyud): 'byor ma 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
314b3(rgyud): rarnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ces spyad par bkye/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// rnal 'byor ma nes mngon par brjod// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las// gang phyir de nyid bsten
314b4(rgyud): pa yi// rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur// rnal 'byor ma le rgyud ces bshad// pha rol phyin pa kun gyi thabs// bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// dga' mdzes mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mtsho/ 
314b5(rgyud): dang gsar kye char ba dang // dga' chen ma dang g+ha sA d+ha~M// shin du gyes rol gsang yid 'phrog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro pan gud brkyad // tshe'i de rje dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kun// gsang mdad
314b6(rgyud): 'byung ba dang // 'khor lo sdom pa grar dang 'byung gnas re// nas 'byor ma chud drug tu rab tu grags// skyes bu rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor rgyud ni yang dag bshad// btsun mo rnams de bsdu ba 'i
314b7(rgyud): phyed// rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud gshad do// dman pa rnams la byang 'i rgyud// bya min nal 'byor de lA ka la// sems can mchog lanal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor gong med de lhag la// de nas byang chub sems
314b8(rgyud): dnga' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ re sheg bdag cag gis spyod yul rnams de 'tshal na'ang // sems can gzhan rnams kyis je ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'tshal ba lags/ bcom
315a1(rgyud): / ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// stong pasnying rje thadad med// gang du sems ni rab bsgobs pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun sde yang bstan pa'o// mu stegs can dbung
315a2(rgyud): ba dang // rgol ba tshar gcod pa dang // rang gi snga'i gzhung brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bdag gi byang chub thob byir dang // gang phyir gzhan basprul ba'i phyir// des na sangs rgyas chos dang
315a3(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o// bdag 'dzin zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// chos dbyings bdag nyid sgrub thabs ni// thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yis// des ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// de nas bcom
315a4(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams dang // rgyal ba'i sras po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di thos nas dga' bar gyur te/ tshig 'di skad smras pa/ e ma kun du bzang po la// bstan pa nam mkha' las byung
315a5(rgyud): ma mkha'i dbus su sbyor ba yis// ye shes rgya mtsho nyan par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// bde ba chen po rnam 'phel bas// dam tshig thams cad bshad par bya// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'do
315a6(rgyud): bawe// bde dang rangs shing gang dang ni// glu dang rol mo'i sgra byed pas// dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis// rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu 'grub// de ltar bde bar bde bzung nas// ji ltar 'dod par smad par bya// je
315a7(rgyud): gnas su gnas nas kyang // yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// bza' dang btung ba'i sbyor ba dang // bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis// nyi ma gcig tu skul pa yis// dam pa'i de nyid 'grub pa
315a8(rgyud): tag tu rang ged ma tshig mang // rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de ltung mgon po nam snang mdzad// darje 'dzin bzhin bla ma dzod// 
315b1(rgyud): A nam mal 'a mdzod can po// ji ltar thub pa rnga chos// ji ltar mgon po bdun rgyal po// da ltar rdo rje slob dpon brjod// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje slob dpon bramache// dge ba mchog
315b2(rgyud): gsal ba bo// nam yang smad par mi bya'o// rdo rje sdom pa nas bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'ad rdo rje chen po de rje gsol bar gshed pa la/ mkha' 'grol bdag med pas 'phru
315b3(rgyud): pas bzang po smod pa dbye bar bya'o// rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag nas ni// ji ltar 'dod par 'dod pa las// rig 'dzin 'khor lo bsgyur ba nyid// dogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// dri lnga yang dag blangs

315b7(rgyud): lcags kyis dkris pa ni// mgon pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// ri lu swa ba thabs do rje zhes gape'i ting nge 'dzin to// klu li rgyal po'i mgo bsregs nas// rang byung khrag shes bsgo bar bya// rdo rje pan
315b8(rgyud): po'i nas 'byor gyis// mig sman rig pa 'dzin par 'byung // bla ma 'is bon ldan pa dang // lhag gi pags pa'i chel bus sa te// su me rjerje na la 'byor ces// rkang pa'i thug pa 'thab par 'gyur/ lan
316a1(rgyud): / lag med pa dkyi 'khor dbus// dbang po brag zug 'gram dun// de rje gang 'okun pa 'byed gyis// lha la zumar rab bsgrub bya// oM D+yan phul du ban// amra 'bras chen pa rtson
316a2(rgyud): dong gnod mangs song ba yis// gang 'og rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// yang nas yang du bskul bar bya// de nyid dngos grub thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu
316a3(rgyud): mtshungs// rdo rje gnod mdzes su chen po// phyag gnyis dal ni gcig bcan// sdigs mdzub klu yi zhags pa dang // kha dog nag po bsgom par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad blangs nas ni// rnam pa thams cad
316a4(rgyud): par bya// mi bstod pa yi yang dag mnan// puHzhes bya bde sngags brjod do// rab tu byug pa dang mig sman de rjes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom

316b5(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba las// rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba la// sems ni brtul zhugs can kyed dbrog/ pad+ma ma me tog ldan pa yi// pad ma dmar pos mchod par bya// ba
316b6(rgyud): mas mnyes pa'i rdo rje can// pad ma dmar pos khyad par du'o// dre kwa'i rab tu stor ba yis// rgyal mtshan ga pur mchod pa ni// 'di ni brtson 'grus bde chen dang // skabs dang rgyas par 'gyur bad
316b7(rgyud): mthong ba nyid kyis bskul ba yis// 'jig rten 'di ni dbang du byed// gang gis dkan mchog gsum gsad dang // gang gi sems can gsar byas dang // gang gi slob dpon spong ba dang // sangs rgyas las
316b8(rgyud): 'phyabya ba rnams// lcags kyu yis ni yang dag dgug/ lcags sgrog gis ni gang pa btsang // nags pas mgrin pa dam par bcing // dang bdag gis dkrug par bya// mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas bsams na

317a8(rgyud): mthar byed rnam par bsgom par bya// gzhan gyis me thubardo rje ni// 'jigs byed zla ba'i nor bu 'ang/ ga/ pad ma'i kho bo dmang po che// rdo rje bdud ce bdag nyid nag/ mtshams kyi gro ba cher mag cing / 
317b1(rgyud): dang 'dzin pa mtshan// gshin rje rnam srang nyin gyis te// de rje sems dpa' dathug pa can// bad pa'i khri ba rnam gcags ngas// rdo rjesams dpa' thabs stong la// de rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa

317b4(rgyud): stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das chen po// rang gis byin brlabs rim gnas te// rang gis byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid las ni bshad bya/

317b7(rgyud): rab tu 'grub// gzugs smra de bzhin de dang ne// ro dang reg bya mngon 'dod pa// deng ni rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni// mi 'dzid de phying bdag gzhan med// de ltar dor bad las byung ba// ne ba'i bde ba'i na
317b8(rgyud): 'dod// dpa' rlabs med cing snang ba med// nam tog med cing yi ger med// myos byed cung bad ba srungs pa'o// bdag gas bdag nyid mi rig go/ dga'abral dga' ba dag gis thar// rtog pa'i
318a1(rgyud): rnam par spangs// 'gyur med 'khrul ba la 'das shing // ci yon rje rnam par gsapa// bems min rnam pa he draka/ rnam pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor// rang nyid mgon pa ha nga?/

318a3(rgyud): mgo bo dra ba'i skud par bcas// lus ni yod min ltar gzigs shing // skad cig kyi'i rdo rje'i gzugs 'dzidan// ji ltar nam mkha' mi dmigs shing // mtshan ma med cing mabyung dang // go
318a4(rgyud): med cing 'khrul pa med// sgrib pa ldan rnam par spangs// de ltar me long gzugs brnyan ni/ gtogs nas bde ba rnam spangs pa// de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka'i// rnam pa k+Sha rung gsal bar mthong
318a5(rgyud): nyid don dang dbang po dang // phung po nom mkha' lta zur yod// lus ni bde ba nyid brjod cing // 'du byed rnams kyis zil me gnon// gzugs ni mig zhes mi 'dzin te// sgra ni thos pa po les med/ 
318a6(rgyud): yis rin mo tshor te// dri ni sA yis kyang ma yin// reg bya lus kyi gong bus min// 'on kyang bde chen tshul las ni// bud med bzang po mthong bas bde// snabs klu lo bde bas pazang // sdom
318a7(rgyud): pas dri'i bde ba che// skye gnas reg pa'i bde chen dang // ro yi btung ba'i stong ba las// gang gis bde ba 'gog par byed// bde ba chen pos 'gro ba khyag/ bdi ba ma gtogs mi shes so// sangs
318a8(rgyud): rgyas byang chub sems dpalas// mkha' 'grol dang btsun mo bzang // sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma ni// bde bar dbyen cing rnam par sad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
318b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi bde ba chen po'i tshig thos nas tshig 'di skad smras pa/ phal ba'i rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir// bsgom pa yang dag rab tu grags// phal ba'i gnas skabs gzhom pa'i phyir// bsgom pa
318b2(rgyud): yang ni sgom pa min// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa de bzhin te// 'on kyang mi la tsang ba'i tshad mnyam par snang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bsgom par bya'o// 
318b3(rgyud): rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus can bsgom pa'i thabs kyi dgos pa nyid de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das gyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag 'ad gos pa yod de// bcom ldan 'das ming
318b4(rgyud): legs/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal ba// sangs rgyas nyid do// sangs rgyas nyid ci lags// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci lags/ zhus can 'di ni bden pa'o// de ni'i slad
318b5(rgyud): 'dzer bas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga ri mtshan sum cu ca gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang ba brgyad nus brgyan pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mi 'dra ba'i phyir bsgrub pa yin no// phyags
318b6(rgyud): gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das bems po lags sam/ dri rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ nga nyid pe long lta bu'i ye shes so// ma long gA 'u ye shes de ci lags// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka
318b7(rgyud): bden pa ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa ma len pa dang / sgyu ma yin pa dang / sgrib ma yin pa ste/ de lta nga nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / nga nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / bged bya ba dan tan gyi
318b8(rgyud): shes dang / des tshamazeng thengs shir byanam par dag pa / den byeng byang chus sems dpa' chen panam pa nga bral ba'i byed du ba srang pa sna shig/  she dngos dang dngos pod dang / 
319a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs par brjod// gzugs dang gzugs med ldan pa'i mchog/ zab mo ni ba'i chos dang ldan// sems dpa' chen pa he ruka/ bdag med lhan cag mnyam spong ba// ba
319a2(rgyud): las ni bems min ngapa// 'jig rten kun rdzob bem bong // skyes pa 'ad med ma ning dang // 'gro bang yis yang dag klub// dpyir 'dus pa zhes bya nyid// rgyal ba rgya ma tshor bdag gis bshad// 
319a3(rgyud): dang byang sems rnams// ma ning gnas sa yang dag 'grub// gang zhig lha mo bdag med de// rang bzhin gyi ni btsun mo yon// sangs rgyas he ru kang yin// de nyid phyir nam ning ste// 'gro
319a4(rgyud): dngos po gnyis mthong nas// thabs dang shes bdag nyid dang // shin du mnyam sbyor rnal 'byor gyis// mi skrod med cing bdag mnga' med// dam pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i// gnas
319a5(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen pa rdo rje 'dod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje yan lag med pa shin du dga' ba chen pos tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ phyag drug pa dang
319a6(rgyud): bar bcas zhal gcig rabab 'dzin pa dang // brgyad gnyis lo la na sar mor// rdo rje yan lag med pa 'grub// dpa' bo'i g.yas par mnga' nyid de// lag pa g.yas par ral gre nyid// 
319a7(rgyud): yang ma long dkri pa bya// lag pa g.yan pa dgag nyid de// gnyis pa la ni dbang mchog nyid// ke ke wa le ya la ga ste// phyag drug nyid du bskum par bya// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas
319a8(rgyud): / rngub ste gang thasams nas // de rje thub mo grub par 'gyur// yang papes ma 'dzin pa 'bigs// ma sha ga yas sre gar brag// ral kris skyesas bsreg par bya/ 
319b1(rgyud): be long bstan par bya// gzu yis rkang pa bcings nas ni// ut+pal zhags pas dgug par bya// sngagala'ang bar 'dod pa dang // snyan pa'i skad ni rab tu smra// ha dang se ni byed pa ma// rangs shing lan
319b2(rgyud): lag sa mas brgyan// kha na so ces gang ba dang // 'dod pa stobs dang bral ba bsam// rdo rje mchod pa'i stor ba yis// mi 'gyur sems kyis rjes chags bya// 'dod par sngags nam btsas pas//

319b4(rgyud): 'gyur// zla ba phyed kyi sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa khri'i sbyor ba las// g.yo ba gser gyi rna cham// shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bsgrub// haM gi sa bon las skyes pa// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par
319b5(rgyud): brgyan// chang gi btung ba'i rab skor bas// rdo rje phan lag med pa bsgrag/ ma bcos mchog gi sa bon ni// bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin can// bde ba chen po mchog tu ne/ 
319b6(rgyud): dga' bar byed// 'di ni srog ni chen poste// mchog tu dga' ba mdzes ma rnyed // bde dang sdug bsngal rtag tu de'i// dran pa de ltar rab tu grags// mya ngan 'dod chags de bzhin gdungs// dga'
319b7(rgyud): dadang dga' bral de bzhin no// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nyid dbyangs yig drug par brjod// zla ba phyed pas gang dag ldan// theg les mgo bo nyid du mchod// sems can gyi ni kun gzhi
319b8(rgyud): darnams kyini khyad par du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems chen po ca rdzas bon gyi yi ge thos nas sems pasus
320a1(rgyud): pa gsal ba nye bar gyur nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems dpa' med cing bsgom pa med// sngags med lnga yang med pa ste// sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba// 'di ni byang chub rim

320a3(rgyud): sems ni brtan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sngags med bzlas pa'ang yod ma yin// 'gro ba gsum po thams cad med/

320a5(rgyud): 'jig rten pa nyid 'khor// 'di ni byang chub rim brtan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma skyes pa dang mi dmigs pa// me phyed nam mkha' lta bu ste
320a6(rgyud): ba cing zhi ba'i rang bzhin ni// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ral gri'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sgyu ma ji ltar me long ltar// nam mkha' ji ltar bde
320a7(rgyud): skur// de lang dngos pa yangs shes pa// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ba bdag med mas de skad ces bka' stsal to// stong nyid dri me da dam pa'i gas

320b1(rgyud): 'asgom// de na mchog gi bsgom pas bsgom// sran gyi'o// sngags dang yi ga rnam par spangs// 'di ni sems med pag sa med// 'di de dam pa'i dran chen to// khro ba meng cing gang ba mang / gos dag

320b3(rgyud): bede brdzun pa min pa ltar// de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi// lus kyi rang bzhin rnyog pa med// 'khor thams cad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs byed

320b7(rgyud): migs ni 'ben la bya// hUM ges kha ni dgang ba dang // g.yas bkyang la sogs sor ba yis// gshin rje srin po bsad par bya// 'dir mang brjod pas ce zhig bya// kun rdzob tu ni bsdus pa tsam
320b8(rgyud): dis zang rtsa ba kang / de da da nga 'dzad spyad // da nas btsam ldan 'das de das ma ba gnas byang nyid de 'on pa skams par 'gas te/ mam sgra gas pa 'di byed pang nge gas

321a2(rgyud): yang rgyas/ mang ba na dang phreng 'dag// dun gsus gas/ dpa gsung bdung bas badrung ba bya// drang dang brdungs pas rgyam pa ste/  kyi la kho gas pa ga pa la stegs pa/ 
321a3(rgyud): ba 'di ni bla na med// rang gi tshigs bcad mang ba na// bstan pa 'dis ni ci zhig bya// ji snyed rol mo'i bstan bcos su// de ni rdo rje ngos mo'i sgra// de nas bcom ldan 'das dri bzang po 'dorje zhes bya ba'i

321b1(rgyud): rdo rje gang 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gus bcas dang par sreg par ldan// dang po brtse bcas rjes bya bas// rkang stabs brgyad du cho ga yis// de rje gom pas rol pa/

322a2(rgyud): ba pra la s+yAd/ 'byas mchags pa ga// oMs nus pa das na/ no dang can dam pa'an// maM badz+ra bi drA ya swA tre/ 'brasas pa'i'o// mims pa kA ya swAH/ nas // sem d+ha ba

323a1(rgyud): rtsa gsum gnas pa'i lha// 'og min du ni gnas pa dang // gang zhig rgyal chen gnas pa dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang bskur nyid dang ni// 'phrul dga' ye ni lha rnams dang // gang zhig dag pa'i ga

323b1(rgyud): rang ga lhag pa'i ltar sbyor bas// de rje sems dpa' snyems byas nas// gnas ni thams cad bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug nas// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sker bdag/

323b6(rgyud): ngo // g.yon pa brkyang ba dang / gabs pa brkyang ba dang / mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / rdo rje'i rkang skabs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sna tshogs thams cad dang / rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang /

324a2(rgyud): po 'joms shing dag byed pa// dge zhing mun pa rnamasal ba// bdag gi dang ba 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// 'di ni dri babang dge ba ste// dag pa'i skye gnas las
324a3(rgyud): dag pa// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// oM badz+ra g+haN+De aHdril bu blang ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA badre hUM/ rdo rje bzung ba'i sngags so// dadro
324a4(rgyud): tshogs rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur// sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas la// tshig ni 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ 
324a5(rgyud): gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// rje las skyes rang bzhin can// lag par thod pa kha T+wAM ga ga bsam nas sgo zhing bzlas pa'o// phyag bzhi pa ni nyid dang yang // zhal gsupa rdo rje las byung ba/ 
324a6(rgyud): / dmar po de bzhin sngo// phag mo lhan cig mnyam skyong ba'o// phyag drug pa la kha dog gnag/ lcags sgrogs ma dang lhan cig slong // sangs rgyas kA ye thod pa can// zhal gsum nyid du sbyor bar bya// 
324a7(rgyud): mdog dmar phyag ni bzhi pa dang // zhal gcig ma dang dbang byedangs// de rje chos kyi gnas mnanam// 'di ni ku ru kukling brjod// 'di ni sngags ni brjod pa'o// btsun mo chos la gnas pa ni/ 
324a8(rgyud): dkyi spyan sngar bdag gis de// dus gcig pa sengs su de// bdag nyid kyis ni 'de bas nas// rgyas pa nyid du rab tud dkye// 'di sa bdag gis thos pa ste// dus gcig dus nigatse
324b1(rgyud): na'o// bdag gis bcom ldan sman sngar te// btsun mo'i chos su dam rgyas pas// lha/ spangs dgug dadabang chen dang // don byed dus dang chang sogs dang // lam gyi de nyid las skyes pa// thub pa tshe

327a1(rgyud): / bka' las 'da' mi bya// sun la smad pa nyid mi b+hA// sems can rnams la gdug byams dang // byang chub sems ni spang ma bya// bdag gzhan ches la slad mi bya// skal med de

330a8(rgyud): bcug nyis yang na bcu drug gas// brnyed te shu lon pa'ang rang // te shu lan chag phyag rgya ga nar// des ni dngos grub zag re byed// sring mo yang na bu mo'am// chung ma sngam la dbul pa// de nas snga
330b1(rgyud): tshigs ngas ces no// tha sa dang bas mchod bdaH// snga tshogs ngas ni brgya sogs dang // rin canas tshig sargyang sa tshan mchog/ su tag phreng ba rin par med// grangs med gser gyis mchod rgya
330b2(rgyud): reng ban chad bdag ni 'bangs// chen po'i chen po mchod pa bzhis// de kar bu ma cho ga les// 'bad de bri ma mchod par bya// bla ma'i gzug pa ni bdag dang yin// bdag mthod byas na dngos grub 'thos/ 
330b3(rgyud): dacig phyag rgya che// mchod pa byas nas bsnyen par bya// bsten pa las ni gang zhig 'byung // slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya// sbom po mtha' lhag sbyar ba yis// kalongs spyod nang du gzhug par bya// 
330b4(rgyud): don pa shes kye// bu me bde bci ga rnga// srog dang rtsel ba mnyam byas nas// shin tu lags dgyes kyis mchod bya// rin chen khal hUM pa Ta sngags// bkod nas mnga' la bskor bar bya// de le dus pa
330b5(rgyud): dga' skad cig/ ce skar rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur// de ltar phyag rgyal bshad bya// 'di ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do// de nas slob ma'i lag tu ni// rkyen nas 'di skad sgru bar bya// nga yi bka' lung tog med
330b6(rgyud): bas// pad+ma'i don la ji bzhin gyis// pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus na ni// rdor dbyings dbang phyug ma ni bzhugs// de ma rnyed pa'i b.raN+Da ni// thabs gzhan la ni byang chub med// don rang bzhin dga' ba'i gzugs// tra
330b7(rgyud): re' phra mo yang dag mchod// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las srab dpon dang spobs brtag pa dang / yo da bul ba dang / dbang bskung ba zhes bya ba 'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas gsang ba bshud pa
330b8(rgyud): mchog dang rab mchog mchog ges chog/ phung po lnga yi bdag nyid su// legs dgyes dbang po'i 'khor lo drug/ babyed byad gzugs char yang ni// rlung gi la khor lo'i nang da 'azhugs// byed min gang ba lang
331a1(rgyud): // ma yin// chu le zla ba bzhin du mthong // sku 'phral chen po 'gro ba'im// char yang grangs med bsnyen pa yin// de ni mchog dang gzhan mchog phra// skye med gnyis med bsam du med// rlung gi
331a2(rgyud): 'khor lo skyed byed ma// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed dge' ba'o// ma 'i 'khor la'i nang na ni// thig le gcig pa yi ge med// thams cad nang yod lag sun yin// thams cad khyab dang bde ba 'thung // bde ba
331a3(rgyud): bar byed pa'o// dbyangs dang dpe byad dang bral le// grangs med pa yi khams gsum ni// chu dang skye bar byed pa'o// tshul ni glo bur ba yi gnas// rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba// dngos po sprul lce 'dra ba yin// 
331a4(rgyud): mthe ris sa ni skyed pa'o// yi ge ma yin khams kyang med// zla tshes thig le rgyan dang bral// skye med grangs med mi zad pa// de ni don dam tshul yin no// sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas// lte ba'i snyomapa
331a5(rgyud): su grags// chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tsam ni// dri ma med pa sprul mig 'dra// dri med ma bcos pa yi gnas// gnas med rnam pa med pa'o// g.yo ba med dang brjod du med// dbugs kyi rgyu ba med pa'o// 
331a6(rgyud): mchog ge ye shes tshul can ni// bcu gsum dbang phyug gis mi shes// mchog ge longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// mchog gi rnam par bdud rtsi mchog/ theg pa mchog gi mtha' na yod// ji ltar chang
331a7(rgyud): ki mthu bzhin no// thams cad bdag nyid byed gzugs bral// gzugs med bdag nyid kyis bzhugs so// gzhan mchog bde chen 'khor lo la// thams cad mtha' yi mtha' na bzhugs// smra bar
331a8(rgyud): da dang blta bya med// mtshan ngan thams cad med pa'o// badz+rad med mi zad zhi ba ste// rang dka' nyams myong rnam pa'o// bla ma yi ni bka' drin gyis// lags dgyes dbang po rjod par 'gyur// de lta bu la la
331b1(rgyud): // rnam par shes drug rang bzhin can// 'khor lo drug gi dbus sun// don dam par na bshad pa'o// steng dang 'og gi sbyor ba pas// basbyar byad gzugs kyis ni yod// bcu gnyis med dang drug gi byed/ 
331b2(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhi de bzhi brgyad// brgyad gnyis dang ni 'argyad bzhin// 'di ni 'khor lo tshwa skyes drug/ dpal phyag rgya chen po'i theg le las sbyong ba drug gi mtshan nyid dang 'khor ma drug gang dashing ba zhes bya
331b3(rgyud): stegasum pa'o// // nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo// tsa yi 'khor lo 'byung ba mchog/ stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// rtsa rnams kyi ni rigs bshad do// rigs chen po yi rgyud chen por// rgyas par bdag
331b4(rgyud): sagasal bar byas// 'di rul khor lo drug gi grangs// mdor bsdus pa ni bshad par bya// rlung gi 'khor lo'i rtsa drug ni// g.yob nam mkha' me dang sbubs// rA bskor dang ni 'jigs chen po// 6
331b5(rgyud): khor lo'i gnas// 'dzin ma dang ni ro ma dang // rtog med ma ni gu gsum gnas// me yi 'khor lo'i nang du ni// rtsa yi dbang po lngar shes bya// mgyogs ma dang ni yang dag mgyogs// shin du bzang dang
331b6(rgyud): zang 'gro dang // stobs chen ma dang 'jigs chen ma// nga rgyal che dang 'jigs byed che// mthus myur ma dang mthu yi cha// mthu li chu dang mthu dri dang // mabu ma dang ni mthus 'bab ma// gtsub dang nur da
331b7(rgyud): mthu ngu ba// rngam pazab na mkhar 'gro// bya me yan lag bya 'grom// phyug po 'jigs mang ro dang // brtul ma mchod ma nyid dang ne// sgra ma spa 'thung sdig can ma// pad+ma sdong bum sngon mo// zil ba le la
331b8(rgyud): 'byung sbra ma dang // phyen phyogs kha dang dkrug pa dang // dkrug pa'i nga rgyal dang po mo// tshel lhomo dang tshe'u drem// tshe'u bdud ma dang brtson 'grus ma// tshe'u khyim ma dang tshe'u kha ma// tshe'u 'od ma dang chos
332a1(rgyud): mug/ 'budam bdag ma 'od ma dang // dri med dang ni dri sreg dang // zag sgom dang thag dga' ma// zag mo dang de thag dus pa// phum ron sum skye phram dang // lo ma dang ni tshor lo dang // gos kyi
332a2(rgyud): dang gus pa byed ma//  'di bcan po brgyad du drang// drug da byani'i byams na// lte ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor long gnas// rin chen ma dang pad chen ma// gshe can ma dang spobs chenam// mamatshan
